Name: Barret
Line: C'mon newcomer. Follow me.

Name: Biggs
Line: Wow! You used to be in SOLDIER all right! ...Not everyday ya find one in a group like AVALANCHE.

Name: Jessie
Line: SOLDIER? Aren't they the enemy?What's he doing with us in AVALANCHE?

Name: Biggs
Line: Hold it, Jessie. He WAS in SOLDIER.He quit them and now is one of us.Didn't catch your name...

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Cloud.

Name: Biggs
Line: Cloud, eh? I'm...

Name: Cloud
Line: I don't care what your names are. Once this job's over... I'm outta here.

Name: Barret
Line: The hell you all doin'!? I thought I told you never to move in a group!Our target's the North Mako Reactor. We'll meet on the bridge in front of it.

Name: Barret
Line: Ex-SOLDIER, huh? Don't trust ya!If you push the Directional button while pushing the [CANCEL] button to run. (earlier marked X)

Name: Wedge
Line: I'll secure the escape passage. Concentrate on the mission, Cloud.Geez, we're really gonna blow this huge furnace up? This'll be somethin' to see!

Name: Barret
Line: Yo! This your first time in a reactor?

Name: Cloud
Line: No. After all, I did work for Shinra, y'know.

Name: Barret
Line: The planet's full of Mako energy. People here use it every day.

Name: Barret
Line: It's the life blood of this planet. But Shinra keeps suckin' the blood out with these weird machines.

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm not here for a lecture. Let's just hurry.

Name: Barret
Line: That's it! You're comin' with me from now on.

Name: Jessie
Line: Biggs and I got the code for this door.

Name: Biggs
Line: Code deciphered.

Name: Biggs
Line: Think how many of our people risked their lives, just for this code...

Name: Jessie
Line: Code deciphered.

Name: Jessie
Line: Push that button over there!

Name: Barret
Line: Little by little the reactors'll drain out all the life. And that'll be that.

Name: Cloud
Line: It's not my problem.

Name: Barret
Line: The planet's dyin', Cloud!

Name: Cloud
Line: The only thing I care about is finishin' this job before security and the Roboguards come.

Name: Jessie
Line: Push the [OK] button in front of a ladder to grab on to it. After that, use the [Directional button] to move up and down.

Name: Barret
Line: When we blow this place, this ain't gonna be nothin' more than a hunka junk.Cloud, you set the bomb.

Name: Cloud
Line: Shouldn't you do it?

Name: Barret
Line: Jus' do it! I gotta watch to make sure you don't pull nothin'.

Name: Cloud
Line: Fine, be my guest.

Name: Barret
Line: ......What's wrong?

Name: Cloud
Line: Huh?

Name: Barret
Line: What's wrong, Cloud? Hurry it up!

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Yeah, sorry.

Name: Barret
Line: Heads up, here they come!

Name: Cloud
Line: Barret, be careful!Attack while it's tail's up!It's gonna counterattack with its laser.

Name: Cloud
Line: Come on, let's get outta here!

Name: Cloud
Line: You all right?

Name: Jessie
Line: My leg got stuck.Thanks!

Name: Biggs
Line: Let's go!

Name: Jessie
Line: Code deciphered

Name: Jessie
Line: Alright, be careful.

Name: Biggs
Line: Code deciphered

Name: Biggs
Line: That should keep the planet going... at least a little longer.

Name: Wedge
Line: Yeah.

Name: Jessie
Line: OK! Now everyone get back.

Name: Barret
Line: All right, now let's get out of here.Rendezvous at Sector 8 station! Split up and get on the train!

Name: Cloud
Line: H, hey!

Name: Barret
Line: If it's about your money Save it 'til we're back at the hideout.

Name: Flower Girl
Line: Excuse me.What happened?

Name: Cloud
Line: - You'd better get out of here- Nothing... hey, listen...

Name: Redhead
Line: Just what the hell's going on!?

Name: Man with Hat
Line: Wonder what that is on the wall over there. Let's see...Don't be fooled by Shinra! Mako energy doesn't last forever! Mako is the planet's lifesource! The end is in sight!Protectors of the planet: AVALANCHE

Name: Soldier
Line: Hey! You there!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Shinra soldiers...- Fight them- Later!

Name: Cloud
Line: Shinra soldiers...- Fight them

Name: Soldiers
Line: That's him!

Name: Cloud
Line: hmph!

Name: Cloud
Line: Shinra soldiers...- Fight them

Name: Soldiers
Line: Over here!!

Name: Cloud
Line: hmph!

Name: Soldier
Line: That's as far as you go.

Name: Cloud
Line: I don't have time to be messin' around with you guys.

Name: Soldier
Line: Enough babbling...... Grab him!!

Name: Wedge
Line: Cloud never came.

Name: Biggs
Line: Cloud...... Wonder if he was killed?

Name: Barret
Line: No way!!

Name: Jessie
Line: Cloud......

Name: Biggs
Line: Say, do you think Cloud's......Going to fight to the end for AVALANCHE!?

Name: Barret
Line: The hell would I know!? Do I look like a mind reader?

Name: Wedge
Line: Hey, Barret! What about our money...?

Name: (unclear)
Line: Uh, nothin' ...sorry.

Name: (from outside)
Line: Ahhh......

Name: Biggs
Line: Cloud!!

Name: Jessie
Line: Cloud......

Name: Wedge
Line: Cloud!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Looks like I'm a little late.

Name: Barret
Line: You damn right, you're late!!Come waltzin' in here makin' a big scene!

Name: Cloud
Line: It's no big deal. Just what I always do.

Name: Barret
Line: Shi't!Havin' everyone worried like that you don't give a damn 'bout no one but yourself!

Name: Cloud
Line: Hmm...... You were worried about me!

Name: Barret
Line: Wha!?I'm takin' it outta your money, hot stuff!Wake up!We're movin' out! Follow me!

Name: Wedge
Line: Hey, Cloud!! You were great back there!

Name: Biggs
Line: Heh heh...... Cloud! We'll do even better next time.

Name: Jessie
Line: Be careful, I'll shut this.

Name: Shinra Manager
Line: This is why I hate the last train. Hoo-boy...

Name: Train Bum
Line: Huh...? This is my house, so make yourselves at home.

Name: Bald Man
Line: You see the headlines in the Shinra Times?The terrorists that bombed the No. 1 Reactor are based somewhere in the slums....blowing up a Reactor... they sure put some thought into this one.They must have a real calculating leader. I wonder what they'll do next?

Name: Barret
Line: Stop actin' like a damn kid. Si'down an' shu'up!

Name: Biggs
Line: It seems this train hasn't switched to security mode yet.I'm sure that will change by tomorrow....YAWN... that sure took its toll on me. I'm gonna sleep till we get to the station.

Name: Train Worker
Line: Please!! You're bothering the other passengers.

Name: Wedge
Line: Someday AVALANCHE's gonna be famous... and me, too!Cloud!!Don't ya think I got a bright future ahead of me?

Name: Cloud
Line: - What do you have in mind?- I wouldn't hold my breath

Name: Jessie
Line: Hey, Cloud. You want to look at this with me?It's a map of the Midgar Rail System. Let's look at it together. I'll explain it to you.I like this kinda stuff. Bombs and monitors... you know, flashy stuff.Okay, it's about to start.This is a complete model of the city of Midgar.It's about a 1/10000 scale.The top plate is about 50 meters above ground.A main support structure holds the plate up in the center, and there are other support structures built in each section...psst... whisper... whisper (The No. 1 Reactor we blew up was in the northern section.)Then there's No. 2, No. 3 all the way up to the No. 8 Reactor.The 8 Reactors provide Midgar with electricity.Each town used to have a name, but no one in Midgar remembers them.Instead of names, we refer to them by numbered sectors. That's the kind of place this is.Phew..., this is next! Look.This is the route this train is on.The route spirals around the main support structure.We should be coming around the center area, right now.At each checkpoint, an ID sensor device is set up.It can check the identities and backgrounds on each and every passenger on the train by linking it up to the central data bank at Shinra headquarters.whisper... whisper... (Anyone could tell that we look suspicious, so we're using fake ID's.)

Name: Jessie
Line: Speak of the devil...That light means that we're in the ID Security Check area....whisper... whisper... (When the lights go off, you never know what kind of creeps'll come out.)...anyhow, we're almost back now. That's a relief.

Name: Wedge
Line: I'm seein' stars. This sucks. I hate the dark.

Name: Jessie
Line: I know! Next time, I'll give you one I made myself.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Thanks anyway- Looking forward to it

Name: Jessie
Line: We're almost there. After talking with you, I really want to do it!I think you've lit my fuse!

Name: Biggs
Line: ...snore... heebeebeeheebee... snore... (Don't act so damn big, Barret... snooze...)

Name: Barret
Line: Look... you can see the surface now. This city don't have no day or night.If that plate weren't there... we could see the sky.

Name: Cloud
Line: A floating city... Pretty unsettling scenery.

Name: Barret
Line: Huh?Never expect ta hear that outta someone like you....you jes' full of surprises.The upper world... a city on a plate...It's 'cuz of that &^#$# 'pizza', that people underneath are sufferin'!And the city below is full of polluted air.On topa that, the Reactor keeps drainin' up all the energy.

Name: Cloud
Line: Then why doesn't everyone move onto the Plate?

Name: Barret
Line: Dunno. Probably 'cuz they ain't got no money. Or, maybe...'Cuz they love their land, no matter how polluted it gets.

Name: Cloud
Line: I know... no one lives in the slums because they want to.It's like this train. It can't run anywhere except where its rails take it.

Name: Barret
Line: Yo!! Get over here, all'ya!!

Name: Barret
Line: Yo, Cloud! You lissen up!

Name: Barret
Line: This mission was a success. But don't get lazy now.The hard part's still to come! Don't y'all be scared of that explosion!Cause the next one's gonna be bigger than that!Meet back at the hideout!! Move out!

Name: Station Man
Line: When you've been a train man as long as I have, you see a lot of people and a lot of lives.People meeting, parting, joy, sadness... After a while, it doesn't even get to you anymore.I wonder how long it's been... There's an invisible rail between me and the passengers.I could never live their lives. I'm just a train man plain and simple. It's easier that way.That's not to say that the crossing gate of my heart doesn't hurt now and again.Back during the war, I remember there was a lot of painful scenes then.But, that's a story for another day...First train leaves Midgar at 05:04am.

Name: Guy
Line: I'm not letting you go tonight.

Name: Girl
Line: Wow!

Name: Guy
Line: Isn't there somewhere we could go to be alone?

Name: Girl
Line: Wow!There's only the train graveyard around here. And they say there's ghosts around too!

Name: Girl
Line: What?

Name: Man by Fence
Line: Hey now!! Oops!!What on earth are you doing? Just butt out......geez!Huh? You came to see it, too?There was a bombing on top. If this pillar should come down, everyone in the slums is dust...Well, there's no point in worryin' about that.Hey!! Look! It's huge, ain't it?

Name: Man by Fence
Line: Hey... This is a strange and wonderful place.This is my place, but you can come here when you want. Bye, bro!

Name: Barret
Line: Yo, Cloud! Over here, now!

Name: Soldier 1
Line: What the hell do you want? You know who I am?You can't pass. I got the miserable job of keepin' scum like you from trying to sneak in here.

Name: Soldier 2
Line: W, wow! You're great!!

Name: Soldier 1
Line: Damn right!! Don't waste time talkin's, what I always say!

Name: Soldier 2
Line: But, uh, I......Ah... eh... uhm............ Excuse me. You cannot pass without the proper clearance.Did I do good this time?

Name: Soldier 1
Line: You gotta be tougher!

Name: Soldier 2
Line: But, uh, I......

Name: Barret
Line: Heh heh...You wanna meet your little baby?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Little baby?- Out of my way!

Name: Gossip
Line: Did you hear?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Don't care- No, what?

Name: Kid
Line: Explosions! Explosions! Oh Man! AVALANCHE is so cool!

Name: Johnny's Cousin
Line: Oh Jesus!! What the hell's wrong tonight!!I thought that long blackout was strange.They say a Mako Reactor was destroyed above.I was jes sittin' here drinkin', watchin' the news by myself.'n' all of a sudden I get kicked outta the &*%$ store. What's up with that!?I wasn't even done with my drink. I didn't even pay my bill...

Name: Johnny
Line: Woo...... ah geez, I'm blitzed. I jes love them homemade cocktails. But they sure do creep up on ya.

Name: A sign to the far left
Line: Don't be taken in by the Shinra.Mako energy will not last forever.Mako is the life of the Planet and that life is finite.The end is coming.Saviors of the Planet: AVALANCHE

Name: Cloud
Line: What crappy handwriting. And look at all this graffiti!

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: (from inside)We're closed today. Come back tomorrow.

Name: Black-haired Man
Line: Hey!! What the, YOU?Anyone talking to me must be a novice.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yep, that's me- I used to be with SOLDIER, the name's Cloud

Name: Big Man
Line: Unn......!! Who the hell are you!? No unauthorized access.Since today's special, I'm gonna let you in on a juicy bit of news. But you gotta keep it to yourself.Do you know what's been going on......?

Name: Cloud
Line: - What, that again?- ............

Name: Man in Hat
Line: You know what I do? I'll bet you don't.You come here tomorrow and I'll tell you.Ahh, there just ain't no good jobs here in the slums.I wanna go to the upper world.

Name: Barret
Line: Ok! Go on ahead.You! Cloud!! Get off your slow-movin' ass!!

Name: Marlene
Line: Papa!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Marlene! Aren't you going to say anything to Cloud?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- Not this time

Name: Tifa
Line: Sorry, Cloud. Marlene seems a little shy.

Name: Biggs
Line: Aaah!! Nothin' like that first drink after a job.Hic!!Why don't you have one too?

Name: Cloud
Line: - No- Yeah, why not?

Name: Biggs
Line: Hic...!!Oh...... Don't tell Barret what I just said.

Name: Wedge
Line: Oh, Cloud!Tifa really knows how to cook. Mmm, mmm......Anyway, let me tell you somethin'

Name: Cloud
Line: - About what?- I'm not interested in your stories

Name: Jessie
Line: Careless...... You're getting all excited.Wonder what for......?

Name: Marlene
Line: Papa, welcome home!

Name: Tifa
Line: You all right, Barret?

Name: Barret
Line: Great!!Get in here, fools!! We're startin' the meetin'!!

Name: Guy
Line: Hey, come over here.

Name: Girl
Line: But people will...

Name: Guy
Line: Who cares?

Name: Girl
Line: But... There's a weirdo over there.

Name: Guy
Line: Huh?

Name: Gossip
Line: Did you hear?

Name: Cloud
Line: - 'Bout what?- Don't care

Name: Johnny's Cousin
Line: There's a TV in there, but my cheap aunt won't let me in the house. Look for yourself.

Name: Johnny's Mom
Line: (from inside her house)I'm not opening up. Go away!!

Name: Johnny
Line: Hey!! Open up! C'mon baby!!It's me! Johnny! Mom!!

Name: Johnny's Cousin
Line: Now that you mention it, there used to be an outside TV monitor here in the slums.But that Barret, busted it up.Shot it up with that weird machine gun hand of his. Blam, blam, blam.I think it was when President Shinra was on.He was on again this morning, too, you know.Tifa better watch out for her TV.

Name: Kid
Line: All's quiet!! Shh, I'm spying now!OH!! There's something!! DANGER!! ALERT!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Sit down.

Name: Tifa
Line: How about......something to drink?

Name: Cloud
Line: - I don't feel like it- Give me something hard

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud. Are you feeling all right?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...yeah... Why?

Name: Tifa
Line: No reason. You just look a little tired I guess.You'd better go down below.

Name: Wedge
Line: You think I'm a little too uptight?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah...- No...

Name: Jessie
Line: Oops...Hey, look at the news... What a blast.Think it was all because of my bomb? But all I really did was just make it like the computer told me.Oh no! I must've made a miscalculation somewhere.Hey, that was my bomb's debut. Makes me kinda proud.

Name: Barret
Line: Yo, Cloud! There's somethin' I wanna ask ya.Was there anyone from SOLDIER fighting us today?

Name: Cloud
Line: None. I'm positive.

Name: Barret
Line: You sound pretty sure.

Name: Cloud
Line: If there was anyone from SOLDIER you wouldn't be standing here now.

Name: Barret
Line: Don't you go thinkin' you so bad jes cuz you was in SOLDIER.

Name: Barret
Line: Yeah, you're strong.Probably all them guys in SOLDIER are.But don't forget that your skinny ass's workin' for AVALANCHE now!Don't get no ideas 'bout hangin' on to Shinra.

Name: Cloud
Line: Stayin' with Shinra?You asked me a question and I answered it... that's all.I'm going upstairs. I want to talk about my money.

Name: Marlene
Line: Papa, you're so great!

Name: Tifa
Line: Wait, Cloud!

Name: Barret
Line: Tifa! Let him go!Looks like he still misses the Shinra!

Name: Cloud
Line: Shut up!I don't care about either Shinra or SOLDIER!But don't get me wrong!I don't care about AVALANCHE or the Planet for that matter!

Name: Tifa
Line: Straighten things up with everyone for me.

Name: Jessie
Line: Money...Oh my. It must have been for a lot of it.Sure! Well, what the hell? It's a verbal agreement. Now let me figure this out.Oh stop it, Cloud! Did you hear me?

Name: Wedge
Line: ......Cloud.You say you don't care, but you came to talk to me.Cloud... You just want friends.Isn't that right?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Blow off- I really don't care

Name: Tifa
Line: Listen, Cloud. I'm asking you. Please join us.

Name: Cloud
Line: Sorry Tifa...

Name: Tifa
Line: The Planet is dying. Slowly but surely it's dying.Someone has to do something.

Name: Cloud
Line: So let Barret and his buddies do something about it.It's got nothin' to do with me.

Name: Tifa
Line: So! You're really leaving!?You're just going to walk right out ignoring your childhood friend!?

Name: Cloud
Line: What......?- How can you say that!- ......Sorry

Name: Tifa
Line: (she says the same thing regardless)......You forgot the promise, too.

Name: Cloud
Line: Promise?

Name: Tifa
Line: So you DID forget.Remember...... Cloud. It was seven years ago...

Name: Tifa
Line: Look, the well.Do you remember?

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah... back then.I thought you would never come, and I was getting a little cold.

Name: Tifa
Line: You remember now, don't you... our promise?

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm not a hero and I'm not famous. I can't keep...... the promise.

Name: Tifa
Line: But you got your childhood dream, didn't you? You joined SOLDIER.So come on! You've got to keep your promise......

Name: Barret
Line: Wait a sec big-time SOLDIER!A promise is a promise! Here!!

Name: Cloud
Line: This is my pay? Don't make me laugh.

Name: Tifa
Line: What? Then you'll...!!

Name: Cloud
Line: You got the next mission lined up? I'll do it for 3000.

Name: Tifa
Line: It's ok, it's ok.psst, psst...... (We're really hurting for help, right?)

Name: Barret
Line: Uh...... ugh...... (That money's for Marlene's schoolin'......)2000!

Name: Tifa
Line: Thanks, Cloud.

Name: Tifa
Line: Good Morning! Cloud!Did you sleep well?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Barret's snoring kept me up......- Next to you, who wouldn't?

Name: Tifa
Line: I'm going this time.

Name: Barret
Line: Our target's the Sector 5 Reactor. Head for the station first.I'll fill you in on the train.Yo! Cloud!Before the next mission, I got somethin' I wanna ask you!I, uh,...... I don't really know how to use Materia!I'll give you that Materia you found. Just teach me how to use it!

Name: Cloud
Line: ...sigh...- Ok, I'll explain it- You wouldn't understand

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud! I got a message from the Weapon Shop man upstairs.He has something he wants to give you. Don't forget!Marlene, you watch the store while we're gone!

Name: Marlene
Line: All right!! Good Luck.Take care!

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: Ahh... Another slow day......If this keeps up, this store's goin' under...Can't sell any really good medicine in a slum like this.Oh!! Look at this! This doesn't happen everyday. You a...... customer?Yes!! Welcome!! We sell! We buy!

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: He, HEY! Waitaminit you!!You can't just walk outta here without buyin' somethin'...Might be unhealthy fer ya, if ya know what I mean.

Name: Kid
Line: You dried up old geez. You tired?Why don't you rest up on the third floor of my house?There's just one condition.You gotta give me some cash.

Name: Cloud
Line: - 1 gil- 10 gil- nothin'

Name: Black-haired Man
Line: Heh heh... He'll forget about it. OH, you!!Get my friend on the second floor to teach ya.

Name: Big Man
Line: This is the Beginner's Hall.You say you're a beginner? But your eyes say you're not.

Name: Cloud
Line: Don't mess with me. I used to be in SOLDIER. I'll tell you how much I know... an' for free too!What do you want to know?- How to save?- How to heal your allies?- Curative Magic?- Weapons and armor?- How to apply Materia?- Effective ways to use Materia?- How to form your battle party?- How to check your status?- About Limit status?- Other things to watch for?- That's all

Name: Cloud
Line: Huh? Finger!? What the hell?

Name: Finger
Line: I'm the position cursor!! Call me whenever you're walking around confused!Push the [SELECT] button and I'll appear over your shiny little head.

Name: Cloud
Line: Geez, you stand out even more than I do...

Name: Finger
Line: Am I in the way? If so, just push the [SELECT] button one more time.I'm pretty busy myself, and can't always come when you need me. If I don't show up sometimes, don't get mad.Later!

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: Man in Hat
Line: Hey!! You got one right off!That was Materia. Next, take this [treasure chest]!

Name: Man in Hat
Line: Now listen, Hidden in these treasure chests, are a lot of itemsThere are box types and bag types, so make sure you don't overlook any.

Name: Girl
Line: Help!

Name: Cloud
Line: You've got to hang in there. You're limit gauge is just starting to build.

Name: Girl
Line: Waaaah!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Ok! Now your limit gauge is full, go ahead and use it! Fight with your limit technique.

Name: Cloud
Line: Great!

Name: Boy
Line: Magic!! Magic!!

Name: Girl
Line: Help!

Name: Cloud
Line: Calm down! When your enemy uses magic counter with [Magic Barrier] or [reflect].[Magic Barrier] reduces the damage received from magic by half.[reflect] bounces the attacks off you. But the number of times you can use it is limited so be careful.

Name: Cloud
Line: Great!

Name: Boy
Line: Wow! You sure are strong! I'm going to be strong, too!

Name: Girl
Line: Me too!

Name: Cloud
Line: If you want to get as strong as me you need to use Materia.And you have to find the best combinations of them.The type of Materia you put in your weapons and armor will determine how quickly your Materia grows.Put Materia into the open slots in your weapons and armor. The possible combinations are limitless.That's about all I can tell you. If you want to be like me, you have to have some natural talent.

Name: Girl + Boy
Line: I still don't get it!

Name: Cloud
Line: Listen kid, don't piss me off!That's all right. Just give it a try. Little by little, you'll get used to it.

Name: Three Guys Posing
Line: Hey SOLDIER!! Tell us about battles! We'll even pay you!

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm not hard up enough to take money from guys like you. But I'll rap with you for a while.What do you want to know?- About ATB- The numbers on the screen- About [change] and [defend]- About [Escape]- About the gauges- About [status]- About [elementals]- About [help]- That's all the time I have for you!

Name: Woman by Save Point
Line: This is the fabled [Save Point]!!At a [Save Point] you can use a [tent] and/or select "SAVE".There's more, too. Look for something called secret.Even if you are wiped out, if you save you can restart from that same point.That way you don't have to worry when you've been wiped out.This is jumping ahead a little but, when you leave Midgar...Once you get the world map, you can save anywhere you like. Remember that.

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: Kid
Line: This is a slum, so don't think you can stay for free.What are you going to do?Doesn't just seeing the bed make you sleepy?

Name: Cloud
Line: - 10 gil- no way

Name: Johnny
Line: I'm leaving. Goin' faraway. But when I come back I'll be a better man! This is goodbye!Hey! Childhood friend! You better take good care of Tifa!

Name: Johnny's Cousin
Line: I hope he doesn't get hurt.That worries me the most.

Name: Gossip
Line: Yesterday, everyone in town was peeking at the two of you from outside the bar.Tifa's childhood friend. That's a good one!

Name: Kid
Line: Ahh! Now I ain't got no one to pick on!

Name: Johnny's Dad
Line: Ha! Ha!...... I wonder if my son's already left?When it's just my wife and I here, you have no idea how lonesome it gets.You want them to be happy and do what they want while they're young, but being a parent, you can't help but worry...I guess I'm not cut out to be a parent yet.By the way......Where are you from?

Name: Cloud
Line: - A village called Nibelheim- Who cares?

Name: Johnny's Dad
Line: Well, you mind leaving the two of us alone?I want to enjoy some quiet time together with my wife.

Name: Johnny's Mom
Line: He used to give us nothing but headaches when he was here, but now that he's gone... I kind of miss him.......strange, isn't it?

Name: Kid
Line: (standing by the door to 7th Heaven)When it comes down to it... I'm gutless. I'm still just a no good kid.

Name: Gossip
Line: Listen! If there isn't anyone to listen, what's the use of getting gossip on everyone!?Yeah, and you Mr. I-don't-care!I'll get a little more information that would poque even your interest. You wait and see!

Name: Johnny's Cousin
Line: Ah... Johnny's gone. You look a little disappointed.I don't like to say it myself but, I'm just a lonely guy when I'm not drinking.

Name: Soldier 1
Line: HALT!! No one is allowed to pass!!

Name: Soldier 2
Line: You know, I got some tickets to "Loveless", do you want to go?

Name: Soldier 1
Line: What're you, retarded? Midgar's under martial law now!

Name: Soldier 2
Line: You mean, you really are concerned for me?

Name: Soldier 1
Line: Hell no!! But in case you forgot, we're in the middle of a slum.They could be anywhere around, so stay on your guard.

Name: Soldier 2
Line: Right. You mean the AVALANCHERS?Don't you worry. SOLDIER has been added to the police force.Boy, it's been a while since SOLDIER's been mobilized, hasn't it?I ever tell you that I flunked the SOLDIER entrance exam?

Name: Soldier 1
Line: Damn right!! blahblahblah......Hey shut up for a minute and let me get back to work!

Name: Soldier 1
Line: What are you more scared of... AVALANCHE or me?

Name: Soldier 2
Line: Oh, you, of course.

Name: Guy
Line: I've had it!

Name: Girl
Line: Me too.

Name: Guy
Line: You know this is the first time, we've ever agreed on something.

Name: Guy
Line: Well then, shall we......?

Name: Girl
Line: huff...... wheez

Name: Station Man
Line: Morning. Dawn comes and things never change.You be careful not to get hurt. Come on back again, hear?ALL ABOARD! The train is about to depart.

Name: Barret
Line: YO!Looks like this ain't no private car!! So split up!!

Name: Shinra Manager
Line: ...hoodlums again. God, don't I just have all the luck...

Name: Barret
Line: You say sumthin'?I said, 'you say sumthin'!?Yo, look at that!! It got empty alluva sudden.What's goin' on?

Name: Shinra Manager
Line: DAMN!!I... it's empty because of... g, guys like you...

Name: Shinra Manager
Line: Y, Y, YIPES!!You... you've seen the news, right? AVALANCHE says there'll be more bombings.Only devoted employees like me would go to Midgar on a day like today.

Name: Barret
Line: You workin' for Shinra?

Name: Shinra Manager
Line: I won't give in to violence... and I'm not giving up my seat either!

Name: Tifa
Line: Barret!!

Name: Barret
Line: &$#%!! You lucky ^$#^$.!

Name: Cloud
Line: So, what are we gonna do now?

Name: Barret
Line: Shit! The hell you so calm about? You bustin' up my rhythm...

Name: Tifa
Line: Seems like they just finished connecting the cars. We're finally leaving.

Name: Cloud
Line: So what's our next target?

Name: Barret
Line: Hah! Listen to Mr. Serious-about-his-work!Awright... I'll tell ya!Jessie's probably already told you, but there's a security check point at the top plate.It's an ID scan system checkin' all the trains.

Name: Tifa
Line: Which Shinra is very proud of.

Name: Barret
Line: We can't use our fake ID's anymore...

Name: Tifa
Line: That means we've got only three more minutes to the ID Check point.

Name: Barret
Line: Alright, in three minutes, we're jumpin' off this train.Got it!?

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud, come over here! Let's look at the Railway Map Monitor.

Name: Train Bum
Line: Hmmm......? You're the only ones that'll talk to me or come to my house.I'm impressed.

Name: Barret
Line: Yo, Mr. know-it-all, big time SOLDIER! You oughta know the area 'round the No. 5 Reactor, right!So let's hear YOUR explanation!

Name: Shinra Manager
Line: Waaaaah!!Don... don't worry about me. (oh man, oh man, oh man...!! I'm gonna brag to everyone at work about this...)

Name: Tifa
Line: Hmm, it looks like you've seen this already...It's all right. Come a little closer.

Name: Tifa
Line: That's odd. The ID Check Point was supposed to be further down.

Name: Tifa
Line: What's happening?

Name: Barret
Line: What's goin' on!!

Name: Jessie
Line: We're in trouble.I'll explain later. Hurry! Get to the next car!

Name: Barret
Line: ^%#@%! Someone blew it...

Name: Barret
Line: Let's go! Keep it up!

Name: Train Bum
Line: Hm?... You'd talk to me even now?I'm really impressed. Let me give you a little something as a reward.

Name: Train Bum
Line: If I die in the gutter, use that to revive me, okay?

Name: Biggs
Line: Hurry!

Name: Wedge
Line: They're gonna lock the door, sir!

Name: Jessie
Line: Just run!Changing to Plan 2!

Name: Passenger
Line: Hey... You guys are rowdy...Well, just calm down.

Name: Kid 1
Line: Hyu----n!! Hyu----n!!

Name: Kid 2
Line: Does this mean we're in a major bind?

Name: Person
Line: Gosh!! You're adults, but you're making such noise.Please behave while you're in the train.

Name: Dark-clothed Man
Line: Huh?The hell?!Do you want this?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah...- My mistake

Name: Barret
Line: Awright! We clear!?

Name: Jessie
Line: Not yet. They're starting another check. If we're caught, we're done for!But, don't worry. If we move up the train, car by car, we should get past it!

Name: Thief
Line: Hee hee!!

Name: Thief
Line: ...nowhere to run...By any chance...Busted?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Huh...?- That's right

Name: Johnny
Line: Later... Goodbye... Adios, Midgar!!sob...

Name: Man Lying on Floor
Line: urrrrrrg

Name: Naked Man 1
Line: Brrrrr......It's terrible. Who'd expect underwear bandits in this day and age?They wiped me out!

Name: Naked Man 2
Line: Any idea what happened?All I know is, when I woke up the 3 of us were butt-naked!But I guess you couldn't relate...

Name: Naked Man 3
Line: That scary broad made me take the bomb.Of course I couldn't very well refuse her!

Name: Barret
Line: All right!! We made it!Yo!! This way!!Let's go!! We're gonna dive outta here!!

Name: Wedge
Line: Guess who? It's me, Wedge!Looks like things were a success.I look just like my little brother in these clothes...I wonder how everyone's doin' now...?

Name: Jessie
Line: It's me, Jessie. How do I look, Cloud?Do I look good in a Shinra uniform?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah...- Not now

Name: Tifa
Line: ...Scary... huh.

Name: Cloud
Line: Too late to be saying that now. Why'd you come along anyway?

Name: Tifa
Line: Because...

Name: Barret
Line: Hey you two! There ain't no time for that!Yo!! Ain't no time to waste!!...do something!

Name: Tifa
Line: Yeah!! I've made up my mind!Watch closely. I'm gonna jump!!

Name: Cloud
Line: You don't care if I go first?

Name: Barret
Line: A leader always stays till the end.Don't worry 'bout me, just go!Yo! Don't go gettin' your spikey-ass hurt!It's only the beginnin' of the mission!

Name: Barret
Line: Later! You take care of the rest!

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: Barret
Line: C'mon!! Hurry your slow ass up! That's it, huh?

Name: Tifa
Line: Oh well...

Name: Barret
Line: We're gonna jump outta here!! Follow me!!

Name: Tifa
Line: We got a lot of battles ahead of us. This's going to be tough.

Name: Barret
Line: Oh man...... We were forced to get this far out.We can't just go back now. We've gotta go on.Biggs, Wedge, and Jessie did good. Now, it's our turn!Well, the reactor's just down this tunnel!

Name: Barret
Line: What? That's it!?

Name: Tifa
Line: That didn't do anything!

Name: Barret
Line: We'll jump from here!! Follow me, you 'spensive leech!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Phew-----! Be strong!

Name: Barret
Line: Oh man...... We were forced to get this far out.We can't just go back now. We've gotta go on.Biggs, Wedge, and Jessie did good. Now, it's our turn!Well, the reactor's just down this tunnel!

Name: Barret
Line: The hell!? So this is as far as we go...?

Name: Tifa
Line: We were almost there.

Name: Barret
Line: We're gonna jump off here!! Follow me!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Don't worry! Don't worry!

Name: Barret
Line: That was close. I thought we were gonna get caught...They probably don't realize that we've sneaked in yet. We should get to the reactor in no time.Biggs, Wedge, and Jessie did good. Now, it's our turn!Well, the reactor's just down this tunnel!

Name: Barret
Line: Good, so far everything's going as planned.Better not let your guard down till we get to the Sector 5 reactor.Biggs, Wedge and Jessie got everything ready for us. So MOVE it.Well, the reactor's just down this tunnel!

Name: Cloud
Line: Those light beams are the Shinra's security sensors. We can't go any further.After coming this far, only an amateur'd get caught by the security sensor.

Name: Barret
Line: That's one damn tiny hole. You tellin' me to squeeze into that to get under the Plate? No way!Yo, Cloud, what're we gonna do?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Look inside closely- Go down- Don't go down

Name: Wedge
Line: Cloud, this way. The reactor's up this ladder.

Name: Jessie
Line: I'm sorry.The ID scan problem on the train was all my fault.I made your ID card special...... So that's why it happened...I put my heart into making it. But I failed.Next time, I'll give you something more decent.I'll be back at the hideout in my research room workin' on it.

Name: Biggs
Line: We're gonna pull out now. We'll meet up at the hideout.Cloud, we're countin' on you to blow the reactor!

Name: Barret
Line: Damn man, get a hold of yourself!

Name: Tifa
Line: You all right?

Name: Tifa
Line: Mmm?

Name: Cloud
Line: No... forget...... Come on, let's hurry!

Name: Barret
Line: Damn straight.Tifa's old friend... That ain't good enough.

Name: Tifa
Line: Jessie said we all have to push the buttons at once.

Name: Tifa
Line: No good. Let's try it again.

Name: Barret
Line: This way!

Name: Cloud
Line: ...a trap...

Name: Barret
Line: Presi... President Shinra?

Name: Tifa
Line: Why is the President here?

Name: President Shinra
Line: Hmm... So you all must be that... ...what was it?

Name: Barret
Line: AVALANCHE! And don't ya forget it! And you're President Shinra, huh?

Name: Cloud
Line: Long time no see, President.

Name: President Shinra
Line: ...Long time no see? Oh... you.You're the one who quit SOLDIER and joined AVALANCHE. I knew you'd been exposed to Mako, from the look in your eyes...Tell me, traitor... what was your name?

Name: Cloud
Line: Cloud.

Name: President Shinra
Line: Forgive me for asking, but I can't be expected to remember each person's name.Unless you become another Sephiroth.Yes, Sephiroth... He was brilliant. Perhaps too brilliant...

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth......?

Name: Barret
Line: Don't give a damn 'bout none of that! This place's goin' up with a big BANG soon! Serves y'all right!

Name: President Shinra
Line: And such a waste of good fireworks, just to get rid of vermin like you...

Name: Barret
Line: VERMIN!? That's all you can say... VERMIN!Y'all Shinra're the VERMIN, killing the planet! And that makes you King VERMIN! So shu'up jackass!

Name: President Shinra
Line: ...You are beginning to bore me.I'm a very busy man, so if you'll excuse me... I have a dinner I must attend.

Name: Barret
Line: Dinner!? Don't gimme that! I ain't even started wit' you yet!

Name: President Shinra
Line: But, I've made arrangements for a playmate for you all.

Name: Tifa
Line: !? What's that noise?

Name: Barret
Line: The hell is this!?

Name: President Shinra
Line: Meet 'Airbuster', a techno-soldier. Our Weapon Development Department created him.I'm sure the data he'll extract from your dead bodies will be of great use to us in future experiments.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Techno-soldier?

Name: President Shinra
Line: Now then, if you'll excuse me.

Name: Cloud
Line: Wait, President!

Name: Barret
Line: Yo, Cloud! We've gotta do somethin' 'bout him!

Name: Tifa
Line: Help, Cloud!THIS is from SOLDIER?

Name: Cloud
Line: No way! It's just a machine.

Name: Barret
Line: I don't care what it is!! I'm gonna bust him up!

Name: Barret
Line: It's gonna blow! Let's go, Tifa!

Name: Tifa
Line: Barret! Can't you do something?

Name: Barret
Line: Not a damn thing.

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud! Please don't die! You can't die! There's still so much I want to tell you!

Name: Cloud
Line: I know, Tifa......

Name: Barret
Line: Hey, you gonna be awright?

Name: Cloud
Line: - (Be strong)- (I don't know if I can hold on...)

Name: Barret
Line: Alright, then, later.

Name: Flower Girl
Line: Oh! It moved!Whew... Am I glad.

Name: Flower Girl
Line: Hello, hello?

Name: Flower Girl
Line: Hello, hello!

Name: Flower Girl
Line: You okay?This is a church in the Sector 5 slums.It suddenly fell on top of me. It really gave me a scare.

Name: Cloud
Line: ......I came crashing down?

Name: Flower Girl
Line: The roof and the flower bed must have broken your fall. You're lucky.

Name: Cloud
Line: Flower bed...... is this yours?

Name: Flower Girl
Line: That's all right. The flowers here are quite resilient because this is a sacred place.They say you can't grow grass and flowers in Midgar.But for some reason, the flowers have no trouble blooming here.I love it here.

Name: Reno?
Line: I'll give you a little more time.

Name: Flower Girl
Line: ......So, we meet again.......Don't you remember me?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah, I remember you......- Never saw you before

Name: Flower Girl
Line: Say, do you have any materia?

Name: Cloud
Line: Yes, some.Nowadays you can find materia anywhere.

Name: Flower Girl
Line: But mine is special. It's good for absolutely nothing.

Name: Cloud
Line: ......good for nothing? You probably just don't know how to use it.

Name: Flower Girl
Line: No, I do...... it just doesn't do anything.I feel safe just having it. It was my mother's......Say, I feel like talking. Do you feel up to it?After all, here we are meeting again, right?

Name: Cloud
Line: - I don't mind- Got nothing to talk about

Name: Flower Girl
Line: Just a little longer.Oh!Now that you mention it......We don't know each other's names, do we?My name is......I'm Aeris, the flower girl. Nice to meet you.

Name: Cloud
Line: The name's Cloud.Me......? I do a little bit of everything.

Name: Aeris
Line: Oh...... a jack of all trades.

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah, I do whatever's needed.What's so funny? What are you laughing at?

Name: Aeris
Line: Sorry...... I just

Name: Reno
Line: Don't worry about me.

Name: Aeris
Line: Say, Cloud. Have you ever been a bodyguard?You DO do everything, right?

Name: Cloud
Line: ......Yeah, that's right.

Name: Aeris
Line: Then, get me out of here. Take me home.

Name: Cloud
Line: OK, I'll do it... but it'll cost you.

Name: Aeris
Line: Well then, let's see......How about if I go out with you once?

Name: Cloud
Line: I don't know who you are, but......You don't know me......?

Name: Cloud
Line: Oh yeah...... I know you.that uniform......

Name: Soldier
Line: ......Hey sis, this one's a little weird.

Name: Cloud
Line: Shut up! You Shinra spy!

Name: Soldier
Line: Reno! Want him taken out?

Name: Reno
Line: I haven't decided yet.

Name: Aeris
Line: Don't fight here! You'll ruin the flowers!

Name: Reno
Line: They were...... Mako eyes.Yeah, all right. Back to work, back to work.

Name: Soldiers
Line: Hey Reno, you just stepped on them!They're all ruined!You're gonna catch holy hell!

Name: Reno
Line: There they are, over there!

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud... that one!

Name: Cloud
Line: I know. Looks like they aren't going to let us go.

Name: Aeris
Line: What should we do?

Name: Cloud
Line: Well we can't let them catch us, can we? Then, there's only one thing left.

Name: Cloud
Line: All right. I'll hold them off.

Name: Aeris
Line: Right. Make sure they don't get through!

Name: Reno
Line: The Ancient is getting away! Attack! Attack! Attack!

Name: Aeris
Line: Eaygh!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Aeris!

Name: Reno
Line: Think we killed 'em? They shouldn't have put up a fight, I say!

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud, help!

Name: Cloud
Line: Damn!

Name: Cloud
Line: Aeris, this way.

Name: Aeris
Line: Ha, ha...... They're looking for me again.

Name: Cloud
Line: You mean it's not the first time they've been after you?

Name: Cloud
Line: They're the Turks.

Name: Aeris
Line: Hmmm......

Name: Cloud
Line: The Turks are an organization in Shinra. They scout for possible candidates for SOLDIER.

Name: Aeris
Line: This violently? I thought they were kidnapping someone.

Name: Cloud
Line: They're also involved in a lot of dirty stuff on the side.Spying, murder... you know.

Name: Aeris
Line: They look like it.

Name: Cloud
Line: But, why're they after you? There must be a reason, right?

Name: Aeris
Line: No, not really. I think they believe I have what it takes to be in SOLDIER!

Name: Cloud
Line: Maybe you do. You want to join?

Name: Aeris
Line: I don't know... But I don't want to get caught by THOSE people!

Name: Cloud
Line: Then, let's go!

Name: Aeris
Line: Wait... Wait, I said!

Name: Aeris
Line: Puff... wheeze...Slow...... down... Don't leave me......

Name: Cloud
Line: Funny...I thought you were cut out to be in SOLDIER?

Name: Aeris
Line: Oh! You're terrible!

Name: Aeris
Line: Hey...... Cloud. Were you... ever in SOLDIER?

Name: Cloud
Line: .........I used to be. How did you guess?

Name: Aeris
Line: ...Your eyes. They have a strange glow...

Name: Cloud
Line: That's the sign of those who have been infused with Mako...A mark of SOLDIER.But, how did you know about that?

Name: Aeris
Line: ......Oh, nothing.

Name: Cloud
Line: Nothing...?

Name: Aeris
Line: Right, nothing!Come on, let's go! Bodyguard!

Name: Aeris
Line: Whew! Finally made it off! Now what...

Name: Boy
Line: Um, we're, um taking care of the um, flowers for the um, lady here.......is that ok?

Name: Cloud
Line: - I don't mind- No it's not!

Name: Boy
Line: They're purty!

Name: Girl
Line: I'm gonna water them later......

Name: Brown-haired Guy
Line: Aaaaah...... what a drag. You wanna go to that store in Sector 6 again?

Name: Redhead
Line: Huh? The hell are you? The hell do ya think you're talkin' to!!

Name: Person Outside the Pipe
Line: That guy in the pipe's a weird one. No matter what you ask him, he only answers 'uuh' or 'aahh'.

Name: Aeris
Line: This guy are sick.He passed out nearby and someone must have helped him here.

Name: Aeris
Line: This is the one...... Won't you help him?

Name: Cloud
Line: Listen, I'm no doctor.

Name: Aeris
Line: No... I guess not...Hey... that man has a tattoo. I think it was the number 2.

Name: Man in Straw Hat
Line: You ever hear of Wall Market?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- Nope

Name: Woman Walking Around
Line: What am I doing? I'm walking around looking at the ground.You find a lot of things people dropped when you look down. You never find them when you're looking up. Right?

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: I don't care if it's scrap metal or materia. We can get anything here in the slums.Got a lot of good materia here. Why don't you look it over?

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: Hey!Don't come barging into my house and be opening up my freezer! Didn't your mother ever teach you that?

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: ...stare... ......hmph... we only trade items for gil here.

Name: Man
Line: Hmph......! Everything President Shinra says is a lie.But then again, you can't trust that AVALANCHE, or whatever you call them.You can bat it around all you like. But in the end it comes down to wanting to be like those who live up above.So who do you believe in? Oneself! Me! I never lie to myself, that's for sure!I only believe what I say. That's because I never lie to myself.

Name: Flyer
Line: Turtles Paradise News No. 1For delicious wine with a nice ring to it......Stop on by the "Turtle's Paradise"!!

Name: Kid Sleeping
Line: glug... glug...Now... no one... will find it... num...The top one... and the bottom one...

Name: Cloud
Line: ..................huh?- Open the top drawer- Open the bottom drawer- Open the hidden drawer between the drawer

Name: Person Running Around
Line: Outta the way! Move! You want something... move into the store!

Name: Man
Line: Huh? You want weapons? That's too damn bad......I ain't got no weapons to sell ya! And the reason why is......the weapon store's over that way.

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: Take care of yourself. It's the law of the slums. But to do that, first you need weapons, right?

Name: Kid
Line: Toot toot! Next stop... Midgar Midgar.Any passengers getting off on Midgar should please ring.You know, Midgar's supposed to be sparkly 'n' springy 'n' sleeky.Oh yeah. Someday, I'm goin' there.

Name: Aeris
Line: I'm home, mom.This is Cloud. My bodyguard.

Name: Elmyra
Line: Bodyguard......? You mean you were followed again!?Are you all right!? You're not hurt, are you!?

Name: Aeris
Line: I'm all right. I had Cloud with me.

Name: Elmyra
Line: Thank you, Cloud.

Name: Aeris
Line: So what are you going to do now?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Is Sector 7 far from here? I want to go to Tifa's bar.

Name: Aeris
Line: Is Tifa...... a girl?

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah.

Name: Aeris
Line: A girl...friend?

Name: Cloud
Line: Girlfriend?- No way!- Yeah, that's right

Name: Aeris
Line: Well, that's... nice.Let's see, Sector 7? I'll show you the way.

Name: Cloud
Line: You gotta be kidding. Why do you want to put yourself in danger again?

Name: Aeris
Line: I'm used to it.

Name: Cloud
Line: Used to it!?......Well, don't know... getting help from a girl...

Name: Aeris
Line: A girl!! What do you mean by that!?You expect me to just sit by and listen, after hearing you say something like that!?Mom! I'm taking Cloud to Sector 7. I'll be back in a while.

Name: Elmyra
Line: But dear... I give up. You never listen once you've made up your mind.But if you must go, why don't you go tomorrow? It's getting late now.

Name: Aeris
Line: Yeah, you're right, mom.

Name: Elmyra
Line: Aeris, please go and make the bed.

Name: Elmyra
Line: That glow in your eyes... you're from SOLDIER, right?

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah. Rather I used to be...

Name: Elmyra
Line: ......I don't know how to say this, but...Would you please leave here, tonight? Without telling Aeris.SOLDIER... the last thing Aeris needs is to get her feelings hurt again...

Name: Aeris
Line: You need to go through Sector 6 to get to Sector 7. Sector 6 is a littledangerous so you'd better get some rest tonight.Cloud...Good night.

Name: Cloud
Line: Oh, man...

Name: Cloud
Line: ...I must've fallen asleep.Sector 7's past Sector 6... I should be all right by myself...

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud! I thought the Turks came back! Get some rest!

Name: Cloud
Line: Can't get caught this time...

Name: Cloud
Line: Through Sector 6 to get to Sector 7. I should be able to do it alone...

Name: Aeris
Line: You're up bright and early.

Name: Cloud
Line: How could I ask you to go along when I knew it would be dangerous?

Name: Aeris
Line: Are you done?

Name: Aeris
Line: You have to go through the slum in Sector 6 to get to Tifa's 7th Heaven.I'll take you there. Come on!

Name: Aeris
Line: The gate to Sector 7's in there.

Name: Cloud
Line: Thanks. I guess this is goodbye. You gonna be all right going home?

Name: Aeris
Line: Oh no! 'What ever will I do!?' ...isn't that what you want me to say?

Name: Cloud
Line: - See her home- Take her to Sector 7

Name: Aeris
Line: Can we take a break?

Name: Aeris
Line: What rank were you?

Name: Cloud
Line: Rank?

Name: Aeris
Line: You know, in SOLDIER.

Name: Cloud
Line: Oh, I was...

Name: Aeris
Line: Just the same as him.

Name: Cloud
Line: The same as who?

Name: Aeris
Line: My first boyfriend.

Name: Cloud
Line: You were... serious?

Name: Aeris
Line: No. But I liked him for a while.

Name: Cloud
Line: I probably knew him. What was his name?

Name: Aeris
Line: It doesn't really matter.

Name: Cloud
Line: Huh? Hey, back there......Tifa!?

Name: Aeris
Line: That girl in the cart was Tifa? Where was she going? She looked kind of odd...

Name: Cloud
Line: Wait!I'll go on alone! You go on home!

Name: Aeris
Line: This place is scary in a lot of ways. Especially for a girl. So we've got to find Tifa fast.

Name: Man outside Honey Bee Inn
Line: I just can't make up my mind... Mmm.Huh? About what?Hmmm, don't make me say it... It's the shop down on the right.

Name: Johnny
Line: Man... Should I go...... or not?...I get so mental at times like this. I'm hopeless!!Hey!! Aren't you...?What!! You mean you're... too?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah, me too.- Don't bring me down to your level

Name: Punk
Line: What the hell!! You *%^&!! This ain't no #$*&^% show!! I'm busy right now!!I'm feelin' like there's gonna be a fight!!

Name: Shinra Soldier
Line: Urrrrgh... no way...... I can't go on.Things aren't working out.Between our differences and my pay, it just isn't cutting it.

Name: Older Man
Line: Welcome!! Even unpopular dweebs, like you may meet their destiny here!!You looking for a girlfriend too?

Name: Cloud
Line: - You know a girl named Tifa?- This place doesn't interest me.

Name: Redhead in Suit
Line: The Honey Bee Inn is a private club. Only members can go in. Shoo, shoo.

Name: Kid by Cat Statue
Line: Aren't cats great? This one's a little big, huh?

Name: Punk
Line: Hey boy! You shore got a good lookin' heifer there!Take her to the Don's place, and you'll make a mint.

Name: Man Cooking Outside
Line: It's a little early to start eating. Come back in a bit.

Name: Machine
Line: ......Beeeeeep...... blipppp......

Name: Cloud
Line: Whoa!...Broken.

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: ...We're closed now.

Name: Man Outside Dress Shop

Line: Hey... what's wrong? You want me to keep you company?

Name: Cloud
Line: No... I'm flattered, but no thanks.Because...

Name: Scotch
Line: Because......?

Name: Cloud
Line: Because...I ain't INTERESTED in a buncha scrubs like you!!

Name: Scotch
Line: Wha... a MAN!???God damn it! You think you can get away with this! Get him! Knock the crap out of him!!

Name: Scotch
Line: Grr! C'mon, what's the matter with you good for nothings!?All right now, COME ON! I'll show you how it's done!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Tifa!!- You all right?- We've gotta help Aeris!!

Name: Kotch
Line: (lying at the bottom of the stairs)C'mon... just once... I won't tell... I promise!I just wanted to act like I got a cute girl...Cute!!

Name: Don Corneo
Line: Woo-hoo!Come, come, don't be so shy...

Name: Aeris
Line: Ye...yes...But Mr. Don. I'd like you to explain something to me first...

Name: Don Corneo
Line: Of course, my dear. I'll take you through it slowly, step by step. So come on!

Name: Aeris
Line: No, that's not what I meant!NO, STOP! Just, just wait a second!!

Name: Don Corneo
Line: Come! Come!Aooooooooh!! I can't wait any longer! Here comes papa!!

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud!!

Name: Don Corneo
Line: Wha... what the hell? Who goes there!?

Name: Aeris
Line: I'm sorry, Don.

Name: Don Corneo
Line: Get what?

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: Don Corneo
Line: This healthy-looking girl!

Name: Cloud
Line: Wa, wait a sec! I mean, uh, please wait a moment!

Name: Don Corneo
Line: Woo-hoo!I love chickies who play hard-to-get! Yeowza!

Name: Don Corneo
Line: You can have the other ones!

Name: Kotch + Scotch
Line: Yes, sir! Thank you sir!

Name: Don Corneo
Line: Well then, shall we go my pretty!?

Name: Don Corneo
Line: Ahh, we're finally alone...All right, pussycat... Come to daddy!!

Name: Don Corneo
Line: Woo-hoo!Don't be shy. We're all alone now...

Name: Don Corneo
Line: You're so cute, I never get tired of looking at you.Do you... like me, too?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Of course!- Ummm......

Name: Tifa
Line: Shut up, we're asking the questions now...What did your assistants find out? Talk! If you don't tell us...

Name: Cloud
Line: ...I'll chop them off.

Name: Don Corneo
Line: No! Not that! I'll talk! I'll tell you everything!

Name: Tifa
Line: So... talk.

Name: Don Corneo
Line: ...I made 'em find out where the man with the gun-arm was. But that's what I was ordered to do.

Name: Tifa
Line: By who?

Name: Don Corneo
Line: No--! If I told you that, I'd be killed!

Name: Tifa
Line: Talk! If you don't tell us...

Name: Aeris
Line: ...I'll rip them off.

Name: Don Corneo
Line: Waaaaaaaaaaaah--! It was Heidegger of Shinra!Heidegger, the head of Public Safety Maintenance!

Name: Cloud
Line: The head of Public Safety Maintenance!?

Name: Tifa
Line: Did you say the Shinra!? What are they up to!? Talk!If you don't tell us......I'll smash them.

Name: Don Corneo
Line: ...You're serious, aren't you... ...ohboy, ohbooy, ohboy....I'm not fooling around here either, you know.Shinra's trying to crush a small rebel group called AVALANCHE, and want to infiltrate their hideout.And they're really going to crush them... literally,By breaking the support holding up the plate above them.

Name: Tifa
Line: Break the support!?

Name: Don Corneo
Line: You know what's going to happen? The plate'll go PINGand everything's gonna go BAMMM!! I heard their hideout's in the Sector 7 Slums...I'm just glad it's not here in Sector 6.

Name: Tifa
Line: They're going to wipe out the Sector 7 Slums!?Cloud, will you come with me to Sector 7?

Name: Cloud
Line: Of course, Tifa.

Name: Don Corneo
Line: Just a second!

Name: Cloud
Line: Shut up!

Name: Don Corneo
Line: No wait, it'll only take a second.How do you think scum like me feels when they babble on about the truth?

Name: Cloud
Line: - They've pretty much given up on life- They're sure they'll win- They don't know what the hell's going on

Name: President Shinra
Line: How are the preparations going?

Name: Heidegger
Line: Ha, ha, ha!! Smoothly, very smoothly! I assigned the Turks to this.

Name: Reeve
Line: President!! Are we really going to do this? Simply destroy a group with only a few members...

Name: President Shinra
Line: What's the problem, Reeve? You want out?

Name: Reeve
Line: ...No.But, as head of the Urban Development Department, I have been involved in the building and running of Midgar. That's why...

Name: Heidegger
Line: Reeve, you should flush those personal problems in the morning!

Name: Reeve
Line: The Mayor's against this anyway...

Name: Heidegger
Line: Mayor?He just sits in this building all day feeding his face! You still call that a Mayor?Now if you'll excuse me sir!

Name: President Shinra
Line: You're tired. Why don't you take a couple of days off and go somewhere.

Name: President Shinra
Line: We'll destroy Sector 7 and report that AVALANCHE did it. Then we'll send in the rescue operation care of Shinra, Inc....Heh, heh, heh... this is perfect.

Name: Cloud
Line: You alright?

Name: Aeris
Line: Yeah.

Name: Cloud
Line: You alright?

Name: Tifa
Line: Man! This is terrible.

Name: Aeris
Line: Well, the worst is over...

Name: Aeris
Line: Maybe not...

Name: Tifa
Line: It's too late...... Marlene... Barret... the people of the Slums.

Name: Aeris
Line: Don't give up, never give up hope. It's not easy to destroy the pillar, right?

Name: Tifa
Line: .........Yeah...... you're right! We still have time.

Name: Cloud
Line: Aeris. I got you mixed up in all of this...

Name: Aeris
Line: Don't tell me to go home.

Name: Tifa
Line: Let's see... If we can just get past the trains that are lit up, we should be able to get out of here.

Name: Station man
Line: I heard a rumor that the plate was going to fall, crushing this station, I've worked at so many years.But I just can't bear to leave here.

Name: Tifa
Line: We made it! The pillar's standing!

Name: Cloud
Line: Wait! You hear something...... above us?

Name: Aeris
Line: ......gun fire?

Name: Cloud
Line: Wedge!! You all right!?

Name: Wedge
Line: ......Cloud...... You remembered...... my name.Barret's up top. ...help him......An' Cloud... Sorry, I wasn't any help.

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm going up!Aeris! You look after Wedge.

Name: Tifa
Line: Aeris, do me a favor.I have a bar called '7th Heaven' in this neighborhood.There's a little girl named Marlene there......

Name: Aeris
Line: Don't worry. I'll put her somewhere safe.

Name: Tifa
Line: It's dangerous here!Everyone get away from the pillar, quickly!Everyone get out of Sector 7!

Name: Aeris
Line: (crouching next to Wedge)Don't worry. You let me handle this.

Name: Soldier 2
Line: L, look... This is my job, so I have to be here until the absolute last minute.

Name: Redhead
Line: Umm... I just LOVE men with a sense of duty. Let me stay here with you.

Name: Shopkeeper
Line: Uh oh...... There goes the pillar.I'm scared, but it's for your own good.If things get too hairy, we'll escape. It's not something you'll see happen too often.

Name: Man by Fence
Line: Uhh...... Help! My strange and wonderful little place.

Name: Soldier 1
Line: Doh! And this was supposed to be my last job! Do something!!I never thought this would ever happen to me! Great... I'm quitting tomorrow!

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud!! You've gotta go now, or Barret's...

Name: Biggs
Line: Cloud... so you don't care... what happens... to the... Planet?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Nope, not interested- You're wounded......

Name: Jessie
Line: ...Cloud... I'm glad...... I could talk with you... one last time.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Don't say 'last'......- Is that so...

Name: Barret
Line: Tifa! Cloud! You came!Be careful! They're attacking from the helicopter.

Name: Tifa
Line: Better equip ourselves before they attack in full force!Here they come!

Name: Reno
Line: You're too late. Once I push this button...

Name: Tifa
Line: We have to disarm it! Cloud! Barret! Please!

Name: Reno
Line: I can't have you do that. No one gets in the way of Reno and the Turks...

Name: Reno
Line: Try and break it if you can.

Name: Reno
Line: It's time.

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud! I don't know how to stop this. Try it!

Name: Barret
Line: DAMN! It's a time bomb!

Name: Cloud
Line: ...It's not a normal time bomb.

Name: Tseng
Line: That's right. You'll have a hard time disarming that one.It'll blow the second some stupid jerk touches it.

Name: Tifa
Line: Please, stop it!

Name: Tseng
Line: Ha ha ha......Only a Shinra Executive can set up or disarm the Emergency Plate Release System.

Name: Barret
Line: Shut yer hole!

Name: Tseng
Line: I wouldn't try that...... You just might make me injure our special guest.

Name: Tifa
Line: Aeris!!

Name: Tseng
Line: Oh, you know each other?How nice you could see each other one last time. You should thank me.

Name: Cloud
Line: What are you gonna do with Aeris!?

Name: Tseng
Line: I haven't decided.Our orders were to find and catch the last remaining Ancient.It's taken us a long time, but now I can finally report this to the President.

Name: Aeris
Line: (leaning forward)Tifa, don't worry! She's all right!

Name: Tifa
Line: Aeris!

Name: Aeris
Line: Hurry and get out!

Name: Tseng
Line: Ha, ha, ha... Well, it should be starting right about now. Think you can escape in time?

Name: Tifa
Line: Once that Plate starts coming down it'll be too late. We gotta hurry!

Name: Barret
Line: Yo, we can use this wire to get out!

Name: Barret
Line: Marlene! MARLENE!!MAR---LE---NE!!Biggs!Wedge!!Jessie!!Goddamn it!!!Dammit!DAMMIT ALL TO HELL!!!!What the hell's it all for!?ARGGHHHH!!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey, Barret!

Name: Tifa
Line: Barret!

Name: Barret
Line: ARGGHHHH!!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey!

Name: Tifa
Line: Barret, stop... Please stop, Barret.

Name: Barret
Line: URGHHHH!!!

Name: Barret
Line: Marlene...

Name: Tifa
Line: ......... Barret......?Marlene is... I think Marlene is safe.

Name: Tifa
Line: Right before they took Aeris, she said, "Don't worry, she's all right." She was probably talking about Marlene.

Name: Barret
Line: R, really!?

Name: Tifa
Line: But...

Name: Barret
Line: Biggs...... Wedge... Jessie......

Name: Cloud
Line: All three of them were in the pillar.

Name: Barret
Line: Think I don't know that?But... we, all of us fought together.I don't wanna think of them as dead!

Name: Tifa
Line: ...and the other people in Sector 7.

Name: Barret
Line: This is all screwed up!They destroyed an entire village just to get to us! They killed so many people...

Name: Tifa
Line: ...are you saying it's our fault? Because AVALANCHE was here? Innocent people lost their lives because of us?

Name: Barret
Line: No, Tifa!That ain't it! Hell no!!It ain't us! It's the damn Shinra! It's never been nobody but the Shinra!

Name: Barret
Line: They're evil and destroyin' our planet just to...build their power and line their own damn pockets with gold!If we don't get rid of them, they're gonna kill this planet!Our fight ain't never gonna be over until we get rid of them!!

Name: Tifa
Line: .........I don't know.

Name: Barret
Line: What don't you know!? You don't believe me?

Name: Tifa
Line: It's not that. I'm not sure about... me. My feelings.

Name: Barret
Line: An' what about you?

Name: Barret
Line: Yo!Where's he think he's goin'?

Name: Tifa
Line: Oh! Aeris!

Name: Barret
Line: Oh yeah, that girl. What's up with her?

Name: Tifa
Line: ...I don't really know... But she's the one I left Marlene with.

Name: Barret
Line: Damn! Marlene!!

Name: Barret
Line: Tifa. There ain't no turnin' back now.

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud!

Name: Barret
Line: Take me to Marlene!

Name: Tifa
Line: You're going to help Aeris?

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah... But before that, there's something I want to know.

Name: Tifa
Line: What's that?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...it's about the Ancients.

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth...?

Name: Tifa
Line: Are you all right?

Name: Barret
Line: Pull it together, man!

Name: Person Outside the Pipe
Line: Even with all that commotion, you went on like nothing happened. You must really been through the mill to get that.

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: Living in a place like this, you could live out several lives,and it still wouldn't be enough!Well, how about some materia? Make some money and then scramble out of here!

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: ...stare... ......hmph... we only trade items for gil here. No matter what.

Name: Woman Walking Around
Line: Never thought that would come tumbling down. Maybe I better walk around looking up from now on.

Name: Man
Line: The hell's up with that!? I don't care if they're AVALANCHE or Avant-garde or whatever you call them. Anyone who brings the plates down on us is nuts!!

Name: Kid from the Weapons Shop
Line: ...sniff... sniff...First there was a rumbling...... ...then cracking... and then ker-blaMM!!......I was so scared... sniff...

Name: Person in Blue
Line: You finally think you're making a living in the pits of Midgar, and then a big piece of scrap like that falls down here... what's next?

Name: Man in Straw Hat
Line: Yeah, that's right! But, even so, where could we move to now...?

Name: Man
Line: ...sure is loud outside. Wonder what's happening?

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: You never know what's going to happen! It's a crazy world,so you'd better at least have a weapon you can depend on! Am I right or what?

Name: Elmyra
Line: Cloud...... wasn't it?It's about Aeris, isn't it?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Sorry. The Shinra have her.

Name: Elmyra
Line: I know. They took her from here.

Name: Cloud
Line: They were here?

Name: Elmyra
Line: That's what Aeris wanted...

Name: Cloud
Line: Why is Shinra after Aeris?

Name: Elmyra
Line: Aeris is an Ancient. The sole survivor.

Name: Barret
Line: ...What did you say? But, aren't you her mother?

Name: Elmyra
Line: ...Not her real mother. Oh... it must have been 15 years ago......during the war. My husband was sent to the front. Some far away place called Wutai.

Name: Barret
Line: Returned to the planet?

Name: Elmyra
Line: I didn't know what she meant. I asked if she meant a star in the sky,But she said it was this planet... She was a mysterious child in many ways.

Name: Cloud
Line: It's amazing how she's avoided the Shinra for all these years...

Name: Elmyra
Line: The Shinra needed her, So I guess they wouldn't harm her.

Name: Tifa
Line: But why now......

Name: Elmyra
Line: She brought a little girl here with her.On the way here, Tseng found them. She probably couldn't get away fast enough.She decided to go to the Shinra in exchange for the little girl's safety.

Name: Cloud
Line: Must be Marlene.

Name: Barret
Line: Marlene!! Aeris was caught because of Marlene!?I'm sorry. Marlene's my daughter. I'm... really... sorry...

Name: Elmyra
Line: You're her father!? How in the world could you ever leave a child alone like that!?

Name: Barret
Line: ...please don't start with that. I think about it all the time. What would happen to Marlene, if I...But you gotta understand somethin'... ...I don't got an answer. I wanna be with Marlene... But I gotta fight.'Cause if I don't... the planet's gonna die.So I'm gonna keep fightin'!But, I'm worried 'bout Marlene. I really just wanna be with her... always.See? I'm goin' in circles, now.

Name: Elmyra
Line: ...I think I understand what you're saying... She's upstairs asleep, Why don't you go and see her.

Name: Tifa
Line: It's my fault... I was the one who got Aeris involved in this.

Name: Elmyra
Line: Don't say that. Aeris doesn't think that.

Name: Tifa
Line: I feel so depressed.

Name: Elmyra
Line: ...sigh...

Name: Barret
Line: I'm so glad...... I'm so glad you're all right...

Name: Marlene
Line: Daddy, don't cry. Your whiskers hurt!

Name: Barret
Line: Cloud!You gonna go help Aeris, right? She's done so much for me...If it's the Shinra you're dealin' with, I can't just sit here! I'm comin', too!

Name: Marlene
Line: Guess what? Guess what? Aeris was asking me lots of questions.Like what kind of person Cloud is. I bet she likes you, Cloud!

Name: Cloud
Line: - I don't know- Let's hope so

Name: Tifa
Line: You're going after Aeris, right?

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah.

Name: Tifa
Line: I'm coming with you.

Name: Cloud
Line: We're going right into Shinra Headquarters. ...You gotta be prepared for the worst.

Name: Tifa
Line: I know.Right now, I feel I have to push myself to the limit.If I stayed here... I'll go crazy.

Name: Barret
Line: Sorry, but can you take care of Marlene a bit longer?

Name: Elmyra
Line: Yes, I don't mind.

Name: Barret
Line: This place is dangerous now. You better go somewhere else.

Name: Elmyra
Line: ...You're right. But promise me that you'll come back to her. Don't get yourself killed.

Name: Tifa
Line: How do we get to the Shinra Building?

Name: Barret
Line: There ain't no train that goes up there anymore...

Name: Tifa
Line: ......Well, let's just go to Wall Market. We might be able to find something there.

Name: Elmyra
Line: I mean it, come back to her. Don't get yourself killed.

Name: Marlene
Line: Daddy, Tifa,Cloud! Please bring Aeris back!

Name: Punk
Line: Hey!! It's you!!Sorry, but I already heard about you.In addition to dressing like a woman, it seems you like to smash and grind things.We only let cultured customers in! Got it? Then you'd better leave!

Name: Guy Outside Inn
Line: Hey, ya'll. Please stay here!

Name: Kid by Cat Statue
Line: It came down from the sky.But the old guy who likes tanks took all of it away. I wanted some too.

Name: Punk
Line: I never believed that Sector 7 would ever come down.

Name: Man Outside Restaurant
Line: According to that guy with the tank, if you're strong enough, anyone can make it to the top plate.So, build your strength by having a plate of our food.

Name: Man Outside Dress Shop
Line: That was scary...

Name: Clothing Shop Owner
Line: You're dressed normal today. If something else interesting comes up, let me in on it.

Name: Man Cooking Outside
Line: Phew, it's all dusty ever since the sky came down. I'll have to start over.

Name: Person 1
Line: Is this pile of trash getting bigger?

Name: Person 2
Line: Yes, I think so.A lot of things came falling down when the Sector 7 pillar fell.

Name: Person 1
Line: Right, right, you're right. The owner of the Weapons Shop scavenged all the stuff that came falling down.

Name: Person 2
Line: Oh is that why? He seems pretty suspicious these days.

Name: Person 1
Line: Oh, you mean he went out to the Plate cross section next to the Don's Mansion, right?

Name: Person 2
Line: Oh, you know! I wonder what he's doing?

Name: Person 1
Line: Yeah! It gives me the chills.

Name: Beautiful Bro
Line: So? How's it?

Name: Man Using Punching Bag
Line: More strength.I bet you could climb all the way up to the upper plate if you used that pipe.Don't you know? The old man at the Weapon shop can tell you more about it.

Name: Redhead
Line: Scary, isn't it? You just never know when the plate might come crashing down.

Name: Redhead 2
Line: Yeah. I'd like to climb up to the plate if I could.

Name: Weapons Shop Owner
Line: You goin' up to the plate? You better have a Battery.

Name: Cloud
Line: You're gonna sell me something you just found?

Name: Weapons Shop Owner
Line: Hey, you knew? But I repaired it, so it's all right.

Name: Cloud
Line: Why do I need a battery to climb up to the plate?

Name: Weapons Shop Owner
Line: You'll find out when you get there. How 'bout 100 Gil for each?

Name: Cloud
Line: ......- All right, I'll take them- I think you're full of it

Name: Kid
Line: Wanna see somethin' awesome? Follow me!

Name: Kotch
Line: Hey! You're... not them... you're...Please, help me!

Name: Cloud
Line: - Help him- Leave him

Name: Girl
Line: Everyone climbed up this wire. Looks scary...... Brrr.

Name: Tifa
Line: Can we climb it?

Name: Girl
Line: Yeah. It leads to the Upper World.

Name: Barret
Line: Awright! We'll climb this wire!

Name: Cloud
Line: There's no way we can do this. You know how far it goes up?

Name: Barret
Line: There IS a way! Look! What's that look like?

Name: Cloud
Line: Just a normal wire.

Name: Barret
Line: Oh yeah? Well to me it looks like a golden shiny wire of hope.

Name: Tifa
Line: You're right. This is the only way to save Aeris...

Name: Cloud
Line: Ok, that was a bad analogy, but, Barret, I understand how you feel.Let's go!

Name: Kid 2
Line: Oh man! This is horrible...

Name: Kid
Line: Hey, scary, huh? Dad told me that it's the Shinra's doing.

Name: Cloud
Line: Maybe if I put a battery in...The propeller might work.

Name: Barret
Line: Hey, you oughta know this building well.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Not really, now that I think about it,This's the first time I've ever been to the Headquarters.

Name: Barret
Line: I heard about this place before.Every floor above the 60th is special and not easy to get to even for employees.Must be where they took Aeris.The security's pretty light now. Awright, let's go!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Wait a second! You're not thinking of just going right through the main entrance, are you?

Name: Barret
Line: Well what else does it look like!? I'm gonna kick some Shinra butt and......

Name: Tifa
Line: That's not going to work! We've got to find another way...

Name: Barret
Line: Ain't gonna be no other way! If we keep wastin' time like this, Aeris'll...

Name: Tifa
Line: I know that! But if we get caught here...Hey, Cloud. ...What should we do?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Let's bust on in!- Let's sneak in quietly

Name: Barret
Line: Hey Cloud!You come all this way, you thinkin' of goin' back down to the 1st floor?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- No......

Name: Soldiers
Line: Destroy the intruders!

Name: Cloud
Line: What's this?

Name: Tifa
Line: I hope Aeris is all right.

Name: Barret
Line: This is the real thing. Don't let your guard down.

Name: Guard
Line: What're you doing here!? No unauthorized people are allowed here!!

Name: Guard 2
Line: People like you don't belong here! Go on, get out!

Name: Barret
Line: Lookit that, all them guards is runnin' around.Cloud, you go on ahead and signal us when it's safe to come.When those guards turn around, MOVE!

Name: Tifa
Line: Stay in the shadows!

Name: Woman
Line: I don't remember seeing your face before... You new here?Say, you're cute. Let me teach you some... things.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Things?- Um, I'm kinda in a hurry...

Name: Man
Line: This is the lounge floor. Above us are the special floors for the big wigs in the company.It's tough working under someone. Tires you out.

Name: Man 2
Line: What's keeping her? Did she forget her keycard?Even employees can't walk around above the 60th floor without a keycard.

Name: Man 3
Line: The hell are you? What're you doin' around here?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Where's Aeris?- ......

Name: Woman Sitting Down
Line: I thought I heard a ruckus downstairs a minute ago. Do you know what that was all about?

Name: Man Sitting Down
Line: No idea. But no need to worry because everything above the 60th floor is safe.

Name: Hart
Line: How do you do?This is the Midgar Mayor's Office. Mayor Domino is in his office.I am the Deputy Mayor. If you should have any questions feel free to ask me...

Name: Domino
Line: Hmm? Oh, and who might you be?You all must be those... ahem... Me? I'm Domino, the Mayor of Midgar.Actually, I'm Mayor in name only. The city and everything in it is really run by Shinra, Inc.My only real job is watching over Shinra's documents...Me! The Mayor! A librarian! Ohh......You want to get upstairs? I tell you what, if you can guess the password, I'll give you my keycard.Yes, that's it. Guess the password and I'll give you my keycard!Get it on the first try and I'll even throw in a special item!

Name: Hart
Line: Did you speak with the Mayor?What? A password? Oh, I get it...He's got way too much time on his hands. But you can't really blame him, Everything in Midgar is controlled by President Shinra.Maybe I can help you.What do you want to know?

Name: Cloud
Line: - HELP- Forget it

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: Domino
Line: Got it?Then tell me.So, what's the password?

Name: Cloud
Line: - BEST- KING- ORBS- BOMB- MAKO- HOJO- Wait a second

Name: Domino
Line: Why would I do something like this, you ask?To mess with them, of course! Shinra's been torturing me forever.That's why I was a little rough on you all just now. Now go up there and really make them suffer.This ought to make us even! Heh heh heh......But my card will only get you to the 65th floor.Can you believe how they treat me? ...ME! Like some common employee...

Name: Hart
Line: If you run into President Shinra please don't tell him about this.I can't be a partner to anymore trouble for Shinra.

Name: Computer
Line: ...beep... beep... ......verifying key card...... ...........................Level B employee: verified. You are permitted to open doors on this floor up to three times.blip...... If you receive an item coupon, remember to exchange it for an item....warning... refrain from entering the air conditioning ducts recklessly - they are very dangerous......bing... bing... Enter command

Name: Cloud
Line: - All clear- Coupon Change

Name: Cloud
Line: An air-duct... It doesn't look like I'll be able to climb in here.

Name: Computer
Line: ...bing... bing... Enter command

Name: Cloud
Line: - Coupon Change

Name: Computer
Line: You can exchange your coupons for items. Here are the items you can have...A coupon.........'Star Pendant'B coupon.........'Four Slots'C coupon.........'All' MateriaPlease use caution... once you have exchanged coupons for items you may not use 'All Clear' function.Exchange coupon?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah......- Naw

Name: Computer
Line: ...... ......... ...... Coupon exchange complete.

Name: Computer
Line: ...bing... bing... Enter command

Name: Cloud
Line: - All clear

Name: Computer
Line: ...beep... beep...... After you have exchanged coupons you may no longer use 'all-clear'.

Name: Receptionist
Line: You must be a visitor. Please feel free to use any unused machines.

Name: Man Lifting Weights
Line: Hmph, hmph... Since I'm head of security for this building, stamina's very important to me.

Name: Woman on Treadmill
Line: ...huff... puff... If you're tired, you should get some rest in the next room.

Name: Man on Treadmill
Line: ...huff... weeze... I'm starting to worry about my belly......

Name: Cloud
Line: .......- Should I try it?- This is so stupid

Name: Vending Machine
Line: Take one to restore your energy!! 'Shinra Gym Special Drink'Only 250 gil!!- Try it out- Don't try it

Name: Man in Nap Room
Line: ...zzz... Please...... let me...... get some... rest......

Name: Sign in Bathroom
Line: Out of OrderPlease use a different FloorShinra Company Repair Management Department

Name: Cloud
Line: What is this...... a Megaphone?Hanging on to this won't do any good...

Name: Cloud
Line: A model of Midgar... born from Mako sucked right out of the earth.Parts of the model are missing...- Place the Midgar parts- Leave it alone

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Sounds like something opened up...

Name: Secretary
Line: Whew, I'm so sick of carrying all these files...But I get to meet lots of guys. I guess that's the benefit of being a secretary!

Name: Secretary
Line: Hello...!! (He's kinda cute. But looks like that girl's with him... But that's kinda exciting!)Hello...!! (Just concentrate on work...)Hello...!! (Looks so serious. I guess it means the man's fastidious.)Hello...!! (Wow, Pee-U! No thanks.)

Name: Man
Line: Is it just me or does the Conference Room smell? There's some sort of stench coming from somewhere...

Name: Man 3
Line: Hey, when you're in the bathroom, do you ever hear whispers coming from somewhere?

Name: Man 4
Line: They're having another executive meeting. I wonder if it's about that Plate incident.

Name: Man 5
Line: It gives me the feeling that I AM alive. The feeling of moving this world, just with my hands.

Name: Woman
Line: Come on, we're building the future of Mako!

Name: Cloud
Line: - Flush?- Climb up?- Get out of here

Name: Barret
Line: Geez--! That's a lotta suits!

Name: Reeve
Line: We have the damage estimates for Sector 7.Considering those factories we already set up and all the investments, the damage is estimated at approximately 10 Billion gil...The estimated cost to rebuild Sector 7 is...

Name: President Shinra
Line: We're not rebuilding.

Name: Reeve
Line: What?

Name: President Shinra
Line: We're leaving Sector 7 as it is.And restarting the Neo-Midgar plan.

Name: Reeve
Line: ...then the Ancients?

Name: President Shinra
Line: The Promised Land will soon be ours.I want you to raise the Mako rates 15% in every area.

Name: Palmer
Line: Rate hike! Rate hike! Tra, la, la! And please include our Space Program in the budget!

Name: President Shinra
Line: Reeve and Scarlet will divide the extra income from the rate increase.

Name: Palmer
Line: Oh man!

Name: Reeve
Line: Sir. If you raise the rates, the people will lose confidence...

Name: President Shinra
Line: It'll be all right.The ignorant citizens won't lose confidence, they'll trust Shinra, Inc. even more.

Name: Heidegger
Line: Ha ha ha!After all, we're the ones who saved Sector 7 from AVALANCHE!

Name: Barret
Line: That dirty #$*$^

Name: President Shinra
Line: Hojo. How's the girl?

Name: Hojo
Line: As a specimen, she is inferior to her mother. I'm still in the process of comparing her to her mother, Ifalna, but for now the difference is 18%.

Name: President Shinra
Line: How long will the research take?

Name: Hojo
