Line: Probably 120 years. It's probably impossible to finish in our lifetime. Or in the lifetime of the specimen too, for that matter.That's why we're thinking of breeding her. Then we could create one that could withstand our research for a long time.

Name: President Shinra
Line: What about the Promised Land? Won't it hinder our plans?

Name: Hojo
Line: That's what I need to plan. The mother is strong... and yet has her weaknesses.

Name: President Shinra
Line: That concludes our meeting.

Name: Scarlet
Line: Something stinks...

Name: Cloud
Line: They were talking about Aeris... right?

Name: Barret
Line: I dunno.

Name: Tifa
Line: Probably.

Name: Cloud
Line: Let's follow 'em.

Name: Cloud
Line: Hojo... huh...?

Name: Man 4
Line: (after the meeting)Sittin' here facing the monitor... day in, day out... I kinda feel...... forced... into doing it. And I just don't have any motivation.

Name: Barret
Line: I remember him.That Hojo guy. He's in charge of the Shinra's Science Department. Cloud, don't you know him?

Name: Cloud
Line: This is the first time I've actually ever seen him. So... that's what he looks like...

Name: Man
Line: Let's see... The specimen Hojo asked me for is...

Name: Man
Line: Is this today's specimen?

Name: Hojo
Line: Yes. We're starting right away. Raise it to the upper level.

Name: Hojo
Line: My precious specimen...

Name: Tifa
Line: Precious specimen...?Is it going to be used for a biological experiment?

Name: Cloud
Line: Jenova...

Name: Cloud
Line: Jenova... Sephiroth's... So... they've brought it here.

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud, be strong!

Name: Cloud
Line: Did you see it?

Name: Barret
Line: See what?

Name: Cloud
Line: It's moving...... still alive?

Name: Barret
Line: Where's its $#&*&@ head? This whole thing's stupid. Let's keep goin'.

Name: Cloud
Line: Aeris!

Name: Hojo
Line: Aeris? Oh, is that her name? What do you want?

Name: Cloud
Line: We're taking Aeris back.

Name: Hojo
Line: Outsiders......

Name: Barret
Line: Shoulda noticed it earlier, you...

Name: Hojo
Line: There's so many frivolous things in this world.

Name: Hojo
Line: Are you going to kill me? I don't think you should.The equipment here is extremely delicate. Without me, who could operate it? Hmm?

Name: Cloud
Line: Ugh.

Name: Hojo
Line: That's right. I recommend you think things out logically before you make any rash moves.Now, bring in the Specimen!

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud, help!

Name: Cloud
Line: What do you think you're doin'?

Name: Hojo
Line: Lending a helping hand to an endangered species... Both of them are on the brink of extinction...If I don't help, all these animals will disappear.

Name: Tifa
Line: ...animal? That's terrible! Aeris is a human being!

Name: Barret
Line: You're gonna pay!

Name: Cloud
Line: Barret! Can't you do anything?

Name: Barret
Line: Awright!! Step back!

Name: Hojo
Line: Stop!!

Name: Hojo
Line: Wh... what are you do-- Oh! My precious specimens...

Name: Cloud
Line: Now's our chance to get Aeris!

Name: Aeris
Line: Thanks, Cloud.

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud... what's wrong?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...The elevator is moving.

Name: Hojo
Line: This is no ordinary specimen. This is a very ferocious specimen!

Name: Red
Line: He's rather strong. I'll help you all out.

Name: Tifa
Line: It talked!?

Name: Red
Line: I'll talk as much as you want later, Miss.

Name: Cloud
Line: We'll take care of that monster.Somebody take Aeris somewhere safe...- Tifa, I'm countin' on you!- Barret, take care of her!

Name: Cloud
Line: What's your name?

Name: Red
Line: Hojo has named me, Red XIII. A name with no meaning whatsoever to me. Call me whatever you wish.

Name: Cloud
Line: Come on!

Name: Cloud
Line: Aeris, you all right?

Name: Tifa
Line: She seems all right, ...in many ways.

Name: Red XIII
Line: I have a right to choose, too. I don't like two-legged things.

Name: Barret
Line: What are you?

Name: Red XIII
Line: An informed question. But difficult to answer. I am what you see....You must have many questions, but first, let's get out of here. I'll lead the way.

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud... so you did come for me.

Name: Red XIII
Line: I apologize for what happened back there. I was merely acting to throw Hojo off guard......

Name: Barret
Line: Now we've saved Aeris, ain't no need to be in this buildin'! So let's get the hell outta here!

Name: Cloud
Line: If all five of us go together, we'll be noticed. Let's break up into two groups.

Name: Man
Line: No! Please don't kill me. I only did what Hojo told me to do.To prove it to you... here, this is the key card to the 68th Floor. Would I be doing this if I was the enemy?

Name: Cloud
Line: H, hey! What is it?

Name: Rude
Line: Would you press 'Up' please?

Name: Cloud
Line: Turks? Must be a trap...

Name: Tseng
Line: It must have been a real thrill for you... Did you enjoy it?

Name: Cloud
Line: Ggh...

Name: Cloud
Line: You all got caught, too?Where is Aeris!?

Name: President Shinra
Line: In a safe place.She's the last surviving Ancient...Don't you know? They called themselves the Cetra, and lived thousands of years ago. Now they are just a forgotten page in history.

Name: Red XIII
Line: Cetra... That girl, is she a survivor of the Cetra?

Name: President Shinra
Line: Cetra, or the Ancients will show us the way to the 'Promised Land.' I'm expecting a lot out of her.

Name: Red XIII
Line: The Promised Land? Isn't that just a legend?

Name: President Shinra
Line: Even so, it's just too appealing to not to pursue.It's been said the Promised Land is very fertile....If the land is fertile...

Name: Barret
Line: Then there's gotta be Mako!

Name: President Shinra
Line: Exactly. That is why our money sucking Mako Reactor is necessary.The abundant Mako will just come out on its own.That is where Neo-Midgar will be built. Shinra's new glory...

Name: Barret
Line: @$#*^%! Quit dreamin'!

Name: President Shinra
Line: Oh really, don't you know? These days all it takes for your dreams to come true is money and power.Well, that is all for our meeting.

Name: Rude
Line: Come on! Outta his way!

Name: Barret
Line: Hold it! I got a lot I wanna say to you!

Name: President Shinra
Line: If you need something else... talk to my secretary.

Name: Tifa
Line: Psst (Can we get out?)

Name: Cloud
Line: - (Leave it to me)- (Kinda hard)

Name: Cloud
Line: I wonder how Barret is doing

Name: Barret
Line: Hey!Aeris is an Ancient and the real name of the Ancients is Cetra.The Ancients know where the Promised Land is and the Shinra is searching for that Promised Land.I only heard stories 'bout the Promised Land. I don't know if it really exists.Is that right?The Shinra believe that the Promised Land is full of Mako energy.Which means, if the Shinra get there, they'll suck up all the Mako energy....and the land'll wither away. The Planet's gonna get weaker.I can't just leave 'em be. I'm recruitin' new members!!Me, Tifa, Cloud... and Aeris too.

Name: Barret
Line: You're so damn boring.

Name: Cloud
Line: I wonder how Red XIII is doing

Name: Barret
Line: Grandpa!? Ha, ha, ha...... Grandpa, hmm...... ha, ha, ha......

Name: Red XIII
Line: What's so funny?

Name: Barret
Line: Nothin'...... ha, ha

Name: Cloud
Line: I wonder how Aeris is doing

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud, are you there?

Name: Cloud
Line: Aeris!? You safe?

Name: Aeris
Line: Yeah, I'm all right.I knew that Cloud would come for me.

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey, I'm your bodyguard, right?

Name: Aeris
Line: The deal was for one date, right?

Name: Aeris
Line: ...!? Tifa! Tifa, you're there too!

Name: Tifa
Line: EXCUSE me.You know, Aeris. I have a question.

Name: Aeris
Line: What?

Name: Tifa
Line: Does the Promised Land really exist?

Name: Aeris
Line: ...I don't know.All I know is...The Cetra were born from the Planet, speak with the Planet, and unlock the Planet.And...... then...The Cetra will return to the Promised Land. A land that promises supreme happiness.

Name: Tifa
Line: ...What does that mean?

Name: Aeris
Line: More than words...... I don't know.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Speak with the Planet?

Name: Tifa
Line: Just what does the Planet say?

Name: Aeris
Line: It's full of people and noisy. That's why I can't make out what they are saying.

Name: Cloud
Line: You hear it now?

Name: Aeris
Line: I, I only heard it at the Church in the Slums. Mother said that Midgar was no longer safe. That is... my real mother.Someday I'll get out of Midgar... Speak with the Planet and find my Promised Land....That's what mom said.I thought I would stop hearing her voice as I grew up, but...

Name: Cloud
Line: Let's just get some sleep

Name: Cloud
Line: The door's open... When did it open?

Name: Tifa
Line: What's wrong?

Name: Cloud
Line: Something's wrong. Look outside.

Name: Tifa
Line: I wonder what happened...

Name: Cloud
Line: He should have the key on him...Come on, Tifa, get Aeris. I'll go help Barret and the others.

Name: Barret
Line: How'd you get in? Why's the door open!?

Name: Tifa
Line: This's kinda eerie...

Name: Aeris
Line: Must've been attacked by...

Name: Barret
Line: The hell's goin' on'!?

Name: Red XIII
Line: No human could've done this.I'll go on ahead.

Name: Barret
Line: I'll clean up back here, so you guys go ahead. And don't get caught by Shinra!

Name: Tifa
Line: Come on, let's follow Red XIII!

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Did it get away? Jenova...?

Name: Red XIII
Line: Jenova Specimen... Looks like it went to the upper floor using that elevator for the specimens.

Name: Red XIII
Line: It looks like it leads up...

Name: Barret
Line: He's dead... The leader of Shinra, Inc. is dead...

Name: Tifa
Line: Then this sword must be...!?

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth's!!

Name: Tifa
Line: ...Sephiroth is alive?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Looks like it. Only Sephiroth can use that sword.

Name: Barret
Line: Who cares who did it!? This is the end of the Shinra now!

Name: Palmer
Line: Uh!

Name: Cloud
Line: What happened?

Name: Palmer
Line: Se... Sephiroth. Sephiroth came.

Name: Cloud
Line: Did you see him? Did you see Sephiroth?

Name: Palmer
Line: Yeah, I saw him! I saw him with my own eyes!

Name: Cloud
Line: You really saw him?

Name: Palmer
Line: Uh! Would I lie to you at a time like this!? And I heard his voice too!Um, he was saying something about not letting us have the Promised Land.

Name: Tifa
Line: Then what?Does that mean that the Promised Land really exists and that Sephiroth's here to save it from Shinra?

Name: Barret
Line: So he's a good guy then?

Name: Cloud
Line: Save the Promised Land? A good guy? No way!!It's not that simple! I know him! Sephiroth's mission is different!

Name: Barret
Line: Rufus! &*%$! I forgot about him!

Name: Tifa
Line: Who's that?

Name: Barret
Line: Vice President Rufus. The President's son.I heard that he's been assigned somewhere else for a long time...

Name: Aeris
Line: I've heard that no one's ever seen him bleed or cry.

Name: Red XIII
Line: I only know his name.

Name: Tifa
Line: I wonder what kinda person he is...

Name: Rufus
Line: So... So Sephiroth was actually here. ...By the way.

Name: Rufus
Line: Who are you guys?

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm Cloud, former SOLDIER First Class!

Name: Barret
Line: I'm from AVALANCHE!

Name: Tifa
Line: Same here!

Name: Aeris
Line: ...a flower girl from the slums.

Name: Red XIII
Line: (growling)...a research specimen.

Name: Rufus
Line: What a crew.Well, I'm Rufus. The President of Shinra, Inc.

Name: Barret
Line: You only President, 'cause yer old man died!

Name: Rufus
Line: That's right. I'll let you hear my new appointment speech....Old man tried to control the world with money. It seems to have been working.The population thought that Shinra would protect them.Work at Shinra, get your pay. If a terrorist attacks, the Shinra army will help you.It looks perfect on the outside.But, I do things differently.I'll control the world with fear. It takes too much to do it like my old man.A little fear will control the minds of the common people. There's no reason to waste money on them.

Name: Tifa
Line: He likes to make speeches just like his father.

Name: Cloud
Line: Get outta this building with Aeris!

Name: Barret
Line: What?

Name: Cloud
Line: I'll explain later! Barret! This is the real crisis for the Planet!

Name: Barret
Line: The hell's that supposed to mean?

Name: Cloud
Line: I'll tell you later! Just take my word for it now! I'll go after I take care of him!

Name: Barret
Line: Awright, Cloud!

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud... I just thought of something.

Name: Tifa
Line: ...I'll wait for Cloud! Everyone, get to the elevator!

Name: Aeris
Line: Hmm, it's going to get pretty ugly from here on. We should check on our equipment.

Name: Rufus
Line: Why do you want to fight me?

Name: Cloud
Line: You seek the Promised Land and Sephiroth.

Name: Rufus
Line: Hm, exactly.Mm? Did you know that Sephiroth is an Ancient?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...A lot has happened. Anyway, I can't let either you or Sephiroth have the Promised Land!

Name: Rufus
Line: I see. I guess this means we won't become friends.

Name: Rufus
Line: Heh, heh, heh...

Name: Rufus
Line: Heh... That's all for today...

Name: Tifa
Line: Where's Rufus?

Name: Cloud
Line: I couldn't finish 'em. Looks like this's gonna get complicated.

Name: Aeris
Line: Quickly! We'll escape out this way......Quickly, we can escape this way...Quickly, we have to get out of here...

Name: Barret
Line: I'll go on ahead!

Name: Aeris
Line: You all get out while you can.It's not you they're after... it's me.

Name: Barret
Line: Yeah, well that ain't happenin'.You got caught up in this over Marlene. Now, it's my turn to watch out for you!Ok, playtime's over for you jackasses...

Name: Aeris
Line: ...thank you, Mr. Barret!

Name: Barret
Line: Who you callin' Mr. Barret? That don't sound right!

Name: Red XIII
Line: Well then...If you are through talking, may I suggest that we think of a way to get out of here.

Name: Barret
Line: Huh? Oh, oh yeah... You a cold man. Just like someone else 'round here I know.

Name: Red XIII
Line: Did you say something?

Name: Barret
Line: Notta thing. So what're we gonna do?

Name: Tifa
Line: Barret!!

Name: Barret
Line: Tifa! Where's Cloud?

Name: Tifa
Line: Everyone, over here!

Name: Barret
Line: Huh? What's up? Where's Cloud?

Name: Tifa
Line: I'll tell you later! Hurry, Hurry!!

Name: Barret
Line: Well, what do we do now?

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth is alive. I... I have to settle the score.

Name: Barret
Line: And that'll save the Planet?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Seems like it.

Name: Barret
Line: Awright, I'm going!

Name: Aeris
Line: I'll go too. ...I have things that I want to find out.

Name: Cloud
Line: About the Ancients?

Name: Aeris
Line: ......Many things.

Name: Tifa
Line: I guess this's good bye, Midgar.

Name: Red XIII
Line: I'm going back to my hometown. I'll go with you as far as that.

Name: Tifa
Line: ...I guess this is the start of our journey...

Name: Cloud
Line: - You hate traveling?- It's dangerous. You sure you want to go?

Name: Aeris
Line: You know what? This is the first time I've ever left Midgar...

Name: Cloud
Line: - Really? ...You worried?- It's dangerous. You sure you want to go?

Name: Barret
Line: We told Aeris's mom to go somewhere safe, so Marlene should be safe too.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah, she should be- Hmm, I don't know

Name: Cloud
Line: Then...- Let's stay here for a while- Let's go!

Name: Barret
Line: We need a group leader for our journey. 'Course only me could be the leader.

Name: Tifa
Line: You think so...?

Name: Aeris
Line: It would have to be Cloud.

Name: Barret
Line: ^#$^%...... awright. Go Northeast to a town called Kalm. If something happens, we'll meet up there.'Sides, we can't have 5 people strolling down the fields. It's too dangerous. Split us into 2 parties...

Name: Cloud
Line: ...I got the feeling I'm forgetting something...Hey, would you stay there just a minute?

Name: Redhead
Line: Aw, c'mon! listen to me! Got anything interesting to say?......

Name: Old Man
Line: Thanks to Shinra, Inc. developing Mako energy for us, everything's more convenient now.Maybe a little too convenient.

Name: Black-haired Man
Line: Tourists, huh?There are some things you should know that'll come in handy when you travel around the world......Want me to tell you what they are?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Tell me- I already know

Name: Man in Blue
Line: I hear that the natural resources near the reactors are being sucked dry.We're better off with them bringing in the Mako energy.

Name: Man
Line: I heard President Shinra was killed. And his son Rufus, the new president, was badly hurt.Hey, I bet that's news to you?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Hey you're pretty clued!!- Don't care...

Name: Man
Line: Shinra is leading the world around by the nose, and you guys are just gonna sit back and take it?

Name: Woman
Line: The famous floating city, Midgar... Just once I'd love to see it in person.South of this town past the Mythril Mine and far to the west is a Shinra harbor called Junon.They say there's a reactor and many tall buildings there. I hope to see it someday.

Name: Woman
Line: Thanks to Mako energy, life's pretty darn convenient. Thanks to Shinra.Don't you think?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah, maybe- You're full of it

Name: Woman
Line: Yeah, Mako energy's made our lives much easier. And it's all thanks to Shinra, Inc.

Name: Girl Upstairs
Line: Mako energy's made things a lot more convenient......But seems like a lot of plants and animals have been disappearing at a rapid pace.I think the old life was better.Don't you think so?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah, maybe- No way

Name: Girl Upstairs
Line: I thought things were better when I was able to play with animals......

Name: Old Man
Line: Did you say you came from Midgar?I used to live there, too. But I hear they got lots of troubles lately.

Name: Woman
Line: There was a suspicious-looking man in a black cloak! He was carrying a wicked-looking sword.Why doesn't anyone believe me? I'm all alone...

Name: Girl
Line: ......My older brother's so stupid. He's so embarrassing I could just puke!

Name: Boy
Line: When I grow up I'm gonna be in SOLDIER. That's why I'm training hard now!!Hyah, hayah, eagghh!

Name: Woman
Line: Is it true that Shinra made a Monster?

Name: Cloud
Line: - It's true- Just a rumor

Name: Woman
Line: (she says the same thing regardless)Yeah, well either way, as long as we're using the reactor, we can't stand up to Shinra.

Name: Kalm Traveler
Line: The world's at peace... all's well.I got my health, and enough to eat... all's well.

Name: Kid outside Bar
Line: My old man was a miner, but he couldn't go to work after monsters started appearing in the Mythril Mine.Now all he does is sit around getting drunk in the bar...

Name: Person in Blue
Line: I heard terrorists bombed a Midgar reactor...There sure have been a lot of dangerous accidents recently. I hate it, just hate it.

Name: Man
Line: Me? I used to work in a coal mine down south called Mythril MineBut, right around then, monsters started appearing.After that, business went to pot and now I spend the days here drinking.Urrrp! ...hic... I'm stinking drunk!!

Name: Bartender
Line: It seems there was this group called AVALANCHE runnin' around, but I guess they finally got wiped out by SOLDIER.Shinra is trying to eliminate anyone, who stands up to them.It don't matter if we like it or not. Shinra's taken over, and we gotta live with it!

Name: Cook
Line: Stay out of the kitchen.

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: This is the Item Store.

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: This is the Materia Store.

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: This is the Weapons Store.

Name: Cloud
Line: Barret and the others are waiting for us at the inn.

Name: Innkeeper
Line: Mr...... Cloud? Your party is waiting for you on the 2nd floor.

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud, you're late!

Name: Barret
Line: Yo man, you're late!

Name: Cloud
Line: Sorry to keep you waiting.

Name: Aeris
Line: Guess everyone's here now.

Name: Barret
Line: So let's hear your story......You know, the one about Sephiroth and the crisis facing the planet.Let's hear it all.

Name: Cloud
Line: ......I used to want to be like Sephiroth, so I joined SOLDIER.After working with Sephiroth on several missions, we became friends.

Name: Barret
Line: You call that a friend?

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah, well......He's older than me, and he hardly ever talked about himself.

Name: Cloud
Line: So I guess you'd call him a war buddy...... We trusted each other. Until one day......

Name: Aeris
Line: ...one day?

Name: Cloud
Line: After the war it was SOLDIER's duty to put down any resistance against the Shinra.......that was 5 years ago.I was 16......

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth's strength is unreal. He is far stronger in reality than any story you might have heard about him.

Name: Aeris
Line: So... Where do you come in?

Name: Cloud
Line: Me? I was mesmerized by the way Sephiroth fought.

Name: Cloud
Line: ......and then we reached Nibelheim.

Name: Barret
Line: You wait a minute!!Isn't that, um...?The name of Sephiroth's mother...I remember Jenova. That's that damn headless spook livin' in the Shinra building.

Name: Cloud
Line: That's right.

Name: Tifa
Line: Barret, would you please let us hear what Cloud has to say? You can ask questions later.

Name: Barret
Line: Tifa, I was only......

Name: Tifa
Line: Okay Cloud, continue.

Name: Aeris
Line: It's a reunion of childhood pals!

Name: Cloud
Line: ......I was really surprised with Tifa.

Name: Cloud
Line: (narrating)...The town was quiet.Everyone must be staying in their houses, afraid to come out because of the monsters.No, maybe they're afraid of us...

Name: Barret
Line: Now you're pissin' me off!! This don't matter, so get on with it!

Name: Cloud
Line: This Mansion......No, I'll come here later.

Name: Cloud
Line: Up ahead is... Mt. Nibel.I'll tell you about the time I went into the mountains.

Name: Cloud
Line: This is...... my house. It has nothing to do with that incident five years ago.

Name: Barret
Line: Yo wait, I wanna hear.

Name: Aeris
Line: Me too! It's been a long time, right?

Name: Barret
Line: Tell us more!You saw your family, right?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Don't want to talk about it- All right......

Name: Cloud
Line: (narrating)......Let's stop this......

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey...I can't... remember much else. There's... nothing more to talk about.

Name: Aeris
Line: That's all right, Cloud.

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud...?Did you go into my house?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah...- No...

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud...?Did you go into my room?

Name: Tifa
Line: Did you play my piano?

Name: Cloud
Line: - No, I didn't- Yeah, I jammed on it- Just a little

Name: Tifa
Line: Did you read it? My letter?

Name: Cloud
Line: - I'd never do that!- Yeah...

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud!!!

Name: Cloud
Line: - It's true- Just kidding. Don't get mad...

Name: Tifa
Line: (she says the same thing regardless)...CloudWe're talking about something really important here.

Name: Cloud
Line: (narrating)A Mako Reactor was built in Mt. Nibel.The cold air of the mountains of Nibel. It was no different...

Name: Cloud
Line: (narrating)Am I...... human?I didn't quite understand what Sephiroth was saying at that time.I was even more surprised by the fact that Shinra was producing monsters.

Name: Barret
Line: Damn, Shinra! The more I hear, the more I hate 'em!

Name: Tifa
Line: ......who would have ever thought the Mako Reactor held a secret like that.

Name: Red XIII
Line: That would seem to explain the increase in the number of monsters recently.I think we should listen carefully to Cloud. Don't you think so Barret?

Name: Barret
Line: (Why you talkin' to me!?)

Name: Cloud
Line: - Save game and take a rest- Keep talking

Name: Barret
Line: ......I get it.

Name: Aeris
Line: Tifa... You were waiting outside then?

Name: Cloud
Line: We returned to Nibelheim. Sephiroth confined himself at the inn. He didn't even try to talk to me.

Name: Tifa
Line: Then all of a sudden he just disappeared, right?

Name: Cloud
Line: We found him inside the biggest building in Nibelheim.

Name: Tifa
Line: The villagers used to call it Shinra mansion.

Name: Cloud
Line: Long ago, people from Shinra used to live in that mansion...

Name: Cloud
Line: (narrating)Sephiroth didn't come out of the Shinra Mansion...He continued to read as if he were possessed by something, and not once, did the light in the basement go out......

Name: Cloud
Line: ......and that's the end of my story.

Name: Barret
Line: Wait a damn minute! Ain't there more?

Name: Cloud
Line: ......I don't remember.

Name: Aeris
Line: What happened to Sephiroth?

Name: Cloud
Line: In terms of skill, I couldn't have killed him.

Name: Tifa
Line: Official records state Sephiroth is dead. I read it in the newspaper.

Name: Aeris
Line: Shinra, Inc. owns the paper, so you can't rely on that information.

Name: Cloud
Line: ......I want to know the truth. I want to know what happened then.I challenged Sephiroth and lived. Why didn't he kill me?

Name: Tifa
Line: ......I'm alive, too.

Name: Aeris
Line: Seems like a lot of this doesn't make sense. What about Jenova? It was in the Shinra building, right?

Name: Cloud
Line: Shinra shipped it from Nibelheim to Midgar.

Name: Aeris
Line: Did someone else carry it out after that? It was missing from the Shinra building.

Name: Tifa
Line: Sephiroth......?

Name: Barret
Line: Damn! Don't none of this make sense!I'm going, going, going, gone!And I'm leavin' the thinkin' to you!Yo, Cloud! Let's get a move on!

Name: Cloud
Line: - Wait a sec- Right

Name: Cloud
Line: Oh brother......

Name: Tifa
Line: .........Cloud...?How bad was I when Sephiroth cut me?

Name: Cloud
Line: I thought you were a goner. ......I was really sad.

Name: Aeris
Line: I...The Ancients...... Cetra...... Jenova...... Sephiroth and myself......

Name: Tifa
Line: Let's go. Barret's waiting.

Name: Red XIII
Line: What a fascinating story......

Name: Innkeeper
Line: 20 gil a night. What's it gonna be?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Stay?- Move on

Name: Innkeeper
Line: (she only says anything if you don't have enough gil)Seems like you're a little short. Why don't you drop by again... when you have money.

Name: Redhead
Line: Listen to me! Just now, some guy in a black cloak goes walked east towards that grassy field.And he's got this killer sword, and is looking REAL scary......

Name: Chocobo
Line: Wark!Wark? Warkwark wark?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Wark- Warrrk

Name: Choco Bill
Line: Thinking of crossing the marshes?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- Not interested

Name: Choco Bill
Line: Looking for an Inn?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- Not interested

Name: Cloud
Line: - All right- I'm in a hurry

Name: Chole
Line: Welcome.

Name: Choco Billy
Line: Do you want a Chocobo?

Name: Cloud
Line: Mmm......- Give me one- Nope

Name: Chole
Line: Wasn't it really expensive?But don't be mad at my brother or Grandpa.Ever since dad and mom died, it's been like this...

Name: Cloud
Line: Did Sephiroth... do this......?

Name: Rude
Line: Just a second!

Name: Rude
Line: Do you know who I am?

Name: Cloud
Line: - From the Turks, right?- Not interested

Name: Rude
Line: It's difficult to explain what the Turks do...

Name: Cloud
Line: Kidnapping, right?

Name: Rude
Line: To put it negatively... you could say that....But, that's not all there is to it, anymore.........................

Name: Elena
Line: Sir!It's all right, Rude! I know you don't like speeches, so don't force it!

Name: Rude
Line: ...Then Elena, explain.

Name: Elena
Line: I'm the newest member of the Turks, Elena. Thanks to what you did to Reno, we're short of people....Although, because of that, I got promoted to the Turks, ...In any case, our job is to find out where Sephiroth is headed.And to try and stop you every step of the way.Wait a minute, it's the other way around... You're the ones that are getting in our way.

Name: Tseng
Line: ...Elena. You talk too much.

Name: Elena
Line: Mr. Tseng!?

Name: Tseng
Line: No need to tell them about our orders.

Name: Elena
Line: Sorry... Tseng.

Name: Tseng
Line: I thought I gave you other orders.Now go. Don't forget to file your report.

Name: Elena
Line: Oh! Right!Very well, Rude and I will go after Sephiroth, who's heading for Junon Harbor!

Name: Tseng
Line: ...Elena. You don't seem to understand.

Name: Elena
Line: Oh! I'm, I'm sorry...

Name: Tseng
Line: ...Go. Don't let Sephiroth get away.

Name: Rude & Elena
Line: Yes sir!

Name: Rude
Line: ...Reno said he wanted to see you after the injuries you gave him healed.He wants to show his affection for you all... with a new weapon.

Name: Tseng
Line: Well, then...

Name: Man
Line: We've been fighting the Shinra for a long time at this battlefield.Even now, we're still settled in for a long war with them.If you aren't in a hurry, would you help us fight them?Listen, we don't want to push you but, if you're in the middle of something, why don't you finish that first?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Where is Junon?- We'll help you

Name: Cloud
Line: - Like to help but...- I guess we'll help you

Name: Tifa
Line: - I'm sorry... really- All right, we'll help

Name: Man
Line: Do you guys want to see it, too?

Name: Man
Line: The condors. They're huge. Come on, have a look.

Name: Man
Line: What do ya think? Awesome, huh?

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: Hello. I'm sorry but we're not selling anything now.We're using everything we have for ourselves.

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: Sorry, but I can't sell you anything now.

Name: Man with Hat
Line: Hmmn, now this is something, I never thought anyone would ever climb up here.......Your eyes are different. Well, anyhow. Any minute now, this will be a battlefield against Shinra.

Name: Man with Hat
Line: It appears you have a problem with Shinra, too. After all, you climbed up here.Why not listen to what I have to say for a moment?

Name: Cloud
Line: ......- I guess so- Not interested

Name: Tifa
Line: Oh, by all means.

Name: Man with Hat
Line: Do you know what's at the top of this mountain?

Name: Man with Hat
Line: I can see you're very perceptive. Yes, it's a reactor and a condor.It seems the Shinra doesn't like the idea of having a condor on top of the reactor.

Name: Man with Hat
Line: It seems there's some type of special materia in the reactor above us.And because the condors came, the Shinra rushed troops here.The military wants to get the condor and all the villagers off this mountain.The condors are now warming their eggs, which hatch only once every few years.We would like to protect the condors from being harmed.

Name: Cloud
Line: New lives......

Name: Man with Hat
Line: Unfortunately, we don't have the ability to fight Shinra ourselves.That's why we have hired soldiers to help us.As our sponsor you can help us with a contribution or by fighting along side of us...What do you think? You want to join us in our fight?

Name: Cloud
Line: ......- All right- Not interested

Name: Tifa
Line: Everyone, listen to what I have to say.I can't possibly leave these people like this.Let's do whatever we can to help them. All right?

Name: Man with Hat
Line: Yes, yes, I've also told the store owners about you, so they should sell you various items.And feel free to use our beds.Ask my son, who's standing guard at the shed, about anything related to our military tactics.

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: Hello. Do your best. We will, too.

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: You hang in there!

Name: Man
Line: You have 10 enemies. There appear to be many Beasts, so you may want to deploy more Attackers.

Name: Man
Line: How are things going? Seems like there's no activity at Shinra.

Name: Man
Line: Perfect timing! They're just around the corner. Get ready.

Name: Man
Line: How goes it? The Shinra troops have attacked X times since you were here.So we're getting a litttle short on funds.We have X gil right now.

Name: Man with Hat
Line: Oh, it's you guys? How are things going?

Name: Cloud
Line: What happened to this town? It's so run-down...

Name: Woman
Line: Wow, now this is rare. We almost never have anyone other than the Shinra people visit this town.I know you guys want to go to the Western Continent, but the only way is on a Shinra ship.

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: If you see a weapon you want, you'd better buy it.

Name: Fisherman
Line: Ever since... Shinra built that city up above during the war, ...ugh, ugh.There's been no fish in the water! It got so polluted... phew...

Name: Cloud
Line: What kinda place is this?

Name: Older Man
Line: Who are you people? Where did you come from?

Name: Cloud
Line: Did you see a man with a black cape?

Name: Older Man
Line: Hmm... I've never seen that feller before.There's nothing here now... But it used to be a busy port.

Name: Elevator Guard
Line: HEY! This is Shinra, Inc.'s elevator. Don't be snooping around here!!

Name: Priscilla
Line: He-y! Mr. Dolphin!My name is......Pri-scil-la!Now you say it.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...that's how it is.

Name: Priscilla
Line: I don't believe you! Get out of here!

Name: Cloud
Line: Great...

Name: Priscilla
Line: Be careful Mr. Dolphin!

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey! Hold on, we're coming!

Name: Cloud
Line: This is bad... You don't think she's dead, do you?

Name: Older Man
Line: Priscilla!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Mouth to mouth!?

Name: Cloud
Line: But, ... she's just a girl......

Name: Older Man
Line: What? You don't know how? Come over here, I'll show you.

Name: Cloud
Line: Guess I gotta do it...

Name: Older Man
Line: Just take a deep breath, hold it in. Then breathe into her.Hurry up and do it!

Name: Older Man
Line: What are you doing!? Hurry up! Breath deeply and give her mouth to mouth!

Name: Priscilla
Line: Uh... ugh...

Name: Older Man
Line: Hey hey! Priscilla, are you alright?

Name: Older Man
Line: Sorry, Cloud. Priscilla needs to rest for a while.

Name: Woman
Line: (waiting outside her house)Hey, come in for a while.

Name: Woman
Line: I heard what happened. You've done so much for Priscilla.You all must be tired. If you want to get some rest, stay here.Make yourselves at home.

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah...- We'll try later- Let's rest

Name: Tifa
Line: Hey wake up. Wake up, Cloud!

Name: Cloud
Line: Tifa...When Sephiroth and I went to Nibelheim, where were you?

Name: Tifa
Line: ...We saw each other, right?

Name: Cloud
Line: The other time.

Name: Tifa
Line: No... it was 5 years ago. I don't remember.But, something seems strange outside. Cloud, come quick.

Name: Woman
Line: For the past few decades, the only thing I've been hearing about is the Shinra.I miss the times when we used to talk only about fish...

Name: Barret
Line: Seems like something's goin' on up there!

Name: Aeris
Line: I heard that girl regained consciousness.

Name: Tifa
Line: Doesn't it seem a little strange? Everything getting so noisy all of a sudden...?

Name: Red XIII
Line: Does this have something to do with the Shinra?

Name: Yuffie
Line: What's this loud music? It's giving me a headache!

Name: Cloud
Line: Are you all right now?

Name: Priscilla
Line: Umm... thanks for helping...I'm sorry, I mistook you for one of those Shinra, Inc. ...

Name: Cloud
Line: That's all right.

Name: Priscilla
Line: I'll give you something SPECIAL!It's an amulet. Take good care of it, ok?

Name: Barret
Line: What's that music? It sure sounds lively.

Name: Priscilla
Line: I heard they're rehearsing the reception for the new Shinra president.

Name: Barret
Line: Rufus!? I gotta pay my respects.

Name: Priscilla
Line: Grandpa and grandma told me this beach was beautiful when they were small.But after the Shinra built that city above, the sun stopped shining here, and the water got polluted...I was raised on that story and hate Shinra so much, I could die!

Name: Aeris
Line: You think Rufus is thinking about crossing the ocean from here, too?What? Does that mean Sephiroth already crossed the ocean?

Name: Red XIII
Line: Cloud, didn't you finish Rufus off?

Name: Barret
Line: We gotta get to the town up there... Mebbe we could climb the tower?

Name: Priscilla
Line: No! No! There's a high voltage current running underneath the tower. Don't wander near it, it's dangerous!But... you might be able to if Mr. Dolphin helps you. Follow me!

Name: Tifa
Line: High voltage tower......I guess this means Cloud'll be all right.

Name: Aeris
Line: Yeah, better leave it to Cloud!

Name: Red XIII
Line: We're counting on you, Cloud

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey!!Wait a second!

Name: Barret
Line: Yeah, I'd like to take a good look at the new President of Shinra, Inc.!

Name: Tifa
Line: Don't you just hate this?

Name: Aeris
Line: You're probably right.

Name: Red XIII
Line: That looks like a Shinra soldier.

Name: Yuffie
Line: Aren't you going to follow her?

Name: Priscilla
Line: Wait a minute.

Name: Barret
Line: Now ain't that something! I ain't never seen no Dolphin jump like that!

Name: Priscilla
Line: Pretty cool, huh? When I blow this whistle, Mr. Dolphin jumps for me.Here!! This is for you, Cloud!

Name: Cloud
Line: A gift? What am I supposed to do with it!?

Name: Priscilla
Line: Just go into the water, blow this whistle, and Mr. Dolphin'll jump you to the top of the pole!

Name: Cloud
Line: Jump to the top of the pole?

Name: Priscilla
Line: See that rod sticking out at the top? If you jump just right, you can climb to the top of the town.

Name: Barret
Line: Good luck Cloud! If you make it, we'll follow you!Whoa, I'll hold the PHS for you. It'll break if it gets wet.

Name: Priscilla
Line: You wanna jump with Mr. Dolphin?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Explain it to me again- Sure- I'll pass

Name: Soldiers
Line: Eh! Ho!Hurry! Hurry!!The new President!! He's here, he's here!!

Name: Commander
Line: Hey! You still dressed like that!? Come 'ere!

Name: Commander
Line: Hey! Rookie!! Can't you hear me!! Come over here!

Name: Commander
Line: Here!! Get in the room!

Name: Commander
Line: Today's the big day when we welcome President Rufus! Hurry up and change!There's a uniform in the locker. Hurry and change!

Name: Cloud
Line: It's the Shinra uniform.- Don't change- Change

Name: Commander
Line: Quit yappin'! Hurry up!

Name: Cloud
Line: A Shinra uniform...I was so proud when I first put it on.I wonder when it was......I couldn't stand wearing this thing anymore.

Name: Commander
Line: Wow! You look good in it!You remember the Greeting procedure, right!?

Name: Commander
Line: ...the look on your face says you forgot. All right, I'll show you again!Do just like we do.

Name: Soldiers
Line: Commander!! We'll help too!This is how to do it!We'll sing too!

Name: Commander
Line: All right! Show 'em!!Now, march!! This's the Welcoming March!

Name: Soldier
Line: Then! I'll sing along with you!Quietly--!!Aaaaah!Aaaaah!Hey, come on now.

Name: Commander
Line: Now!And... march--!!One, two...! Three, four!Keep in step with the soldier next to you and march smoothly!

Name: Soldiers
Line: Rufus--- Rufus Shinra----We---are---Shinra Company---- The new-----President------Oh----- Oh----- Shinra---------Oh----- Oh oh---- Shinra, Inc.---Realization----of the new era--- New---President----Ru--fus---Oh----- Oh----- Shinra---------Oh----- Oh oh---- Shinra, Inc.---Building------the new era----- Shinra-----forev---er-------

Name: Commander
Line: Once you're all in step, shoulder your gun!To shoulder your gun, press the O button!Got it!?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Not yet- All clear!

Name: Soldier
Line: Rufus has arrived! Preparation completed!

Name: Commander
Line: All right, show time! Don't disgrace yourselves!

Name: Soldier
Line: Begin the Welcome Parade!

Name: Commander
Line: Oh... no...!! No one's here!Late---!?Hey Rookie!! It's because you're running around like that!!

Name: Soldier
Line: Captain!! We'll take a short cut!

Name: Commander
Line: Right!Good idea.Get over here!!All right! You first!

Name: Commander
Line: Hey!! Don't get me any madder than I already am!

Name: Soldier
Line: I'll go first! Now you watch close and do as I do, rookie!Just sneak into the back of the line when you see an opening.

Name: Commander
Line: Now listen up! This parade's gonna be broadcast live on Shinra TV, around the world!If you look bad, the whole Junon army will look bad. Remember that and don't screw up!OK! Jump in when I give you the sign!Just sneak in from the back! Don't mess up the row!And no matter what you do don't try to go in from the front!All right!! Start marching!!Charge--!!

Name: TV Producer
Line: What the hell was that soldier doing?

Name: AD
Line: I don't know.

Name: TV Producer
Line: Are the points up?

Name: Commander
Line: Good! We made it.Oh! President Rufus!Hey! Line up and shut up!Don't make a move!

Name: Rufus
Line: How's the job?What happened to the Airship?

Name: Heidegger
Line: The long range airship is still being prepared.It should be ready in about three more days. Gya haa haa!

Name: Rufus
Line: Even the Air Force's Gelnika?

Name: Heidegger
Line: ......Gya haa haa!

Name: Rufus
Line: Stop that stupid horse laugh.Things are different than when father was in charge.

Name: Heidegger
Line: Gya...

Name: Rufus
Line: Is the ship ready?

Name: Heidegger
Line: Yes Sir, we'll get it ready quickly.

Name: Soldiers
Line: What a disaster.Heidegger was really irritated...The man in the Black Cape's been roaming the city, but we can't find him.

Name: Cloud
Line: Man in a Black Cape?

Name: Soldiers
Line: He showed up two or three days ago, and killed a few of our soldiers.He disappeared right after that. There's a rumor going around that it was Sephiroth.

Name: Commander
Line: Attention! Dismissed!

Name: Commander
Line: Hey! Hey you! You messing with the army?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Who cares?- What if I am?

Name: Commander
Line: (he says the same thing regardless)You're too lazy!! No break for you!!Get over here!

Name: Commander
Line: This is the military, soldier!! Your orders for today are to send off President Rufus at the dock!I'll keep drilling you until it's time!

Name: Soldiers
Line: I'll help, sir!Me too, sir!

Name: Commander
Line: All right!! Line up in order and show me your final pose!Today's command is Formation!Remember it!Ready!?Junon Military Send Off, BEGIN!!

Name: Commander
Line: All right! Now you try it!

Name: Commander
Line: So, you got it?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Not yet!- I've got it!

Name: Commander
Line: All right! Don't mess up during the real thing!

Name: Soldier
Line: Commander!! What's today's special pose?

Name: Commander
Line: Huh? ...I haven't decided yet.All right, rookie!! I'll let you decide!Show me your best move!

Name: Cloud
Line: Let's see... My best move is...

Name: Soldiers
Line: Woo----ow!That's awesome!

Name: Commander
Line: All right!! We'll go with that as today's special!!Practice it!

Name: Soldiers
Line: Yes sir!!

Name: Commander
Line: Well then! Meet at the dock!! Don't be late!!Attention! Dismissed!!

Name: Elevator Guard
Line: What? It's not time for our shift, yet. Just relax.

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: Come on, forget about your job! Step right up!!

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: Welcome!I was just starting to get worried... You see our sales were pretty bad today.

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: I've got nothing to sell to you! Come back later!

Name: Barkeeper
Line: I'm sorry! It's all rented out today!

Name: Rude
Line: Mm...? You too?Then, take your mask off and come here. That's our rule.

Name: Man with Head on Table
Line: Looks like something's going on outside, but we're too smashed to do anything...Ooh, oohh... Oh man, my head's burning up...

Name: Bald Man in Suspenders
Line: Seems like you're all a little too young to be in here.

Name: Big Bald Man
Line: Seaweed... Seaweed...

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: Oh, a Soldier! Welcome!

Name: Man in Plainclothes
Line: Hey, how could you do that!? Nobody woke me up!And I can't find the uniform I left in my locker, either. I wonder if I left it somewhere...Geez! Do you think this could be... what they call 'bullying?'Oh man, My future in the military, is pretty bleak.

Name: Soldier
Line: Hmm? A know-it-all, huh?All right!! Come in!!

Name: Soldier
Line: This is a Respectable Inn... guests only!You should absorb all the wisdom until it is a part of you.

Name: Soldier 2
Line: Ok wise-guy, I'll ask about Materia just so you can let off some stress.

Name: Cloud
Line: You're right...- Growth Materia- Kinds of Materia- Combinations of Materia- Divisions of Materia- Numbers of Materia that you may carry- The rest is a secret

Name: Soldier 3
Line: Ok. Expert! Enlighten us on Limit Techniques, why doncha?

Name: Cloud
Line: I don't have too much to say about that...- Developing Limits- Extreme Limits- That's it

Name: Ghost
Line: This is the Beginner's Hall (Intermediate)!Your explanations were so complicated I couldn't return to the Planet.So, I have a right to ask you again.

Name: Cloud
Line: What do you want to know?- How to save?- How do I cure party members?- Curative Magic- Weapons and armor- How to apply Materia- Effective ways to use Materia- Battle formation- Checking status- Limit Techniques- Other- You got nothing to teach me!

Name: Ghosts 2 & 3
Line: Ok, Mr. Know-it-all, ex-SOLDIER! Let me revenge... I mean, review!

Name: Cloud
Line: What do you want to review?- ATB- Onscreen numbers- Change and Defend- Escape- Gauges- Status- Elementals- Help- That's all

Name: Soldier Studying
Line: Mmm? I'm not going to the parade.The road to becoming SOLDIER First Class is very difficult.Don't mind me.As a man with promise and future, I don't have any time to fool around like the rest of you.

Name: Soldier Guarding Upper Junon Lift
Line: President Rufus is being sent off at the port.

Name: Sailor Outside Underwater Reactor
Line: What is it? The elevator's out of order right now due to an inspection.You know, right under us, is a Submarine Dock and the Underwater Mako Reactor.Mako energy puts a lot of wear and tear on the machinery.A lot of problems can pop up. So it's necessary for close inspections and maintenance.

Name: Soldier Guarding Lower Junon Lift
Line: Oh! How's it going!? If you're looking for Junon dock, it's over there!This lift goes to the Shinra section...Ever since that Black-caped murderer... But we can't use it because we're all on red alert.

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Hey soldier-boy, aren't you still on duty?

Name: Tseng
Line: Stay outta this.

Name: Reno
Line: The President's safety is secure because we're here.

Name: Elena
Line: The minute you think the job's boring, you guys start messing around.

Name: Innkeeper
Line: Are you sure it's all right?Nap while on duty?- 30 gil- Forget it

Name: Girl
Line: Please! Come in...

Name: Girls
Line: Welcome!

Name: Redhead
Line: I won't charge you for a smile...

Name: Black-haired girl
Line: Buy a lot, cutie!

Name: Girl
Line: Please go to the counter.

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: There's lots of stores in Junon.If we don't do this... we can't compete.But, what bothers me is that the girls make more than me.

Name: Girls
Line: Thank you very much!

Name: Accessory Shopkeeper
Line: I used to be in SOLDIER... Once I left, I opened up this shop...But to tell you the truth, I'd rather be at the shop downstairs.

Name: Soldier
Line: Hey! Aren't you still on duty!?Look, I'm in no position to talk, but...Don't become a delinquent worker like me.

Name: Shinra Manager
Line: It's so shameful!...and they told me that I would be staying at five star hotels on these trips...How can you guys sleep in a place like this?

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: Oh! Welcome!We don't have anything special now. I kind of messed up the last time I ordered but feel free to look around!

Name: Commander
Line: All right, it's time!Ten... HUT!

Name: Soldier
Line: President Rufus... has now arrived!

Name: Commander
Line: This is it!! Junon Military Reception--!Do it right---, Do it with enthusiasm...! Ready...!

Name: Commander
Line: All right! Now finish strong!!SPECIAL---!!

Name: Rufus
Line: Once the word gets out that Sephiroth's here, Cloud and his friends will show up, too.

Name: Heidegger
Line: We'll crush them as soon as we find them!

Name: Rufus
Line: We can't have them get in our way.

Name: Heidegger
Line: Leave it up to me, sir! Gya haa ha!

Name: Rufus
Line: I thought I told you to stop that stupid laugh...

Name: Commander
Line: All right! Dismissed!

Name: Soldiers
Line: That was close.Heidegger's been really edgy lately.Because Hojo disappeared, leaving a letter of resignation.Heidegger's been forced to take care of that investigation, too.

Name: Commander
Line: Hey--! I thought you were dismissed!

Name: Commander
Line: We got some cleaning up to do! Hurry up!

Name: Red XIII
Line: Hey, hurry. You're the last one.

Name: Cloud
Line: How did you get here?

Name: Red XIII
Line: A dolphin gave me a ride.Priscilla remembered the dolphin after you climbed the pole. But, you mustn't be mad at her.

Name: Cloud
Line: We'll cross the ocean, to the new continent....even if we are wearing Shinra's uniforms...

Name: Sailor
Line: I'm workin' hard already, and you still want me to do more?The new President's probably the same.He's just gonna order us around anyway.

Name: Yuffie
Line: Urrrgh... This is why... I hate ships.Hey, Cloud. You have any 'Tranquilizers'?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Here, use this- Nope

Name: Yuffie
Line: Where are the others?I dunno. Aren't they hiding somewhere around here?How should I know...? Ugh...... urk......

Name: Aeris
Line: Umm...... It's me Aeris.Hey, Cloud. Did you see the Airship at Junon?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...I heard it was big, but I didn't expect it to be THAT big.

Name: Aeris
Line: That was REALLY something.Hey, do you think I could get on it?

Name: Cloud
Line: - I'll take you someday- I dunno...

Name: Sailor 2
Line: It won't do any good trying to stop me!All right! I'm going to show the new President what I'm made of!

Name: Soldier
Line: Hey, get to work!Both the new President Rufus and Heidegger are aboard this ship!If we do good, we could get promoted!

Name: Tifa
Line: Yes sir! Everything quiet, sir!...But, you know what? I really hate this uniform.Uniforms, soldiers, war, I hate 'em all.They take away all the things and people you love...I wish they'd all disappear. Right, Cloud?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah......- I don't know

Name: Sailor 3
Line: President Rufus and his men are in the Bridge of the Ship. If they see you slacking, they'll bust you one!

Name: Sailor 4
Line: Hey! What's wrong, kid? You got no pep!A seaman's gotta have umph!

Name: Cloud
Line: - I'm tired...- Something's missing- Leave me alone

Name: Soldier 2
Line: Oh man, we're almost to Costa del Sol.When I get there, I'm going to take a long overdue vacation. Maybe I'll go down to the beach and get a tan...

Name: Red XIII
Line: ............It's me.Red XIII.I'm a little woozy, but I shouldn't get caught.Humans only look at appearances anyway.Anyway you look at it, I'd say I make a fine human being.

Name: Aeris
Line: Hey, Cloud. Did you see Barret?I hope he's not doing anything stupid...

Name: Barret
Line: Look, Cloud. It's Rufus and Heidegger.They're this close but we can't do a thing to 'em...Ummmm...... Gmmmmm......How can he...... Goin' off laughin' like that?Because of him, Biggs...... Wedge...... Jessie......!Ggggggggh... Ggggh......! Ggggggghhh!!God!! I can't take it anymore!I'm gonna settle things here and now......

Name: Barret
Line: Damn, did they find us!?Hey, that don't seem like us. Do they mean... Tifa and the others!?Get off your spikey butt and let's go, Cloud!

Name: Tifa
Line: Everyone all right!?

Name: Barret
Line: You all right!?

Name: Aeris
Line: Huh?

Name: Tifa
Line: Everyone's here... right?

Name: Barret
Line: Hey, wait.You don't think that suspicious character is...

Name: Someone
Line: Sephiroth!?

Name: Tifa
Line: Really!?

Name: Barret
Line: How the hell am I supposed to know!?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Let's find out.

Name: Red XIII
Line: It's the most logical thing to do. Then, who's going to go?

Name: Yuffie
Line: (backing away)N, not me...I don't even like Sephiroth anyway. And besid...... ugh...... urk......

Name: Cloud
Line: ...... Sephiroth............All right, let's go!

Name: Barret
Line: I'm goin' too!

Name: Aeris
Line: Is it really Sephiroth......?

Name: Tifa
Line: Take me with you!

Name: Red XIII
Line: These clothes are too tight on me. Can I switch with you?

Name: Yuffie
Line: I told you... I don't want... to, ugh...... urk......

Name: Sailor 4
Line: Say, who are you? You're not a part of the crew.Oh well, seamen never bother with details!How you feelin'!

Name: Cloud
Line: - I'm tired...- Something's missing- Leave me alone

Name: Soldier
Line: ...the Engine Room... ...a suspicious...... character...No...... there's no way...... that...... not a human...... That thing's not human...............

Name: Cloud
Line: Is it...... Sephiroth?

Name: Cloud
Line: No... not Sephiroth!

Name: Sephiroth
Line: ......After a long sleep......the time.........time has...... come...

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth! You're alive!

Name: Sephiroth
Line: ......Who are you?

Name: Cloud
Line: You don't remember me!? I'm Cloud!

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Cloud...

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth! What are you thinking!? What are you doing!?

Name: Sephiroth
Line: ...the time...... is now...

Name: Cloud
Line: What!? What are you saying!? Be more......

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Jenova. The arm of Jenova.

Name: Cloud
Line: So it WAS Sephiroth.

Name: Cloud
Line: ......Time... is now?

Name: Cloud
Line: - I'll try- Too much trouble [With this choice, he doesn't say anything more.]

Name: Cloud
Line: ...I'll try, but don't interrupt me while I'm explaining.Sephiroth went off searching for the Promised Land, so he could become the ruler of the planet... That was 5 years ago.Then Sephiroth came back and killed President Shinra.And then just now all of us saw Sephiroth.He was carrying Jenova with him....This much I do know. He told me he wants to go to the Promised Land with his mother, Jenova....I guess that's about it.

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth... is alive...The Promised Land... Does it really exist...?

Name: Barret
Line: Damn! Sure is hot here!But I sure feel better now that I can say good-bye to this sailor suit.Yo listen up!! Y'all be sure to mingle like regular folks here!
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Aeris
Line: Oh, too bad. I liked Barret's sailor suit.He looked so cute.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Barret
Line: ......What'ya mean "cute"?
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Tifa
Line: Right... well, uh...Barret, why don't you use that sailor suit for pajamas?Right, Cloud?
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Cloud
Line: - I guess- Keep your mind on Sephiroth
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Red XIII
Line: ...puff... puff...Would you kindly hurry? The heat here is drying my nose.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Yuffie
Line: Yeah, mine, too!!
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Cloud
Line: All right. We'll take a break and then head off.Don't wander too far off.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Barret
Line: I'll wander wherever I damn well want! Who made him the leader?
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Aeris
Line: Maybe I should get a tan for a change.Which do you like, Cloud?
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Cloud
Line: - I like fair complexions.- Maybe a healthy tan is nice.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Aeris
Line: (she says the same thing regardless)Got it. I'll remember that.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Tifa
Line: I think I'll go swimming.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Aeris
Line: Sounds good to me!Hmm? Cloud, are you thinking of anything in particular?Your cool exterior's cracking...Well then, let's go!
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Red XIII
Line: It looks like my mane got messed up.I'm going to rest somewhere cool.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Yuffie
Line: Don't bother looking for me!
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Sailor
Line: You're stowaways, right?It's okay. I'm used to them.The truth is, before I worked here, I was one of the best.Costa del Sol... a harbor paradise where the sun always shines and it's summer all year round!Hmm...... Things aren't going well...... You can go sightseeing in the city.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Sailor Running Around
Line: Don't bug me. This is Rufus's first official visit since becoming President.It seems like he's here on business this time.I'm so jealous of him, I could spit. We're both about the same age, but, he's President.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Sailor on the Helipad
Line: Oh crap... The manager of Shinra won't come down.Even though the President's here on business. All he does is play, forgetting everything to do with work.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Woman Lounging on Sea Plane
Line: But a bunch of hardworking deckhands like you wouldn't understand.On the marine blue sea, Gazing at the eternal skies that seem to go on forever... Gives you the feeling like you're taking a nap on the wing of a Cessna.It's the ultimate high!
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Man Near Sea Plane
Line: Heh, heh... I hear the Shinra brass are arriving soon.Heh, heh...! Got nothing to do with us, does it?
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Rufus
Line: What a long boat ride that was!!Hmmm...... Good work everyone......
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Heidegger
Line: Gya, Heh, heh..., ha!! Hurry up with that!
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Sailor
Line: Yes, sir!!
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Line: I heard Sephiroth was on board.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Heidegger
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Line: And it seems Cloud and the others were on board, too.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Heidegger
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Heidegger
Line: I'm ashamed of myself.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Rufus
Line: Is that all you can do...?Give one word answers and apologize for everything?
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Sailor
Line: Ready for departure, sir!!
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Rufus
Line: ......Do something. I'll be expecting results.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Man Near Sea Plane
Line: Hey! Spread out, all of you, out!!Put any fingerprints, scratches, or dents on that plane and I'll put one in your head!Da plane, da plane!! This's something you'll never be able to do in your lifetime.So you just watch from a distance... and wish.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Woman Lounging on Sea Plane
Line: He's quite handsome, isn't he?......Oh, don't worry, I'm not talking about you.I'm talking about President Rufus. Charming, rich, blond... He even looks good in a double-breasted suit.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Sailor
Line: Damn. I'm soaking wet down to my underwear.Oops! You must be those AVALANCHE guys!Quick! Let's get outta here! Heidegger's in charge of the transport ship.That's tough for both of us.The transport ship won't be sailing for quite a while. Heidegger's orders.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Sailor Running Around
Line: Rufus complimented me on my job!Wow!! I guess it pays to do good work.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Shinra Manager
Line: Oh, oh, oh!!! I'm gonna quit this company!!I mean it, I'm really gonna quit!!Heidegger's such an idiot!!And Rufus, acting all big!!God, that sure felt good...
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Line: Say, aren't you bored?
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Cloud
Line: - Not that much- Yeah, we fight a lot
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Cloud
Line: - Where's the inn?- Where're the stores?- Show me around town.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Man
Line: What a fluffy bed...... feels so great......Mmm... Just a little longer......Oh!!Oh, I'm sorry...... I didn't know you were here. This is embarrassing.Take your time and look around.By the way, are you seriously considering buying?
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Cloud
Line: - The heck do ya mean?- I'm out of here
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Man
Line: 'Praise the Lord,' it's a miracle!! Who'd ever think someone with some real money would ever come here...... I probably shouldn't even ask, but Are you really going to buy it?
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yep, 300,000 gil- I changed my mind
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Line: This is MY villa. Rest up in your new villa?- With pleasure- Gotta move on
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Manager
Line: Yes sir!!Oh, those items are free, so please help yourself....SNORE... SNORE...Geez my lower back's killing me!Y, yes... sir!!How do you do! I'm the Manager.Nice to meet you.Well, if you'll pardon me, I'll be leaving. Good-night.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Line: You want drink? Iz ok. You take time.

Line: Yeah, snowboarding's what's happening this year.I'm sick of surfing.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Line: ...huff... puff... I can't stand hot places...
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Man
Line: ......HIC... Mm? Wanna order? We're outta that now.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Mukki
Line: I really like this town.You could walk around nearly naked, and no one'd look twice at you.

section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Welcome to Bar del Sol! Here's to tropical nights!
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Woman Behind Counter
Line: Hey! I thought you'd drop by.(That's 1, 2... 4 fishes all together...... not bad.)
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Women Walking Around
Line: Shall we play our hand around here?Not yet. Remember, no compromises.You're right. After all, this trip was expensive.But only your average Joes are trying to pick us up.Well, that's because we're just too beautiful and hard to approach.I guess so. Well, I envy the plain Janes.Why don't we compromise? We'll make do with what we have.Not yet. Remember, no compromises.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Red XIII
Line: Hm, that's interesting.It's not as if I'm doing this because I want to.You see, this tail of mine, moves quite independently of my will.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Line: I heard. That big dog talks like a human.That's cool... but it's weird.
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Name: Red XIII
section: Costa del Sol - Taking a Break

Line: 1, 2, 3, here we go!

Line: Yo, Cloud! Still too early, ain't it?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Stay- I've changed my mind

Line: Are you sure? Please come again.

Name: Innkeeper
Line: Shucks!! Too bad!Hey! Hey you! Does your friend have a cute lady?She came in here looking for him a while ago. Shouldn't you find her?What are you going to do? Just forget about her and go to bed?200 gil a night.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Stay- Changed my mind

Line: What's with YOU!!Hey, is it.........you?We were in SOLDIER, and childhood friends before that. You were such a playboy.And a $#&^ murderer!!Why can't I remember your name?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Who are YOU?- I'm Cloud, and don't forget it

Line: I'm sorry about that. He's had some big shocks lately and is pretty depressed.

A man wearing a black cloak came up from the ocean.I think he had tickets for the Gold Saucer... no, that wasn't it... I wonder if it was all just an illusion?

Line: Hey...... heh heh...... don't forget to talk to me, too.

Corel?I'm getting a little sad.Professor Hojo looks happy like a child when he discovers something. He gets this big smile and then laughs......I guess we should chase after him. Name: Old Man
Line: I just passed a guy in a black cloak back there.I just tried to tell him that it's dangerous up ahead, and he ignored me!
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth...
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Old Man
Line: It's dangerous up ahead. Be careful on your way.If any strangers should greet you warmly while traveling, make sure to greet them back.Whew! I guess that's the fun of being on the road.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Aeris
Line: Come on, Cloud. Let's rest a minute.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Cloud
Line: Ok, then...- PHS- Let's move on!
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Barret
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Aeris
Line: I'm sure glad I'm with you, Cloud!
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Tifa
Line: I'm beat...
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Red XIII
Line: What...?
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Yuffie
Line: I'm pooped!
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Aeris
Line: Oh, Cloud!! Good Luck!!
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud!! Go Cloud!! Go!!
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Cloud
Line: OW!! Sure is tight in here...Come on, Cloud, don't let it get to you. Let's see... this is it.Maybe if I turn this......something should happen.- Do it- Leave it
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Cloud
Line: What should we do?- Take the damn treasure- Leave it where it is
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Man
Line: Hey! How'd you ever wind up around here?Look, I'm sorry but, I can't do a thing for you!Oh boy!! Corel sure has gone to pot. It used to be a famous coal mining town!They say there were more jobs than you could shake a...Well, you get the picture!Now, it's nothing but a miserable pit! Me, my bulldozer... everything's out of work.Got no job... I can't even show my face. 'Bout all that's left for me is to just live in this hole all day.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Men
Line: You got a lot of balls comin' back here!Look at this place! It's all your fault North Corel turned into a garbage heap!Why doncha say something!?Or did ya forget what you done here already?
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Barret
Line: ...I'm sorry...
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Man
Line: ^%$#! You ain't even worth the effort.Don't waste your time talkin' to that Techno-freak!
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Barret
Line: You heard 'em... It's my fault this town was... destroyed...
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Big Man
Line: YOU know who's responsible for North Corel winding up like this!
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Man
Line: Get out of the way!!The only way we can make ends meet around here now is by collecting junk!
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Old Man
Line: The next train's coming in soon.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Black Woman
Line: Grandpa used to be a Coal Train engineer.He still can't kick his old habits from then.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Man
Line: I want to leave this garbage dump of a town behind me, and start a new life.If I had a buggy, I'd cross the southern desert, and go to that town across the river...
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Woman
Line: Everyone knows that accident couldn't have been avoided.But no one will be satisfied until someone takes the blame.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Kid
Line: There was something glowing in that well over there.If I can get my hands on it, I'm gonna sell it and go to the Gold Saucer!
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Tool Shopkeeper
Line: Please buy something! Anything will do!
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: General Store Shopkeeper
Line: What do you want?
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Cloud
Line: - Buy- Listen to your story- Not interested
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: General Store Shopkeeper
Line: (when asked for a story)Take that road on the left to the Ropeway station!The Ropeway'll take you to the Gold Saucer.It don't mean much to us poor folks though...
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Weapon Shopkeeper
Line: If you want to survive, then you're gonna need some of my weapons.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Man
Line: How am I supposed to continue living in a town that's lost everything...?To hell with the Mako reactor!
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Woman
Line: Because of them...... ugh. My husband got into that accident... He used to be such a strong man...
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Little Girl
Line: Yaaay!! What do you wanna play?
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Man in Hardhat
Line: I hear it's a big fad now in the city to get tattoos. Is that right?
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Cloud
Line: - I wouldn't know- That's right
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Innkeeper
Line: Welcome. It's 50 gil a night. Would you like a room?
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yes- No
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Cloud
Line: We're moving!?This is bad!Hoo boy... There's no way we can walk across now.Not even a Chocobo could make it across... Isn't there a more powerful vehicle?
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Aeris
Line: Barret, what happened?
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Barret
Line: Sorry.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Cloud
Line: What happened?
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Barret
Line: My hometown used to be around here.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Red XIII
Line: What do you mean 'used to'?
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Barret
Line: It ain't here no more. Heard it got buried... in just 4 years.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Aeris
Line: But how could those people say those terrible things?
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Barret
Line: An' it's my fault. ALL my fault.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Barret
Line: (narrating)...My hometown, Corel's always been a coal mining town.It's so dusty, but calm and so poor...... a real small town, this one.That's the first time I ever heard the word "Mako Reactor" mentioned since that time...
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Barret
Line: (narrating)That's how the Corel Reactor was built..... and completed.We all thought it would bring us an easier life.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Barret
Line: (narrating)It happened when Dyne and I were out of town for a few days.Corel was burned down by the Shinra troops.All the townspeople... All my relatives...... Everyone... everything......
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Cloud
Line: Shinra troops? What for!?
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Barret
Line: There was an explosion at a reactor.Shinra blamed the accident on the people. Said it was done by a rebel faction.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Tifa
Line: That's so terrible!
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Barret
Line: Well, I guess that's true. But more than Shinra, I couldn't forgive myself.Never should've gone along with the building of the reactor...
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Tifa
Line: Don't blame yourself. We were all fooled by the promises Shinra made back then.
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Barret
Line: That's why... that's why I get so pissed off!!Not only did they take advantage of me...... But I lost my wife, Myrna, too...
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Station Man
Line: Hey everyone! If you want to go to the 'Gold Saucer', hurry and get on!Ride the Ropeway?
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Cloud
Line: - Go on- Don't go on
section: Corel - Garbage Dump of a Town

Name: Chocobo Mascot
Line: Welcome to the Gold Saucer.

Name: Admissions Lady
Line: Please buy your ticket here.

Name: Admissions Lady
Line: Welcome to the Gold Saucer.Are you together? A single pass is 3000 gil, or you can purchase a lifetime pass for 30000 gil.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Pay 3000 gil- Pay 30000 gil- Don't pay

Name: Admissions Lady
Line: Here at the Gold Saucer, there are many places where you must pay with GP.Just think of 'GP' as money that you can only use at the Gold Saucer.GP can only be redeemed at the games in Wonder Square and at the Chocobo Races.Your GP limit is 10000, so please be careful.Please enjoy yourselves.

Name: Aeris
Line: Wow! Let's have fun!I know this isn't the right time to do this.

Name: Barret
Line: ......I ain't in no cheery mood. So jes' leave me alone.

Name: Aeris
Line: Really? That's too bad.

Name: Tifa
Line: ....whisper... whisper... (Wasn't that a little harsh, Aeris!?)

Name: Aeris
Line: ...whisper... whisper... (Just act normal when this happens)

Name: Tifa
Line: ...whisper... (You think so...?)

Name: Aeris
Line: Of course!

Name: Barret
Line: So PLAY! ...messin' round #@^%$!Don't forget we're after Sephiroth!

Name: Aeris
Line: ...I think he's mad.

Name: Tifa
Line: He'll be fine. He seems to be doing a little better now.

Name: Info Board inside the Station
Line: Welcome to Gold Saucer!Many attractions await you here at Gold Saucer.You will be moved and excited, thrilled and terrified! Led from one zone to another...unlike anything you've ever experienced! Make your memories... today.Shinra"Now in: Gold Gate" Let's access all of the Attractions!"Event Square" An entertaining show is awaiting you."Chocobo Square" Chocobo Racing takes you into the world of Virtual Reality! Wark! Wark!"Ghost Square" Please come and stay at the hotel..... Ha ha ha..."Battle Square" Go to the limits in heated battles! Try your hand at the special Gold Attack!!"Round Square" Take a tour of the Park and see the beautiful night scenery of Gold Saucer..."Speed Square" A Shooting Roller Coaster is waiting to take you into the world of excitement."Wonder Square" A number of Games await you here. Collect GP at Wonder Square and play some more!

Name: Cloud
Line: Sh...!Shinra soldiers... Even here...

Name: Soldier
Line: Attention! Dismissed!!

Name: Lady at Entrance
Line: Welcome to Chocobo Racing.

Name: Man Betting
Line: I... I lost...

Name: Man
Line: You can only buy up to 3 tickets. Think before you buy. For example, you could select half of the Chocobos and buy 3 boxes.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Boxes?- Not interested

Name: Man
Line: A box is buying 3 combinations of 2 chocobos.For example, if you select Chocobo 1, 3, and 5, you can purchase combinations, such as 1-3, 1-5, 3-5.You can also play the limited wheel by selecting a Chocobo.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Limited wheel?- Not interested

Name: Man
Line: Playing a 'Limited wheel' means you select a Chocobo and use it in all of your combinations.For example, if you have Chocobo 1, then you buy 1-2, 1-3, 1-4.No matter how you make your bet, you win some and you lose some. It all comes down to insight and luck.

Name: Security
Line: (near Jockey Lounge)I'm sorry, but this is for authorized personnel only.

Name: Blond Man
Line: We usually buy tickets for the B rank and C rank races, right?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Rank?- Not interested

Name: Blond Man
Line: In other words, 'rank' means the Chocobo's 'strength'. A is highest and C's the lowest.When you become a Free Chocobo jockey, you'll be able to buy A rank tickets.Of course, the higher the rank, the better your item ticket. Hey, maybe I'll become a Chocobo jockey!?

Name: Cloud
Line: - How DO you become one?- Not interested

Name: Blond Man
Line: You can become one if you own a Chocobo... and have some connections. But Chocobo's are pretty hard to catch and I don't have any connections.

Name: Woman
Line: Hey, what's that Chocobo on the odds sheet?

Name: Redhead
Line: That's how you can find out a Chocobo's condition and strengths.

Name: Woman
Line: Hmm, If you can tell which ones are the strongest, then it's easy...

Name: Redhead
Line: Well, not as easy as you think. It's not just a matter of the Chocobo's strength,but it also depends on the jockey and the Chocobo's personality.If these are bad, they may use too much stamina, and affect other things.

Name: Lady at the Ticket Desk
Line: Welcome. Would you like to buy some Chocobo tickets?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- Ask how to buy- Explain it to me- Not interested

Name: Woman
Line: I'm sorry, we're currently renovating. Please come again.

Name: Zombie
Line: Welcome. Thank you for coming to the Ghost Hotel.Uuuuuuuuuuugh......For reservations, please step up to the counter.Uuuuuuuuuuugh......

Name: Receptionist
Line: It's our most popular employee, Mr. Hangman.

Name: Mr. Hangman
Line: Welcome!

Name: Receptionist
Line: It's 5 GP a night. Would you like to stay?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah, all right- No thanks

Name: Receptionist
Line: Ugh, ugh, ugh, ugh! Enjoy, ugh, your stay.

Name: Flyer
Line: [Turtle's Paradise]No. 3Forget the bad times with a nice drink...Only thing missing in Gold Saucer is......A pub with good drinks and a great atmosphere!Stop in the "Turtle's Paradise"!

Name: Mr. Hangman
Line: Sir... Please register at the counter!!

Name: Woman at Ticket Booth
Line: Welcome. This attraction is 3 GP.Shall you be riding this evening?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yes, I shall- No, I shan't

Name: Man
Line: Hey boy.

Name: Cloud
Line: Boy...

Name: Man
Line: How is it? You having fun?Mmm, so, you ARE having fun. Well, good, good for you boy.

Name: Cloud
Line: My name's Cloud. And stop calling me boy.

Name: Dio
Line: Mmm? Me? I'm the owner of the Gold Saucer. The name's Dio.Just call me 'Dio'.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...... (Not even listening)

Name: Dio
Line: By the way, boy, do you know what a 'Black Materia' is?

Name: Cloud
Line: - I know what it is- What is it?

Name: Cloud
Line: Why d'you ask me?

Name: Dio
Line: Well, a while back, a boy your age came in and asked me if I had a 'Black Materia.'I thought you might know who he was, seein' as how you're both about the same age.

Name: Cloud
Line: Did he happen to have... a Black Cape...

Name: Dio
Line: Why yes, yes indeed. And a tattoo on his hand that said '1'.

Name: Cloud
Line: Where did he go!?

Name: Dio
Line: Ha ha ha, I have no idea.Well then.I say, stop by the Battle Arena if you like, boy.You'll probably like it. Many of my collections are on display there.Ha, ha ha.

Name: Person
Line: We have to be careful of these steps.What...? A lot of things...

Name: Redhead
Line: First, I gotta memorize the order it comes out, and then guess on the attacks...... mumble, mumble......

Name: Ticket Person
Line: This way, Sir, to register.

Name: Ticket Person
Line: Is this your first time? First, listen to the explanation of the game over there.

Name: Lady
Line: Hear the rules for this attraction?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yes- Not interested

Name: Lady
Line: This attraction, Shooting Coaster isWhile your ride's going ZOOM, you're going BANG BANG, and things are going PHEW PHEW and you destroy them with a big BOOM. Pretty simple, isn't it?Oh, to shoot, hit the O Button. And, the Bar that's shown on the left side of the screen is the Power Meter.When it's full, it'll go BROOOOOM and when it's empty, it'll only go BRM and become weak. So be careful.Also, if you're in the Top 3 you'll get on the Wall of Fame.

Name: Ticket Person
Line: This attraction costs 10 GP.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Pay- Changed my mind

Name: Wall of Fame Staffer
Line: Your score is x points.

Name: Cloud
Line: Ugh...

Name: Wall of Fame Staffer
Line: Would you like to see the Wall of Fame?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yes- Not interested

Name: Wall of Fame Staffer
Line: You'll receive a prize if you get more than 3000 Points. So good luck.

Name: Man
Line: Hey, I finally got 5000 points.

Name: Woman
Line: Wow!! You're so wonderful!!
