Name: Man
Line: Man, I finally got a prize...

Name: Man
Line: Hey, I got 5000 points again.

Name: Woman
Line: Wow!! You're so wonderful!!

Name: Man
Line: Well, I guess I'll go and get some more GP.

Name: Little Girl
Line: Eyyaaaaaa!

Name: Little Boy
Line: Yaaay----!!

Name: Man
Line: Come on now, no running.

Name: Security
Line: Sorry but there's no show now.

Name: Staffer
Line: We put on a really unusual show here. It's not on today, but come back again sometime and see it.

Name: Couple
Line: What's your problem? Can't you see we wanna be alone?

Name: Couple 2
Line: Geez, you're a real bummer. Why don't you just leave us alone?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Hey you!! What're you lookin' so down for!?How 'bout it? Want me to read your fortune!? A bright future! A happy future!Oh, but don't hold it against me if it's not a great prediction!Oh, so sorry! I'm a fortune telling machine. The name's...Cait Sith.

Name: Cloud
Line: You can only read the future?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: You kidding!? I can find missing things, missing people, anything!

Name: Cloud
Line: Then can you tell me where a man named Sephiroth is?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Sephiroth, right!?Okay, here goes!!

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Ordinary luck. It will be an active fortune.Give into the good will of others, and something big'll happen after summer. ...wait... what's this?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Huh? Let me try again.

Name: Cloud
Line: Be careful of forgetfulness. Your lucky color is... blue?...Forget it.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Wait, wait give me another chance!Wait! Let me try it again!

Name: Cloud
Line: ...What the!?

Name: Cloud
Line: What you pursue will be yours. But you will lose something dear.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: I don't know if it's good OR bad...This's the first time I ever got something like THIS.Then shall we?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: As a fortune teller, I can't help but think about this.If I don't see what it leads to, I won't be able to relax. That's why I'm going with you!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: I'm comin' with you no matter WHAT you say!

Name: Cloud
Line: H... hey!

Name: Man in Overalls
Line: They probably told you at the entrance, but most of the attractions at Gold Saucer only take 'GP'.They don't sell GP. You can only get 'em from the Wonder Square games or at the Chocobo Races.

Name: Chocobo Mascots
Line: Let's get lotsa GP at Wonder Square and have some fun!Let's get lotsa GP at Wonder Square and have a blast!

Name: People Playing Wonder Catcher
Line: All...... most......Crap!no cigar...You sure do need a lot of money here.Please...... don't...... talk to me...... right now.I get so caught up in these......Back there...

Name: Guy on Motorcycle Game
Line: Hyuuuuu, BAM, BAM, BAM...Oh man, I just gotta shout.

Name: Guy on Snowboard Game
Line: Nope, I'm not quitting until I clear this!I'm gonna be the wind again today!

Name: Guy Near Submarine Game
Line: Whew, I'm tired. Oh this? It seems to be out of order.

Name: Guy Near Mog Game
Line: ...... Don't worry 'bout me. Go ahead and play.

Name: Narration
Line: This is Mog's house. It's in Mog Forest on Mt. Mog.The beginning of another day in the life of a Mog.This year, Mog is pipapopupo years old. ...that's 28 in human years. He's at that age when he should be looking for a mate.But before Mog can become an adult, he first needs to learn how to fly.Even though Mog trains hard everyday... He still can't seem to get off the ground...

Name: Narration
Line: Looks like he's still got a long way to go...Here's where you come in. Help Mog learn how to fly by pushing O button and feeding him his favorite Kupo nut.But don't overfeed him. He won't be able to fly if he's too fat.

Name: Narration
Line: Oh? It seems like Mog's decided to take another shot at it.

Name: Fortune Telling Machine
Line: 1 fortune 50 gil

Name: Cloud
Line: - Try it- Not interested

Name: Fortune Telling Machine
Line: Use caution in relationships

Name: Cloud
Line: Mm!?Dead......

Name: Cloud
Line: Did Sephiroth do this!?No... it's not him... They're all shot... Sephiroth would never use a gun...

Name: Woman
Line: Ugh, ugggh.

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey, what happened!

Name: Woman
Line: Ugh... ugh... a man with a gun... on his arm......

Name: Security
Line: Hold it right there! And stay quiet!!

Name: Dio
Line: Did you guys do this!?

Name: Cloud
Line: N... no, it wasn't us!

Name: Dio
Line: (if you spoke earlier)I must've been wrong...

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Hurry and run, it's gonna get ugly.

Name: Cloud
Line: He...... hey!

Name: Dio
Line: Hold them!!

Name: Dio
Line: That's as far as you go.

Name: Cloud
Line: Wait, listen to...

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Cloud...

Name: Dio
Line: One more to go.

Name: Security
Line: Yes

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey! Pay attention!!

Name: Dio
Line: There's no need to listen. Pay for your crime down below!!Do it!

Name: Security
Line: Yes

Name: Cloud
Line: Where are we?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: A desert prison... Corel Prison...

Name: Cloud
Line: A desert prison?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Yup, a natural prison in the middle of the desert... surrounded entirely by quicksand.I heard that once you get in, you never get out...But, there was one special exception...

Name: Cloud
Line: Barret...Did he really......

Name: Barret
Line: Stay back! This's something I gotta deal with.Jes' leave me alone...

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Whew! That's one of your friends? He sure looks dangerous...

Name: Cloud
Line: This one's been shot too...

Name: Man Near Gate
Line: Wo-ho! Welcome to Corel Prison.Hold---it. If you wanna pass, Then you're gonna need the boss's permission.

Name: Cloud
Line: We should find Barret before we go out into the desert.

Name: Man Following
Line: Ha ha ha

Name: Man
Line: I'll tell you one thing, rookie. This desert is extremely dangerous.It'll welcome you in, but when you try to leave it, it'll swallow ya.I hear tell, some of them never make it out... the best thing is to stay out of the desert entirely.

Name: Black Man
Line: Those guys only tell lies. Only lies. Not a one of 'em will tell you the truth.Just talk with 'em a couple of times, and you'll get sick of them.

Name: Three Liars
Line: This place is heaven.This place is heaven.This place is heaven.Man with a gun on his arm?Never heard of him.Never heard of him.Never heard of him.You wanna see the Boss?Go Southwest and you'll meet him.You'll meet him.You'll meet him.Once out in the desert, stay still and don't walk.Don't walkDon't walkThere's no way you'll ever see a mysterious Chocobo carriage. No way.No way.No way.

Name: Man 2
Line: This elevator will take you to the top...But, you gotta be picked as a Chocobo Racer, first.

Name: Big Man
Line: Want to enter the Chocobo Race?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Not interested- Yeah, I want to enter

Name: Guards Outside Trailer
Line: You new? Then go and pay your respects to Mr. Coates.

Name: Mr. Coates
Line: Never seen your face 'round here before. Goin' up?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Not interested- Yeah, up

Name: Shopkeeper
Line: A rookie? Then you gotta buy something. Yup, that's the rule here.

Name: Barret
Line: Didn't I tell you not to come here!?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Ju...... just hold on for a second! We just want to talk! You'll understand if you just hear us out!

Name: Barret
Line: Didn't want none of ya to get involved...

Name: Aeris
Line: Hey that's Cloud's line! '...It's too dangerous, I can't let you get involved...' blah, blah, blah...

Name: Tifa
Line: Yeah. We're already involved in this.

Name: Aeris
Line: We saw you and hurried here. Barret, just tell us what's going on.

Name: Barret
Line: You guys...

Name: Red XIII
Line: I heard that the murders at the Battle Arena were done by a man with a gun-arm. ...Was that you?

Name: Barret
Line: There's another... another man that got a gun grafted inta one of his arms. It was four years ago...

Name: Barret
Line: (narrating)I remember... I was on my way home from visiting a Mako Reactor being built.

Name: Barret
Line: From then on, I couldn't use my right arm no more....I was depressed for a while.But then I threw away my artificial arm and got this gun grafted in.Got a new right arm to get revenge on the Shinra, who took everything away...Back then, I heard the doc say there was another man who got the same operation as me.But, his was the left arm.

Name: Aeris
Line: But... Dyne's injury was the same as yours, right?

Name: Tifa
Line: Yeah, that's right. He was deceived by the Shinra too.He'll probably join us to fight against the Shinra.

Name: Barret
Line: ...wouldn't bet on it. I gotta 'pologize to Dyne before I can rest in peace.An' that's why, I gotta go alone.

Name: Cloud
Line: Do whatever you want... Is that what you want to hear?Well, I can't let you do it. Because, if you die on me, I'm gonna have nightmares.

Name: Aeris
Line: Barret, this isn't the end.

Name: Tifa
Line: Weren't you going to save the Planet?

Name: Barret
Line: Shit! Tifa, you oughtta know by now.

Name: Tifa
Line: ...That's all right. I'm not so different from you.

Name: Aeris
Line: That's easier to understand. It's you, Barret.

Name: Cloud
Line: So there it is, Barret. So I guess it'll be Barret, me, and......

Name: Aeris
Line: I wonder if Dyne will join us?

Name: Tifa
Line: Be careful.

Name: Red XIII
Line: Hmm? Shall I go with you?

Name: Yuffie
Line: You sure are all acting pretty heroic, considerin' we're not makin' any money on this...

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Fortune's good. Everything is perfect!

Name: Cloud
Line: This one's been shot too...

Name: Man
Line: Man, the Boss was REALLY in a bad mood today... Or was it one of his better days?If you get lost in the desert, just keep going Northeast. If you're lucky, you'll make it back here.

Name: Carriage Driver
Line: Wanna ride...?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Get on- Don't get on

Name: Barret
Line: ...Dyne ...Is that you?

Name: Dyne
Line: Now that's a voice I haven't heard in years...A voice I'll never forget...

Name: Barret
Line: I always hoped I'd be able to see you again someday...I knew you were alive somewhere... we had the same operation.Listen to me Dyne. I want to...

Name: Dyne
Line: What's that? ......I hear her voice.

Name: Dyne
Line: I hear her voice, Eleanor's voice. Begging me... not to hate your rotten guts.That's why I didn't hunt you down...

Name: Barret
Line: ...I know I was stupid. I'm not asking you to forgive me.But... What're you doin' in a place like this?Why ya wanna kill those that ain't even involved? Why?

Name: Dyne
Line: ...Why!? The hell do you care for!?Are the people killed going to understand 'why'? Are the people of Corel going to understand just hearing Shinra's excuses?I don't CARE what the reason is!All they give us are artillery and stupid excuses... What's left is a world of despair and emptiness...

Name: Dyne
Line: You still want to hear 'why'? ...All right, I'll tell you.'Cause I want to destroy everything.

Name: Barret
Line: Dyne, Marlene...... Marlene's still alive.

Name: Barret
Line: I went back into town. I thought she was gone for sure.That is why I wanted to be by her side till the end.That's when I found her... ...found Marlene.

Name: Barret
Line: She's in Midgar. Let's go see her together, all right?

Name: Dyne
Line: So...... she's still alive...All right, Barret. I guess that means you and I gotta fight.

Name: Barret
Line: What!?

Name: Dyne
Line: Eleanor's alone all by herself. I've got to take Marlene to her.

Name: Barret
Line: Dyne... are you insane!?

Name: Dyne
Line: Marlene wants to see her Mom, don't she?

Name: Barret
Line: Stop, Dyne! I can't die yet!

Name: Dyne
Line: Oh yeah? Well my life's been over ever since then.

Name: Barret
Line: Stop it! I don't wanna fight you!

Name: Cloud
Line: Barret!

Name: Barret
Line: Cloud, you stay the hell out of it! This is MY problem!!

Name: Dyne
Line: Urgh!

Name: Barret
Line: Dyne... I don't know either, man.Is this the only way... we can resolve this?

Name: Dyne
Line: I told you... I... I want to destroy everything...Everything... This crazy world... Even me...

Name: Barret
Line: An' what 'bout Marlene? What's gonna happen to her!?

Name: Dyne
Line: ...Think about it... Barret... How old was Marlene back then...?Even if I did go to her now... she wouldn't even know me...And what's more... Barret...These hands are a little too stained to carry Marlene anymore...

Name: Dyne
Line: Barret...

Name: Barret
Line: All right...

Name: Dyne
Line: ...wow... Marlene's... already...... 4......

Name: Barret
Line: Dyne...?Dyne!

Name: Mr. Coates
Line: You want somethin'?

Name: Barret
Line: I want to go up.

Name: Mr. Coates
Line: Like I told you before, you gotta get the Boss' permission, then win the Chocobo......

Name: Barret
Line: Dyne's got his reasons an' can't speak.

Name: Mr. Coates
Line: Yeah, bull--!!

Name: Barret
Line: I want to go up.

Name: Mr. Coates
Line: R, right.Did you kill Dyne?You must've. Or you'd never be holding that thing....So Dyne's dead... Maybe now, the place'll calm down a little.Dyne didn't care who anyone was......

Name: Barret
Line: The hell do YOU know!!

Name: Mr. Coates
Line: R... ri...... right! I mean, no, I DON'T know anything. S, s... sorry.

Name: Cloud
Line: Then, will you get us outta here?

Name: Mr. Coates
Line: Huh? Oh man, you guys are mistaken.I already told you, there's only one way to get outta here.That's to win the Chocobo Race and that's held up there, in the Gold Saucer.And, only one racer can go up at a time.

Name: Barret
Line: Say what!?

Name: Mr. Coates
Line: Noooo! Really, even if you threaten me!!A rule's a rule. I can't change it.If I do, the whole system down here'll get messed up!! An' I can't do that!Okay, ok, I'll let one go up there. After that, he's gotta deal with Dio.

Name: Barret
Line: Awright then.Cloud, you go.We'll wait down here.Hurry up an' win that Chocobo Race, an' get us outta here!

Name: Mr. Coates
Line: Have you decided?All you need now is a manager....and register and get a Chocobo...

Name: Ester
Line: Hi...... I happened to hear your story.

Name: Mr. Coates
Line: Ester?

Name: Ester
Line: I'll be your manager.

Name: Mr. Coates
Line: Well, I have nothing against it, but...This is Ester. She may look kinda funny...But there's no better manager in the races...

Name: Ester
Line: That's so rude...Yeah, well. Nice to meet you, Cloud.

Name: Mr. Coates
Line: All right then, Cloud.I'll send you up the elevator. Ester'll fill you in on the details.

Name: Ester
Line: Hmm, so that's what happened. I'll talk to Dio directly. You just concentrate on the race.Oh yeah, getting back to the other thing, there are many different types of Chocobo jockeys. It's not only for criminals.Some people compete for the fame, some people compete for the money, some for glory... And then there're people like you.Oh yeah, I'll teach you how to ride a Chocobo.

Name: Cloud
Line: - All right- Not interested

Name: Ester
Line: Ummm... First use the [Select] button to choose either AUTO or MANUAL.In other words, either you control the Chocobo or let it run on its own.But it's pretty hard to make the Chocobo run the way you want it to. If the Chocobo doesn't like you, it won't listen.You can't really help on this one.But, most of the Chocobo's that I'll provide you with are mellow and you should be able to handle them.When you're riding, use the [] Button to Speed Up and the X Button to Slow Down.But, if you go faster than the Chocobo can handle, it'll lose its stamina really fast.And use the Directional button to move the Chocobo left and right, use the O Button to get a boost of speed.Of course your stamina runs out faster though.There are some bad tempered Chocobos that can't pace themselves and they'll lose their stamina pretty fast.For these kinds of Chocobos, you should set the controls on Manual and slow it down.Finally, some advice for the restless, once the first and second Chocobo cross the goal line,Push the [Start] button to end the race.

Name: Man
Line: You new?

Name: Ester
Line: Hi, Joe.

Name: Joe
Line: Hey, Ester you're looking pretty as usual.

Name: Ester
Line: Thanks.Let me introduce you, Cloud.This is Joe, one of the top Chocobo Jockeys.

Name: Joe
Line: Nice to meet you, Cloud.If you're with Ester, then...

Name: Ester
Line: Right! He's an up and coming jockey.He's only been down here for a day and already he made it up here!!

Name: Joe
Line: What!?Oh, I see...So what did you do down there?Sorry... you're not supposed to ask about the past here...Pretty interesting... I have a feeling that we'll meet again.Then, until we meet again, Cloud.

Name: Ester
Line: I'm going to check on the Chocobo. You just wait here for a while.I'll be right back.

Name: Jockeys
Line: ......I got nothing to say.......Don't get cocky. Skills don't matter once you get in the race...

Name: Ester
Line: CloudThanks for waiting. I registered you in the next race.This is a Chocobo I prepared myself. He won't lose easily.Oh yeah... You know how to ride one?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Uh, how was it again?- Yeah, I got it

Name: Ester
Line: Then, good luck.

Name: Ester
Line: Congratulations!! Now you're home free!Oh yeah, the owner told me to give this letter to you when you won.

Name: Dio
Line: Boy, if you're reading this letter, then you must've won. And won a victory that I am sure you earned.I heard about Dyne from Ester. Now that you are victorious, I promise that you and all your friends will get a full pardon, and you all will be set free.And also, by way of apology, I prepared a little gift for you to use on your journey.Sorry I couldn't be there to tell you this in person, but I'm a very busy man.Sincerely, Dio

Name: Cloud
Line: A gift?

Name: Cloud
Line: (Hmm? The letter continues...)P.S. I just recently met Sephiroth. He must have a lot of fans with boys your age.Why don't you get his autograph? It seems he's headed toward the South of the river, towards Gongaga.Sephiroth...

Name: Ester
Line: I guess this is goodbye.Yeah. Well, if you ever get your own Race Chocobo, come back again.I'll take care of your registration and everything. I'll see you again.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Is someone there?

Name: Reno
Line: Hey, Rude. Who do you like?

Name: Reno
Line: What are you getting so embarrassed about? Come on? Who do you like?

Name: Reno
Line: Hmmmm...That's a tough one.But, poor Elena. She...... you......

Name: Rude
Line: No, she likes Tseng.

Name: Reno
Line: I never knew that! But Tseng likes that Ancient...

Name: Cloud
Line: What are they talking about?

Name: Elena
Line: It's so stupid!They always talk about who they like or don't like. But Tseng is different.Ah! Oh no!

Name: Reno
Line: Hmm... Then it's time...Rude... Don't go easy on them even though they're girls.

Name: Rude
Line: ...Don't worry, I'll do my job.

Name: Elena
Line: Then, we're counting on you. I'll report to Tseng!

Name: Reno
Line: It's been a while.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Sector 7?- Out of our way

Name: Rude
Line: That's as far as you go.

Name: Reno
Line: We may be retreating, but...we're still victorious!

Name: Cloud
Line: They followed us...... But there weren't any signs of it. Then, that means......

Name: Cloud
Line: I don't even want to think that there's a spy...I trust everyone.

Name: Cloud
Line: A ruined reactor.

Name: Cloud
Line: It's Scarlet, Head of Shinra Weapon Development.

Name: Scarlet
Line: ......Hmph! This isn't any good either.You only get junky materia from junky reactors.This reactor's a failure.What I'm looking for is big, large, huge materia. You seen any?

Name: Tseng
Line: ...No I haven't seen it. I'll get on it right away.

Name: Scarlet
Line: Please. We could make the ultimate weapon if we only had some.

Name: Tseng
Line: I just can't wait.

Name: Scarlet
Line: With Hojo gone, the Weapon Development's been betting a bigger budget.

Name: Tseng
Line: I envy them.

Name: Scarlet
Line: But, even if we make the perfect weapon, could that stupid Heidegger even use it?

Name: Scarlet
Line: Oh... sorry! I forgot Heidegger was your boss! Ha ha ha!

Name: Scarlet
Line: Let's go!

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Big, large, huge materia?An ultimate weapon? The perfect weapon?Just what are the Shinra up to...?

Name: Old Man
Line: ............No matter how much I pray, it won't bring our grandson back...

Name: Redhead
Line: Three years ago when the reactor exploded, my husband...Do people really need reactors to live?Aren't there more important things in life...?

Name: Cloud
Line: A ruined reactor.

Name: Accessory Shopkeeper
Line: Huh...... did you want something?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Buy accessories?- Hear a story?- Nothing in particular

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: ...You want something?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Hear a story?

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: One day, there was a huge explosion. Many townspeople died in it...Shinra built the reactor, without even thinking about the town's safety. And, this is the result.It's been a while since the explosion, but you can still find pieces of it left all over town.

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: Oh... you here to shop?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Hear a story?

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: One day, there was a huge explosion. Many townspeople died in it...Shinra built the reactor, without even thinking about the town's safety. And, this is the result.It's been a while since the explosion, but you can still find pieces of it left all over town.

Name: Innkeeper
Line: Uh... need somethin'?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Need a room?- Hear a story?- Nothing in particular

Name: Mayor
Line: This is Gongaga Village. Many people died here in a Mako reactor explosion.The Shinra people told us that everyone would be happy once the Reactor was built. But, all it brought us was sadness......

Name: Zack's Father
Line: You a traveller? Hey wait, that glare in your eye... you in SOLDIER?

Name: Zack's Mother
Line: Oh you're right! Don't you know anything about our son?

Name: Zack's Father
Line: His name is Zack.

Name: Zack's Mother
Line: It's been close to 10 years since he left for the city, saying that he didn't want to live in the country...

Name: Zack's Father
Line: He left saying he's going to join SOLDIER. You ever hear of a Zack in SOLDIER?

Name: Cloud
Line: Aeris...

Name: Aeris
Line: What a shock... I didn't know Zack was from this town.

Name: Cloud
Line: You know him?

Name: Aeris
Line: Didn't I tell you? He was my first love.

Name: Aeris
Line: Zack... SOLDIER First Class. Same as Cloud.

Name: Cloud
Line: Strange, there aren't that many who make First Class, but I've never heard of him.

Name: Aeris
Line: That's all right. It's all in the past now. I was just worried because I heard he's been missing.

Name: Cloud
Line: Missing?

Name: Aeris
Line: I think it was 5 years ago. He went out on a job, and never came back.He loved women, a real lady's man. He probably found someone else...Hey? What's wrong?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Poor guy- (...jealous... envious...)

Name: Aeris
Line: Let's go, Cloud.

Name: Tifa
Line: Zack......

Name: Cloud
Line: Do you know him?

Name: Tifa
Line: N, no, I don't know him!

Name: Cloud
Line: Your face tells me differently.

Name: Tifa
Line: I told you, I don't!

Name: Cloud
Line: A, all right.

Name: Tifa
Line: ............That sounds just like you, leaving town, and saying 'I'm joining SOLDIER!'.

Name: Cloud
Line: There were a lot of guys like that back then.

Name: Tifa
Line: You must really be something making it in SOLDIER out of a group like that.I really respect you...

Name: Cloud
Line: - I just got lucky- I worked hard for it

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud, thanks for caring.

Name: Zack's Father
Line: Have you ever met someone in SOLDIER named Zack?

Name: Zack's Mother
Line: I can't believe he hasn't contacted us in 10 years...! ...After all, we're his parents.

Name: Cloud
Line: Oh man... a breakdown? Now?

Name: Red XIII
Line: I am home! It is I, Nanaki!

Name: Gatekeeper
Line: Hey, Nanaki! You're safe!Come on, and say hello to Bugenhagen!

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Nanaki?

Name: Gatekeeper
Line: Welcome to Cosmo Canyon. Are you familiar with this land?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yes- No

Name: Barret
Line: Wooooooooo!I always wanted to come here!

Name: Gatekeeper
Line: Ummgah! It's full capacity at present, so I'm afraid I can't let you enter.

Name: Red XIII
Line: They helped me some when I was on the road. Please let them in.

Name: Gatekeeper
Line: ...Oh, is that so? You helped our Nanaki? Please, come in.

Name: Cloud
Line: Who is Nanaki?

Name: Gatekeeper
Line: Nanaki is Nanaki. That's his name.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Here is where I was... I mean, ...this is my hometown.My tribe were protectors of those who appreciate this beautiful canyon and the Planet.My brave mother fought and died here, but my cowardly father left her...... I am the last of my race.

Name: Cloud
Line: Cowardly father?

Name: Nanaki
Line: Yes. My father was a wastrel.And so the mission I inherited from my ancestors, is to protect this place. My journey ends here.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: (from above)Hey! Nanaki--! You're home!

Name: Nanaki
Line: Coming, Grandpa!

Name: Sign
Line: Tasty Cocktails! Pub "Starlet"Fluffy Beds! In "Shildra Inn"Come in today!It's right near Cosmo Candle!

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Welcome. How 'bout our original cocktail, 'Cosmo Candle?'A drink now and then is good for you. It'll relax you a bit. ...If you know when to stop.

Name: Aeris
Line: Maybe there are some people here that know about the Promised Land and the Ancients.

Name: Tifa
Line: Nanaki...... I wonder what's happened to Nanaki...? He's as excited as a little boy.

Name: Elder Bugah
Line: Is that so? You brought Nanaki back here?Yeah, thanks.

Name: Innkeeper
Line: Welcome to 'Shildra Inn'.It'll be 100 gil a night. Would you like to stay?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yes- No thanks

Name: Flyer on Wall
Line: [Turtle's Paradise] No. 5Our cocktails are good but our wine is the best!Please stop in to "Turtle's Paradise"!!

Name: Man
Line: So this is Cosmo Canyon... Quite a mysterious place.Have you come to seek the 'Study of Planet Life'?

Name: Cloud
Line: - That's it- No

Name: Kid near the Cosmo Candle
Line: Yaaay! Nanaki! Nanaki's back! It's all thanks to this flame!This fire is called 'Cosmo Candle'. It has burned for generations.It is a holy flame that protects this canyon.I heard once, it only went out once, long ago.The elders said something horrifying occurred, but I really don't know much about it.

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: Hello. Looking for anything in particular?

Name: Gatekeeper
Line: Since you're here, why don't you listen to Bugenhagen's story?

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: Oh, welcome.The people of this canyon hate to compete. So almost everything here are replicas.But that's all right. Some of them you can really use.

Name: Flyer on wall
Line: [Turtle Paradise Newsletter] Number 4Now hiring!Looking for someone who can stand long hours of boredom!For details, contact Pub "Turtle Paradise"!!

Name: Elder Hargo
Line: Where did I put it...? I know it's around here...

Name: Barret
Line: There was this guy who studied 'Planetary Life' here.He couldn't take things the way they were, so he went to Midgar to form AVALANCHE.Wanna hear more?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Go on- Not really

Name: Barret
Line: (on choosing "Go on")Guess you could say this is where AVALANCHE was born.I always wanted to come here... And... I finally...... made it.A lot... happened...

Name: Cloud
Line: - And then?- Yeah, whatever...

Name: Barret
Line: (on choosing "And then?")And then...? I don't know what's going to happen, now that there is no AVALANCHE...

Name: Yuffie
Line: Oh man! This place looks like a real drag. And their Materia sucks, too.

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: ...num... yawn... Sir,... You... forgot...... your...... change....num... Yes, I'm coming...Are you here to shop?

Name: Cloud
Line: - That's right- No, what's your problem?

Name: Woman
Line: Oh man, I'm so busy. I need more help. Mummer... complaint...

Name: Woman
Line: Those two... uh, Anyway, are you two friends? It really seems strange.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Hmm, this place seems like it has a lot of secrets.So, when's dinner?

Name: Woman
Line: All right, all right. I'm making it right now....But I wonder which one is going to eat...

Name: Kid outside Sealed Door
Line: Bugenhagen sealed this door shut.How'd he do that? With super glue?

Name: Nanaki
Line: Cloud, this is my grandfather, Bugen.He is incredible. He knows everything.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. I hear that you looked after Nanaki a bit.Nanaki is still a child you see.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Please stop, grandfather. I'm 48.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. Nanaki's tribe has incredible longevity.So you see his 48 years would only be equivalent to say that of a 15 or 16 year old in human reckoning.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: He's quiet and very deep. You thought he was an adult?

Name: Nanaki
Line: ......grandfather. I want to be an adult.I want to grow up to be able to protect you and the village.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. No Nanaki. You can't stand on your own yet.To do that now would destroy you in the long run.Reaching up into the heavens, threatening to snatch the very stars from the great city of Midgar. You've seen it, haven't you?Well, that's a bad example. Looking up too much makes you lose perspective.When it's time for this planet to die, you'll understand that you know absolutely nothing.

Name: Cloud
Line: ......When the planet dies?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. It may be tomorrow, or 100 years from now... But it's not long off.

Name: Cloud
Line: How do you know this?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: I hear the cries of the Planet.

Name: Cloud
Line: What's that?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: The sounds of the stars in the heavens. While this goes on, planets are born, and die.

Name: Cloud
Line: What was that?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. That was a scream from this planet.Didn't you hear it? As if to say... I hurt, I suffer......

Name: Nanaki
Line: They have come here on a journey to save the planet.Why don't you show them your apparatus?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. To save the planet? Ho Ho Hoooo!But, then again, I guess it wouldn't hurt to show him.

Name: Kid
Line: (walking in)Bugenhagen!Several odd looking people have come.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: The whole place has gotten busy all of a sudden.

Name: Nanaki
Line: He brought friends too. I'll go get them.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Don't worry. My machine won't run away. You go and invite your friends.

Name: Barret
Line: What?

Name: Aeris
Line: Hmm?

Name: Tifa
Line: Are you going somewhere?

Name: Nanaki
Line: (in his room)Don't worry about me. I've seen it many times.It's my first time back in a while. Let me rest for a bit...

Name: Yuffie
Line: God. I HATE studying!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: What did they say?

Name: Gatekeeper
Line: Did you get to see Bugenhagen's contraption? If you haven't yet, you must!

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Here, over here. The door's unlocked, come on in.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. That's a machine only I can use.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. It looks like you have them all together. Then let's begin.I'll be stand there.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Hmm, yes pretty good. This is my laboratory.All the workings of space are entered into this 3D Holographic System.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. Yes, it is something, isn't it?Well, let's get to the subject.Eventually... all humans die. What happens to them after they die?The body decomposes, and returns to the Planet. That much everyone knows. What about their consciousness, their hearts and their souls?The soul too returns to the Planet.And not only those of humans, but everything on this Planet. In fact, all living things in the universe, are the same.The spirits that return to the Planet, merge with one another and roam the Planet.They roam, converge, and divide, becoming a swell, called the 'Lifestream'.Lifestream... In other words, a path of energy of the souls roaming the Planet.'Spirit Energy' is a word that you should never forget.A new life... children are blessed with Spirit energy and are brought into the world.Then, the time comes when they die and once again return to the Planet...Of course there are exceptions, but this is the way of the world.I've digressed, but you'll understand better if you watch this.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Spirit energy makes all things possible, trees, birds, and humans.Not just living things. But Spirit energy makes it possible for Planets to be Planets.What happens if that Spirit energy were to disappear?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: ......These are the basics of the Study of Planet Life.

Name: Cloud
Line: If the Spirit energy is lost, our Planet is destroyed...

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. Spirit energy is efficient BECAUSE it exists within nature.When Spirit energy is forcefully extracted, and manufactured, it can't accomplish its true purpose.

Name: Cloud
Line: You're talking about Mako energy, right?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Everyday Mako reactors suck up Spirit energy, diminishing it.Spirit energy gets compressed in the reactors and processed into Mako energy. All living things are being used up and thrown away.In other words, Mako energy will only destroy the Planet...

Name: Elder Hargo
Line: Ahh, here it is.My job is to gather all the legends and the knowledge of the planet and to make a book.Then, even when I return to the planet, the children may still be taught about many things...Mmm? Oh, we have guests. Good, good.I know, I know.You came to ask me something, right? Am I right?

Name: Cloud
Line: - It's about the Promised Land- Not really

Name: Elder Hargo
Line: By the way, those that came with you are all at the Cosmo Candle.Are you leaving?

Name: Gatekeeper
Line: Leaving already? But it appears your friends still want to learn more about the planet...

Name: Elder Bugah
Line: Mmm...What is it?

Name: Cloud
Line: - The story of the Ancients...- Nothing

Name: Elder Bugah
Line: By the way, your friends are all in front of the 'Cosmo Candle'Are you all leaving now?

Name: Barret
Line: Cosmo Canyon... This's where AVALANCHE was born...I promised my guys someday... when we saved the planet from the Shinra, that we'd all go to Cosmo Canyon and celebrate...Biggs... Wedge... Jessie...Now they're all gone... died for the planet....Really? To save the planet?We all... we all hate the Shinra...Do I even got a to go on?Will they......... will they ever forgive me?...Right now, I really don't know. But I know one thing.If there's anything I can do, to save the planet... or the people livin' on it... Then I'm gonna do it!I don't care if it's for justice or revenge, or whatever. I don't care...... let 'em decide for 'emselves.

Name: Aeris
Line: I learned a lot. The elders taught me many things.About the Cetra... And the Promised Land...I'm...... alone... I'm all alone now...

Name: Cloud
Line: But I'm...... we're here for you, right?

Name: Aeris
Line: I know. I know, but... I am the only...... Cetra.

Name: Cloud
Line: Does that mean we can't help?

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud...Bonfires are funny, aren't they?They make you remember all sorts of things.You know, Cloud. 5 Years ago.........It's nothing.No, forget it. I'm afraid to ask...

Name: Cloud
Line: What is it...?

Name: Tifa
Line: It feels like... it feels like you're going far away...You really, really are...... you... right?

Name: Yuffie
Line: What a boring place, just like I thought. I wanna go somewhere! Let's go find some Materia!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: I wonder how many years it's been... Gosh, it brings back memories......

Name: Nanaki
Line: ...Long ago....When I was still very small. We were all around this flame...No, never mind...

Name: Cloud
Line: What happened?

Name: Nanaki
Line: It's about my parents.When I talk about my mother, I am full of pride and joy...And that's fine. ...But when I remember my father, my heart is full of anger...

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: ...You really can't forgive your father...?

Name: Nanaki
Line: Of course. He...... left mother for dead.When the Gi tribe attacked, he ran off by himself, leaving mother and the people of the Canyon!

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: ...Come, Nanaki. There's something you should see.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: The place may be dangerous.Cloud. Will you and one other person come with us?

Name: Barret
Line: ...Where're they going?

Name: Aeris
Line: I wonder what he wants to show Nanaki...?

Name: Tifa
Line: Can I go too?

Name: Yuffie
Line: Does he want to show him THAT? You know, maybe there's some Materia that's been passed on for generations in this Canyon!?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Dangerous? Count me out......

Name: Elder Bugah
Line: Mmm. I'm starting to feel good now. That bartender's cocktails always hit the spot.

Name: Gatekeeper
Line: Hm? If you're looking for Bugenhagen, he went to the Sealed Door.Remember, there's a steel door on the way to Bugenhagen's room.What's that door there for anyhow? It's been closed forever...

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho HooooAre we all set?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- Just a minute

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Not ready yet? Tell me when you are ready.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. Shall we go?

Name: Nanaki
Line: Hey? Aren't you going with us, Grandpa?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: What are you crazy? It's dangerous in there. I told you that!You want an old man like me should go first? I'll be right behind you.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: What is it, you're going back? I'll be waiting here for you when you're ready.I can't leave this door open forever.Good. Then we shall proceed.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo.Everyone here's a Ghost of the Gi tribe. Killed in a certain battle.

Name: Nanaki
Line: A certain battle...?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: The vengeful spirits of the Gi didn't disappear, and couldn't return to the Lifestream...We still have far to go. Ho Ho Hoooo.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: As you can see, this cave leads to the back of Cosmo Canyon.It was unfortunate that the Gi were larger than us. If they attacked through here, we wouldn't have stood a chance.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Let's move on.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: This warrior went through the cave all alone.Fighting attackers one after another...

Name: Nanaki
Line: Grandpa...... That warrior...

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo... We're almost there.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: What is this......?

Name: Nanaki
Line: Grandpa, is he...!?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: After death... The ghosts of the Gi... Like stagnant air......This... can't be!!

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: ...Thank you, Cloud. Because of you, we survived.Nanaki, you have grown strong, too.

Name: Nanaki
Line: ......Oh yeah?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Now I know that it wasn't a mistake bringing you here...Come, I have something I want to show you. Right over here.

Name: Nanaki
Line: This is...

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: ...The warrior who fought against the Gi.He kept them from taking even one step into Cosmo Canyon.But he was never able to return to town...Look, Nanaki. Look at your father, at the warrior, Seto.

Name: Nanaki
Line: ...That... That's...... Seto...?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Seto continued to fight the Gi tribe here. ...To protect this Canyon.Even after the Gi's poisonous arrows turned his body to stone......Even after they all ran away... Seto, continued to protect us.And he continues to protect us, even now.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Even now...

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: You thought that he was a coward and ran away. But he, alone risked his life to protect Cosmo Canyon.That is your father, Seto.

Name: Nanaki
Line: That...... that is Seto? ...!? Did mother know?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo... She knew. The two of them made me promise to keep this cave shut.They asked me to seal it myself and not to tell a soul.They said we should forget about this cave.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Cloud... Would you mind leaving the two of us alone?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Nanaki. I want you to continue your journey with Cloud and the others.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Grandpa!?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Listen, Nanaki.Cloud says they are trying to save the planet.Honestly, I don't think it can be done.For even if they stop every reactor on the planet, it's only going to postpone the inevitable.Even if they stop Sephiroth, everything will perish.But, Nanaki. I've been thinking lately.I've been thinking if there was anything WE could do,as a part of the planet, something to help a planet already in misery...No matter what happens, isn't it important to try?Am I just wishing against fate?I am too old to do anything about it...This year, I'll be 130. Ho Ho Hoooo.That is why, Nanaki, you must go with them! For my sake.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Grandpa...

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: I wanted to show you your real father before you left...I'm so glad that you came back while I was still alive to show you.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Grandpa... don't talk like that. I don't want to think of life... without you......

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. Well, I've had a long life.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Grandpa! You must live!I'll see to it.I'll see to what's happening to the planet. And I'll come back to tell you.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Nanaki...

Name: Nanaki
Line: I am Nanaki of Cosmo Canyon! The son of the warrior, Seto!I'll come back a warrior true to that noble name! So please, Grandpa...

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: That's... Seto's...... Seto......

Name: Nanaki
Line: Seto....... Fa... Father...

Name: Barret
Line: They said they finished fixin' the buggy.

Name: Cloud
Line: Shall we get going?

Name: Aeris
Line: So this is it, Nanaki...

Name: Barret
Line: That's just the way it goes. ...You came in handy at times...

Name: Man
Line: The repair on your car is completed.Now you should be able to go where ever you want.

Name: Cloud
Line: - How much do I owe...?- Much obliged

Name: Man
Line: Mmm...... I think the teachings of the 'Study of Planet Life' are true.But can people used to Mako energy ever go back...?

Name: Kid outside Sealed Door
Line: Nope... It doesn't open... How'd he seal it? With a huge magnet?

Name: Nanaki
Line: Wait for me! I'm coming too!

Name: Cloud
Line: Mmm?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Cloud. Please look after Nanaki.

Name: Cloud
Line: What happened?

Name: Nanaki
Line: I think I grew up a little. That's what happened!

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. Come back whenever you need my knowledge.

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm not lying!I remember... the intense heat of the flames...

Name: Innkeeper
Line: Hi, welcome.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Give me a room- What's your story?

Name: Cloud
Line: Man in a Black Cape?He has a tattoo number '6'. Hmm? He has something...

Name: Clone #6
Line: Urrr...... rrrrr...... rrrgh... must... go... to... Re... uni... on...

Name: Woman
Line: Nice town, huh?We've been in business here for a long time...

Name: Cloud
Line: ...You're lying.

Name: Woman
Line: Do you have anything to do with this town?

Name: Cloud
Line: - How about bein' born and raised here?- Nope, guess not

Name: Cloud
Line: He has a tattoo of the number '12'. Mmm? He has something.

Name: Clone #12
Line: Can...... you...... hear? The... voice... of... Se... phi... ro... th......

Name: Woman
Line: What is it?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Nothing- I want to hear your story

Name: Clone #5
Line: ...must...... get...... it... and bring... to... Se... phi... roth...Then... become... one... with... Se... phi... roth...

Name: Cloud
Line: This guy's number '5'...

Name: Cloud
Line: He has a tattoo of the number '11'...

Name: Cloud
Line: Tattoo number '4'

Name: Clone #4
Line: ...Where... are... you...? Great... Se... phi... roth...

Name: Cloud
Line: But... I definitely remember playing the piano then. But why didn't it get burnt down?Play the piano......?

Name: Cloud
Line: I wonder what... this is...

Name: Small Clone
Line: ...Re...... union.

Name: Clone
Line: Wooooo-----ooow...... He's... calling...... Sephiroth...... is...... calling......

Name: Clone 2
Line: The... Great... Se... phi...... roth...... is... near......In... side...... inside... the Mansion...... Urrrrrrrgh...... the great...... Sephi...... roth

Name: Letter
Line: I must get rid of all those that stand in the way of my research. Even that one from the Turks.I scientifically altered him, and put him to sleep in the basement. If you want to find him, then search the area.But... this is merely a game I thought of. It is not necessary for you to participate if you don't want to.

Name: Cloud
Line: There seems to be another letter.- Read it- Ignore it

Name: Letter
Line: Move the dial on the safe carefully, but quickly. You have 20 seconds. You can not go past the numbers while turning. The 4 hints for the numbers are...

Name: Cloud
Line: I have a bad feeling about this...- Still open the safe- Don't open

Name: Vincent
Line: ...To wake me from the nightmare

Name: Cloud, Tifa, or Cid
Line: You were having a nightmare.

Name: Vincent
Line: Hmph... a nightmare...? My long sleep has given me time to atone.

Name: Vincent
Line: I have nothing to say to strangers. Get out.This mansion is the beginning of your nightmare.

Name: Vincent
Line: Hmm? What do you know?

Name: Cloud, Tifa, or Cid
Line: - Don't say a thing- Talk about Sephiroth

Name: Vincent
Line: Sephiroth!?

Name: Vincent + Cloud, Tifa, or Cid
Line: You know Sephiroth?

Name: Vincent
Line: You start first.

Name: Cloud, Tifa, or Cid
Line: ...That's how it was.

Name: Vincent
Line: So Sephiroth knows he was created five years ago? And about the Jenova Project?...He was missing, but has just recently reappeared.He has taken many lives and is seeking the Promised Land.

Name: Cloud, Tifa, or Cid
Line: Now it's your turn.

Name: Vincent
Line: Sorry... I cannot speak.

Name: Vincent
Line: Hearing your stories, has added upon me yet another sin.More nightmares shall come to me now, more than I previously had.

Name: Cloud, Tifa or Cid
Line: - Good night- Who are you?

Name: Vincent
Line: I was with... the Shinra Manufacturing Department in Administrative Research, otherwise known as--the Turks...Vincent.

Name: Vincent
Line: Formerly of the Turks.I have no affiliation with Shinra now....And you?

Name: Vincent
Line: You were also with Shinra...? Then do you know Lucrecia?

Name: Cloud, Tifa, or Cid
Line: Who?

Name: Vincent
Line: ......Lucrecia.

Name: Vincent
Line: The woman who gave birth to Sephiroth.

Name: Vincent
Line: That isn't completely wrong, but just a theory.He was born from a beautiful lady.That lady was Lucrecia.She was an assistant to Professor Gast of the Jenova Project. Beautiful... Lucrecia.

Name: Cloud, Tifa, or Cid
Line: ...A human experiment?

Name: Vincent
Line: There was no way to cancel the experiment.I couldn't stop her.That was my sin.I let the one I loved, the one I respected most, face the worst.

Name: Vincent
Line: Let me sleep...

Name: Vincent
Line: Wait!If I go with you will I meet Hojo?

Name: Vincent
Line: Lucrecia...All right. I've decided to go with you.

Name: Vincent
Line: Being a former Turks, I may be of help to you...

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth!

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Being here brings back memories.Are you going to participate in the Reunion?

Name: Cloud
Line: I don't even know what a Reunion is!

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Jenova will be at the Reunion. Jenova will join the Reunion becoming a calamity from the skies.

Name: Cloud
Line: Jenova, a calamity from the skies? You mean she wasn't an Ancient!?

Name: Sephiroth
Line: ...I see. I don't think you have the right to participate.I will go North past Mt. Nibel. If you wish to find out... then follow...

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Reunion? Calamity from the skies?

Name: Glass Tank
Line: C project specimen (B) codeCA scratch left by a fingernail inside the beaker... 'Let's get out of here...'.

Name: Second Tank
Line: C project specimen (A) codeZA scratch left by a fingernail inside the beaker... 'Feeding Time'... that's our chance...!

Name: Escapee Report no. 1
Line: X Month X DayThe two escapees were located near Midgar.

Name: Escapee Report no. 2
Line: Description of the time of capture.A Former member of SOLDIER/Number ( )No effect could be detected from either Mako Radiation Therapy or Jenova on him.B Regular/Number ( )Reaction to Jenova detected.

Name: Escapee Report no. 3
Line: Concerning their disposal.A Shot for resisting.B Escaped during A's resistance.

Name: Escapee Report no. 4
Line: OtherB's whereabouts is currently unknown. But, we submit there is no need to pursue him, due to his diminishing consciousness. Awaiting further instructions.

Name: Clone 2
Line: Great...... Sephi...... roth......... left us......Over... mountains...... gone......

Name: Cloud
Line: What's that...!?

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: A gun is a MAN'S weapon! Ain't nuthin' else'll do!Let me handle all your weapon and accessory needs!

Name: Man Looking at Painting
Line: Hmm. Is it real or fake?

Name: Innkeeper
Line: Welcome to the Shanghai Inn!It's 100 gil a night. Would you like to spend the night?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yes- No

Name: Innkeeper
Line: Excuse me. Please don't come in here.Our books and the room keys are in here, so I'll have to ask you to please stay out.

Name: Cloud
Line: The books...Maybe we could find out who's been here?- Was there a man in a Black Cape?- Not interested

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Would you like something to drink?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Let me hear your story- Not interested

Name: Man at Table
Line: Better ask the Captain about this town. He's the one in charge of it.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Captain?- Did you see a man in a Black Cape?

Name: Man at Table
Line: A drink will ease your heart...

Name: Man in Bathroom
Line: ...I'm in here.P...... Urrrrgh... aaaaaghh...Urrrrgh, urrrgh

Name: Redhead
Line: That rusted out rocket is all that remains of the Shinra's Space Program.

Name: Mechanic
Line: Everyone in this town was a mechanic back when they were planning to launch the rocket.

Name: Man
Line: Mmm, I'm so bored. Isn't there anything that can get me excited?

Name: Woman
Line: Geeeeez, it's boring! Isn't anything exciting going to happen here?

Name: Old Man outside Item Shop
Line: This used to be a Shinra base where they used to launch rockets.You saw the leaning rocket, right? That's Shinra No. 26. It never got off the ground though.It just looms there. That's how the town got its name... 'Shinra No. 26'.Want to look at the rocket with me?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah, let's take a look- No, not interested

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: Welcome! This is the Item Shop.

Name: Old Woman
Line: All gramps does is gaze at that rocket all day long.Well he's a man that really loves machinery...

Name: Old Man
Line: My job's to make everyone laugh all over the world...Hmm, let's see... do I know any good jokes...?

Name: Cloud
Line: There's a Shinra logo on it. Tiny Bronco...... This is cool.

Name: Shera
Line: Um... may I help you?

Name: Cloud
Line: No... We're just looking at it.

Name: Shera
Line: ...If you would like to use it, please ask the Captain. The Captain should be in the Rocket.I'm Shera. And what are your names?

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm Cloud.

Name: Shera
Line: Hmm... So you're not with the Shinra.I thought the approval for the reopening of the Space Program came.

Name: Shera
Line: President Rufus is scheduled to come here. The Captain's been so restless all morning.

Name: Cloud
Line: Rufus!!?

Name: Cid
Line: What're you guys doin' here?

Name: Cloud
Line: We heard the Captain was here.

Name: Cid
Line: Captain? I'm the Captain!The name's Cid. Everyone calls me 'Captain', though.What d'ya want?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Tell me about this rocket- Is Rufus coming?- Can we borrow the "Tiny Bronco"?

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Would you like something to drink?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Let me hear your story

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Cid's had some bad breaks. It's really no one's fault he couldn't go into space.Just bad luck, I guess...

Name: Shera
Line: Excuse me... Cloud?Did the Captain say anything?

Name: Cloud
Line: Nope...

Name: Cid
Line: ^%$#! Shera. What are you, blind!?We got guests!! GET SOME TEA! ^%$#!

Name: Shera
Line: I... I'm sorry.

Name: Cloud
Line: Really, don't mind us.

Name: Cid
Line: Shut up! Sit your ass down in that chair and drink your goddamn TEA!Argggggggh! DAMN, I'm pissed!Shera! I'll be in the backyard tunin' up Tiny Bronco!An' make sure to serve them some tea! All right!?

Name: Cloud
Line: Sorry. It's our fault.

Name: Shera
Line: No, no. He's always like this.

Name: Shera
Line: No... It's because of my stupid mistake.I was the one who destroyed his dream...

Name: Cloud
Line: What happened?

Name: Shera
Line: He pushed the Emergency Engine Shut Down switch, aborting the mission, to save my life.After that, the Space Program was cut back and the launch was canceled.It's my fault his dream was destroyed...That's why... it's all right. I don't care what the Captain says, I'll live my life for him.

Name: Cid
Line: Shera! You still haven't served 'em tea!

Name: Shera
Line: I... I'm sorry.

Name: Cid
Line: Hurry up and sit down! Or ain't my hospitality good enough for you!?They're late... Where is Rufus...?

Name: Palmer
Line: Hey-HEY! Long time no see! So Cid, how ya been?

Name: Cid
Line: Well, if it ain't fat man, Palmer. How long were you figurin' on keepin' me waitin'!?

Name: Palmer
Line: Hey-hey! I don't know. The President's outside, so why don't you ask him?

Name: Cid
Line: ^$#&! Good for nothing, fat &$#$^@!

Name: Palmer
Line: Don't say 'fat'!Hey-hey! Tea!Can I have some too? With lotsa sugar and honey and... oh yeah, don't forget the lard!

Name: Shera
Line: Is President Rufus here to announce that he's going to restart the Space Program?

Name: Palmer
Line: Hey-hey? Have we met before?Hey-hey! Is the tea ready yet?With plenty of sugar and honey. Oh yeah, and don't forget the lard too.

Name: Cid
Line: What the......! You got me all excited for nothing!?Then, what'd you come here for?

Name: Rufus
Line: I want to borrow the Tiny Bronco.We're going after Sephiroth. But seems like we've been going in the wrong direction.But now, we think we know where he's headed. But, we have to cross the ocean. That's why we want your plane...

Name: Cid
Line: &^#^%! First the Airship, then the Rocket, and now, the Tiny Bronco.Shinra took outer space away from me and now you want to take the sky away from me too!?

Name: Rufus
Line: Oh my...You seem to forget it was because of Shinra, Inc. that you were able to fly in the first place.

Name: Cid
Line: What!?

Name: Shera
Line: (from behind Cloud)Uh, excuse me...This way...

Name: Shera
Line: You wanted to use the Tiny Bronco, right?

Name: Shera
Line: I believe Palmer's going to take it. Why don't you talk to him?

Name: Palmer
Line: Hmm... Why do I have to do this...? I'm the head of the Space Program...

Name: Cloud
Line: We'll be takin' that Tiny Bronco.

Name: Palmer
Line: I've seen you somewhere before...I know! The Shinra building! When the President was killed! Ulp!Se... se... security!!

Name: Palmer
Line: Heh-hic-heh-hic!Heh heh hic!

Name: Cloud
Line: Forget it! Get in!!

Name: Cid
Line: Shit!! The tail's been hit!

Name: Cloud
Line: Emergency landing...

Name: Cid
Line: This's gonna be a big splash. Hold on to your drawers and don't piss in 'em!

Name: Cid
Line: She won't fly anymore...

Name: Cloud
Line: Can't we use it as a boat?

Name: Cid
Line: $#&%! Do whatever you want!

Name: Cloud
Line: Cid, what are you going to do now?

Name: Cid
Line: Dunno. I'm history with the Shinra and I've given up on the town.

Name: Cloud
Line: How 'bout your wife? How 'bout Shera?

Name: Cid
Line: Wife? Don't make me laugh! Just thinkin' 'bout marryin' her gives me the chills.What're you guys gonna do?

Name: Cloud
Line: We're going after a man named Sephiroth. We'll have to get Rufus of the Shinra someday too.

Name: Cid
Line: I don't know about any of that, but...What the hell!? Sign me up!

Name: Cloud
Line: How 'bout it, everyone?

Name: Cid
Line: Glad to be aboard, numbskulls!

Name: Cloud
Line: Numskulls...?

Name: Cid
Line: Yeah. Anyone stupid enough to go up against Shinra nowadays, has GOTTA be a numskull! I like it!So, where we headed?Rufus was goin' after Sephiroth towards the Temple of the Ancients.

Name: Cloud
Line: Really!? ...Where is it? That Temple of the Ancients?

Name: Cid
Line: Dunno. That numskull kid was tellin' me he was headin 'The wrong direction'... so maybe it's off this way?

Name: Cloud
Line: Let's just head for land and get some information. Temple of the Ancients... that name bothers me.

Name: Yuffie
Line: .........Hm. How 'bout goin' west?No, no reason. NO reason at all!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Wait, wait, wait, wai----t!!

Name: Yuffie
Line: I know this area pretty well.It gets pretty tough past here. Better get ready...

Name: Yuffie
Line: No! It's REALLY tough...

Name: Soldiers
Line: There they are, catch 'em!!

Name: Shinra Soldier
Line: Hey, that's not them! These are the other guys from before!!

Name: Yuffie
Line: I didn't know! I have nothing to do with this one!

Name: Yuffie
Line: No, umm, uh......

Name: Shinra Soldiers
Line: What should we do!?Uh...... Get them! Grab them and ask questions later!!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Hey!!

Name: Yuffie
Line: This is MY house! Nobody gets in!

Name: Man on the Path to Godo's House
Line: Lord Godo is in this house.He used to be quite strong, but now, all he does is sleep......What, Yuffie... It's best to ask Lord Godo about that.But today he's not in the best of... Well, I should say... But really he's not so......

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: Sorry, listen I... No, nothing... never mind.

Name: Man
Line: Sorry, but we're entirely sold out now.What's this here? Ah, no... that's uh......a sample! Yeah, that's it... a sample. Sorry, but why don't you all come back later?

Name: Pub [Turtle's Paradise] Publicity Flyers! Notice
Line: [Turtle's Paradise] is now having a Publicity flyer campaign.They will be posted all over the world. So make sure you look for our flyers that say "Turtle's Paradise"There's six in all. If you find them all, make sure to let the owner of Turtle's Paradise know. You can win a prize!Just reading them's good enough, so please don't take them down or rip them up!!--Owner, Turtle's Paradise

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Hey, hey, welcome! You on a trip? Well, just relax and make yourself at home.Nowadays, thanks to tourism, Wutai's able to get by.

Name: Man
Line: Hey. Did you hear? There used to be a Water God here in Wutai.They say the Water God was a huge snake!Now we live in a world filled with Mako. Not many people would believe in something like that now.But some in the world, and here in Wutai, still believe.Believe in the scales of the Water God and in materia that has its power in it.

Name: Elena
Line: Yy, you!? How did you get here...?

Name: Reno
Line: ...Elena, you talk too much.

Name: Elena
Line: Ww, what?

Name: Reno
Line: What are we doing way out here in the middle of nowhere?

Name: Elena
Line: We're taking our vacation and resting up from our work.

Name: Reno
Line: Now our vacation is ruined.

Name: Elena
Line: B, but...

Name: Rude
Line: ...even the booze tastes bad now.

Name: Elena
Line: ...sorry...

Name: Elena
Line: Hmm, you're lucky all right. Now get out of my sight!The next time we meet I won't be so nice.

Name: Reno
Line: Drink, Rude! How long have we been a team...?There have been hard times being a Turk, but all in all, I'm glad I did it.I even got to meet a bunch of wing nuts like you.

Name: Rude
Line: To the Turks... To Reno... cheers!

Name: Little Kid
Line: Alright, alright, alright! I know!On the side of the mountain, right there in your face is Da-chao!I hear you can climb to the top, but since it's dangerous I'd be mighty careful if I were you!A girl with materia? No, there hasn't been anyone climbing Da-chao for some time now.You know I've noticed that there's  pounding noise from time to time in this store.

Name: Man on the Path to Godo's House
Line: Lord Godo is in this house.He used to be quite strong, but now, all he does is sleep......Anyhow, for some reason Yuffie's had a fondness for materia ever since I can remember.She's always hung around places she thought might have it.

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: We got a lot of different stuff here. Take what you want.

Name: Woman
Line: I'm sorry. The sign outside says "Materia", but there's almost no materia left anywhere in Wutai.Listen, this is just a backwoods town. We don't have much to do with Shinra, and besides...If we had a lot of materia, Wutai would be a much more exciting town, but we don't...

Name: Woman
Line: Huh? What? You DID?

Name: Man outside Godo's House
Line: That five-storied pagoda over there is called the Pagoda of the Five Mighty Gods...The Five Gods are Power, Speed, Magic, War and Omni, who has the best characteristics of everything.Since ancient times, we in Wutai, have worshipped Da-chao and the Water God.Legend has it that the village has been protected by Da-chao, the Water God, and the Five Mighty Gods.But in the last battle, we didn't fare so well... I guess our beliefs were based on nothing more than legends.

Name: Gorky
Line: Freeze!You aren't from Wutai, are you?

Name: Cloud
Line: - No- Yes

Name: Godo
Line: GOOGAH... what do you want?Don't have... GAH... anything much but, you should be able to... GOO... rest yourselves here. GOGAH... make yourselves at home.......Yuffie? ......nope, never heard of her. ...GOOGO......you again? I told you once, and I'm telling you again, I don't know her.

Name: Yuffie
Line: What's with you, you coward!

Name: Godo
Line: Yuffie......!

Name: Yuffie
Line: You scared of the Shinra?Then why don't you fall into line and obey them, just like all of the other towns!

Name: Godo
Line: Shut up! What would you know about this?

Name: Yuffie
Line: You get beaten once, and then that's it?What happened to the mighty Wutai I used to know?

Name: Godo
Line: No kid like you's going to talk to me like that!You keep acting like that! You ought to be ashamed of yourself!

Name: Yuffie
Line: That's my style! And it's my own business, not yours! Don't you try and dictate what I should do!

Name: Godo
Line: Style...? Dictate...?Throwin' around all those fancy words... You're a miserable daughter!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Hmph! You're a sad excuse for a father!!

Name: Godo
Line: ......take your things and get out of here now.To protect Wutai, we cannot afford to stand up to Shinra.

Name: Man on the Path to Godo's House
Line: She's always getting into fights. But in that, she takes after Godo to a tee.Like father like daughter...Yuffie's like that, you know. Sometimes she'll just bust into people's houses.Then she hides in the shadows... Just like a little kid.

Name: Woman Walking near River
Line: Life is just like the flowing of a river. It flows from the large ocean of life, and eventually it returns back to it.Wutai is a historical place. There are some very unusual things here you should see.Yuffie? I saw her a while ago. She must be in one of the houses around here.

Name: Boy
Line: Oh no! More weirdosNo, these aren't like the one from a while ago, but these ones look weird too!

Name: Old Man
Line: Well, well. Long time no see. What have you been up to? Let's see... what was your name?

Name: Boy
Line: No, Gramps! This isn't anyone you know! This is just some stranger who barged into our house!What are we going to do, Gramps? Some strange-looking girl came in here a minute ago and I...

Name: Old Man
Line: Oh, how exciting. You a friend of my grandson's?

Name: Boy
Line: No, Gramps! These guy's are creepy! They're runnin' all over the place!

Name: Man on the Path to Godo's House
Line: She's always getting into fights. But in that, she takes after Godo to a tee.Like father like daughter...That reminds me, Lately I've been seeing a kid around here that reminds me of Yuffie.Always sneakin' around corners And into somethin' she shouldn't be.

Name: Yuffie
Line: O... ok, I know... I was wrong......You win. I'll give you back your materia...

Name: Shinra Soldier
Line: So our reports were right! He IS here on vacation!We've finally found him! Get the Turks here for back-up!

Name: Reno
Line: ...what a drag.

Name: Shinra Soldier
Line: Wh, what was that...?

Name: Reno
Line: Right now we're off duty and can't run off to save your butts.

Name: Shinra Soldier
Line: We know you're off duty, but...

Name: Reno
Line: If you knew that, then don't bother us! Lookin' at you is makin' me sober.

Name: Shinra Soldier
Line: But you all have orders from headquarters to look for him too!

Name: Shinra Soldier
Line: All right, that's it! We'll get him without any help from the Turks, just you see!

Name: Shinra Soldier
Line: And don't think that headquarters isn't going to hear about this!!

Name: Elena
Line: Reno, do you think that was really such a good idea!?I mean is that the way a professional, a Turk would act!?

Name: Reno
Line: Elena. Don't misunderstand.A pro isn't someone who sacrifices himself for his job. That's just a fool.

Name: Elena
Line: Rude...?

Name: Elena
Line: Well, I don't buy that! Goodbye!!

Name: Reno
Line: Relax. She's not a child. Let her have her way now...

Name: Yuffie
Line: I know, the materia, right? I have it stored in a safe place. ...Follow me.

Name: Flyer on Wall
Line: [Turtle's Paradise] No. 6Drink at the "Turtle's Paradise" And talk about Wutai!You'll know "Turtle's Paradise" by the big pot outside!!

Name: Yuffie
Line: ...I've been hearing that ever since I was little.Before I was born, Wutai was a lot more crowded and more important...You saw what it looks like now, right? ...JUST a resort town...After we lost the war, we got peace, but with that, we lost something else. Now look at Wutai...That's why... if I had lots of materia I could...

Name: Yuffie
Line: I know. I know that...That... sniff... switch... the lever on the left...... materia's... sniff, hic... in there.

Name: Barret
Line: Ain't nuthin' we can do about it...

Name: Aeris
Line: I feel bad, but......

Name: Tifa
Line: Now, the Materia...

Name: Nanaki
Line: Were we a little too harsh on her?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Well, let's get our materia back.

Name: Vincent
Line: There was nothing else to do.

Name: Cid
Line: Hmmph... I dunno......

Name: Cloud
Line: - Flip the Left Lever- Flip the Right Lever

Name: Yuffie
Line: Ha ha ha------! Never trust anyone that easily!! / Ha ha------! You should've listened!!The Materia's mine! Tough!You want your materia? Then go find it yourself!Yeah that's right. And when you're looking for the materia, remember you gotta steel it.Heh heh... steel... steel! Get it?C ya!!

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Seems like the town got really boisterous since you arrived. Did anything happen?

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Congrats! You have just found all six flyers for the "Turtles Paradise"!How wonderful! Now here is your prize, just as we promised!!

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Please come again to "Turtles Paradise"! We're looking forward to seeing you!

Name: Reno
Line: ......It's just that we're off duty!I don't feel like drinking with you. And don't talk to me.

Name: Yuffie
Line: Let go! I SAID let GO!Hey! Who do you think I...... OW! What're you doin'...? Jerk!

Name: Corneo
Line: Hohi!I've finally got a new chicky!Two for one, in fact! Hohi, hohi!

Name: Cloud, Tifa, or Cid
Line: Two!?

Name: Elena
Line: H......hey! Let go of me! You're gonna regret this!!

Name: Corneo
Line: Hohi, hohi! Hohihi!

Name: Shinra Soldier
Line: Now listen up! They must be in the area! Find them no matter what!

Name: Shinra Soldier
Line: Yes, sir!!

Name: Shinra Soldier
Line: There he is! It's Corneo! Don't let him get away!Attaaaack!

Name: Reno
Line: Hmm... that Corneo is good at escaping...

Name: Rude
Line: ......Elena.

Name: Reno
Line: Let's go, Rude. We'll give them a taste of what the Turks can do.

Name: Reno
Line: ......Sounded pretty good.

Name: Reno
Line: Don't misunderstand.We have no intention of joining you. But for now, we'll agree not to bother each other. That's all.

Name: Reno
Line: Hmm, nice attitude. Here's a clue, it's the place that stands out the most.

Name: Man on the Path to Godo's House
Line: Two girls just went off towards Da-chao. I wonder if that place is starting to become popular with the kids?One had herself all tangled up in a rope. And the other one kind of looked like Yuffie.

Name: Little Kid
Line: Alright, alright, alright! I saw an old man in flashy clothes running towards Da-chao!He was babblin' somethin' and looked like he could float! It almost bowled me over!

Name: Reno
Line: You're finally here. We're gonna split into two.You do whatever you want. But don't endanger Elena.Don't worry. We won't do anything to that girl, Yuffie.For now...

Name: Reno
Line: Don't fool around. You know the enemy's not gonna wait for us, right?

Name: Corneo
Line: Hmm! Delicious... scrumptious! I think I've just found a new HOBBY!Which shall it be? Hmm... Hmm...Should I go... with HER?

Name: Elena
Line: He... hey, I'm one of the 'Turks'! Don't think you can get away with this!?

Name: Corneo
Line: Or... maybe... HER?

Name: Yuffie
Line: Oh GAWD! If I knew this was gonna happen, I would've taken rope escape lessons more seriously!!

Name: Corneo
Line: Hmm!!! I've made my choice! My companion for the night will be.........the cheerful one!

Name: Yuffie
Line: GROSS-NESS!Don't mess with me old man! You don't even have any Materia!

Name: Corneo
Line: Oooooh! And she's saucy, too! Wheee! Wheee!

Name: Corneo
Line: Hee-haw. What... what's goin' on!? Who's there?

Name: Yuffie
Line: Oh man! Cloud......!

Name: Corneo
Line: Wheeel... long time no see.

Name: Cloud
Line: Don't tell me you forgot...

Name: Corneo
Line: Be quiet! None of you know how much I've suffered since then...It's a long story, but......

Name: Corneo
Line: Hmm... You guys are... serious. ......Good, good....this ain't no time for me to be fooling around either...Why did you kill my little Aps?I'm gonna make you PLAY with my new pet, so you won't get in the way of my search for a bride!RAPPS---come here!!

Name: Corneo
Line: Wait...Just wait a second!

Name: Corneo
Line: Just listen to me - it won't take long.Why do you think a bad guy like me would swallow his pride and plead for his life?

Name: Cloud, Tifa, or Cid
Line: - 1 Because he's ready to die- 2 Because he's sure to win- 3 Because he's clueless

Name: Elena
Line: Eyaaaah...!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Makes me so MAD...!

Name: Corneo
Line: If I push this button, they'll fall upside down, and we'll have a SQUASHED TOMATOES!

Name: Cloud
Line: Damn...!

Name: Corneo
Line: Now, give me your women too!Ha, ha, ha, ha! I guess I'm the one laughing last!

Name: Reno
Line: No, that would be us.

Name: Corneo
Line: Hee-haw. What... what's goin' on!? Who's there?

Name: Corneo
Line: ...The Turks!

Name: Reno
Line: You knew this was gonna happen ever since you leaked that secret.We're going to take care of you... personally.

Name: Corneo
Line: DAMMIT! Then they're all goin' with me!

Name: Corneo
Line: Ugh...!

Name: Reno
Line: Good timing, Rude.

Name: Rude
Line: ...Let's get to work.

Name: Reno
Line: All right, Corneo. This'll be over quick, so listen up.Why do you think we went to all the trouble of teaming up with those guys to get you...?1. Because we were ready to die2. Because we were sure of victory3. Because we were clueless

Name: Corneo
Line: Two... Number two?

Name: Reno
Line: All wrong.

Name: Corneo
Line: No...! Wait, sto......!

Name: Reno
Line: The correct answer was...

Name: Rude
Line: ...because it's our job.

Name: Elena
Line: Oh, thank you very much...!I never expected you'd to come help......

Name: Reno
Line: Elena, don't act so weak.You're a Turks!

Name: Elena
Line: Y... Yes, sir!

Name: Reno
Line: Yes... this is Reno.Yes... Yes... I'll get on it right away.

Name: Elena
Line: Was that the company?

Name: Reno
Line: Yeah, they want us to find Cloud...

Name: Rude
Line: Are we on...?

Name: Reno
Line: No, today we're off duty.

Name: Yuffie
Line: Hey---who cares about that!? Get----me-----down----!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Phew, perfect. Now the materia is back in its rightful place.

Name: Yuffie
Line: Huh? Oh, it'll be all right...Don't be so picky!Anyways, that sure was close......No, normally I would kick their butts, Boom, Bang!!

Name: Yuffie
Line: I'd rather deal with my dad than deal with that guy.

Name: Yuffie
Line: Oh, by the way, some of those guys from the Turks are good, huh?At least, after all that, we got the materia back.Now come on everybody, let's continue our journey...

Name: Yuffie
Line: .........Come on, wait---!

Name: Woman Walking near River
Line: Materia is like Life. They both come from the large ocean of life, and both must return to it.

Name: Man
Line: Listen, I'm sorry about last time. Yuffie told me not to sell anything to you.

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: Hey yo! Welcome!Strike while the iron's hot, I say! We got some of the best blades right out of the furnace!

Name: Little Kid
Line: Alright, alright, alright! I know!On the side of the mountain, right there in your face is Da-chao!I hear you can climb to the top, but since it's dangerous I'd be mighty careful if I were you!Why Da-chao? Alright, alright, alright! I don't know!

Name: Gorky
Line: Freeze!Miss Yuffie! You cannot go on to the second floor until you defeat me!

Name: Gorky
Line: Oh, Miss Yuffie! Will you be climbing the pagoda today?

Name: Yuffie
Line: - Yeah, that's it- No way!

Name: Gorky
Line: Then I, Sacred Gorky, will be your opponent on the first floor!

Name: Shake
Line: Yo! They call me Shake! I'll be watchin' your fight with Gorky!

Name: Gorky
Line: Then, begin!Power Change!

Name: Gorky
Line: Winning Miss Yuffie's heart must mean you have tremendous skill.

Name: Shake
Line: You aren't good enough to be here! This is the Wutai Temple of Martial Arts!

Name: Shake
Line: Hey, you there! Don't ignore me!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Who's next?

Name: Shake
Line: Are you blind? I'm right here!

Name: Yuffie
Line: What? I gotta fight a punk?

Name: Shake
Line: Heh! Punk. I'm more of an adult than some bimbo girl!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Wh, what did you say!?

Name: Shake
Line: See what I mean? That kind of anger's what makes you so immature!Don't pat yourself on the back until you beat me!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Now watch...!

Name: Shake
Line: 'bout the only thing you do really good is breathe! Sure you're brave enough to fight!

Name: Yuffie
Line: - Stop yappin'!- I'll forgive you

Name: Chekhov
Line: So, I guess it's time for Chekhov to stand in...

Name: Shake
Line: Here I go, brat! Speed Change!

Name: Shake
Line: Compared to me, all of you are nothin' but a buncha babies.

Name: Chekhov
Line: That being the case, we have nothing further to discuss.

Name: Chekhov
Line: How dare they mock us like that, thinking they could sneak past us.

Name: Staniv
Line: So even Shake's been defeated. It's been a while since you had to fight, Chekhov.

Name: Chekhov
Line: Unfortunately, this is as far as it goes. Staniv, you watch over there.

Name: Yuffie
Line: That ain't going to happen! I'll teach you about the strength of youth!

Name: Chekhov
Line: Keep mouthing off like that, little girl, and you're going to get burned.

Name: Yuffie
Line: - I got insurance- Let's get this over with, old bag

Name: Chekhov
Line: Managing that girl must be exceedingly rough on you.

Name: Staniv
Line: If it were not for Miss Yuffie, I wouldn't be facing him...

Name: Staniv
Line: HAAAAH!

Name: Staniv
Line: The rule is the best fighter on each floor will be your opponent... Although it's a five-storied pagoda, the fourth floor is the highest...In other words, no one has ever defeated me--Master of Weaponry!You still want to try...?

Name: Yuffie
Line: - Just come on!!- I'll pass!

Name: Gorky
Line: Splendid! Your level and skills have improved...

Name: Shake
Line: Oh, ho! You might not be as much of a child as we thought you were!

Name: Chekhov
Line: Of course. If WE lost to her...

Name: Staniv
Line: You have defeated four of our best, but now you will have to face HIM......!

Name: Godo
Line: ...Hm. You can do it......

Name: Yuffie
Line: D, ...Dad!?

Name: Godo
Line: I'm glad you made it this far, Yuffie!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Why, why are you......

Name: Godo
Line: I'll answer you by having you try your skills against me!Hold nothing back. Come as if you're trying to kill me! If you don't... then I'll have to kill you!

Name: Yuffie
Line: H... hey!

Name: Godo
Line: What are you doing! OMNI-Change! ......!!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Dammit......

Name: Godo
Line: Ohhh! And what was that!? Come back when you get more training!

Name: Yuffie
Line: I'll show you this time, you old Fart-meister!

Name: Godo
Line: Hmm? A slight improvement.Come at me with all you have! OMNI-Change! ......!!

Name: Yuffie
Line: ...heave...... heave...

Name: Yuffie
Line: O... old coot... n...... ot... bad...

Name: Godo
Line: You've...... also...... improved...

Name: Yuffie
Line: Hah... Ha, ha......

Name: Yuffie
Line: Ha ha haaaaaa......!

Name: Godo
Line: Waha haaaaa......!

Name: Godo
Line: It's time I gave this to you, Yuffie...This is Leviathan Materia. Take it.

Name: Staniv
Line: But, Lord Godo. The Leviathan Materia should only be given to the person who conquers and takes over this Pagoda. That is our custom...

Name: Yuffie
Line: CUSTOM, CUSTOM, CUSTOM... I'm so sick of hearing that!It's so stupid!

Name: Gorky
Line: Silence, Miss Yuffie!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Then what 'bout the rest of you? You have all that power...Are you satisfied being cooped up in this tower?

Name: Godo
Line: Yuffie...!

Name: Yuffie
Line: You too, dad...! Just because you lost the war!And turning Wutai into a place like this!

Name: Chekhov
Line: ...What do you want to say?

Name: Yuffie
Line: You turned Wutai into a cheesy resort town peddling to tourists...How dare you!? Da-chao Statue and Leviathan are ashamed!!

Name: Shake
Line: She IS a kid.

Name: Yuffie
Line: Wh, what did you say...!?

Name: Godo
Line: Yuffie!!Forgive me... It's all my fault...

Name: Gorky
Line: What are you saying, Lord Godo!

Name: Godo
Line: Losing the war... turning Wutai into this. It was all my fault...

Name: Chekhov
Line: Lord Godo!

Name: Godo
Line: Silence!!Yuffie......I am the same now as I was before when I wanted the war.But, after I lost the war, I began to think...Is strength, only for defeating the enemy?...or just something to show-off to others...?Might begets might.That's the same way as the Shinra...

Name: Godo
Line: I knew you were looking for Materia for the good of Wutai.But, the reason I hide my strength now, is also for the good of Wutai...And now, I realize both are necessary...Strength without determination means nothing. And determination without strength is equally useless...!

Name: Staniv
Line: Lord Godo...

Name: Godo
Line: You there, please take Yuffie with you!I perceive that you all have both determination and strength!

Name: Cloud
Line: All right, I don't mind.

Name: Godo
Line: Go, Yuffie!For the sake of strengthening Wutai!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Dad...

Name: Godo
Line: I'll take care of the Five Sacred Gods until you return!Go! And come back alive!

Name: Yuffie
Line: ......Of course!

Name: Godo
Line: Yuffie, wait a minute.The Materia they all have...After their battle is over, you think they'll still want it?

Name: Yuffie
Line: Dad...!

Name: Godo
Line: Go! Survive till the end! And return!With the Materia!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Heh, heh... you bet!

Name: Godo
Line: Go! Survive to the end! And return to us!Mat-...Take care of the Materia!!

Name: Staniv
Line: Miss Yuffie. Your feelings for Wutai are the same as Lord Godo's. Always remember that...

Name: Chekhov
Line: Fight so that you never bring shame on Wutai.

Name: Shake
