Line: You say there's some unusual materia where the underground pipe is!?But, first you gotta get if from a monster and unless you use your head. You won't be able to do it.

Name: Gorky
Line: Miss Yuffie. We pray for your success!

Name: Choco Bill
Line: Welcome.How 'bout a Chocobo Lure materia?Each level it increases, makes it easier for you to find a Chocobo.

Name: Old Man
Line: You've already fought x times... ......zzzzz....... zzzzzzzz......Come on. You already escaped x times. ......zzz...... zzzzzzzzz......Large materia needs high level materia............ zzzzzz...... zzzzzzzz......

Name: Old Man
Line: What're you groping around for!..................zzzzz......... zzz.......

Name: Old Man
Line: Who're you?Hmph. I guess it was fate that I woke up and met you. Here!

Name: Fisherman
Line: There's a dolphin in the bay. If you get close enough and blow the whistle, it might come to you.If you want to get on the ship, why not have the dolphin take you?

Name: Priscilla
Line: No... that tickles...No... Stop......Mr. Dolphin......

Name: Elevator Guard
Line: If you want to get on the elevator that badly, give me 10 gil!

Name: Cloud
Line: - Okay, I guess- No way!

Name: Soldier
Line: All I wanted was to become a pilot! It used to leave me speechless watching the Highwind in the sunset!

Name: Soldiers Practicing Victory Poses
Line: Someday I'll get to use my special pose in a real battle!Same here!! I'll keep practicing until then!

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: Hey! Yo! You want weapons?

Name: Bald Black Man
Line: It just isn't a party without Rude!

Name: Commander
Line: Hey!! Stay out of the way!

Name: Soldier
Line: Ever since I was late to that parade, they've been on my back everyday with basic training.I can't handle it anymore!

Name: Commander
Line: Hey! Stop yappin'!

Name: Soldier Studying
Line: Ugh... My eyes are tired... No, this is the time for me to really buckle down!Until I become SOLDIER First Class.

Name: Soldiers Sleeping
Line: ZZZZZ......Grrrrgh--- ---Grrrgh

Name: Soldiers
Line: You can't pass.

Name: Commander
Line: Hey!! Civilian!! Stay out of our training!!Go around them! And stay out of their way!!

Name: Elevator Attendant
Line: ...gulp... Going do---wn.This floor is the Submarine Dock...Those of you visiting the Underwater Reactor, please proceed through the connecting tunnel....gulp... We're here...

Name: Soldier
Line: Only authorized personnel are allowed past this point!You know too, right? About Junon Navy's important classified information.A new submarine has almost been completed using Shinra's top technology.A new version of submarine. I'll be sailing on it. Man, I can't wait!

Name: Soldier 2
Line: Man...... It's so boring keeping watch at the Underwater Reactor.

Name: Elevator Attendant
Line: ...gulp... Going u---p.Returning to Junon....gulp... We're here...

Name: Bartender
Line: I'm sorry. The bar is only for Shinra employees.

Name: Soldier
Line: I'm a good lookin' man once I take my uniform off.

Name: Soldier 2
Line: Mommy... My mommy...

Name: Soldier 3
Line: Booze, booze! Ain't nothing like booze during working hours.

Name: Innkeeper
Line: Welcome to the 'Inn'd of the line' in Junon. Wait, I shouldn't be sayin' stuff like that.Wanna spend the night?- 30 gil- Forget it

Name: Soldier
Line: These barracks are for soldiers. This is no place for civilians.

Name: Sailor
Line: How 'bout a ship taxi? Only in Junon!Free to Air Force personnel!

Name: Cloud
Line: - Sure, call 'em- Nope

Name: Soldier outside Cargo Ship
Line: Lately it seems like the economy's been better. Must be the 'Rufus' effect.Cargo ships are always coming and going from Costa del Sol.Now I'll overlook the fact that you're a stowaway, but you better at least help with the cargo.

Name: Man Near Sea Plane
Line: Hey, who're you? You look like you've been around the world twice.I don't know what your story is, but hang in there.

Name: Woman Lounging on Sea Plane
Line: Today's a great day for a nap in the sun. It always puts me in a good mood!

Name: Sailor
Line: Thinking of being stowaways?It's 100 gil to Junon. Give it to me, and I'll put in a good word with the captain.What'll we do?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Pay up- Don't do it

Name: Sailor Running Around
Line: Ever since Rufus complimented him, he ran around for a while, And we haven't heard a peep from him since...

Name: Women Walking Around
Line: Why's that!?Not yet!!Eaghhh!It's your fault!What's wrong with you!?You wanna go!?Whew!!!

Name: Little Girl
Line: It hurts when you kick me with your bare feet!

Name: Johnny
Line: Heh, heh, heh!...... My woman and me are getting along pretty good.But I'm such a pitiful waste......

Name: Johnny
Line: ...sigh...... I'm not good enough for her. What I should do?

Name: Man
Line: Always the same story... Women never pay any attention to me...

Name: Woman
Line: If this is your idea of flirting... forget it. I do fine as it is.

Name: Woman 2
Line: The sea, the wind and the sun. Don't you just love the outdoors? It always puts me back on track.

Name: Woman 3
Line: Hey, good timing. Would you mind putting lotion on me?

Name: Cloud
Line: - With pleasure- Sorry

Name: Cloud
Line: ...No one's here. We'll come back later.

Name: Weapon Seller
Line: Huh? Oh another customer. You sure picked an out of the way place but...But if it's the "Keystone" you're looking for, you're too late. Don't have it.

Name: Cloud
Line: Keystone?

Name: Weapon Seller
Line: What? You didn't come here for that?The "Keystone" is the key that unlocks the gate to a very old temple somewhere.You're not going to believe your ears,But I heard it was the Temple of the Ancients!!

Name: Cloud
Line: The Temple of the Ancients...

Name: Weapon Seller
Line: Kya, hah hah hah...Don't take it seriously. It's just a legend!Huh? What?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Where is this "Keystone"?- Where is the Temple?- Let's change the subject- Never mind

Name: Weapon Seller
Line: Hey, don't just come bargin' in here!

Name: Weapon Seller
Line: What? You want to rest?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yep- Nope

Name: Weapon Seller
Line: Oh all right. You can use that bed.

Name: Gatekeeper
Line: Welcome to Cosmo Canyon. Make yourselves at home.

Name: Kid near the Cosmo Candle
Line: Nanaki, are you leaving again? We want you to stay here forever...

Name: Innkeeper
Line: Welcome to 'Shildra Inn' As long as there are guests, our lights will always be on.It is 100 Gil a night. Would you like to stay?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. You people.Where is Nanaki? I hope he's not bothering you.

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Would you like something to drink?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Let me hear your story

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Y'know, I heard Rufus rushed back to headquarters in Midgar...

Name: Man at Table
Line: How long's that guy gonna be in the bathroom? I need to go too...

Name: Redhead
Line: Oh, it's you? I heard you and the Captain really made a BANG!I also heard that Rufus was so pissed off he went on a rampage and that no one's been able to get near him!

Name: Mechanic
Line: I heard Tiny Bronco broke...That sucks. I was secretly eyeing that thing. Broke, huh? What a drag.

Name: Old Man
Line: Because those Shinra creeps locked us up in our houses, we couldn't even watch the rocket lift off.I never thought that my only hobby would be destroyed by that arrogant young Rufus...!

Name: Shera
Line: I'll take care of everything at home. But please take care of the Captain.

Name: Excavator
Line: Welcome to Bone Village, a town for nature lovers.What do you want?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Have you seen Sephiroth?- What are you doing?

Name: Man
Line: A buncha guys called Turks came here sayin' they'd pay 10000 gil for some rock called a 'Keystone'.When I asked how much they'd pay for a regular rock just layin' around here, they slapped me upside my damn head!!

Name: Man 2
Line: I'll never understand the rich. I heard some guy named Dio at the Gold Saucer is collectin' rocks!

Name: Fortune Telling Machine
Line: (at Wonder Square)What you are looking for is near.

Name: Man
Line: I heard that this is the curator's favorite attraction. He likes it so much that he even has his collection displayed in the arena.

Name: Woman
Line: Are you here for the battle, too?

Name: Cloud
Line: - That's the idea- Not interested

Name: Black-haired Man
Line: Crap! I still don't have enough points.Mmm? You're new here, aren't you? Then, you want an explanation of the Battle Arena?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- Not interested

Name: Black-haired Man
Line: You fight here and collect battle points. You can then exchange those points for prizes.The Battle Game... even though it's a game you still use all your physical abilities. To participate, go to the front and pay yer GP's.You can fight in up to eight battles. The more you win, the more battle points you get.But, if you lose, you lose all your points. So it's up to you whether or not to fight after each win.They also make it harder by givin' out handicaps.They decide what handicaps there'll be, and you won't know what you're up against until the battle.Oh yeah, once you leave the Battle area, all your battle points will become useless. So watch it.Oh, and one other thing. The maximum points you could get is 65000, no more. So if you get that many you should exchange them for something.

Name: Black-haired Man
Line: Hmm...So, uh, how've things been since then?

Name: Cloud
Line: - No sweat- They're going

Name: Large Man
Line: Maybe I could've made it a little further. It's so hard to know when to stop...Man, I knew I should've stopped. But it's so hard to stop...

Name: Man Practicing Kicks
Line: I'm not going to lose this time!All right, it should be my turn comin' up here soon.

Name: Registration Lady
Line: Hey, have you heard? Something awful happened!Two staff members and some Shinra soldiers were shot.The soldiers died instantly, but the staff survived.

Name: Barret
Line: Dyne......

Name: Registration Lady
Line: Register for battle? The registration fee is 10 GP.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Let's do it- Not interested

Name: Registration Lady
Line: This is a one-on-one battle. Which one of you will participate?

Name: Points Machine
Line: Welcome. You currently have X battle points.Would you like to exchange them?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- No, thanks

Name: Points Machine
Line: Thank you very much. Please remember, your battle points become invalid once you leave the Battle Arena.

Name: Staff Person
Line: Whenever you come to the Gold Saucer, I recommend you visit the owner's museum at least once.

Name: Item Plaques
Line: "Star Cup""Weekend Clock""Laugh Sapling""Slayer's Pot""Chisa's Mask""Dio's Portrait""D Type Equipment""Zauger's Cup""Calling Gourd"

Name: Cloud
Line: It's the Keystone...

Name: Dio
Line: Heh, heh, heh. Long time no see, my boy. Hmm? You like that, huh?

Name: Cloud
Line: Can you let me borrow this?

Name: Dio
Line: Heh, heh, heh. Sorry, but it's not for rent.Hmm.Since you've been good to me in the past, I CAN let you have it on one condition.

Name: Cloud
Line: One condition?

Name: Dio
Line: Heh, heh, heh. Entertain me!

Name: Cloud
Line: - What'd you want me to do?- Not in the mood

Name: Dio
Line: Well then, we shall meet again! Heh, heh, heh.

Name: Staff
Line: Excuse me, sir.I'm sorry. The Tram is out of order right now.

Name: Staff
Line: I'm really sorry!I'm afraid you won't be able to leave until it's fully repaired.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Too bad. It happens, though.I know! Let's stay at the hotel! They know me here. I'll go talk to them.

Name: Staff
Line: I will let you know once the repairs are completed.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: We don't usually get the chance to be together like this, huh?Cloud, how 'bout it? Can you tell us what's happened so far?I don't really know what's goin' on because I wasn't here in the beginning.

Name: Cid
Line: Yeah! I'm all for it!

Name: Vincent
Line: Good idea.

Name: Barret
Line: I been here since the beginnin', an' I still don't know what the hell's goin' on either.Cloud, the hell's goin' on? C'mon, tell us!

Name: Cloud
Line: - I'm tired...- All right, I'll give it a shot...

Name: Cloud
Line: Phew...We are going after Sephiroth.Sephiroth must be in search of the Promised Land.

Name: Cid
Line: The Promised Land?

Name: Cloud
Line: A land full of Mako energy. ...or at least that's what the Shinra believe.I don't know if it actually exists.

Name: Aeris
Line: The Cetras return to the Promised Land. A land that promises boundless happiness.

Name: Barret
Line: Cetra? That some kinda disease?

Name: Aeris
Line: That's what the Ancients call themselves.Hey, didn't you listen to the elders at Cosmo Canyon?

Name: Aeris
Line: ...You don't 'know' where the Promised Land of the Ancients is.You search and travel, until you feel it. Like you just know, '...this is the Promised Land.'

Name: Cloud
Line: Aeris... can you feel it too?

Name: Aeris
Line: I think so.

Name: Tifa
Line: So Sephiroth is traveling the world because he's searching for the Promised Land? Is that it?

Name: Aeris
Line: That, and one other thing he's searching for.

Name: Cloud
Line: The Black Materia...

Name: Cait Sith
Line: I heard from Dio that a man in a Black Cape was lookin' for the Black Materia.

Name: Tifa
Line: I don't even know what the Black Cape is...How many men with Black Capes and number tattoos are there?

Name: Nanaki
Line: ...you know, of course... My tattoo is number 13.

Name: Cloud
Line: How did you get that tattoo?

Name: Nanaki
Line: ...Hojo put it on me. Everything else is just war scars, but the number was done by Hojo.

Name: Tifa
Line: So there are at least 13!?

Name: Aeris
Line: ...You know......I think Hojo did something to those men in the Black Capes.But I don't know what it has to do with Sephiroth though...That's why I think we should just go after Sephiroth himself.

Name: Barret
Line: Yeah, me too! It's all just too damn confusin'.

Name: Aeris
Line: And...I'm sorry, forget it!I think I'm tired. I'm going to bed now.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: What was that, all of a sudden!?

Name: Yuffie
Line: What!? That's it? I'm goin' to bed!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Is that all? How 'bout the Black Materia?

Name: Cloud
Line: You wouldn't understand even if I told you.

Name: Barret
Line: Now all we gotta do is take action! We're startin' tomorrow!!

Name: Nanaki
Line: Cloud...I'm number 13. Am I going to go mad too?

Name: Tifa
Line: I don't know what Hojo did to you, but you've been all right so far, right?

Name: Nanaki
Line: But...

Name: Tifa
Line: Be strong.

Name: Nanaki
Line: But, I...

Name: Tifa
Line: Stop it, Nanaki! Be strong!

Name: Cloud
Line: Tifa?

Name: Tifa
Line: You're not the only one who's worried!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: I don't know what's goin' on, but we're in a bad situation...

Name: Vincent
Line: Hey Cid, let's go back to our rooms.

Name: Cid
Line: ...zzzz... zzzz...

Name: Aeris
Line: Hee, hee!

Name: Cloud
Line: What's wrong?

Name: Aeris
Line: You want to go on a date?

Name: Cloud
Line: What?

Name: Aeris
Line: A DA-TE! Or haven't you ever gone on one?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Don't take me for a fool- Well, not a real one...

Name: Aeris
Line: Oh well, come on let's go...

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey!

Name: Man
Line: Tonight's Enchantment Night! All the attractions are free.How 'bout it you two? There's going to be an entertaining show in Event Square!

Name: Aeris
Line: Come on, let's go.

Name: Man
Line: Congratulations!!You are our 100th couple today!!You two will be the leads in tonight's show!!!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Wha?

Name: Man
Line: Oh, now, it's not hard. Just play it however you want to and the rest of the cast will cover up for you.Come this way.

Name: Cloud
Line: H, hey!

Name: Aeris
Line: This sounds like fun. Come on Cloud, let's do it.

Name: Narrator
Line: Long, long ago...An evil shadow appeared over the peaceful kingdom of Galdia...Princess Rosa was just kidnapped by the Evil Dragon King, Valvados. What will become of her?Just then, the legendary hero, Alfred, appears!!

Name: Knight
Line: Oh...... You must be the legendary hero...Alfred!

Name: Knight
Line: Hey, it's your line.

Name: Knight
Line: Yeah, you.Ahem!Oh...... You must be the legendary hero... Alfred!I know in my soul. Please... please save Princess Rosa!Now......Please talk... to the King......!!

Name: King
Line: Oh...legendery hero, Alfred. You have come to save my beloved Rosa...Oh the peak of a dangerous mountain...dwells the Evil Dragon King, Valvados... who's kidnapped Princess Rosa...But... you can't beat the Evil Dragon King now! Talk to the one who can help you......Who will you talk to?

Name: Cloud
Line: - The knight- The wizard

Name: Aeris
Line: Oh, that was fun. Hey, let's go on the Gondola.

Name: Aeris
Line: Two, please.

Name: Woman at Ticket Booth
Line: Here you are, two tickets.Enjoy the sights of Gold Saucer.

Name: Aeris
Line: Wow, how nice.Oh! Look, Cloud.It's so pretty.

Name: Aeris
Line: I want to meet you.

Name: Cloud
Line: But I'm right here.

Name: Aeris
Line: (I know, I know...what I mean is...)I want to meet...you.

Name: Aeris
Line: I had fun tonight. Let's go together again.You don't like being with me?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- That's not it

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud...

Name: Cloud
Line: What's wrong?

Name: Tifa
Line: ......I thought about what I was going to say, but, it's kinda embarrassing...Hey, Cloud!Why don't the two of us sneak out of here and spend some time together?

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey.

Name: Man
Line: Tonight's Enchantment Night! All the attractions are free.How 'bout it you two? There's going to be an entertaining show in Event Square!

Name: Tifa
Line: Come on, let's go.

Name: Man
Line: Congratulations!!You are our 100th couple today!!You two will be the leads in tonight's show!!!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Wha?

Name: Man
Line: Oh, now, it's not hard. Just play it however you want to and the rest of the cast will cover up for you.Come this way.

Name: Cloud
Line: H, hey!

Name: Tifa
Line: Sounds like fun. Come on Cloud, let's give it a try.

Name: Narrator
Line: Long, long ago...An evil shadow appeared over the peaceful kingdom of Galdia...Princess Rosa was just kidnapped by the Evil Dragon King, Valvados. What will become of her?Just then, the legendary hero, Alfred, appears!!

Name: Knight
Line: Oh...... You must be the legendary hero...Alfred!

Name: Knight
Line: Hey, it's your line.

Name: Knight
Line: Yeah, you.Ahem!Oh...... You must be the legendary hero... Alfred!I know in my soul. Please... please save Princess Rosa!Now......Please talk... to the King......!!

Name: King
Line: Oh...legendery hero, Alfred. You have come to save my beloved Rosa...Oh the peak of a dangerous mountain...dwells the Evil Dragon King, Valvados... who's kidnapped Princess Rosa...But... you can't beat the Evil Dragon King now! Talk to the one who can help you......Who will you talk to?

Name: Cloud
Line: - The knight- The wizard

Name: Tifa
Line: Hmm, that was funny. Hey, let's go on the Gondola next.

Name: Tifa
Line: Two, please.

Name: Woman at Ticket Booth
Line: Here you are, two tickets.Enjoy the sights of Gold Saucer.

Name: Tifa
Line: Oh, how pretty.Look, Cloud.Oh, Cloud.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...what?

Name: Tifa
Line: Aeris would be able to just come out and say it, probably.Cloud...?Sometimes being old friends is hard.I mean, timing is everything.

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah...

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud I really had fun tonight.

Name: Cloud
Line: By the way, What did you want to say a minute ago...?

Name: Tifa
Line: N, nothing!Nothing...

Name: Tifa
Line: Oh, look at the time. We should be getting back.

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: Yuffie
Line: Cloud you up?

Name: Cloud
Line: What's wrong?

Name: Yuffie
Line: Would you...... keep me company for a bit.

Name: Cloud
Line: ? Keep you company where?

Name: Yuffie
Line: Just come on.

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey.

Name: Man
Line: Tonight's Enchantment Night! All the attractions are free.How 'bout it you two? There's going to be an entertaining show in Event Square!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Cloud, let's go.

Name: Man
Line: Congratulations!!You are our 100th couple today!!You two will be the leads in tonight's show!!!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Wha?

Name: Man
Line: Oh, now, it's not hard. Just play it however you want to and the rest of the cast will cover up for you.Come this way.

Name: Cloud
Line: H, hey!

Name: Yuffie
Line: I don't know what it's all about but sounds kind of cool. Wanna try it, Cloud?

Name: Narrator
Line: Long, long ago...An evil shadow appeared over the peaceful kingdom of Galdia...Princess Rosa was just kidnapped by the Evil Dragon King, Valvados. What will become of her?Just then, the legendary hero, Alfred, appears!!

Name: Knight
Line: Oh...... You must be the legendary hero...Alfred!

Name: Knight
Line: Hey, it's your line.

Name: Knight
Line: Yeah, you.Ahem!Oh...... You must be the legendary hero... Alfred!I know in my soul. Please... please save Princess Rosa!Now......Please talk... to the King......!!

Name: King
Line: Oh...legendery hero, Alfred. You have come to save my beloved Rosa...Oh the peak of a dangerous mountain...dwells the Evil Dragon King, Valvados... who's kidnapped Princess Rosa...But... you can't beat the Evil Dragon King now! Talk to the one who can help you......Who will you talk to?

Name: Cloud
Line: - The knight- The wizard

Name: Yuffie
Line: I didn't get it. Cloud, let's go on the Gondola next.

Name: Yuffie
Line: There will be two of us.

Name: Woman at Ticket Booth
Line: Here you are, two tickets.Enjoy the sights of Gold Saucer.

Name: Yuffie
Line: (sitting backwards to lean out the window)Wow!Geez!!Cloud!

Name: Yuffie
Line: (scratching her head)I just felt like doing that.

Name: Yuffie
Line: That's all.

Name: Yuffie
Line: H, hey!! Say something, why don't you!!

Name: Yuffie
Line: ......gawd, I could just die.

Name: Yuffie
Line: Say something, PLEASE!

Name: Yuffie
Line: I'll think I'll sleep really well tonight.Thanks... for coming with me.

Name: Yuffie
Line: You wanna go back, Cloud?

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: Barret
Line: Yo, Cloud. You still up?

Name: Cloud
Line: What's wrong?

Name: Barret
Line: Uh, I was jes thinkin' of goin' for a walk...

Name: Cloud
Line: What, just the two of us?

Name: Barret
Line: What's wrong with that!? Don't gimme no lip!! I say we go!

Name: Man
Line: Tonight's Enchantment Night! All the attractions are free.How 'bout it you two? There's going to be an entertaining show in Event Square!

Name: Barret
Line: Cloud, wanna take a peek?

Name: Man
Line: Congratulations!!You are our 100th couple today...... Oh, wait...... no you're not...... Sorry.

Name: Barret
Line: Let's go somewhere where we can talk, in private.

Name: Barret
Line: Hey! You mean just the two of us are gettin' on...? ...yeah, I guess that's cool.

Name: Woman at Ticket Booth
Line: Here you are, two tickets.Enjoy the sights of Gold Saucer.

Name: Barret
Line: Hey foo. What you wanna see fireworks with me for?

Name: Cloud
Line: Not having fun?

Name: Barret
Line: You should've asked one or the other!

Name: Cloud
Line: Which would you have asked?

Name: Barret
Line: Oh man, there just ain't no choice!Tifa, Aeris.Ah, Yuffie?

Name: Cloud
Line: (hoo boy)

Name: Barret
Line: What the hell's that supposed to mean?Hey, you don't mean... Marlene?NO WAY! Forget it!There ain't no way I'm lettin' a wacko like you anywhere near my little Marlene!She's my baby. My prized possession.......Marlene.Wish I could've brought Marlene here. She'd love the fireworks.Why the hell do I gotta be here with a foo like you...Shit... the more I think 'bout it the madder I get!Damn fireworks anyways.

Name: Barret
Line: Oh man I'm beat. Let's head back.

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: Cloud
Line: !!Is that the... Keystone?Hey! Cait Sith!

Name: Lady at Entrance
Line: Sir, we can't have you doing that!

Name: Bystanders
Line: What?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Hey! Over here! The Keystone!

Name: Tseng
Line: Well done.

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: W, wait a second. I won't run or hide.Yes, I was a spy. I was hired by the Shinra.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: I couldn't help it.How 'bout if we continue like nothing ever happened?

Name: Cloud
Line: No way, cat! You gotta lot of guts acting like a friend but being a spy!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Then, what are you goin' to do? Kill me?You'd just be wastin' your time if you tried. This body's just a toy anyway.My real body's at Shinra Headquarters in Midgar. I'm controlin' this toy cat from there.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Whoa, I can't tell you my name.

Name: Cloud
Line: We're not gettin' anywhere.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: See? I told you! Talking won't do any good, so can't we just continue our journey?

Name: Cloud
Line: You think I'm jokin'!?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: ...Alright, yes, I am a Shinra employee.But we're not entirely enemies....Something bothers me. I think it's your way of life.You don't get paid. You don't get praised. Yet, you still risk your lives and continue on your journey. Seeing that makes me...It just makes me think about my life. I don't think I'd feel too good if things ended the way they are now.

Name: Cloud
Line: He'll never tell the truth. Once a spy, always a spy.We can't go on with someone like that. C'mon get real!!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: ...just as I thought. Talking won't make a bit of difference.But I prepared something in case this happened.Why don't you listen to this?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: ...So, you have to do as I say.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...you're the lowest...

Name: Cait Sith
Line: I didn't want to do this... using dirty tricks and taking hostages...But this is how it is... no compromises. So why don't we continue on as we did?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Well, we're stuck... We'll have to do what he says.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: What took you so long, Cloud?Oh yeah, about the Temple of the Ancients. I think if we take the Tiny Bronco East towards the sea, we should be able to find it.Well then, shall we get goin'? Who's gonna go?

Name: Aeris
Line: I want to go! I'm going for sure!

Name: Barret
Line: Yo! I'm goin' too, Cloud! Gotta keep movin'!!

Name: Tifa
Line: You know...... no, forget it. Let's go.

Name: Nanaki
Line: I'm so excited, my tail's starting to tingle. Let's go, Cloud!

Name: Yuffie
Line: I'm startin' to get nervous.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: The Temple of the Ancients is to the east. Shall we go?

Name: Vincent
Line: The Temple of the Ancients... This might be pretty interesting...

Name: Cid
Line: I don't care what's goin' on let's just go!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Then see you later.

Name: Fortune Telling Machine
Line: (at Wonder Square)What you search for is in the Southeast

Name: Aeris
Line: This is... the Temple of the Ancients...I... I know... I feel it... The knowledge of the Ancients... floating...You could become one with the Planet, but you're stopping it with the strength of will.For the future? For us?

Name: Cloud
Line: What are you saying? Do you understand?

Name: Aeris
Line: You're uneasy... But happy?Because I'm here? I'm sorry... I don't understand.

Name: Clone #9
Line: Key...... stone......Open... the door... of the Temple...

Name: Aeris
Line: Look......

Name: Aeris
Line: Hey! It's Tseng!

Name: Cloud
Line: Tseng? Of the Turks!?

Name: Tseng
Line: Uh... I've been had.It's not the Promised Land... Sephiroth's searching for...

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth? He's inside!?

Name: Tseng
Line: Look... for yourself...

Name: Aeris
Line: You're wrong.The Promised Land isn't like what you imagined.And, I'm not going to help.Either way, there was no way Shinra could have won.

Name: Tseng
Line: ...pretty harsh. Sounds like something... you'd say.

Name: Cloud
Line: You crying?

Name: Aeris
Line: ...Tseng's with our enemy, the Turks, but I've known him since we were little...There's not a lot of people I can say that about. In fact, there are probably only a handful of people in the world who really know me.

Name: Clone #9
Line: Black...... Materia......

Name: Tseng
Line: I am...... still alive...

Name: Cloud
Line: Let's put the Keystone in.

Name: Aeris
Line: Words... feelings... So many of them here.

Name: Aeris
Line: ...Cloud! I know it's going to be tough, but...Don't give up! We can do it!

Name: Cloud
Line: Sealed......? That sound brings back memories.

Name: Spirit Body
Line: Nyum... nyum...

Name: Aeris
Line: Whew! We finally caught up to you.I'm sorry. You waited for me.Those are the spirit bodies of the Ancients.They've been away from their Planet for a long time to protect this Temple.Over the many years, they've lost the ability to talk.Actually, they didn't need words from the beginning because there was only one objective for those left in the Temple.Please, talk to me!No good. I don't understand the rest. Are you afraid...?Is it because Sephiroth is in the Temple? Or something else?

Name: Aeris
Line: Phew--- We did it!

Name: Cloud
Line: Everyone all right? That sure took a lot out of us.

Name: Aeris
Line: Oh no... Cloud. Come quick!!Hurry, this way!

Name: Aeris
Line: It's full of the knowledge of the Ancients.No... not knowledge... consciousness... a living soul...It's trying to say something.I'm sorry, I don't understand.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...What's going on?

Name: Aeris
Line: Wait! Look! It's showing us!

Name: Aeris
Line: Did you see it?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Where is the room with the pictures on the walls?

Name: Aeris
Line: Almost there...

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth is here, right?No matter what he thinks, it's going to end here.I'm taking him out!

Name: Time Guardian
Line: I am the Time Guardian. Ye who seek the knowledge of the Ancients. I control the time, select your path....it is time... You may proceed.

Name: Aeris
Line: This atmosphere...

Name: Cloud
Line: I guess there's no way we can open it... We'll come back later.

Name: Aeris
Line: Hey! It's locked.No good. We have to catch it!You must be tired.

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- I want to go home

Name: Aeris
Line: This is the room with the murals...

Name: Cloud
Line: Where are you!? Sephiroth!!

Name: Sephiroth
Line: So cold.I am always by your side.Come.

Name: Cloud
Line: Looks like we're locked in.

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Splendid.A treasure house of knowledge...

Name: Cloud
Line: I don't understand what you're saying!

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Look well.

Name: Cloud
Line: At what!?

Name: Sephiroth
Line: At that which adds to the knowledge of...I am becoming one with the Planet.

Name: Aeris
Line: How do you intend to become one with the Planet?

Name: Sephiroth
Line: (swinging the Masamune)It's simple.Once the Planet is hurt, it gathers Spirit Energy to heal the injury.The amount of energy gathered depends on the size of the injury.

Name: Aeris
Line: An injury powerful enough to destroy the Planet?Injure... the Planet?

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Behold that mural. The Ultimate Destructive Magic... Meteor.

Name: Cloud
Line: That'll never happen!

Name: Cloud
Line: Where are you!? Sephiroth!!

Name: Aeris
Line: Wait, Cloud!

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Ha ha ha... Black Materia.Ha ha ha... Call Meteor.

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud!! Get a hold of yourself!

Name: Cloud
Line: Cloud...I'm... Cloud...How should I?

Name: Aeris
Line: ...Cloud.

Name: Cloud
Line: Mm? What's wrong? Is something wrong?

Name: Aeris
Line: ...It's nothing so don't worry about it.Right, Cloud! It's nothing.

Name: Aeris
Line: Sephiroth got away.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Don't worry about it. I understood what he was saying.So this must be Meteor, right?

Name: Aeris
Line: ...this must be magic. Just what Sephiroth was saying.The Ultimate Destructive Magic, Meteor.It finds small drifting planets with its magic.And then collides with them. This Planet might get wiped out entirely...

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth!?

Name: Cloud
Line: Any sign of Sephiroth?

Name: Aeris
Line: He disappeared.

Name: Cloud
Line: We're locked in.

Name: Cloud
Line: What is this?

Name: Aeris
Line: ...There's something written on it....B.l.a.c.k...... M.a.t.e.r.i.a.

Name: Cloud
Line: Black Materia!!

Name: Aeris
Line: Hey!...Black Materia.What should we do, Cloud?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Shake it- Take it- Leave it

Name: Aeris
Line: Wait a minute. I'll ask!

Name: Cloud
Line: What do they mean?

Name: Aeris
Line: So, this whole building is the Black Materia?

Name: Cloud
Line: This huge Temple? This is the Black Materia!?Then no one could take it.

Name: Aeris
Line: Hmm, it's pretty hard. You see this is a model of the Temple.And inside it is a device, which gets smaller each time you solve a puzzle.As the model becomes smaller, you become smaller too.Until it's small enough to fit in the palm of your hand.

Name: Cloud
Line: So, if we solve the puzzles, the Black Materia will get smaller and smaller and we can take it out?

Name: Aeris
Line: Yes, but there's one thing...You can only answer the puzzles inside the Temple.So, anyone who solves the puzzle will be crushed by the Temple.

Name: Cloud
Line: I see... the Ancients didn't want dangerous magic to be taken out of the Temple so easily...

Name: Cloud
Line: No. We've got to think of a way to get it out.Because Sephiroth has lots of different flunkies.It's nothing to him to throw their lives away to get the Black Materia.This place isn't safe.

Name: Aeris
Line: So what are we going to do?

Name: Cloud
Line: It's warm...This isn't good...

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud...... behind you.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Sorry to keep you waiting!! It's Me!!

Name: Aeris
Line: Cait Sith...Come on, Cloud... Say something.

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm not good at this.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Mmm, I understand. I feel the same too.

Name: Aeris
Line: Why don't you read our fortunes?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Say, that's right... I haven't done it in a while, huh?I'm so exited. Right or wrong, I'm still the same 'ol meNow, what should I predict?

Name: Aeris
Line: Hmm, let's see how compatible Cloud and I are!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: That'll cost ya. Exactly one date!Here I go!

Name: Aeris
Line: No! Tell me!I promise I won't get mad!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Is that so? Then I'll tell you.Looks good. You are perfect for each other!Aeris's star and Cloud's star! They show a great future!Cloud, I'll be your matchmaker, preacher... I'll do whatever you want me to!You just call me when it all happens!Thank you for believing in me, knowing that I was a spy.This is the final, final farewell!

Name: Aeris
Line: Be strong Cait Sith!!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: She told me to 'Be strong.' I feel so happy.

Name: Cloud
Line: That's the Black Materia...

Name: Cloud
Line: As long as we have this, Sephiroth won't be able to use Meteor.

Name: Cloud
Line: Mmm?Can you guys use it?

Name: Aeris
Line: Nope, we can't use it right now. You need great spiritual power to use it.

Name: Cloud
Line: You mean lots of Spiritual energy?

Name: Aeris
Line: That's right.One person's power alone won't do it.Somewhere special. Where there's plenty of the Planet's energy...Oh yeah!The Promised Land!!

Name: Cloud
Line: The Promised Land!!No, but...

Name: Aeris
Line: Sephiroth is different. He's not an Ancient.

Name: Cloud
Line: He shouldn't be able to find the Promised Land.

Name: Sephiroth
Line: ...Ah, but I have.I'm far superior to the Ancients.I became a traveler of the Lifestream and gained the knowledge and wisdom of the Ancients.I also gained the knowledge and wisdom of those after the extinction of the Ancients.And soon, I will create the future.

Name: Aeris
Line: I won't let you do it! The future is not only yours!

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Ha, ha, ha... I wonder?Wake up!

Name: Cloud
Line: Sh... shut up!

Name: Cloud
Line: The... Noise...

Name: Sephiroth
Line: There, Cloud... good boy.

Name: Little Cloud
Line: No......!Don't be afraid--!

Name: Sephiroth
Line: ......Well done.

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud, are you all right?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...I gave the Black Materia to Sephiroth...?

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud... be strong, OK?

Name: Cloud
Line: Urrrrrrgh... What have I done!?

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud... you haven't done anything.It's not your fault.

Name: Little Cloud
Line: Waaaa~!!What are you doing!?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Oops! This looks like I came at a bad time!I'm Cait Sith No. 2. Right pleased to meet you all!

Name: Cloud
Line: Everything is white...What did I do? I don't remember anything...My memory... since when...? If everything's a dream, don't wake me.

Name: Aeris
Line: Cloud, can you hear me?

Name: Aeris
Line: Don't worry about it.

Name: Aeris
Line: Oh...Then, why don't you REALLY worry about it?And let me handle Sephiroth.

Name: Cloud
Line: What is this place?

Name: Aeris
Line: This forest leads to the City of the Ancients... and is called the Sleeping Forest.It's only a matter of time before Sephiroth uses Meteor.That's why I'm going to protect it. Only a survivor of the Cetra, like me, can do it.

Name: Cloud
Line: Aeris?

Name: Barret
Line: You look like you was havin' a nightmare.How are you feeling?

Name: Cloud
Line: - I seem to be OK- Not good- Don't really know

Name: Tifa
Line: You know, Cloud. Aeris is gone.

Name: Barret
Line: Everyone's out looking for Aeris.

Name: Cloud
Line: ......City of the Ancients. Aeris is headed there.

Name: Barret
Line: By herself!? Why did she go by herself!?Hey, we're goin' too.

Name: Cloud
Line: Only the Ancients, only Aeris can save us from Meteor...

Name: Tifa
Line: Then we must go. What'll we do if something happens to Aeris? If Sephiroth finds her, she's in trouble.

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth... already knows.

Name: Barret
Line: Hey! Why are you still sittin' around?

Name: Tifa
Line: Let's go, Cloud.

Name: Cloud
Line: No.

Name: Barret
Line: Yeah, godammit! It's 'cuz of you that Sephiroth got the Black Materia in the first place. It's your damn fault!

Name: Cloud
Line: My fault?

Name: Barret
Line: I know you got problems... hell, we all do. But you don't even understand yourself.But you gotta understand that there ain't no gettin' offa this train we're on, till we get to the end of the line.

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud, we came this far... Aren't you going to settle up with Sephiroth?

Name: Cloud
Line: (shaking his head)No...I'm afraid.If this keeps up, I may go crazy!I'm afraid...

Name: Barret
Line: Just a damn jackass, that's what you are...Yo, jes' think about it... How many people in this world do ya think really understand themselves?People get depressed in life because they don't know what's up.But, they go on living. They don't run away... Isn't that how it is?

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud... you'll come with us, right? I believe in you.

Name: Cloud
Line: What... am I supposed to do?Pull out of here?Pull out? ...To where?

Name: Tifa
Line: (from the next room)Cloud...

Name: Barret
Line: Wait a minute, Tifa. Give him a little time.He has to decide this on his own.You believe in Cloud... right?

Name: Cloud
Line: ......I'm afraid to find out the truth...? But...... why?

Name: Innkeeper
Line: You awake?Those people were so worried that they stayed by your side until you woke up.You sure do have good friends.

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud...

Name: Barret
Line: Hey, how are you?I just wanna know, which is it gonna be?You wanna find out about yourself? Or are you afraid to find out?Either way, you stay around here and about all you can do is worry about it.Even if you do go nuts again when you see Sephiroth... If it happens, it happens.I'll go upside your spikey white head and bring you back to normal!

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud, it'll be all right. We're all with you.

Name: Cloud
Line: But...

Name: Barret
Line: If it happens, it happens. Don't worry 'bout it.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...You're... right. ......He's right, isn't he?

Name: Tifa
Line: Come on, let's go and find Aeris...?

Name: Excavator
Line: Welcome to Bone Village, a town for nature lovers.What do you want?
section: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Name: Cloud
Line: - Where is the City of the Ancients?- Do you know where Aeris is?- What are you doing?
section: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Name: Excavator 2
Line: Excavating is a slow process. The treasures we excavate are stored in the box next to the tent. Remember that.
section: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Name: Excavator 3
Line: You can awaken the Sleeping Forest if you have the Lunar Harp.Once awake, they say the forest will open a road for you.The girl in pink that just went in also used a Lunar Harp to get through.
section: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Name: Cloud
Line: - I want a Lunar Harp
section: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Name: Excavator 3
Line: Ask the guy in the tent below.
section: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Name: Excavator 4
Line: We use the newest system to find buried treasure. We simulate earthquakes by using bombs, and then check the sound waves given off by the tremors.
section: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Name: Excavator near Forest
Line: The forest just beyond here is called the Sleeping Forest. Right now the forest is asleep and anyone who wanders in while it's asleep, it confuses. You can go in, but you may never come out...But just now, a girl in pink and a man in a Black Cape went in. You think they'll be all right?
section: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Name: Head Excavator
Line: The Lunar Harp is somewhere in the ground here. We could excavate it for you if you want us to.
section: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Name: Cloud
Line: - Start diggin'
section: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Name: Head Excavator
Line: It's not just the Lunar Harp you're after. What else are you having us dig for?
section: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Name: Cloud
Line: - Lunar Harp- Good treasure- Normal treasure
section: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Name: Head Excavator
Line: All right! Then I'll lend you some of my staff. Show us where you want us to dig!
section: Bone Village - A Town of Excavators

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Ugh....Words of the Ancients?...no good. I can't understand....Ugh, again?This stream of consciousness... Could this be the words of the Ancients...?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: I feel it...
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: Aeris is here....and so is Sephiroth.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: ...it's not an excuse. I feel it in my soul.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: ...right. Let's hurry and find Aeris.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: Aeris's voice...... Coming from there?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: Aeris?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: All
Line: Cloud!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: Ugh... what are you making me do.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Aeris.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Sephiroth
Line: (arms raised)Do not worry. Soon the girl will become part of the Planet's energy.All that is left is to go North. The 'Promised Land' waits for me over the snowy fields.There, I will become a new being by uniting with the planet. As will this girl......
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Shut up.The cycle of nature and your stupid plan don't mean a thing.Aeris is gone.Aeris will no longer talk, no longer laugh, cry...... or get angry......What about us...... what are WE supposed to do?What about my pain?My fingers are tingling.My mouth is dry.My eyes are burning!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Sephiroth
Line: What are you saying? Are you trying to tell me you have feelings too?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: Of course! Who do you think I am!?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Ha, ha, ha...... Stop acting as if you were sad.There's no need to act as though you're angry either.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: Everyone, listen to me.I'm Cloud, ex-SOLDIER, born in Nibelheim.I came to settle up with Sephiroth.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: I came here by my own free will... Or so I thought.However......To tell the truth, I'm afraid of myself....There is a part of me that I don't understand.That part that made me give the Black Materia to Sephiroth.If you hadn't stopped me, Aeris might have been......There's something inside of me. A person who is not really me.That's why I should quit this journey.Before I do something terrible.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: I don't know how Aeris tried to save the planet from the Meteor.And I guess now, we'll never know.But!We still have a chance. We must get that Black Materia back before Sephiroth uses it.Let's go.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: ...ugh.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Cloud
Line: Hmmm...Sephiroth said to me... Head North............ past the Snow Fields......
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Sacrifice

Name: Girls Building a Snowman
Line: It's almost finished!Next time, I'm gonna make an even bigger one.

Name: Little Girl
Line: Grandpa, wake up! We have a customer!!

Name: Old Man
Line: ...smack... mff... Oh... welcome, glad you came.

Name: Old Man
Line: (on speaking to him again)You'll have a hard time selecting from all the good things we have!

Name: Old Woman in Rocking Chair
Line: My husband left 20 years ago and still hasn't come back.He should at least be at the foot of the Gaea Cliffs. It's marked with a check on the map...

Name: Young Woman
Line: Grandma, don't sleep so close to the fire!

Name: Old Woman in Rocking Chair
Line: I just get s-o comfortable.

Name: Young Woman
Line: The master is an experienced climber, you know.I've heard that he knows every corner of that Great Glacier!

Name: Man in Yard
Line: It's nearly impossible to reach the Northern limits without a map.If you're thinkin' 'bout going to the Northern limits, you'd better take that map on the wall.

Name: Black Surfer
Line: You heard about the gnarly hill in this town? They tell me it's off limits!

Name: White Surfer
Line: What luck! We came all this way... crap!

Name: Woman
Line: We came from Costa del Sol to snowboard, but we're just about to leave!

Name: Man by Furnace
Line: Phew, what is it? Don't get too close, or it'll burn ya.

Name: Innkeeper
Line: It's colder than usual today...It's 200 gil, you wanna spend the night?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yes- No

Name: Woman
Line: Welcome! You look like a STRONG one...If you want, I could lend you an ear...?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- Not interested

Name: Barkeeper
Line: I've heard there's a snow woman, at the Great Glacier, that hates hot springs...But I think it's just a myth to scare off visitors.

Name: Redhead
Line: I heard some guy went to the Great Glacier in the North.What an idiot. Is he thinkin' 'bout going to that hot spring?

Name: Blond Man
Line: He's probably gonna get lost in the glacier and freeze to death.No matter how well equipped he is, out there in that cold on the glacier, I give him two days at the most.

Name: Redhead 2
Line: You thinkin' of going North?

Name: Cloud
Line: - That's my plan- No

Name: Man
Line: Do you know what a Cetra is?

Name: Man 2
Line: What was the Cetra......? Oh yeah, it's the same as the Ancients, right?

Name: Man
Line: Yeah, a Cetra lived in this town a long time ago.Her name was Ifalna, and she knew about a lot of things...

Name: Man 2
Line: Whadaya mean?

Name: Man
Line: I heard she was abducted by the Shinra and was taken somewhere.

Name: Man 2
Line: Shinra and the Ancients... I smell somethin' fishy...

Name: Man in Bathroom
Line: WHAT YOU LOOKIN' AT!?You're a real freakazoid, aren't you?

Name: Woman in Bathroom
Line: (later)Eyaaaaaaaaaah!!!

Name: Man in Thicket
Line: No, don't!! It's a steep downgrade, past here.It's dangerous, please don't go!

Name: Cloud
Line: - I'm still going- Thanks for your kindness

Name: Man in Thicket
Line: Do you want me to explain again?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yes, please- No thanks

Name: Elena
Line: There they are, hurry!!

Name: Soldiers
Line: Yes ma'am!!

Name: Elena
Line: Cloud... huff... wheeze.I won't let you go any further!

Name: Cloud
Line: What's down there?

Name: Elena
Line: It's a SE-CR-ET.It really doesn't matter! But you really got guts doin' my boss in like that!

Name: Cloud
Line: You mean Boss...... Tseng? That wasn't us. Sephiroth did it.

Name: Elena
Line: No! Don't think you can fool me, liar!

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm not lying... it was Sephiroth.

Name: Elena
Line: Don't try to act innocent. I'll never forget it!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Oh, man...

Name: Elena
Line: Looks like talking alone won't cut it. You're going to have to feel some pain!

Name: Soldier
Line: Just you... and me!!

Name: Elena
Line: No, I can handle him! There's no way he can avoid my punch.

Name: Soldier
Line: What? Yeah......

Name: Soldiers
Line: This village is now under martial law!

Name: Cloud
Line: - (Do what you're told)- (Kick his butt)

Name: Girl Sledding
Line: Who is that man?

Name: Man on Roof of Small House
Line: When I first moved here, I saw a man with a Black Cape heading North.It seemed strange seeing a Black Cape against the snowy white.

Name: Woman
Line: My boy got hurt right about the time we moved here...I never should've bought him a snowboard.

Name: Boy
Line: ......whimper...... weep...I got hurt on my snowboard, and now I can't go out for a while...Hey, I'll give you my snowboard.

Name: Boy
Line: Tell me when you get good at it.

Name: Man in Thicket
Line: Sorry I just took off a while ago... It looked like there was going to be trouble.Anyhow, you'll need a snowboard to get down that hill. Want me to teach you how to ride one?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah, maybe you should- No, not interested

Name: Man in Thicket
Line: Do you want me to explain again?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yes, please- No thanks

Name: Man in Thicket
Line: Be careful!

Name: Cloud
Line: Ugh...

Name: Cloud
Line: So where did we land?

Name: Cloud
Line: It sure is cold. We'll freeze if we stay here any longer.

Name: Cloud
Line: Looks like trouble.- We're outta here!- Wait a minute!

Name: Woman in Blue
Line: ...Please leave.Please don't worry about me.Now, I don't want to harm any of you.And don't come back again.Please stop it.Please, that is enough.

Name: Cloud
Line: This is the only place not frozen.- Touch it- Let's go on

Name: Cloud
Line: Hmm, a hot spring.

Name: Woman in Blue
Line: Yeeew... You got a lot of nerve trying to touch me with the same dirty hands that touched that filthy hot spring!I'll never forgive you.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Snow... as far as you can see... Better watch where I walk....I'll place a landmark, and start walking.

Name: Holzoff
Line: You ever hear about those who challenged the cliff?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- No

Name: Holzoff
Line: But, we weren't prepared for it. We did expect the temperature to be low but...On that cliff, there's always a biting cold wind. The cold air lowers your body temperature.Yamski, was below me. He cut his own rope......and I didn't even notice...Ever since then, I've settled here... continuing to challenge the cliff, and provide warning and shelter to my fellow climbers.If you're going to climb the cliff, there's 2 precautions you'll need to take.First, check your route... It's hard to find because of all the snow.Second, once you get to a ledge, make sure you warm yourselves up.Understand?

Name: Cloud
Line: - One more time- Yes

Name: Holzoff
Line: You must've used a lot of energy getting up here... Better get some rest before you head out.

Name: Holzoff
Line: To climb this cliff you must check your route.And you have to keep your body temperature normal. Don't forget these things.Like to rest a little?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Oh yeah- No, thanks

Name: Holzoff
Line: (if Cloud answers no)Don't over do it.

Name: Barret
Line: You know, I've been thinkin'...?

Name: Cloud
Line: - What is it?- Save it for later

Name: Barret
Line: ...Seein' a place like this, makes you realize how awesome nature is.But, if anyone ever told me to live here, I'd tell them to... you know...I'll tell you one thing though, If I did have to live here I'd change things around 'n' make it better.I guess the total opposite of this would be...... Midgar.When you think of it that way, Shinra don't seem so bad...Uuuuuuurrrrrgh!!What the hell am I sayin'!? The Shinra, not bad!?

Name: Cloud
Line: We'll secure the route. You come up later.

Name: Barret
Line: Y'know... standing here like this...Kinda makes you feel like the Planet's not on our side, don't it?Of course we can't even compete. I mean... The Planet don't even notice us humans...

Name: Tifa
Line: This blizzard's nothing! I gotta say that or... brr...

Name: Nanaki
Line: I wonder what's at the top of that cliff? Well we shall see...

Name: Yuffie
Line: Brrrr, I can't take this cold!!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: This is secret info, but... Rufus's going to arrive here, too.

Name: Vincent
Line: I wonder what's on the other side of the cliff...

Name: Cid
Line: Damn! If I could just get back in the air, this cliff would be nothing!

Name: Clone
Line: Ugh...... Errgaahh!!

Name: Cloud
Line: An old crater...Something fell out of the sky and crashed down here......Leaving a scar on the planet.

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth took that energy and is trying to use Meteor.Next time the wound won't be so small.

Name: Clone
Line: ...b, back... to... Sep...... i... roth...

Name: Rufus
Line: So, I finally found you.

Name: Scarlet
Line: Kyaa haa hah.Kyaa haa hah.haa hahhaa......... hahThis is incredible......

Name: Heidegger
Line: This is the Promised Land the President has been searching for!!

Name: Rufus
Line: But, I'll be the one who gets it.Sorry, old man.

Name: Hojo
Line: Heh heh heh......That land is no one's.It's where the Reunion will take place...... They will all gather here......I wonder if we'll see...... Sephiroth?

Name: Tifa
Line: We need to cross when the wind is calm, or we'll get swept off!

Name: Clones
Line: uph... Se... phi... roth...wh-... who---a

Name: Sephiroth
Line: This is the end... for all of you.

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth!!!This is the end!

Name: Sephiroth
Line: You're right. This is the end of this body's usefulness.

Name: Cloud
Line: He disappeared!?

Name: Tifa
Line: He might still be nearby......

Name: Cloud
Line: Our...?

Name: Cloud
Line: Master...!?

Name: Cloud
Line: Jenova's cells......hmm. So that's what this is all about.The Jenova Reunion...

Name: Tifa
Line: Not Sephiroth!? You mean all this time it wasn't Sephiroth we've been after?

Name: Cloud
Line: I'll explain later. Right now, the only thing I'm thinking about is beating Sephiroth.

Name: Tifa
Line: But Sephiroth is......

Name: Cloud
Line: He's here. The real Sephiroth is just beyond here.It's both incredibly wicked and cruel...But it's releasing a powerfully strong will from deep within this planet's wound.

Name: Tifa
Line: We'd better not take the Black Materia any further. Why don't you give it to someone else to hold on to?

Name: Yuffie
Line: I don't want anything to do with that Black Materia!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: No, not the Black materia, please.

Name: Vincent
Line: How about if you hold on to the Black Materia?

Name: Cloud
Line: I don't think I can...

Name: Cid
Line: Me and Black Materia just don't mix.

Name: Cloud
Line: Don't give it to ANYONE. I'm counting on you.

Name: Barret
Line: Sephiroth...... What a damn crazy #*&^%.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Cloud, be careful!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Shouldn't we hurry? The real Sephiroth is still close, right?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Something feels rea---lly weird here!

Name: Vincent
Line: You never know when Sephiroth may show up... so don't let your guard down.

Name: Cid
Line: Let me catch some shut-eye.

Name: Tifa
Line: Let's find Sephiroth!!

Name: Cloud
Line: We're going in first! You guys stay and keep watch.

Name: Tifa
Line: What is this? What happened?

Name: Cloud
Line: Calm down, Tifa.Sephiroth is near. Anything could happen.

Name: Tifa
Line: Nibelheim...

Name: Cloud
Line: This is an illusion Sephiroth made up.He's trying to confuse us.It'll be all right. As long as we know it's an illusion, there's nothing to be afraid of.Come on, let's keep going.

Name: Tifa
Line: Yeah, you're right...Look!!

Name: Sephiroth
Line: All right, let's go.

Name: Tifa
Line: Stop... Sephiroth.

Name: Cloud
Line: This is so stupid...

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud... It's just an illusion.Don't worry about it...

Name: Cloud
Line: What's... next?

Name: Tifa
Line: Stop it already!!

Name: Cloud
Line: ...This is what actually happened five years ago.But...It's probably not me that's going to come out of the Shinra mansion.He's going to try and show us another stupid illusion.

Name: Cloud
Line: See... didn't I tell you?

Name: Tifa
Line: I don't want to... watch this. Cloud... don't watch.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...What's wrong, Tifa? I told you before, right?As long as we know that it's just an illusion, there's no need to be scared.

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth! I know you're listening! I know what you want to say!That I wasn't in Nibelheim five years ago.That's it, isn't it?

Name: Sephiroth
Line: I see you finally understand.

Name: Cloud
Line: What you are trying to say is that you want to confuse me, right?But... even making me see those things won't affect me.I remember it all. The heat of the fire... the pain in my body... and in my heart!

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Oh, is that so?You are just a puppet... You have no heart... and cannot feel any pain...How can there be any meaning in the memory of such a being?What I have shown you is reality. What you remember, that is the illusion.

Name: Everyone
Line: Cloud...

Name: Sephiroth
Line: ...Do you understand?

Name: Cloud
Line: I don't want to understand.But, I want to ask you one thing. Why... why are you doing this?

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Ha, ha, ha......I want to take you back to your real self.The one who gave me the Black Materia that day...Who would have ever thought a failed experiment would prove so useful?Hojo would die if he knew.

Name: Cloud
Line: Hojo!? What does he have to do with me!?

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Five years ago you were......constructed by Hojo, piece by piece, right after Nibelheim was burnt.A puppet made up of vibrant Jenova cells, her knowledge, and the power of Mako.An incomplete Sephiroth-clone. Not even given a number. ...That is your reality.Ha, ha, ha......

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud... Don't listen to him...Close your ears! Close your eyes!

Name: Cloud
Line: What's wrong, Tifa? I'm not affected by it....I wasn't paying attention to him.

Name: Tifa
Line: All that talk of Hojo constructing you is a lie.Don't we have our memories together?Being kids together, starlit nights...

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Ha, ha, ha... Tifa...Why are you so worried and scared by those words?Hmm... Shall I show everyone here what's in your heart?

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Ha, ha, ha... You look like you're not feeling well.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Tifa? Is Sephiroth right?

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud...

Name: Cloud
Line: Why are you so scared? Don't worry about me. I'm all right.No matter how confused I am, I'll never believe a word that Sephiroth says.It's true that sometimes I can't figure out who I am.There's a lot of things muddled up in my memories.But, Tifa......But you said, 'Long time no see, Cloud' right?Those words will always support me.I am the one you grew up with. I'm Cloud of Nibelheim.No matter how much I lose faith in myself, that is the truth.That's why you shouldn't be so scared.No matter what anyone else says to me, it's your attitude that counts...

Name: Tifa
Line: No, that's not true, Cloud......

Name: Cloud
Line: What's not? Aren't I the same Cloud you grew up with?

Name: Tifa
Line: That's not what I mean... I don't know how to say it...Cloud, I need some time... Just give me a little time...

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Cloud... Don't blame Tifa.The ability to change one's looks, voice, and words, is the power of Jenova.Inside of you, Jenova has merged with Tifa's memories, creating you.Out of Tifa's memory......A boy named Cloud might've just been a part of them.

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud...Please... don't think right now.

Name: Sephiroth
Line: Ha, ha, ha...... Think, Cloud!...Cloud? Ha, ha, ha...... Oh, excuse me. You never had a name...

Name: Cloud
Line: Shut up... Sephiroth.

Name: Sephiroth
Line: You still don't understand? Then...

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud... don't...

Name: Cloud
Line: I... should be in the picture.Even if I'm not in there, no worry. This is just an illusory world Sephiroth made up.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Just as I thought.This picture's a fake. The truth is in my memory....Five years ago, I came back to Nibelheim, to inspect the reactor. I was sixteen.The town hadn't changed at all. What did I do...? Oh yeah...I saw my mom. I saw the people in town.Yeah, I went to Tifa's room. There, I...I played the piano!I looked in the drawers!I read the letter addressed to Tifa!I spent the night and went to the reactor in Mt. Nibel. I was excited about it.Because that was my first mission after becoming First Class in SOLDIER.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...SOLDIER, First Class?

Name: Tifa
Line: ......Cloud?

Name: Cloud
Line: Let's go, Tifa. I'm... I'm all right.

Name: Scarlet
Line: Wow!! That's amazing!It's all Materia!!

Name: Rufus
Line: The outside is rich with mako energy. The inside is a treasure trove of Materia. This truly is the Promised Land.

Name: Hojo
Line: There is no such thing as the Promised Land. it's a legend... an old wives tale...... it's utterly ridiculous.

Name: Rufus
Line: Everything's as I imagined it to be. Isn't it splendid?It is that kind of dullness that makes you a second-rate scientist.

Name: Rufus
Line: What's happening?

Name: Scarlet
Line: It's coming from within the wall! Something's in there! It's moving!

Name: Hojo
Line: Weapon...Then it really does exist... I didn't believe in it.

Name: Rufus
Line: What does this mean?

Name: Hojo
Line: ...Weapon. Monsters created by the Planet.It appears when the Planet is in danger, reducing everything to nothingness.That's what was stated in Professor Gast's report.

Name: Rufus
Line: I never saw that report... Where is it?

Name: Hojo
Line: Here, right here.

Name: Rufus
Line: You keep a lot of things to yourself.

Name: Tifa
Line: Barret, you're here! I'm so glad!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Everyone's waiting! Cloud's in trouble!Please come. Help us!Over there!

Name: Tifa
Line: ......hee hee hee... And remember...

Name: Sephiroth
Line: ...the Black Materia!

Name: Scarlet
Line: Mr. President... I've got a bad feeling about this place...

Name: Rufus
Line: Hmm... maybe we should go back to our ship now.We need to prepare for the inspection anyway.

Name: Scarlet
Line: Hey!!! Where did you come from?

Name: Cloud
Line: ...don't know...This place is going to get rough.Better leave things to me and get out of here while you still can!!

Name: Rufus
Line: Leave things to you? Hmph... I don't know what you mean.

Name: Cloud
Line: This is where the Reunion is happening. Where everything begins and ends.

Name: Cloud
Line: Thanks... Barret. Where's the Black Materia?

Name: Cloud
Line: I'll take it from here. Give me the... Black Materia.

Name: Cloud
Line: Thanks. ......leave the rest to me

Name: Cloud
Line: Everyone, thanks for everything. And... I'm sorry.

Name: Hojo
Line: Ha, ha, ha... this is perfect!!!It means that my experiment was a complete success.What number were you? Huh? Where is your tattoo?

Name: Cloud
Line: Professor Hojo... I don't have a number.You didn't give me one because you said I was a failed experiment.

Name: Hojo
Line: What the--? You mean only a failure made it here?

Name: Cloud
Line: Professor... please give me a number. Please, Professor...

Name: Hojo
Line: Shut up, miserable failure...

Name: Rufus
Line: Who... was that?

Name: Hojo
Line: ...He's a Sephiroth-clone I created after the real Sephiroth died five years ago.Jenova cells and Mako, with my knowledge and skills, have been combined with science and nature to bring him to life....I'm not wild about the failure part, but the Jenova Reunion Theory has now been proven.You see, even if Jenova's body is dismembered, it will eventually become one again. That's what is meant by Jenova's Reunion.I have been waiting for the Reunion to start. Five years have passed, and now the Clones have begun to return.I thought the clones would begin to gather at Midgar where Jenova is stored.But my predictions were not entirely correct. Jenova itself began to move away from the Shinra Building.But being a genius that I am, I soon figured it out. You see it was all Sephiroth's doing.Sephiroth is not just content to diffuse his will into the Lifestream; he wants to manipulate the Clones himself.

Name: Hojo
Line: I wondered where the clones were going, but I was never able to figure it out.

Name: Hojo
Line: The one thing that I did know was that Sephiroth was at their final destination.

Name: Hojo
Line: Did you see it!! It's Sephiroth! So he IS here!This is perfect! Both Jenova's Reunion and Sephiroth's will!They won't be diffused into the Lifestream,but gathered here! Mwa, haa, ha,......

Name: Tifa
Line: What are you so happy about, Professor? You know what this means, don't you?Cloud has the Black Materia!Sephiroth is going to summon Meteor! Every single person is going to die!

Name: Rufus
Line: Whatever I say now is too little... too late...... We must evacuate.I want you all to come with me. There is still much more I want to hear.

Name: Tifa
Line: ...Because I'm scared.

Name: Barret
Line: Don't worry. I don't know what happened to Cloud either.Guess I shouldn't tell you not to worry...None of them know if he's all right either.

Name: Tifa
Line: He's still... alive, right?

Name: Tifa
Line: How long... was I asleep?

Name: Barret
Line: Lessee now...... Must've been about 7 days.

Name: Tifa
Line: What about Sephiroth?

Name: Barret
Line: You ain't over it yet. Remember that huge light, in the Northern Cave?Since then, the crater's been surrounded by a huge barrier of light.Everyone knows Sephiroth sleeps in that big hole, protected by the barrier.We can't do a damn thing about it. We just gotta wait till he wakes up.An' on topa that, some huge monster called Weapon's been on a rampage.

Name: Tifa
Line: ...Weapon?

Name: Barret
Line: Remember that huge monster that was with Sephiroth, at the bottom of the crater?Well it's up here now. They say it's some legendary monster from the past.

Name: Tifa
Line: Weapon... is protecting Sephiroth?

Name: Barret
Line: Dunno. But he's up here goin' around tearin' shit up.Right now Rufus' fightin' it. I hate to say it, but he's got guts.We shoulda been the ones to destroy it, but we ain't got no time...

Name: Tifa
Line: Time...... Hey! How about Meteor?

Name: Tifa
Line: Do we have to give up?

Name: Barret
Line: ...Dunno.

Name: Rufus
Line: I thought Cloud would show up to save you all...Professor Hojo wanted to check up on Cloud, too.

Name: Tifa
Line: What are you going to do to Cloud?

Name: Rufus
Line: Sephiroth's alter ego...Meteor has been summoned... Essentially, it's all but over now.So, there's no need for you now.No, maybe there is an important task for you...

Name: Heidegger
Line: President! Preparations for the public execution are complete.

Name: Barret
Line: Execution!?What're ya gonna get by executin' us?

Name: Rufus
Line: You are to be executed for causing this situation.People are ignorant. They'll feel better as long as someone is punished.

Name: Barret
Line: I take back what little praise I had for this damn jackass!

Name: Rufus
Line: Well, enjoy your last moments together.

Name: Heidegger
Line: I'll tie your arms now.

Name: Scarlet
Line: Is everyone here? These are the ones who brought this madness into the world!

Name: Barret
Line: The hell are these people?

Name: Scarlet
Line: We will be broadcasting your miserable deaths live on national television.

Name: Large Man
Line: Scarlet, why a public execution in this day and age?

Name: Scarlet
Line: With the chaos resulting from the Meteor reports, we desperately need to rally public support... it's better that we punish somebody, anybody.

Name: Tifa
Line: You make me sick...

Name: Scarlet
Line: Ha, ha, ha, ha!They'll never admit it, but everyone loves this stuff!We'll start with this girl.

Name: Barret
Line: If you've gotta do it... do me first!

Name: Scarlet
Line: Camera, this way! Make sure you get this, the audience just eats up tearful goodbyes!

Name: Tifa
Line: What are you doing!?

Name: Scarlet
Line: This is my special gas chamber. Take your time, and enjoy a slow painful death.

Name: Scarlet
Line: Stuck up ^%$#&!!

Name: Scarlet
Line: Well now, the show's about to begin. Ha, ha, ha!

Name: Press Representatives
Line: Oh no! It's Weapon!Run!

Name: Scarlet
Line: Hey, hey, all of you!Damn! Why now?

Name: Large Man
Line: How does it feel now, Scarlet?

Name: Scarlet
Line: Hmm, so you didn't run? I'm impressed. How do I feel? Right now......Nngaaaaaahhhh!

Name: Barret
Line: Huh!? Sleeping gas?

Name: Soldiers
Line: Weirdo!!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: (untying Barret's arms)I'm here to help!

Name: Barret
Line: Why you......? Ain't you part of Shinra?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Let's just say I'm against capital punishment. Besides... I hate this broad. Come on, we gotta help Tifa.I'll keep watch at the entrance.

Name: Scarlet
Line: ......Fools...... I've already pushed... the switch...

Name: Barret
Line: It won't open!

Name: Heidegger
Line: It's Weapon.

Name: Rufus
Line: There's been so many attacks lately. Can we handle it?

Name: Heidegger
Line: I believe so. Your orders?

Name: Rufus
Line: No need to ask.

Name: Heidegger
Line: We'll give it a shot from our big cannon.Open cannon doors!! Activate cannon. Target: Weapon!!

Name: Sailor
Line: Preparations complete!

Name: Heidegger
Line: The cannon...Fire----!!!

Name: Rufus
Line: Did we get 'em?

Name: Heidegger
Line: Seems so...

Name: Heidegger
Line: It can't be! We hit it dead on!

Name: Rufus
Line: How about the cannon?

Name: Heidegger
Line: It'll take time to reload.

Name: Rufus
Line: Then use regular fire power in the mean time!

Name: Heidegger
Line: Yes sir! Open all artillery doors! Target: Weapon! Don't let it land!

Name: Tifa
Line: Gas!!Barret, help!!

Name: Barret
Line: Hold your breath! Hold on as long as you can!

Name: Tifa
Line: Come on! I can't hold on forever!

Name: Barret
Line: Shi-!

Name: Barret
Line: The Gas Room's probably locked from a different room!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Hmm, we gotta go with a different plan. Let's get out of this room first.

Name: Barret
Line: Tifa! I'll help you, I promise!

Name: Barret
Line: No! They locked this too!

Name: Scarlet
Line: (from inside)Fools. Now, you can't save the girl.Ha, ha, ha, ha!!

Name: Barret
Line: Goddammit......!!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: OK, OK time for Plan B. Let's run to the airport!

Name: Barret
Line: Why the airport? An' leave Tifa there?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Trust me, trust me. We gotta take a chance.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Where you goin'? The airport's the other way.

Name: Yuffie
Line: I know you're in a hurry! But, please if I could have a word......

Name: Barret
Line: Shu'up!! I'm in a hurry!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Don't make so much noise...... It's me, ME! Yuffie!

Name: Barret
Line: The hell you doin' here!?

Name: Yuffie
Line: I'll explain later! Now we gotta get to the airport!

Name: Barret
Line: Damn, man!

Name: Barret
Line: Yo! You sure this is the right way? It's a dead end!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Uh oh? Did I make a wrong turn?

Name: Barret
Line: You damn cat......! What the hell're we gonna do now? They all be comin' soon!Yo, better watch my back till the end... partner!

Name: Tifa
Line: Which button stops the gas...?

Name: Scarlet
Line: What d'you do? Hey! Open it!

Name: Tifa
Line: First you lock me in this weird place, and now you're telling me to come out? Make up your mind!

Name: Scarlet
Line: Our little game of hide and seek ends here.The execution may have been unsuccessful, but your death by falling from here and crashing into the water below still might be pretty exciting.

Name: Tifa
Line: Quit slapping me! You old wench!!!

Name: Tifa
Line: (as she slaps Scarlet)What!?Pay back!!Stop it!Same to you!!

Name: Scarlet
Line: (as she slaps Tifa)How can you!?You!!That hurts!That's enough!

Name: Scarlet
Line: (if she loses)God! I can't stand it!

Name: Scarlet
Line: Take her away.Now it's time to pay up. I'll really drop you if you don't settle down!Ha, ha, ha, ha!

Name: Barret
Line: You okay?

Name: Tifa
Line: My cheeks hurt a bid.Forget about that, what's all this about?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Well, I'll catch the details later.In any case, the Airship, Highwind, is now yours.

Name: Yuffie
Line: (lying on deck)Ha! Ha! ......urk!Well...... I'm glad you're safe.I'm going to stay up here a little longer.......Urk! ......I can't ride ships either in the air or water.

Name: Crew Member in Operation Room
Line: Sorry!! Go speak to Captain Cid!

Name: Crew Member outside Operation Room
Line: My hands are full, so I'll excuse myself here!

Name: Tifa
Line: - Fly Airship- Chew the fat

Name: Crew Member in Chocobo Stable
Line: I'm bored...... I'd like to ride a Chocobo.

Name: Tifa
Line: - How do I?- Later

Name: Barret
Line: Dammit! Why didn't ya tell me you could fly an airship!?I thought...... Tifa was gone for good.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Sorry, but I had to do something to trick the enemy.Come on! Everyone is waiting!

Name: Tifa
Line: Everyone? Everyone's here?

Name: Cid
Line: Welcome to my airship--the Highwind!

Name: Cid
Line: What's wrong!? You should be more excited than that!

Name: Cid
Line: Yeah......

Name: Tifa
Line: Not enough crew.

Name: Pilot in Training (LV3)
Line: Yaaaaahh! Don't talk to me right now!

Name: Bridge Crew Member 1
Line: Whenever anyone talks to me, I get all nervous and mess things up!

Name: Bridge Crew Member 2
Line: All we have to do is just pilot. They don't have to talk to us.

Name: Cid
Line: (after Tifa speaks to either of the crew)Hey you! What the hell are you doin'!?

Name: Barret
Line: What's that sad face for?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Tifa, I'll give you information Shinra.Ask me if there's anything you don't understand.

Name: Cid
Line: Well, it takes all kinds.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Do you think we aren't strong enough without Cloud?Do you think we can't save the Planet alone?

Name: Tifa
Line: Meteor is coming, and Weapon is on the rampage......At a time like this, I don't know what I'm supposed to do......No idea at all......

Name: Barret
Line: Get a hold of yourself Tifa! C'mon, let's think about this!No way we can get offa this train we're on!

Name: Tifa
Line: ......If only Cloud was here, everything would be fine.Cloud would......Stand that cocky little way he did, and tell us what to do.He'd say, 'Everything's under control, Tifa.'

Name: Barret
Line: Tifa! When'd you become such a wimp!

Name: Tifa
Line: I'm sorry Barret.I'm kind of shocked myself. I'm so depressed.

Name: Nanaki
Line: And Tifa...... the reason why we all thought it was Cloud was because......

Name: Tifa
Line: ......I know.That's why I want to make sure. That's why I have to see him again.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Cheer up, Tifa......

Name: Vincent
Line: ......So glad you're all right Tifa.

Name: Barret
Line: What? Does Cloud always gotta be around?.......We did fine without him in the beginning......Right? An' what happened to tough girl I used to know? Where'd she go to?

Name: Cid
Line: I want you to know that I didn't dislike him.Gotta admit he was a strange dude.Just when you thought he was cool, he'd go and do some damn fool thing.And when you thought he was smart, he'd show how stupid he was.Everything about him from his movements to his speech were kinda odd.Knowin' what I do now, I can see why he was that way.Well, as long as you stay alive, you just might see him again someday, so cheer up, sis.

Name: Tifa
Line: ......I'll be able to see him someday.

Name: Cid
Line: If we can find out where he is, the Highwind'll get us there in no time.

Name: Nanaki
Line: ......MaybeCloud is still stuck deep in the North Crater, where the ground cracked and swallowed him up......Buried in the depths of the underground......

Name: Tifa
Line: Deep within the earth...... are you talking about the Lifestream?

Name: Nanaki
Line: The Lifestream sometimes gushes out to the surface from cracks in the ocean floor.I heard that such a place exists.Maybe, just maybe Cloud's......

Name: Pilot in Training (LV3)
Line: Waaaaah! Captain Cid!

Name: Cid
Line: Tifa, sorry, but I've gotta show this moron how to land the ship.Don't worry, it'll be done in a minute.Oh, and Tifa......No matter what your goal is, you've got to be prepared.Go to your room and get ready for our operation.I put a lot of things for the operation in your room, so put them in order.

Name: Crew Member in Operation Room
Line: Tifa, thank you for a job well done!

Name: Barret
Line: Whenever I think of Cloud, everything gets all jumbled up.No matter how powerful Shinra or Hojo is, I can't believe they can create humans.But because of them, we know that Meteor is heading towards us......Y'know, even if I saw him, I don't have a damn idea what I'd do......

Name: Nanaki
Line: There appears to be a small island near the Lifestream......They said the Lifestream sometimes suddenly gushes out at the south island.I remember hearing about this from Seto when I was a child, but I don't remember much else......I'm sorry...... Tifa.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Everything appears calm right now at Shinra.So now's the time to look for Cloud.I'm worried about him, too.I wonder where Cloud is. Or could he already be......

Name: Vincent
Line: Too much hope is the opposite of despair.An overpowering love may consume you in the end......

Name: Cid
Line: OK! You just signal when you're ready to fly full speed.

Name: Pilot in Training (LV4)
Line: Eagggghh! Are we going?

Name: Tifa
Line: - We're going- We're staying put

Name: Pilot in Training (LV4)
Line: Eagggggh! We're off!

Name: Redhead
Line: Huh? You're looking for your friend? You want to know where the Lifestream is?Let's see, I can't help you with your friend, but I've heard about the Lifestream.When I traveled to the southern islands, a doctor was very kind to me. I seem to recall him telling me something about the Lifestream......
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Old Man
Line: Ah, youth... You really believe that big meteor filling up the sky's going to fall here?If that's the case then all we can do is put our hope in Shinra, Inc.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman
Line: They say the meteor is going to fall, but it's okay! I'm sure Shinra will come through for us in the end and do something!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Girl Upstairs
Line: I can't believe Meteor's really falling this way...... What's going to happen to us?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman
Line: Oh man, oh man!A meteor's gonna fall on us, and now there's some big huge monster the likes of which I've never seen just wandering around out there!What's going to happen to all of us!!?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Girl
Line: ......My older brother's so stupid. He's so embarrassing I could just puke!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Boy
