Line: I'm gonna hurry up and get strong so I can crush the meteor to bits! But I gotta train real hard to do it.Hyah, hayah, eagghh!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man in Blue
Line: The meteor's going to fall, isn't it? Unless Shinra does something about it, then we're all history!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man
Line: I want you to stop that talk about a Meteor falling on us!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman
Line: Even if Meteor falls, If you're in Midgar, you ought to be safe.They say it's a "Mako Metropolis" so they should survive somehow......
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman
Line: The meteor's coming, right? Where am I going to stash my money...? Wait, maybe I'd better take it with me and get out of here!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Kalm Traveler
Line: The world's changed a lot in the past few days......That huge monster Meteor was covering up the sky and acting like he owned it or something...A lot of my friends have died......I'm goin' on a journey to pray for their souls.A map that was sunk along with the ship. ...... "Guidebook"A rose that blooms once every 1000 years in the desert. ...... "Desert Rose"A harp that soothes those who hear it. ...... "Earth Harp"I wonder if there's anyone who'll bring it to me?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Kid outside Bar
Line: My dad still just sits at the bar drinking, even though he knows that Meteor's coming!It's sad. Even though he's an adult, he just doesn't want to see the world as it really is. I dunno what to do.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Person in Blue
Line: And all of Midgar's gonna be destroyed by a falling meteor? Oh, don't make me laugh!Lately, there's been a number of scary incidents. I hate it. Just hate it!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man
Line: Listen, I've worked hard till now... and you say Meteor's gonna smash everything to bits?Well, I ain't standin' around listenin' to fool talk like this. Makes a person lose the will to work, that's what it does!What're ya, dense? Something like that'll never happen? It's ridiculous!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Bartender
Line: I heard Shinra's taking all its biggest artillery from Junon and its various other facilities and gathering it in Midgar to fight the meteor and Weapon.What's going to happen to the world...?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man in Blue
Line: (checking the Mako pressure)What're you doing checking the pressure of the Mako energy at a time like this? It's probably already too late......It's times like this when you shouldn't go into a tail spin. You've got to continue to live orderly just like before.At least that's what I think...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Choco Bill
Line: Oh, what is that? What has this world come to? Stars falling and everything.With things the way they are now, how 'bout raising a Chocobo?No, I'm not trying to persuade you for money. It's just because of the state of things in the world.I thought that it would be a good and healthy thing for you to raise some Chocobos...Hmm... You just happen to be in luck!It just so happens that we aren't taking care of any Chocobos for anyone else, so...I could take care of 6 Chocobos right now, for 10000 gil per Chocobo. How 'bout it?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Tifa
Line: - Could you take care of the chocobos?- I'd like to hear about something else- Tell me how you raise them- That's all
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Choco Billy
Line: Welcome!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Cloud
Line: - Buy- Get some information- Moving Chocobos- Feeding Chocobos- Mating Chocobos- Releasing Chocobos- Riding Chocobos- Do nothing
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chole
Line: Welcome! Hey, I've got something good to tell you.The white Chocobo likes it when you scratch behind its ears.But if you scratch it someplace that it doesn't like, it'll get mad, so be careful.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chole
Line: Hey, do you know what a Chocobo Sage is?What!? You've actually met him!?Wow! What did he tell you?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chole
Line: Wow, that's amazing! ...let me take some notes.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chole
Line: Hey, did you ever see the Chocobo Sage again? What did he tell you?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chole
Line: Wow, that's amazing! ...let me take some notes.What...?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Tifa
Line: - Let me jot this down- Chole's Chocobo inspection- Nothing
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman
Line: I almost passed out when I saw Weapon.It seems Weapon was beaten, but a Shinra soldier told me there are 4 more.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Fisherman
Line: Once Meteor hits, not just the fish, but the whole ocean will be destroyed...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Older Man
Line: What? Cloud is missing?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Tifa
Line: Maybe... he dropped some from the North Caves into the Lifestream...Sir, do you know where the Lifestream runs through?Cloud might have drifted from there.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Older Man
Line: What? The Northern... what? Sorry, but I don't think I follow.But... I think I remember hearing Priscilla saying 'Life... something' before.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Priscilla
Line: Who are you---?Lifestream?Yeah, I know! It's Mr. Dolphin's playground.There's a Three-taloned island south of the continent. I heard the Lifestream runs below that island.But why are you asking about the Lifestream?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud fell into the Lifestream at the North Cave, and has been missing ever since.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Priscilla
Line: Huh, Cloud!?Hurry up and help him!! He's very important to me.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Soldier
Line: It's kinda lonely at the airport without the Highwind, isn't it?I miss that bikini girl on the side of the plane.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Soldiers at the Airport
Line: I sure was frightened when Weapon attacked. It gives me the chills knowing there's still two of them left.Oh yeah? Well, I'm ready to fight the worst enemy mankind's ever had like a real warrior. It's not everyday you get to fight in an inter-planetary war.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: Come on in!Welcome!!I just can't believe it. I never thought a monster like Weapon really existed.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Weapon Shopkeeper
Line: This machine hasn't been working right ever since Weapon got to it!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man
Line: Weapon and Meteor scared everyone else off, but I'm sittin' here soused as usual.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Barkeeper
Line: I'd like to close down this shop, but we got the regulars to think about... I don't know what to do......
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: They're not going to get me down! Not me!!Weapon, Meteor, even bad customers, aren't going to get me!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Soldier Guarding the Respectable Inn
Line: Hmmm? You have no right to enter!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Commander
Line: (drilling a soldier)Hey!! Stay out of the way!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Soldier
Line: I'm starting to feel like I can't stop anymore.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Commander
Line: Hey! Stop yappin'!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Soldier
Line: I've been had!! I want to get in a real battle, too!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Soldier Studying
Line: I lost most of my rivals in the attack on Weapon.Oh, of course, I was here, studying.And the coveted green officer's uniform is almost in my reach.After that, I'll get on the newspapers as a plain clothed First Class officer in SOLDIER...A triumphant return to my homeland!! Tons of fan letters... My future's peachy!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Barkeeper
Line: I'm sorry. I've decided to close this place down.All my regular customers were killed by Weapon.Everyone was pretty weird, but I got a lot of memories of them.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Girl
Line: Please! Come in...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Girls
Line: Welcome!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Honey Bee Girl
Line: Look, why not forget about Meteor and Weapon for now and do a little impulse shopping!?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Black-haired Girl
Line: Buy a lot, cutie!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Redhead
Line: I won't charge you for a smile...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Girl
Line: Please go to the counter.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman
Line: Why don't you surround yourself with young girls and have some fun... maybe for the last time.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Shopkeeper
Line: I hired more girls after hearing that the world's coming to an end, but I wonder if I made a mistake.I keep getting more and more in debt. I've got to get out from under it somehow. Maybe I'll have Weapon help me.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Girls
Line: Thank you very much!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Shopkeeper
Line: I used to be in SOLDIER. Recently, I've felt like dressing up like this...I don't know why, it's out of season, but...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Soldier
Line: (trying to cross his legs casually)I'm learning to be a delinquent soldier!!I just can't seem to get the hang of it! It just isn't going right!!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Delinquent Soldier
Line: All the real soldiers were killed fighting Weapon.It may seem ironic that losers like me are still alive. But that's the reality of it.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Shinra Manager
Line: I only came to help with the transporting of Junon's Huge Cannon, Sister Ray, but...Now the company tells me not to bother coming back...What's being a Shinra employee all about...?Yeeeeee......If Weapon killed all the upper management... then I'll be President...!!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: Weapon was really something. Nothing can compare with his strength, but with a selection like this, our weapons'll win.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Sailor
Line: Everyday there's no ship coming in, I always come here to watch the sun go down.The sun disappears almost like it's swallowed up in the big horizon.And somewhere out there is a big unknown continent with another port city.Twilight always gets me misty...I'm so glad I became a seaman.Well... I wouldn't have time for one now anyway because of that Weapon thing...I haven't had a girl friend in 18 years. And I'm a romantic! ......phew.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man Near Sea Plane
Line: Well, I'm not worried. When it all comes down, I'm heading for the skies.The only problem is...... will there be anywhere left to land?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman Lounging on Sea Plane
Line: Not gonna be able to nap like this for much longer.When you put it that way, I feel kind of sad.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Sailor
Line: There's no ship to Junon. Recently, there's been a hoard on materials. Everything's topsy-turvy.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Sailor Running Around
Line: Everyone's in a rush to get one last vacation in before the Meteor strikes, That's why it's so busy here.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman at the Information Kiosk
Line: I don't feel like sightseeing around town. What I really want to do is... Looks like Gold Saucer is temporarily closed.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Waitress
Line: I wan' learn how speak beddah. But don' wan' have stars fall down. You think... same?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: White Surfer
Line: I don't care if it's the Meteor or not, I'm not giving up yet!I still haven't surfed the best waves of Costa del Sol!I hope the Meteor doesn't strike before I do.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Black Surfer
Line: It's weird seeing the reflection of the Meteor on the sea in the evening!It gives you the creeps.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Black Man
Line: ...huff... wheeze...Heat and cold are just memories of the Planet......
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man
Line: I don't understand what my boss is thinking!I'm gonna yell at him! I'm gonna scream my head off till it gets ugly!Isn't that what life's all about? What do you think?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Mukki
Line: I'm just sitting here havin' a quiet drink.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman Behind Counter
Line: When you're in here, forget all those awful things going on outside, and... just enjoy yourself.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Women
Line: They're burning. Someday they'll burn out.The stars are just like our youth.Ho! Ho! Ho!...... It's the end of the world.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Little Boy
Line: Oh wow!! Man, that's huge!!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Little Girl
Line: The stars!! They're in flames!!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Johnny
Line: I proposed to her in the middle of all that Meteor stuff!I don't care even if the world were to end right now!I can't think of anything else!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Butch
Line: Good or bad everything's gotta go! It's the end of the world sale!!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: Wanna buy a souvenir to remember participating in the Meteor tour?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Innkeeper
Line: (lying in bed)I don't feel like doing anything. I just want to spend the rest of my life sleeping.Will you be staying together?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Tifa
Line: - Yes- No thanks
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man
Line: Sitting around waiting for Meteor to come...... Why's it gotta fall on us?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman
Line: It's getting closer and closer. Someone will do something, don't you think?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman 2
Line: The sea breeze, sun and Meteor. Isn't nature strange?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman 3
Line: I don't care even if it is the end of the world, I just want to sit here and drink cocktails!Ooooh...... I think I drank too much.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man Swimming
Line: Eaaggh!! Leave me alone!I'm trying to learn how to swim before the end of the world.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man
Line: Staring up at Meteor won't put food in my stomach.But if I look down, sometimes I find somethin' to eat.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Old Man
Line: The next train's coming in soon.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Black Woman
Line: As long as we're here, Grandpa's not going to be able to forget about trains.Maybe we'll start anew, moving to Southern Isle of Mideel.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Big Man
Line: Look down... nuthin' but junk. Look up... Meteor.Am I gonna be stuck between these two for the rest of my life?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man in Hardhat
Line: Hey, what's gonna happen to the world...?I guess no one wants to have fun anymore now that the Gold Saucer is closing...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Station Man
Line: The Gold Saucer is currently closed. The Ropeway's up and runnin', but there's no point in goin' there.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Dio
Line: I'm sorry, I'm gonna close this for a while.I'm just debating if I should be in business at a time like this.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Old Man
Line: You lost? When that happens the only ones you can count on are your friends.The first thing you gotta do is find your best friend.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Redhead
Line: Life Stream? Never heard of it.The Planet's structure? ...Who cares about that?Why don't you go ask Bugenhagen of Cosmo Canyon hard questions like that?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Gatekeeper
Line: Oh, it's you. This is terrible. The color of that unlucky star...The children are all so scared that they won't even go outside.I'd rather not see it either...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man
Line: Mmm...... I can't be standing here talking about the 'Study of Planet Life'.I think I'll be heading back to my homeland now...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: General Storekeeper
Line: Hi. Of course, our store's open.No need to fear. I have the 'Study of Planet Life' right here.No, maybe I AM a bit afraid. But, whenever I'm reading 'Study of Planet Life,' I can forget all my fears.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Barkeeper
Line: How about our original cocktail, 'Lifestream'?You should forget your troubles with a drink. We humans sure are weak creatures...That reminds me. I heard that someone here in Cosmo Canyon is selling some Healing Materia.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Elder Bugah
Line: Live with the planet, die with the planet.Maybe this is the way it should be. Who knows? I'm full of booze...It's when I think about the children. I wonder if we could just save our own children.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Kid in Nanaki's Room
Line: It's not that I'm afraid of that big star.It's just that, uh, I have a stomach ache... That's why I'm not moving. That's the truth!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Innkeeper
Line: Welcome to 'Shindra Inn'. It's times like this a nice, soft bed will do you good.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: Welcome. You still want more weapons? You sure are weird...Uh, I mean, it's weird. if there weren't people like you, I'll be out of business. Heh, heh, heh... sweat...!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Elder Hargo
Line: Mm... oh, this? This is the book of Stars. I'm just finishing it.Nothing is meaningless. If I do this then, someday, someone will run across it.The Ancients did the same. That is how we know about them, right? Maybe my book also......
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: Oh man... Everything is over, once the meteor hits...I've been selling Materia for 10 years now, ever since I was 16. What have I been doing with my life...?Welcome! Oh, it's nothing. Now, please make yourselves comfortable!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman
Line: Hmm... I wonder what's going to happen now...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Kid
Line: Don't worry, mom! All of us just need to go through that door!Mr. Bugenhagen sealed it so we wouldn't have to worry about it!But what's a seal...?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo....no time to be humming now. The planet is nearing imminent death.Where is Cloud? Wasn't he with you?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Tifa
Line: That's why we're here... Cloud... Cloud has...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: I see... Cloud has......It's true that there are several places on the planet where Lifestream is gathered.But most of those places are below the surface where humans cannot reach them.There's only one place. An island floating in the Southern Sea...What did you say? I haven't left here in years... No good. I can't remember.In the Southern Seas I think there was an island where Lifestream is.But even if you find Cloud there...Life's dream is a mass of spiritual energy,and one person alone probably couldn't stand against such an incredible spiritual current...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman in Shop
Line: How can you shop at a time like this?What? 'Me, in business'?Don't worry, it's all right. I get paid by the company.My real job is to protect the secret of Nibelheim.What? Secret?We don't have a clue. But it's all right.It's all over anyway!The end, the end, the end!! Yeah, even as we speak, Meteor...! The End...!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman
Line: What's going to happen to this planet!? What the hell's Shinra doing!?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud... Cloud was playing.I wonder what... this is...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man Looking at Paintings
Line: Mmmm... I'm starting to see it now...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Innkeeper
Line: (if you go behind the desk)Authorized personnel only.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Barkeeper
Line: You don't feel comfortable here? Then, every time you look in the sky you see Meteor.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man
Line: Meteor's coming toward us!? And I can't even go to the bathroom...!?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Redhead
Line: If things go on like this, then Meteor's just going to smash right into us and kill us all, right? ......I guess that's life?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Mechanic
Line: Look up at the sky. The bigger Meteor gets, the less time we have to live.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Old Man
Line: Shinra's trying to gather the Huge Materia from Corel and Fort Condor. There are four left, and they're transporting them here.I can't stand the thought of them using my rocket for something like this.Anyways.How 'bout it? Want to look at the rocket with me?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Tifa
Line: - Look up- No
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Shera
Line: ...What's going to happen?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman Walking Near River
Line: Life is like the dew on the leaves of the trees. Whether that planet falls or not is no more than a fleeting glimmer.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Old Man
Line: Oh, you know lately things have been like that. You can even see the moon in the afternoon. Everyone's celebrating.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Boy
Line: No, Gramps! That's a big red planet in the sky! Everyone's scared of it!!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man
Line: This is a weapons store of the hard cores, by the hard cores, and for the hard cores! Come on and take a look, why doncha!?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Shopkeeper
Line: Hey yo! Welcome!You aren't tired of my babbling?Great! Then come on in and start buying!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Barkeeper
Line: First the ground started shaking, then that large star......Yy, you think... It's all over?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man
Line: Hey. Things look pretty sad around here.With things the way they are in the world I guess there's nothing I can do about it.Running around like a fool won't help matters any. So, we all might as well sit back and have a beer...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Little Kid
Line: When that big star bashes into us, both Wutai and Da-chao are going to be dust! Can't we do something?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Shopkeeper
Line: You're still gonna sit here and buy stuff at a time like this?You're an odd one...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman
Line: And now it's too late to be worrying about materia at this stage of the game...If you see anything you need, buy it.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man on the Path to Godo's House
Line: The end is right in front of us...But what can you do about it? Just go on living your life day in and day out...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man Outside Godo's House
Line: Have you ever heard the story of the scales of the Water God?They're not just regular scales. They have special hidden powers. And are impervious to the strongest flames.But of course I don't think they'd stand up to the fire that huge eerie-lookin' Planet's gonna make when it crashes into us...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: People Praying
Line: num, num...... I hope the planet doesn't fall anywhere around here......He's in the pagoda next to Lord Godo. Lord Godo says we're stuck...Help me. Help me. Help me......
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Excavator
Line: Welcome to Bone Village, a town for nature lovers.You need something?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Tifa
Line: - Are you going to run away??- What are you doing?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Tifa
Line: Eyaaaa!...Consciousness of the Ancients?...I'm sorry. ...I can't... understand.Eaayy!? Again?It speaks directly to my mind... Is this the Consciousness of the Ancients?...I'm sorry. ...I can't... understand.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Cid
Line: Whoa...!...Consciousness of the Ancients?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman
Line: I don't think I could live in this town. It gets so cold here!I have to move again... I don't know where to start.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man
Line: The reason for the drop in temperature must be because of that dome of light at the Northern limits...You all should get away from here and go to a place like Mideel Island in the south.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Boy
Line: I wanted to get a lot better at snowboarding...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Old Woman
Line: Cough... cough... I've been living in this town for 60 years. And STILL I caught a cold...I heard there's a doctor on a Southern island somewhere. I sure wish he'd come here... cough... cough...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Woman
Line: Grandma's been sick for a while and doesn't have much energy lately...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man in Yard
Line: It's the first time that the temperature has dipped this low, this fast...There's also that mysterious light at the Northern limits too. Does it mean that we've reached the end of the world?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man
Line: With all the strange things happening in the world, I kinda understand why people want to leave...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man 2
Line: Maybe we'd better leave town soon too.Let's go to that island in the South! What was it called...... hmm?Yeah, yeah, I heard that there's a town called Mideel on a southern island.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Person in Bathroom
Line: I'm still in here! All right!?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Little Girls
Line: I heard that there's a barrier on top of the mountain.What's a barrier? You mean that light on the top of the mountain?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Man in Thicket
Line: There's a barrier at the North end of the crater! You shouldn't go any further.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Ho ho. It's unusual for people to come to such an out of the way place...I can't remember how many years it's been since the last person came.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Cloud, Tifa, or Cid
Line: Who are you?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Me? I'm......I don't know.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Been a while since I gave it any thought...Wonder what they used to call me?Oh yeah!! They used to call me the 'Chocobo Sage'. That's right!!Right, that was it, The Chocobo Sage!!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Now what can I do for you?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Cloud, Tifa, or Cid
Line: - What about that Chocobo?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: That chocobo? Well that one is...Let's see now, I don't quite remember...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Now what can I do for you?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Cloud, Tifa, or Cid
Line: - You remember something?
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: I remember now! That's the one they call...It's a Mountain Chocobo. And just like the name says, he can cross any mountain.There was another one that could cross rivers, too. They call him 'River Chocobo'.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: There aren't any around now.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Wha? I wonder what he's doing there?Can't remember for the life of me...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Oh, oh yeah! That chocobo was.........was bred from a 'Great Chocobo' and a 'Good Chocobo'.When they're given "Carob Nuts" while breeding, there's a chance you'll get one of these Chocobos.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Huh? Where? Where was that?And what was that nut?Can't remember for the life of me...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Oh, OK. I remember! That chocobo......It's on an island southeast of here, In a place called Corel surrounded by greenery.You should be able to catch one just west of Corel. And some 'Carob Nuts', too......There used to be some monsters just south of here that had them. Or you might............... Funny...... What was I saying just now?Can't remember for the life of me...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Oh right!It was about the Mountain Chocobo and the River Chocobo I told you about.When you mate these two together......you get one that can cross rivers AND mountains.And... And also... uh, what was I saying?Can't remember for the life of me...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Oh, yeah! And also...There's one that can cross oceans, too!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Hey, don't tease me like that! To get an Ocean-crossing Chocobo, you just...Let's see now... ...Nope. Don't remember a thing.Can't remember for the life of me...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Oh, I remember! The Ocean-crossing Chocobo is...The Mountain-and-River-crossing Chocobo is...... is... Oh, what was I saying?Let's see now... ...Nope. Don't remember a thing.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Right, right! I remember! You take the Mountain-and-River-crossing Chocobo...Mate it with a 'Wonderful Chocobo' you can catch right around here... And you'll get...Can't remember for the life of me...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Oh, right! You'll need a...'Zeio Nut'. Now let me see, as I remember, the Zeio nut...Where was it you could find those things?Can't remember for the life of me...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: Oh yeah! Zeio nuts were...The favorite of goblins. There's a small island east of here where the goblins have a bunch of them.
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Chocobo Sage
Line: I think......that's all I'm gonna remember.Oh!That's it...
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Cid
Line: Wh, what the hell was that!? That came buzzin' past here like a powerhouse!
section: The World - After Meteor is Summoned

Name: Old Man at Entrance
Line: Ahoy! Hey ain't you a beaut. This here's Mideel. It's a quiet little Hot Springs town.Just the perfect place for old folks like us to live out our lives.I hear that things ain't so peaceful on the outside. But here it's still nice and quiet.

Name: Shopper
Line: But anyhow, that overgrown moon is going to fall down on us isn't it?This's no joke! We've got to start stocking up on supplies before they're all gone!Outta the way! Hey, move it, move it!

Name: Tifa
Line: What is it? You're being awful friendly all of a sudden.Oh, so that's it. You want the Samolen Greens... don't you?- Give it some Samolen Greens- Don't give it any

Name: Shopkeeper
Line: Welcome! We always welcome cash! Now, about where you want to go...I'm afraid other customers have already booked it up. There's nothing left.......just kidding! Just a little joke. Now what can I do for you?Thank you! Come again!

Name: Girl in Blue Outside
Line: Gather 'round, gather 'round, this is a bargain!!We've got the best armor and weapons, the likes of which you won't find anywhere else.But it's first come first served, so get yours now!Step right up! You there, don't just stand around outside.Go on in! Come on! Don't be shy, step right up!I'll never know why he wanted to open a store in a dead town like this. What's up with him......? ...sigh......

Name: Man
Line: Everything must come to an end. And someday it's gonna be your turn. Even the world's gotta end sometime.Everybody leaves at one time or another. And everyone gets left also. That's just fate...It's sad, but there's nothing that can be done about it. So that's why I'm prayin' like this for all of you.

Name: Tifa
Line: Huh......? What could that be?There's something stuck deep inside that looks like a key... It's hard to get out.Well, I'll just let it go for now......

Name: Shopper
Line: You again! You aren't here hoarding up goods too are you?Don't reach in front of me! Everything in this store is mine!I've got money to burn! I've been saving it like mad just for a time like this!C'mon, outta the way! Move, will you? Move!

Name: Shopkeeper
Line: Welcome to the charity store, a store of love and courage! What can I get you today?Thank you very much! Please come again.

Name: Tifa
Line: No good... I wonder if it's locked?

Name: Tifa
Line: I wonder if there isn't some way to get this outta here...?If I just move this...... And push that...... Okay! I got it out!

Name: Woman
Line: You say you don't know when the stars are gonna fall outta the sky? Is that for real?I still don't believe it! How could this be happen?

Name: Old Man
Line: Ancient Weapon? End of the world? I don't know nothing about that! I'm gonna live to be a hundred!There's tons of stuff I still gotta do! This's just the beginning.And what have Shinra and SOLDIER done about it? Tell me! They're a waste!!

Name: Girl
Line: Actually, I'm a beautiful maid. I just work here in the accessory store part-time.Everything here can compare with the best goods anywhere. So, how about one?Thank you. Stop by again.

Name: Tifa
Line: Oh yeah, shall I try that old beat up key?- Use the beat up old key!- Forget it

Name: Woman
Line: Huh? Never seen you here before. You from outta town? How're things on the outside?Between the earthquakes and Meteor...... It just might be the end of the world like everyone's been sayin'...Oh, how depressing! What a miserable world this is......

Name: Shopper
Line: Ohh...... there's not much time left!! You never know when that moon is gonna come crashing down!!When it all comes down to it, this world's about money and material things!If you got 'em, you can get by whenever, wherever!Gotta buy!! Gotta buy, buy, buy!! I'm gonna shop till I drop!!

Name: Shopkeeper
Line: Ah, welcome to you! What I get you to-day?Thank very much! You come 'gain.

Name: Tifa
Line: What's the matter? Are you all alone?

Name: Bald Man
Line: ......guess it's been about a week now since he washed up here on the shore... Poor pokey-headed young thing...

Name: Old Man
Line: It was really sad...... but weird. He was holding this really long sword.I dunno. The whole thing feels unlucky to me. But the amazing thing was those weird blue eyes......

Name: Tifa
Line: Wha!?

Name: Bald Man
Line: Yeah... a villager found him a little ways down the coast... It was about a week ago I think.

Name: Old Man
Line: Yeah, poor kid...... He must've drifted from somewhere pretty far away...

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud!! It must be!! It's Cloud!!

Name: Tifa
Line: So where is he? Is he safe!? Where is he now......?

Name: Bald Man
Line: Yeah... up ahead here... At the, uh, clinic......

Name: Tifa
Line: He's alive...!Cloud...... Cloud's alive!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud!?

Name: Doctor
Line: Here now. The way you're running around here, you'd think Meteor fell or something.

Name: Tifa
Line: I'm sorry, but I heard that a friend of mine was being taken care of here......

Name: Doctor
Line: A friend...?Oh yeah......! That young fellow!?Don't worry. Your friend is next door. But I'm afraid his condition is...

Name: Tifa
Line: Here?Over here.

Name: Tifa
Line: Oh... Cloud!! I'm so glad you're safe!?......!?Cloud......?

Name: Tifa
Line: Wh...... what's wrong...... Cloud......?

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud! What happened to you......!?

Name: Doctor
Line: Mako poisoning...... Quite an advanced case......It appears this young man's been exposed to a high level of Mako energy for a protracted period of time.He probably has no idea who or where he is now......Poor fellow, his voice doesn't even work. He is literally miles away from us.Some place far away where no one's ever been... All alone......

Name: Tifa
Line: Doctor......!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud......

Name: Doctor
Line: Ahem! Let us excuse ourselves.Listen, would you all mind...... waiting outside?

Name: Tifa
Line: Why......? What do you want me to do?Please, Cloud...... Talk to me......Tell me you see me, that you can hear me...... Tell me, please......I came this far believing in the memories we have together...This isn't happening......! This is too cruel......Oh, Cloud......! I............

Name: Doctor
Line: I'll say it again, he's got Mako poisoning. I've never seen a case this bad...An immense amount of Mako-drenched knowledge was put into his brain all at once......No normal human could have survived it...... It's a miracle he did!

Name: Doctor
Line: But remember, the light of hope can be found anywhere.Listen, if you give up hope... What will happen to him?

Name: Barret
Line: ......hope......Hey, but honestly, man...... Do I really want him to come back?What did he do for the world? What can he do for us from here on out? He may be nothing more than Sephiroth's shadow......

Name: Doctor
Line: Is something wrong?

Name: Barret
Line: No, nothin'. Nothin' at all, doc.

Name: Tifa
Line: Yes...... I'm sorry I had you all worried.And I have something I want to tell you all......

Name: Tifa
Line: I don't care about anything else, only Cloud......I...... want to be by his side......

Name: Tifa
Line: I'm sorry, everyone... At a time like this......

Name: Tifa
Line: Right......

Name: Barret
Line: Oh, and uh, Tifa... I don't like askin' this but......Is he really your childhood friend? And not Sephiroth's shadow?

Name: Tifa
Line: Huh!? Well... that is......No, I'm sure of it!

Name: Barret
Line: Yeah......? Okay then...... Sorry for askin' that.

Name: Barret
Line: What're we gonna do now! What can WE do?Huh? Ain't there nothin' we can do?An' don' go tellin' us to wait for Cloud to get better.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Oh, I've got some news.

Name: Barret
Line: Yeah, what!? That you a spy?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Yeah...... I've already told you I was.Both gya ha ha and Kya ha ha, are up to something.Wanna eavesdrop?

Name: Rufus
Line: Now then...... We're faced with two issues.1 Destroy Meteor. 2 Remove the barrier around North Cave and defeat Sephiroth.Any ideas?

Name: Heidegger
Line: Gya haah hah hah! We already solved the first problem!Meteor will soon be smashed to bits!The plan has already been put in motion. Namely, to collect Huge Materia from each region.

Name: Rufus
Line: Well......

Name: Scarlet
Line: Huge Materia is a high density special type of materia made through a special compression process in Mako reactors.The energy extracted from it is 330 times the strength of normal materia.Ha, ha, ha! How about that!?We will gather all the Huge Materia together and ram it into Meteor.That will cause a huge explosion!! Reducing Meteor literally to bits.

Name: Rufus
Line: You're going to ram Meteor?Do you think we have the technology to do it?

Name: Scarlet
Line: Don't worry about that!More importantly, we've got to collect Huge Materia from each area.

Name: Heidegger
Line: We've already collected materia from Nibelheim.All that's left is "Corel" and "Fort Condor".I've already dispatched troops to Corel.Ghaa haah hah hah!

Name: Barret
Line: Corel!What else can they do to Corel!?

Name: Nanaki
Line: And the Huge Materia......You mean the Huge Materia, don't you? I've heard about it.When, our small materia nears the larger one, something should happen.I'm certain of it.That's why we're using the power of materia in our fight......

Name: Barret
Line: Can't let Shinra get a hold of the Huge Materia!Besides, when Cloud gets back, I wanna show him this Huge Materia. He's gonna be shocked.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: So, what are you saying, Barret?Even though you're always knocking him, you really want Cloud to return.

Name: Barret
Line: I ain't sayin' nothin' 'bout nothin'. You just... shut your face!Every group's gotta have a leader.An' that's me!Or at least I wanna be... But I ain't cut out to be no leader.I never knew that till lately.An' that's what is......

Name: Barret
Line: You been chosen to be the new leader.

Name: Cid
Line: Pain in the ass. Forget it.

Name: Barret
Line: But for us to fight, we gotta have Highwind, and you.We need it to save the Planet. An' who's runnin' this ship? You!That's why you're our new leader. Ain't no one else can.

Name: Cid
Line: Hm...... this ship's gonna save the Planet, huh? Ain't that gonna be just a little tough?Oh man, that went straight to my heart.I'm a man, too!Okay, I'll do it! Everyone, follow me!

Name: Barret
Line: Awright, now here's the first job.The Operation Room's waiting for you!

Name: Cid
Line: Yeah!!

Name: Barret
Line: Yo, Cid!When you're ready, we're headin' for the Corel Reactor. C'mon Mr. leader, you'd better hurry.

Name: Yuffie
Line: Cid......????I know you're all dyin' to talk to a babe like me!But just leave me alone. This ship makes me...... urk...!!

Name: Bridge Crew Member 1
Line: Good day, Captain!

Name: Bridge Crew Member 2
Line: Looks like you turned out to be the leader after all, Captain......

Name: Pilot in training (LV5)
Line: Eaggggghh! Congrats' on becoming our leader, Cap'n!

Name: Crew Member outside Operation Room
Line: My hands are full, so I'll excuse myself here!

Name: Cid
Line: - Fly Airship- Chew the fat

Name: Barret
Line: Yo, Mr. Leader! Get your pilot ass up here!

Name: Nanaki
Line: Cid.Let's visit Cloud and Tifa from time to time.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Hmmn, the Huge Materia is at Corel, Fort Condor......I'm sure there was another place that had it. Where was that......?

Name: Vincent
Line: Cid...... I wish I had your go-get-them attitude.It appears my feelings vanished into thin air ever since I was in that long slumber......

Name: Pilot in training (LV6)
Line: Yaah! Shall we take off?

Name: Cid
Line: - Yes- No

Name: Pilot in training (LV6)
Line: Yaah! We're taking off!

Name: Cid
Line: Well, let's see...... What's a good place to head to?Corel? Fort Condor?

Name: Redhead
Line: Hey, listen to me! The Shinra troops are on the move.The TV news said Rufus came up with 2 plans. One, is to launch a rocket into space containing Huge Materia......Is Huge Materia really that destructive?

Name: Priscilla
Line: Who are you---?

Name: Cid
Line: We found Cloud!

Name: Priscilla
Line: I'm so happy!! Someday I'm going to be Cloud's wife.I've decided I'm gonna be Cloud's wife.

Name: Soldier on the Path to the Airport
Line: Right now the Shinra's using it to gather the Huge Materia from the Corel Reactor and from the Fort Condor Reactor.The Gelnika's flying all over the place! The only one that's not busy, is probably me!

Name: 1st Soldier at the Airport
Line: The President is gathering up all the Huge Materia on the planet. He wants to shoot it at Meteor in the rocket.President Rufus is different from the older generation. He'll protect the planet with all of the technology Shinra currently has.

Name: 2nd Soldier at the Airport
Line: Protect? No, I don't think so. The President isn't the type to do anything so heroic. It's all just a game--a question of winning or losing--to him...

Name: Commander
Line: Our forces are in the process of gathering the Huge Materia from the Corel and the Fort Condor Reactors!Once these two missions are completed, the Underwater Reactor will be our next target!Till then, we do nothing but train, train, train!

Name: Old Man
Line: This reactor's useless, but I hear there's still big materia at the Corel, Fort Condor, and the Junon reactors.Shinra's working to get the materia from all those places...... But for what...?

Name: Redhead
Line: Seems like the Shinra is planning something big to destroy Meteor...I heard they're going to do something with all that big materia they've been gathering...After what happened with the reactor you can't trust Shinra.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: You are using Shinra materia, as a weapon?Materia is highly dense spiritual energy. A shred of the planet's life. It should not be used as a weapon.We must stop using it... or the planet will become weakened.

Name: Man
Line: Shinra soldiers came around sayin' they were gathering up all the Huge Materia.I think they're gonna bring it here by coal train, from the Corel Reactor.

Name: Big Man
Line: Some Shinra soldiers went up to Mt. Corel. They said they're collecting Huge Materia to blow up Meteor!Ya think they can really do it...? I'll bet the reactor destroys everything even before Meteor hits!

Name: Soldier
Line: You guys are...!

Name: Cid
Line: Guess we're safe for now...!

Name: Cid
Line: Looks like they're takin' off with the Huge Materia in that train!

Name: Cid
Line: Hey, do you know who I am?I'm Cid - that's who the hell I am! Now just let me handle it!

Name: Cid
Line: Hey, hey, hey, hey---!

Name: Cid
Line: Don't ask me... I don't know!

Name: Cid
Line: Don't worry! I can handle this kinda stuff!Two levers; one on the right and one on the left...I see, just alternate the two levers up and down, right!?Judging from the enemy's speed, I'd say it'll take about 10 minutes.We're gonna fly!! Hold on tight!!

Name: Cid
Line: There's only one more Huge Materia the Shinra needs... That's the one at the Underwater Reactor.

Name: Cid
Line: With us always in their face, even the Shinra's gotta be getting tired of it all.We have to hurry that much... ...right now I'm more worried about him than anything else!

Name: Cid
Line: Yeah, and I'm worried about Tifa, too.Let's go see what's going on at Mideel...

Name: Cid
Line: What's next? Shall we head for Fort Condor?

Name: Barret
Line: Huh? Mr. Leader, what's next!?

Name: Nanaki
Line: We'll do our best for Cloud and you.......And Aeris, too.

Name: Vincent
Line: ......Don't expect anything else from me except fighting beside you.I don't have any comforting words.Of course, I don't believe you're the type of guy who needs kindness from other's......

Name: Man
Line: This is the deciding battle. The enemy numbers more than ever before.

Name: Cid
Line: Where shall we go next? Shall we head for the Corel reactor?

Name: Cid
Line: Hey......It's tough being the leader.Cloud did a great job. Sheesh......Shall we go to Mideel to check on things?

Name: Barret
Line: Yo, wanna see what Tifa and the gang are doing?

Name: Nanaki
Line: Say Cid.I wonder how Tifa and Cloud...... are doing.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Shinra's...... stopped.Now we've got to be careful. I know Heidegger and his gang are plotting something.

Name: Vincent
Line: You look really tired, maybe you're ready to give up being leader?

Name: Pilot in training (LV7)
Line: Yaaah! Shall we take off?

Name: Cid
Line: - Roger- Negative

Name: Pilot in training (LV7)
Line: Man! We're taking off!

Name: Nanaki
Line: I wonder how Cloud's doing.I wonder if Tifa needs a break......I could look after him instead.

Name: Old Man at Entrance
Line: Ahoy! This here's Mideel. A quiet Hot Springs town... At least it used to be...Lately the sea's been in a tizzy. Lifestream has been mixin' things up at the bottom of the ocean.I think the planet's pretty angry too. We've pretty much done whatever we've wanted to the planet up till now.

Name: Woman
Line: It's bad enough with earthquakes and Meteor, but on top of all that now the Lifestream has become active again, too.I hope it doesn't blow and cause a panic like it did before. That was really bad, I tell ya.

Name: Cid
Line: What's this!? Your bein' awful friendly.Oh, so that's it. You want the Samolen Greens... don't you?- Give it some Samolen Greens- Don't give it any

Name: Old Man Playing with Dog
Line: I gotta feelin' something bad's gonna happen. Is it gonna be okay?I'm all right. I've lived a long, full life.But I'm worried about my son and his family living in that far-off town...I hope they're safe...

Name: Old Man Playing with Dog
Line: Wait a minute.Did you take something just now?

Name: Cid
Line: Uh, oh. I'm......- Yeah, I took it old man!- Don't know nothin' 'bout it!

Name: Old Man
Line: So how is the boy? Poor kid. He sure got the worst of whatever it was......Sure hope he gets better soon. Right now is when he really needs to hold on and not give up.

Name: Bald Man
Line: It's amazing he recovered. When they carried him here after they first discovered him, I thought for sure he was a goner.That boy must have one powerful guardian angel watchin' over him.

Name: Doctor
Line: I'm sorry...... But your friend's condition remains unchanged......You'll have to be patient and wait this out. These things take time. Just like fine wine, time is of the essence.

Name: Nurse
Line: (after one Huge Materia mission)Oh, hello. She always stays right by his side. She must really love him.Remember, even at a time like this you can never give up hope. You've got to be strong like her.

Name: Nurse
Line: (after both missions)She's finally beginning to look a little tired... I hope she's all right.No change in his condition, and still she stays there doing her best. It must be tough on her.If she keeps this up she'll probably get sick......

Name: Nurse
Line: Well anyhow...... Hey, you all look terrible. Why don't you rest up for a while?

Name: Cloud
Line: uh...... a...... aah...............What...... What number...... am I?Uh...... aaa......?A billion mirror fragments...... small...... light......taken...... angel's...... singing voices............ zeno...... gias......Uh...... aaa......?

Name: Tifa
Line: (after one Huge Materia mission)Cloud...... I don't understand a word he's saying......I'm such a fool...... I thought there was something that I could do for him......

Name: Tifa
Line: (after both missions)......it's no use...... I don't understand a thing, Cloud.What should I do......? What if you never recover for the rest of your life?

Name: Tifa
Line: Eyaaah!?

Name: Cid
Line: What did you say, Cloud!?

Name: Cid
Line: Damn. What the hell's goin' on!?

Name: Tifa
Line: No way...... Is this......!?

Name: Doctor
Line: This isn't good!! It's big!

Name: Nurse
Line: Eyaaah! I hate earthquakes!!

Name: Cid
Line: What's this...!?The Lifestream is gushing up from below the surface of the earth!

Name: Cid
Line: Damn, that's......!? This is bad......!!

Name: Tifa
Line: (at the door)Cid......!? What's wrong?

Name: Cid
Line: N, nothin'!! You and Cloud get inside quick!!

Name: Cid
Line: Hey, don't worry about a thing. I ain't about to die that easily.

Name: Tifa
Line: Be careful...!

Name: Cid
Line: Okay, here I go! Watch this!!

Name: Cid
Line: Damn!! That &%$^%$ Weapon!!Of all the times to show up......!OK then, come on!! You &$^%$!

Name: Cid
Line: You &^$#&$#! You tryin' to escape?

Name: Cid
Line: Damn, you gotta be kiddin'......!!Th, this's bad......! The main stream is kickin' up!!Somethin' way bigger than that last one is on its way!!No good!! Get outta here......!!

Name: Cid
Line: Goddammit!!You don't have time to worry about anyone other than yourself! You don't know when that stream'll blow......Whoa!!There's no time, hurry!!

Name: Cid
Line: Tifa!! Cloud!! Get outta here!!

Name: Tifa
Line: This is bad...... The tremors are getting worse.Wait a minute, Cloud.Doctor! Shouldn't we move him somewhere rather than stay here...?

Name: Doctor
Line: Hmm...... It might be safer to take refuge in a wide open space.

Name: Tifa
Line: Don't you worry about a thing, Cloud......I'll see to it that you get somewhere safe!

Name: Doctor
Line: No! The structure can't take it!! Hurry!

Name: Tifa
Line: Yes!Ready Cloud? We're leaving now!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Wh, where am I......? what's happening? I......?

Name: Tifa
Line: Huh...... what......? Who......?Who is it......? I can't hear......

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud, help me!!Eyaaaaghh......!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud!?What is it, Cloud? What is this......!?Is this the inside of your dreams? Or is it...... your...... subconsciousness......?You're searching, aren't you Cloud?Searching...... for yourself......I can help too. We'll work together to try and get the real you back!But...... Where do we start......?

Name: Cloud
Line: (sitting by the well)That starry night at the well...... The promise we made that night...... What if that memory was all a lie?

Name: Cloud
Line: (sitting outside the window)............ a sealed up secret...... wish......Tender feelings...... that no one can ever know......

Name: Cloud
Line: The gates of Nibelheim... Five years ago, Sephiroth passed through these gates......And...... That's how it all started......

Name: Tifa
Line: It connects...... to Nibelheim......?That's right... It's probably best to start from there......Let's go have a look, Cloud. I know it's not easy...... But I'll be right with you......

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud... look.Here's the well...And that's Gramps' Inn, too.The only truck in town. It's been here since we were little kids, right?This is the Nibelheim you remember, right?It's the same as my Nibelheim. That's why this place is...... our Nibelheim.

Name: Tifa
Line: Five Years ago... two men from SOLDIER came...Sephiroth and...... a young and vibrant soldier.Can you tell me again what happened?

Name: Tifa
Line: Five Years ago... I saw the real Sephiroth for the very first time.

Name: Tifa
Line: So this is... the Great Sephiroth.

Name: Tifa
Line: But to tell you the truth, I thought he was very cold.

Name: Tifa
Line: I remember, I felt a foreboding about him.

Name: Tifa
Line: No, Cloud.I've been hiding it for some time, afraid that if I told you... something terrible might happen.But, I'm not going to hide anything anymore.

Name: Tifa
Line: You weren't here. Cloud did not come to Nibelheim five years ago.

Name: Tifa
Line: I... waited. But, Cloud... never came.The two that were ordered here were Sephiroth and another person...

Name: Cloud
Line: You mean that member of SOLDIER who came with Sephiroth wasn't...... Cloud......?

Name: Tifa
Line: There's nothing...... I can say......You must find the answer yourself......If you can't...... Then you......Take your time, Cloud. Slowly...... little by little, okay?

Name: Cloud
Line: That starry night at the well...... And our promise that night... What if the memory was just a lie?

Name: Tifa
Line: Don't hurry, Cloud...... Don't answer too quickly.Just keep checking all those small emotions and it'll come back...... Slowly...... little by little.......Right... like the sky that night...... the heavens were filled with stars......

Name: Tifa
Line: From the beginning... OK?

Name: Tifa
Line: Try and remember, Cloud.

Name: Tifa
Line: Right, I was wearing these clothes.That's you, too. You were so small then......

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud, what about your other memories?No, not memories.A memory is something that has to be consciously recalled, right?That's why sometimes it can be mistaken and a different thing......But it's different from a memory locked deep within your heart......That's why it must be a fake. If he could recall up that memory......That's it! What about some memory that has to do with me?I say something and you don't remember it......But you say something, and I remember it, too... Then we'll know that's our memory......Talk to me. About anything, some important memory to you...Now that you mention it, why did you want to join SOLDIER in the first place?I always thought it was a sudden decision you made......

Name: Cloud
Line: ......I was devastated. ......I wanted to be noticed.I thought if I got stronger I could get someone to notice......

Name: Tifa
Line: Someone to notice you...? ......who?

Name: Young Cloud
Line: Tifa...... did you forget...... about those days?

Name: Tifa
Line: Look...... I......I'm sorry...... But what are you talking about?

Name: Young Cloud
Line: No...... it's all right. You were having a hard time back then.You were so busy with your own things, it's only natural you don't remember me back then.

Name: Tifa
Line: 'Back then'?

Name: Young Cloud
Line: It's important to me...... I hate to say it but... It's a very important memory......Do you want to see it?

Name: Cloud
Line: (sitting by the well)A promise under a starry sky... But what if even that was a memory that Tifa imagined......?

Name: Young Cloud
Line: Come on, hurry.

Name: Cloud
Line: ......a sealed up secret...... wish......Tender memories...... no one can ever know......

Name: Young Cloud
Line: Do you know where this window goes to, Tifa?Fine...... I'll go.

Name: Tifa
Line: My room?

Name: Young Cloud
Line: It was my first time there.

Name: Tifa
Line: Was... it?

Name: Young Cloud
Line: I only used to look up at it from outside.

Name: Tifa
Line: Was that the first day you came into my room?...that's right.We lived next to each other.But I really didn't know you that well.I've known you since we were children and always thought we were close...Now that you mention it... I don't recall you ever being in my room...

Name: Young Cloud
Line: Tifa always used to be with this three-some.

Name: Tifa
Line: ...That's right.

Name: Young Cloud
Line: I used to think... they were all stupid.

Name: Tifa
Line: What!?

Name: Young Cloud
Line: You were all childish, laughing at every little stupid thing.

Name: Tifa
Line: But we were children, back then.

Name: Young Cloud
Line: ...I know. I'm the one that was stupid.I really wanted to play with everyone, but I was never allowed into the group.Then later... I began to think I was different...That I was different from those immature kids.That then... maybe...

Name: Young Cloud
Line: I was so prejudiced. And... weak.

Name: Tifa
Line: Yeah... it was so sudden. I was... a bit surprised.But...It's true that we weren't THAT close, but...After you left town, I really thought about you a lot.I used to wonder how Cloud was doing.I wonder if Cloud was able to get into SOLDIER?I started reading the newspapers, thinking that there might be an article about you.

Name: Young Cloud
Line: Thanks, Tifa.Tell him what you told me, later. He'll probably be so happy.

Name: Tifa
Line: OK!Huh?What happened on this day? Was it a special day?

Name: Young Cloud
Line: This was the day...

Name: Tifa
Line: The day Mom died...

Name: Cloud
Line: I don't remember the path I walked.Tifa missed her step. I ran to her... but didn't make it in time.Both of us fell off the cliff.Back then, I only scarred my knees but......

Name: Cloud
Line: Tifa was in a coma for seven days.We all thought she wouldn't make it.If only I could've saved her...I was so angry... Angry at myself for my weakness.Ever since then, I felt Tifa blamed me...I got out of control... I'd get into fights not even caring who it was.

Name: Cloud
Line: That was the first time I heard about Sephiroth.If I got strong like Sephiroth, then everyone might...

Name: Cloud
Line: If I could just get stronger...... Then even Tifa would have to notice me......

Name: Tifa
Line: So that was it......Sorry, Cloud.If I had only remembered more clearly what happened, I could have done something sooner......

Name: Cloud
Line: It's not your fault, Tifa.

Name: Tifa
Line: But, I remember back when we were eight!That's it! Now I know!You weren't created five years ago.My childhood memories weren't all made up!Hang in there Cloud! Just a little longer! You've almost found the real you!Let's go back to Nibelheim again......!

Name: Cloud
Line: The truth is right there. We almost have the answer right in the palm of our hands.

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud, wait.Where are you going?

Name: Cloud
Line: ......The reactor......?To the reactor! The Mako reactor of five years ago!

Name: Tifa
Line: Hey! It's Cloud!

Name: Tifa
Line: You remembered!!

Name: Tifa
Line: That's right! It was Zack who came to Nibelheim with Sephiroth!Then, where were you, Cloud?

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud... Did you... see it all?

Name: Cloud
Line: I saw... everything...

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud!?

Name: Tifa
Line: That's what happened...

Name: Tifa
Line: ...You were there.You were watching me.

Name: Tifa
Line: Yeah, I remember.Hmm... so it was you.

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah... This is... me.I... never made it as a member of SOLDIER.I even left my hometown telling everyone I was going to join, but...I was so embarrassed...... I didn't want to see anybody...

Name: Tifa
Line: ...You came. ...You kept your promise.So you really did come when I was in trouble!

Name: Cloud
Line: Sorry... I didn't get there... fast enough...

Name: Tifa
Line: It's all right... Cloud.

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud......

Name: Young Cloud
Line: Then... this is goodbye, Tifa. Until we meet again......

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Oh, Cloud......! It's really you, isn't it?

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah...... Tifa...... We finally...... meet again......

Name: Tifa
Line: You stupid jerk!! You had us all worried sick!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud!? Are you all right!?

Name: Cloud
Line: V, voice...... Their......

Name: Tifa
Line: I see. We're... in the Lifestream aren't we?Everyone's waiting.Let's go back, Cloud. Back to everyone......

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah, I guess so... Come on, Tifa. Let's go home......

Name: Barret
Line: Yo! You awright!? Tifa!?

Name: Barret
Line: Don't worry about him. He's a tough one.

Name: Tifa
Line: Barret...... I...... When I was in the Lifestream I saw the real Cloud.I mean, I didn't really find him. Cloud found himself on his own...

Name: Barret
Line: Awright, I know... I shouldn't have doubted him.But I can't win against you. You're some kinda lady.

Name: Tifa
Line: People have so many things pent up inside of themselves...And they can forget so many things......Strange...... isn't it............

Name: Barret
Line: Yo, Tifa! Snap outta it!!Tifa......!?

Name: Cloud
Line: Everyone...... I'm sorry. I don't know what to say......

Name: Nanaki
Line: Don't say anything, Cloud. All you've been doing is apologizing.

Name: Cloud
Line: I never was in SOLDIER.I made up the stories about what happened to me five years ago, about being in SOLDIER.I left my village looking for glory, but never made it in to SOLDIER......I was so ashamed of being so weak; then I heard this story from my friend Zack...And I created an illusion of myself made up of what I had seen in my life......And I continued to play the charade as if it were true.

Name: Barret
Line: Illusion, huh...? Pretty damn strong for a 'lusion, I'd say.

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm physically built like someone in SOLDIER.Hojo's plan to clone Sephiroth wasn't that difficult.It was just the same procedure they use when creating members of SOLDIER.You see, someone in SOLDIER isn't simply exposed to Mako energy.Their bodies are actually injected with Jenova cells......For better or worse, only the strong can enter SOLDIER.It has nothing to do with the Jenova Reunion.But weak people...... like me, get lost in the whole thing.The combination of Jenova cells, Sephiroth's strong will, and my own weakness are what created me.Everyone knew that. I'm...... Cloud.......the master of my own illusionary world.But I can't remain trapped in an illusion any more......I'm going to live my life without pretending.

Name: Tifa
Line: You're sure messed up, Cloud!

Name: Barret
Line: That means there ain't no difference from before!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: By the way, Cloud. What are you going to do now?Don't tell me you're going to leave the ship?

Name: Cloud
Line: ......I'm the reason why Meteor is falling towards us.That's why I have to do everything in my power to fight this thing.

Name: Barret
Line: Good!! Then you're gonna keep fightin' to save the planet!?

Name: Cloud
Line: It's like you always told me, Barret.

Name: Barret
Line: Oh, uh, you mean that!

Name: Nanaki
Line: What? I don't understand!

Name: Cloud
Line: There ain't no gettin' offa this train we on!

Name: Tifa
Line: There ain't no gettin' offa this train we on!

Name: Barret
Line: The train we on don't make no stops!

Name: Crew Member
Line: Cloud, I was deeply moved by your story!I'm really a weak person and so I could really understand how you feel, Cloud!No one knows when fighting will begin. But let's get ready!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Listen, Cloud.We're right in the middle of the mission for the Huge Materia, right?I know this's kinda outta the blue, but there's a underwater reactor at Junon.As far as I can see, that's the only one left.That's that. Let's go!

Name: Barret
Line: C'mon, Cloud! Don't #&$* around!We're goin' to Junon, boyeee!!

Name: Tifa
Line: Let's do our best, Cloud!

Name: Nanaki
Line: I'm glad you're back with us!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: This's kinda on the spur o' the moment, but shouldn't we oughta get to Junon!?

Name: Vincent
Line: Escape from a world of illusions... Hmph... I wonder which is better...?

Name: Cid
Line: I know how tough it is bein' a leader, because I've been one.I always forget who has what materia.

Name: Crew Members
Line: Ahhhhh! Oh no, oh no, oh no!Sorry, I'm in the middle of a very delicate operation!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Huh?How would you even know? You don't know how tough it is... getting sick on boats and rides......So, please...... just leave me alone.

Name: Cloud
Line: ......I really do understand, Yuffie. When I get sick on a flight, it's a real killer.When I was in SOLDIER, I completely forgot about my motion sickness.

Name: Yuffie
Line: Oh......Isn't there any way to prevent this?

Name: Cloud
Line: Well, according to my research......First off, if you're nervous a lot, you won't get sick.But you can't always be nervous.With this much space, your best bet is to move around while you're riding.It also might be a good idea to stretch sometimes, too.But in SOLDIER, we spent a lot of time in trucks.That sucked!......And there's one thing you mustn't do when riding.And that is......Read!Once you get sick, there's nothing anyone can do.I know it's tough......

Name: Yuffie
Line: ......so you're a little better off than me.But I don't feel...... well.Where's the next stop? Can't you get there any quicker?Cloud, put me in your party, so I can get off this ship.

Name: Crew Member
Line: My hands are full, so I'll excuse myself here!Oh, yeah, yeah. Are you using Chocobos?I mean, just loading them up and transporting them.

Name: Crew Member in Chocobo Stable
Line: That's a good Chocobo.

Name: Learner Pilot (L8)
Line: Wanna Go?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yes- No

Name: Old Man at Entrance
Line: Ahoy! This here's Mideel. As you can see, this used to be a quiet hot springs town.Everything's gone now but in a way, I'm kinda glad everything's cleaned out. Feels better this way, ho, ho.

Name: Bald Man
Line: Hey, you feelin' all better now? That's good, real good.Now don't overdo yourself like that again, hear?

Name: Shopper
Line: Hee, hee. Welcome. It's here. The day's finally come! Your day to shop!!Do we have items and weapons!? Well, I should say so. And here's a bargain! What would you say to 50% off everything?Just kidding. Even I wouldn't do something like that. Now what can I do for you today?Thank you. Come again!

Name: Doctor
Line: Hmphf? You...!? How did you recover from your Mako poisoning?This is absolutely amazing...... I am so glad for you! Looks like your friends' wishes came true.You can see for yourself what things look like, but at least no one was seriously hurt. We're just very unhappy now.

Name: Nurse
Line: You probably don't remember, but you know that girl that watched over you for so long when you were sick?You'd better take care of her. If you don't, you'll be sorry. Believe you me!Well anyhow...... Hey, you all look terrible. Why don't you rest up for a while?

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: Welcome! We always welcome cash! What can I do for you today?I'm sorry. Our stock isn't so great now... But that's just the way it is here.If you're looking for other items, why don't you check out the other stores?

Name: Girl in Blue
Line: Have you seen my husband? He disappeared during the big earthquake and I haven't seen him since.I thought he'd be in the store......You don't think he got through that door and went to another country on the other side, do you?That's all just a dream...... Nothing like that could ever really happen. Heh...

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: Welcome. Just what you need at time like this--a shop of rest and relaxation. What you want?Thank you! We don't have many goods but you coming again, please.

Name: Girl
Line: Oh great. Now I've got to find another job......I guess I might as well make my side job as an accessory seller into my regular job.Well, since you're already here, why don't you buy something to take back with you?Thank you. Stop by again.

Name: Woman
Line: They say Shinra's gathering Huge Materia from around the world and bringing it to Junon.Bringing it to Junon must mean they want to use their airplanes.I've noticed there's been a lot of Shinra ships recently. I think they're going to the off-shore Underwater Reactor.Isn't Shinra trying to transport the Reactor's Huge Materia?

Name: Older Man
Line: I remember years ago, seein' the Shinra build a long pipe underwater.The underwater reactor is connected to Junon by a pipe.You should be able to get to the reactor through it.

Name: Priscilla
Line: Who are you---?Cloud!!Stupid jerk! Look how much you made me worry!! Were you at the Lifestream?

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah, that's right.

Name: Priscilla
Line: You've gotta be more careful! Because you're going to marry me one day.

Name: Soldier on the Path to the Airport
Line: The Shinra's collecting Huge Materia at the Junon Undersea Reactor!When they're done, they'll bring it to this airport.Get out of here before you get in the way!What... me? I'm gonna be watching from here, so that I don't get in their way either!

Name: Soldier
Line: After they get it, they'll take it to the airport and will transport it to Rocket Town by Gelnika. Don't let your guard down!

Name: Soldier 2
Line: They've finally started collecting the Huge Materia from the Junon Underwater Reactor.

Name: Cloud
Line: I may be mistaken, but...... Doesn't it feel like we're missing something?

Name: Commander
Line: All right!! Let's see how hard you trained!Attention! Charge--!!

Name: Commander
Line: He... hey--!! That's the Underwater Reactor!! Come back!!

Name: Soldier
Line: How 'bout, whoever stays alive, gets to take her out?

Name: Soldier 2
Line: All right, you're on!!But... What if both of us...

Name: Soldier
Line: Whoa!! Don't even talk about that!

Name: Redhead
Line: ...gulp... (Great... there went two perfectly good men!)

Name: Soldier 3
Line: OK! Back to work!! Back to work!!

Name: Soldier 4
Line: Yawn... I'm sleepy!!

Name: Soldier 3
Line: For Junon!!

Name: Soldiers in Reactor
Line: You, you're Cloud!!You are NOT getting this Huge Materia!!So you WERE after the Huge Materia!

Name: Cloud
Line: !? The Huge Materia!

Name: Cloud
Line: Did we make it!?

Name: Reno
Line: What are you doing? Help load.

Name: Cloud
Line: Either give it to us or else....which is it gonna be?

Name: Reno
Line: Unfortunately, I don't have time to deal with you.My priority is the Huge Materia!

Name: Cloud
Line: Damn! The submarine!

Name: Soldiers
Line: Y, you...!You're not taking over this ship!

Name: Soldiers
Line: You want the Sub? Just try an' take it!Um... sir! Maybe we shouldn't piss them off...

Name: Barret
Line: Come on, Cloud! Follow me!Damn, man!! ......what the...?Hey yo! Remember I was the leader first, man!Yo! We come a long ways since we got on that train!Lotsa things changed! This and that.

Name: Captain
Line: NO, NO!! This is terrible!

Name: Soldiers
Line: We don't have much time left! I don't want to die!There's still so much more I've got to do!I never even got to do my special victory dance in battle!

Name: Captain
Line: All right!! Then make this your first victory!!Go on, show 'em!!

Name: Soldiers
Line: Yes, sir!!

Name: Captain
Line: Remember your last training. Begin!!

Name: Soldiers
Line: Yes, sir!!

Name: Captain
Line: I'm back! An' now I got no regrets!!ATT----ACK!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Hmmmm...- Fight them- Take them prisoner

Name: Cloud
Line: Someone... please. I'm sorry I can't take it anymore.The lack of space, the shaking, the roar of the engine...

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey, you're right... I DO feel a little better driving.No sweat. Just leave everything to me.

Name: Soldiers
Line: I thank you! I am happy to be a hostage!Piloting a submarine is very difficult! I am completely clueless!

Name: Captain
Line: Hey! Who am I to know!

Name: Cloud
Line: Well, now what?- Read the manual- Sit in the seat- Leave it alone

Name: Fisherman
Line: It seems like there's something going on again up there.Is that huge plane going to take off again with that deafening roar?

Name: Older Man
Line: I just saw some Shinra soldiers all huddled together discussing something.They said a plane carrying Huge Materia would be taking off from the airport above.

Name: Soldier on the Path to the Airport
Line: Finished loading the Huge Materia!All we have to do now is to ready the cargo ship, 'Gelnika', for departure and we're done!

Name: Cloud
Line: Oh no! The Huge Materia...

Name: Cloud
Line: Rocket Town, of course.

Name: Soldier
Line: Whew... I hope everything goes all right until we get to Rocket Town. Then, our mission is nearly complete.

Name: Soldier 2
Line: Not so fast. We still have one major task... we still have to transport the stuff...

Name: Soldier
Line: The stuff...

Name: Soldier on the Path to the Airport
Line: I'm glad we got Gelnika to the Rocket Town safely.But they sure think big. Looks like they're going to use the Huge Materia's to break up Meteor...

Name: Cloud
Line: So this is the Leader Sub...Damn...... makes me sick just thinking about it...

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Phew... That's good to hear.

Name: Cloud
Line: This is the Shinra's Gelnika type airplane... I wonder why it went down here?

Name: Cloud
Line: What is this place...? Must be some kind of a Research Establishment because there's a Mako generator?

Name: Cloud
Line: Turks!?

Name: Rude
Line: ...again?

Name: Reno
Line: We just seem to keep running into each other lately!There were weapons and Materia developed solely to destroy Sephiroth.

Name: Rude
Line: ...but, it was attacked by Weapon and sunk to the bottom of the sea.

Name: Reno
Line: I can't give you what's here. We'll take out Sephiroth.I guess this is our last meeting.

Name: Rude
Line: I won't let you get in our way.

Name: Reno
Line: These guys are pretty tough.

Name: Cloud
Line: So Shinra's new, secret weapon was on this Airship...

Name: Cloud
Line: This must be the Cargo Room...This is terrible... It's all messed up...

Name: Cloud
Line: It looks like a key to somewhere...It seems really old.

Name: Cloud
Line: Several thousand years... ...Ancients?

Name: Barret
Line: Them Shinra guys think they're gonna fight Meteor with the Huge Materia?

Name: Tifa
Line: How are you feeling?You ought to rest a bit... Don't push yourself.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Shinra only cares if things are good right now.But, I plan to live for 500 years and won't stand for that type of thinking.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Them Shinra's ar' all gathered at Cid's Rocket Town...Yep... there ain't nuthin' I like more than lettin' out secrets.

Name: Vincent
Line: ...how does it feel, Cloud? Living for yourself and not someone else?

Name: Cid
Line: You said there's somethin' goin' on at Rocket Town...?

Name: Yuffie
Line: Hmph!......I wonder why anyone would ever make an airship like this......Ugh...... ugh......

Name: Learner Pilot (L9)
Line: Wanna go?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Go- Don't go

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Seems like Palmer of Shinra, Inc. ordered soldiers to restore the rocket...

Name: Man
Line: Even with all this goin' on outside, that guy still won't come out of the bathroom? He must be a damn water tank!?

Name: Mechanic
Line: What's young president Rufus doing by getting all those mechanics together?

Name: Redhead
Line: The Shinra serious 'bout launching that piece of crap rocket? But why now...?

Name: Old Man
Line: There's a bunch of Shinra people here messin' with the rocket...Is my rocket... all right?

Name: Old Man
Line: Hey Cid! I just thought of the best joke! Listen to this one.

Name: Cid
Line: I'm so sick of hearing these dumb puns, but okay... let's get it over with. Go on... let me hear it.

Name: Old Man
Line: Uh, now, let's see, how did it go......He's crude an' a jerk...I mean, He's Rude of the Turks!

Name: Cid
Line: And?

Name: Old Man
Line: President Rufus, lathers Tantrics...Uh, I mean... President Rufus, gathers mechanics...Raunchy meat, a pocket full, at the cafeteria. Uh, I mean... Launch a beat up rocket full of Materia.

Name: Barret, Tifa, Nanaki, Yuffie, Cait Sith, or Vincent
Line: (A fearful sense of humor...)

Name: Cloud
Line: (The problem starts way before his sense of humor.)

Name: Cid
Line: ...I thought it might be fun to hear some of your stupid puns again for old times sake... my mistake.

Name: Old Man
Line: Oh, 'crap-again' (oh, captain).

Name: Cid
Line: Dammit! That does it!

Name: Old Man
Line: How rude...

Name: Cid
Line: Rude, hell! You're the one who always cracks those #$##@& jokes!

Name: Old Man
Line: (lying on the floor)Ugh... Nice kick.

Name: Man
Line: Mmmmm, a SPECTACLE.

Name: Woman
Line: Is something about to happen? Oh, I'm getting excited.

Name: Soldiers
Line: Those terrorists are here!

Name: Commander
Line: Don't let them get any further! Everyone, ATTACK---!

Name: Commander
