Line: Urrrgh, you're not going anywhere! Uh un, nowhere!

Name: Cid
Line: Cloud, what are you doin'!? There gonna launch the rocket!!

Name: Man
Line: Mmmm, here comes some hard action!

Name: Woman
Line: What? You guys are terrorists? Wow, that's kinda exciting!

Name: Rude
Line: ...you again?...We will eliminate everyone who gets in Shinra's way.

Name: Commander
Line: You... you! Why are you here? Rude of the Turks should've been here!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Too bad. Those guys are over there.

Name: Commander
Line: Oh man... the Turks, being done in like that... But, I won't let you through!

Name: Commander
Line: urrrrgh...

Name: Cid
Line: Hey! What the hell're you guys doin'!?

Name: Mechanic 1
Line: Hey! Just when I thought somethin' was goin' on, you come back!

Name: Mechanic 3
Line: Listen to me, Captain. We're gonna launch this rocket!

Name: Cid
Line: Huh? What are you talkin' 'bout?

Name: Mechanic 2
Line: We're gonna load a Materia bomb in this and blow up Meteor.

Name: Mechanic 1
Line: Our rocket's gonna save the planet!

Name: Mechanic 2
Line: Urrrrgh. Man this is so COOL!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Wait a minute!

Name: Cid
Line: Shut up!! Just shut the hell up!

Name: Mechanic 1
Line: It's pretty much OK.

Name: Mechanic 2
Line: But...

Name: Mechanic 3
Line: We planned to run it into Meteor on Auto-Pilot, but the most important device is broken.

Name: Cid
Line: Broken? How's the repair goin'?

Name: Mechanic 3
Line: Shera's doin' it...

Name: Cid
Line: Oh great! What a buncha wizards you guys are! She's gonna take a 100 years!I'll take over, so don't worry about the Auto-Pilot!Hey, go ahead! Go tell everyone!

Name: Mechanics
Line: All right, Captain. Good luck.

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey, Cid! What're you doing!?There are generations of knowledge and wisdom inside the Materia.We're gonna borrow their powers and save the planet from Sephiroth.There's no way that we can lose the Huge Materia. You understand that, right?

Name: Cid
Line: Yeah, I understand. I understand that Materia is precious, and I also understand what you're thinking.But listen.I don't give a rat's ass whether it's science or magical power.No, I guess if I had to choose, I'd rather put my money on the power of science.Humans who used to only roam around on the ground are able to fly now!And finally, we're about to go into outer space.Science is a "Power" created and developed by humans. And science just might be what saves this planet.I was able to earn my living thanks to science. So to me, there's nothing greater!Now quit your worrying 'bout what Shinra's gonna do!I don't want to regret not having done something later.

Name: Cloud
Line: But, Cid......

Name: Cid
Line: Shut the hell up!! I don't wanna hear it!!Alright, time to get to work! Anyone who ain't involved, get the hell outta here!

Name: Cid
Line: What the hell......? What the hell happened!?

Name: Cid
Line: Palmer! What the hell did'ya do!?

Name: Cid
Line: Goddamn Shera! Why'd she pick today to get fast!

Name: Cid
Line: What the!? No countdown!? It just don't seem the same without it!

Name: Cid
Line: I finally made it... outer space...Let's see, how's the course set...?Yup, it's headed for a collision with Meteor.

Name: Cid
Line: That damn Palmer went outta his way to lock the Auto-Pilot device. We might not be able to change the course.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...this is the end?

Name: Cid
Line: Huh? What the hell're you sayin'? You're still young, and you give up that easily?I'm not gonna crash into Meteor.Just watch.I keep an Escape Pod on the rocket just for emergencies like this.I deciphered the lock code on the Escape Pod. We'll bail right before we crash into Meteor.

Name: Cid
Line: ......If you want the Materia, do whatever you want!The Materia should be there after you climb that ladder.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...You sure?

Name: Cid
Line: I dunno...I know what I said a minute ago.But maybe all that I really wanted was just to go into outer space.So, why don't you all do whatever you think is right?

Name: Cid
Line: Hey, Cloud.If you're goin' to get the Materia, it's this way.

Name: Cloud
Line: I finally found the Huge Materia...

Name: Cid
Line: It's structured so that the lock can be opened if we enter the passcode from this control panel.Hey Cloud, you know how to use it, right?Everytime it says, 'Enter Passcode,' push one of those O X <U+25B3> <U+25FB> buttons.If you punch in the right code, it'll unlock and you can get the Huge Materia!

Name: Cloud
Line: So, what order am I supposed to enter the passcode in?

Name: Cid
Line: I dunno. Just try and punch in the code randomly.

Name: Cid
Line: Grrrgh!Damn! My leg's stuck in the debris......

Name: Cloud
Line: Cid!!

Name: Cid
Line: Don't worry 'bout me. Hurry up and go! If you don't hurry, the rocket's gonna crash into Meteor!

Name: Cloud
Line: ...I can't go without my friends.

Name: Cid
Line: You ^%#@&%......! No time to worry 'bout other people!

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm gonna do whatever I can.

Name: Cid
Line: You're stupid. You're really $#&^%$* stupid.Tank Number 8 blew up...... So Tank Number 8... really was malfunctioning......Shera... You were right.But, ......this is the end for me.

Name: Shera
Line: Don't say that, Cid.

Name: Cid
Line: Huh!? Shera!?

Name: Shera
Line: I tagged along. I'm coming to help you.

Name: Cid
Line: You stupid &$#&%*%&%#!!......Sorry.

Name: Shera
Line: The Escape Pod is this way. Please hurry.

Name: Shera
Line: Hurry. I'm going to detach the Escape Pod.

Name: Cid
Line: Hey, Shera! Does this Pod really fly?

Name: Shera
Line: It'll be OK. I've been checking it till now.

Name: Cid
Line: .........Then I'm relieved.

Name: Shera
Line: ......Thanks.

Name: Cid
Line: (plastered to the window)So this is...... outer space...Man... it's the real thing... I'm really here in outer space...So long, Shinra No. 26...

Name: Cloud
Line: Rufus and the others plan was a failure...

Name: Barret
Line: What a bust... But I kinda hoped it'd work.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: We been botherin' them as much as we can...But there ain't no other way... Wonder if we've been wrong all this time?

Name: Nanaki
Line: Makes you worry, doesn't it?

Name: Tifa
Line: Don't worry! Think!

Name: Cid
Line: Hey! The girl's right.You start worryin' and there's no stoppin' it! Things just start fallin' apart and get worse and worse.

Name: Barret
Line: You're pretty damn optimistic! You up to somethin'?

Name: Cid
Line: Yeah, I been thinkin' about this and that.All the time we been up here lookin' at the planet.I been thinkin' even when we were floatin' in the ocean in that escape pod.

Name: Cloud
Line: I've... been thinking too. About the universe... planet... ocean.How wide and big... No matter where I go and what I do it won't change a thing.

Name: Cid
Line: Maybe you're right.But I came up with something different.I always thought this planet was so huge.But lookin' at it from space, I realized it's so small.We're just floatin' in the dark. ......kind of makes you feel powerless.On top of that it's got Sephiroth festerin' inside it like a sickness.That's why I say this planet's still a kid.A little kid sick and trembling in the middle of this huge universe.Someone's gotta protect it.Ya follow me? That someone is us.

Name: Tifa
Line: Cid... that's beautiful.

Name: Barret
Line: Yo! Cid! You even got to me!Do, now what? How're we gonna protect the planet from Meteor?

Name: Cid
Line: ...............I'm still thinkin' about that.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Huh!?Did you...... hear something?

Name: Tifa
Line: The planet's scream...... or Meteor...? Is it this planet?

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey, how do we know that this is really the planet's scream?

Name: Tifa
Line: Did you forget?Bugenhagen told us.

Name: Cloud
Line: Bugenhagen...

Name: Nanaki
Line: Let's go see Grandfather! To Cosmo Canyon!I'm sure he'll be able to tell us something that will be helpful!

Name: Barret
Line: That Bugenhagen guy... He was a weird old dude.I thought he was some kinda naturalist, but he was all into them machines.

Name: Tifa
Line: Did Bugenhagen...... tell you anything?

Name: Nanaki
Line: Hurry, hurry! We must go meet Grandfather!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: This's just between you 'n' me but...That there Bugenhagen feller, used to be a pretty handy Shinra worker.Yep, he ain't never bought no weapons or Mako though......

Name: Vincent
Line: The machines in Cosmo Canyon were presents of Dr. Gast.Wrapped up in the planet's strange notions surrounded by Shinra-made machines...Science and the planet lived side by side in that old man's heart.

Name: Cid
Line: Maybe it's just me, but has this ship been remodeled without me knowin' it?All these switches and levers. They're kinda gettin' to me.

Name: Yuffie
Line: What? Are we there?I know it's all for Wutai, But I can't take much more of this.

Name: Learner Pilot (L10)
Line: Shall we go?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Let's- No, let's not

Name: Barkeeper
Line: Even though they failed to blow up Meteor with the rocket, the Shinra haven't given up yet...Looks like they're gathering all the weapons from all their bases and are preparing for a final showdown.

Name: Man
Line: OK, which is it gonna be? Meteor hits us first, or that guy comes out of the bathroom?I'm not movin' from this spot till I see it with my own eyes.

Name: Man
Line: Even the rocket launch wasn't all THAT great.

Name: Woman
Line: Now that one of Shinra's greatest events is over, I guess it's back to the same old boring everyday life again...

Name: Woman
Line: Is Gramps gonna stay like that even though rocket's gone?

Name: Old Man
Line: My, my precious rocket... It's gone.Hmph, I know. No matter how much I look, the rocket's still gone.But I just can't stop it. Just call it an old man's folly if you will.Sorry to get you into this. For me, it's a kinda hobby.But, out of appreciation, let me give you this.

Name: Old Man
Line: I wish you'd take care of it and use it...Maybe it's time for me to get a new hobby...Mmm. You know that Shinra sports car at Cid's house? It might be fun to try and restore that thing...

Name: Redhead
Line: I get so restless now that the rocket's gone. And now that we can see Meteor clearly, ...I can't stand it.

Name: Mechanic
Line: I still can't believe that piece of crap rocket actually made it into space... I guess the mechanic was a genius.

Name: Old Man
Line: I got to learn more... Devotion, devotion.

Name: Shera
Line: Now all we have to take care of is Meteor, right? You should be able...Excuse me... ...Please take care of the Captain.

Name: Person
Line: That's funny... did I drop the key to this gate... somewhere? Was it when I was on that excavation tour?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Boy
Line: They're purty!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Girl
Line: Hey! Where's the flower lady?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Person Outside the Pipe
Line: These folks went wobbling off somewhere...They said something about the 'Reunion starting'... sounded almost like a chant. Wonder what the heck that meant.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Woman Walking Around
Line: I'm not going to look up or down! From now on I'm just going to look straight ahead.Maybe not. I'm just flapping my gums. I really wonder how things will turn out.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Person in Blue
Line: What's going on with the world? When it's all said and done, we're all gonna wind up dead.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man in Straw Hat
Line: Yeah, that's right! But, even so, where could we move to now...?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Person in Blue
Line: ...You've been talking like that for sometime now.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Materia Shopkeeper
Line: And I just got together enough money to get out of this place...Now it doesn't matter where I go! Ho, ho, ho...
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Item Shopkeeper
Line: ...stare... ......hmph... we only trade items for gil here. No matter what.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Weapons Shopkeeper
Line: I don't know crap about crap! But I do know one thing.The one thing that you'll always need is a good strong weapon!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: TV
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Kid
Line: SOLDIER? What about them!?Damn! If they really were from SOLDIER, they would be doing something about all this!!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man Upstairs
Line: The trick to bein' a real man, is not to fart around, but to let everyone know where you stand, right off!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Soldier
Line: Heee, ...... The Shinra have occupied this shop!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cid
Line: Hmm? Let me see that.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Tifa
Line: Cid! What did you do!?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cid
Line: Don't get mad, you'll just get more wrinkles. Hey, something's comin' out.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cat Kid
Line: I wish I could live with a real cat.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Punk
Line: We're not leavin' this city no matter what happens.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man Outside Restaurant
Line: It's a weird world we live in, so eat up and work hard.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man Cooking Outside
Line: I don't know what's gonna happen next, But first, you gatta fill your stomach.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man Outside Dress Shop
Line: Seems like everything has frills on it.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man Using Punching Bag
Line: These days, you've got to have strength. Come on, you should work out.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Weapons Shop Owner
Line: Oh, so you're back? I got something good for you. Why don't you buy it?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cloud
Line: You probably just found it lying around somewhere, right?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Weapons Shop Owner
Line: I'll admit that I found it, but you may never be able to get another one like it again.How 'bout 129,000 Gil for it?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cloud
Line: ...What kind of price is that?- Oh, all right... I'll buy it- No, I don't want it
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Redhead
Line: Listen to me! Something really big's happening in Midgar.They were just saying on TV it was Rufus second strategy and...That big cannon's pointed due north...... You think the target's...... Sephiroth?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man
Line: Sephiroth put up a huge barrier around the North Crater.Rufus wants to use a mammoth cannon to smash the barrier.He plans to have Shinra troops rush in and attack Sephiroth after the barrier falls.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Old Man
Line: Everyone at Shinra's in an uproar because they heard Weapon's coming.I heard a big hydroplane carrying secret weapons, got attacked by Weapon and was sunk at sea......
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Woman
Line: I heard a war's about to start! And that's why they're moving the big cannon!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Older Man
Line: Listen Cloud, I'm over the hill, but Priscilla is still a child.Isn't there a way to protect at least her from Meteor?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Soldier
Line: The Shinra Army's gathered at Midgar. Now it's just a matter of time Sephiroth's dead.What... me? I don't mind. I'll just wait here. My life is important to me.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Soldier Guarding the Respectable Inn
Line: Hmmm? Back again, Mr. Know-it-all!?All right! You can enter!!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Johnny
Line: No, no, NO!! Meteor's getting bigger by the minute!!I wanna live on the edge right now! I want to build a home with my woman and grow old together!If you can't do it, I will! And that's that!I'm gonna do my best, so you hang in there, too!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man in Hardhat
Line: Hey, the Gold Saucer reopened!We've got to play hard to get our minds of Meteor.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Redhead
Line: I'm gonna use all my life savings before Meteor hits!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Blond
Line: I know how you feel, but what if Meteor doesn't hit us? What are you gonna do then?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Station Man
Line: The Gold Saucer reopened. Why don't you go play hard and clear your heads as well as your pockets?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Dio
Line: (if you spoke to him while it was closed)I thought about it, but there was only one conclusion.I believed that because of the way things are, there's a need for a place like this.Enjoy yourselves... Ha ha ha ha...
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man
Line: Hey, how 'bout it, change your gil into GP?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- Not interested
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man
Line: Hey, thanks 1 GP is 100 gil.Is x gil okay?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cloud
Line: - Yeah- No
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man
Line: If you want some more later, I'll be around now and then.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Ester
Line: Hey, long time no see... How have you been?There's a lot going on in the world outside.It got a little lonely around here, but you can't keep a jockey from doing what he loves.How 'bout it, you want to ride again? You have your own Chocobo, right?Do you want to ride?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cloud
Line: - Let me register- Tell me how to ride it- Don't do it
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Zombie
Line: Welcome. No matter what happens in this world, The Ghost Hotel will always be in business.Uuuuuuuuuugh......For reservations, please step up to the counter.Uuuuuuuuuugh......
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Black-haired Man
Line: Hmmm...What, you too? With the way things are in the world, It makes you wonder what we're doin' here?Well, it's a little late for me to run around now, so I do what I love, it works best for me.Oh, by the way, did you know? I heard that there's going to be a battle and only the strongest will be allowed to participate.But what do they mean by 'strongest'? If ya ask me I'll say it's 'weapons.'But, there's gotta be a way to measure this too. Mmm, we need another way to measure strength.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man Practicing Kicks
Line: I'll give that Meteor my ultra kick...... ...or...... maybe not.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Registration Lady
Line: Those two over there eloped, saying stuff like 'OUr last moments together---' I can't bear it.I don't have anyone like that in my life so, if something happens, it happens....that's why I'm working now. Oh, sorry for going off like that...
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Registration Lady
Line: Um, I'm sorry, that's only for registered participants. You won't be able to go in through there until you come and register.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Registration Lady
Line: You know, I've been thinking about it for a while now, but you must be pretty strong?Probably strong enough to take on the top 1 or 2 fighters?Maybe you'll be good enough for the big match......How 'bout it? There's a private battle only for the strongest. Wanna try?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cloud
Line: - Let's do it- Not interested
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Woman Outside Battle Square
Line: I watched you win eight battles. I want you to have this!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Woman Outside Battle Square
Line: Good luck in the future, too!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Woman at Ticket Booth
Line: Sorry it's out of order.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man
Line: Hey, since the prizes changed, I got 5000 points again.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Woman
Line: Wow!! You're so wonderful!!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man
Line: Man, I finally got a prize...
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Chocobo Mascot
Line: I'll hang in there, even if I'm alone!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Man Running after Kids
Line: Now, be careful of Meteor.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Staffer Offering Prize Exchanges
Line: We got new prizes. But what's in them is a secret.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: First Person Playing Wonder Catcher
Line: I can't stop, no matter what's happening outside...
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Second Person Playing Wonder Catcher
Line: You sure are an unusual one. Staying here with all that's happening outside...... guess that makes, uh, two of us... huh?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Fortune Telling Machine
Line: Never give up.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Tifa
Line: Hey, Cloud. Let me ride once in a while.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cid
Line: Hey, Cloud. Let me hop on sometime.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cloud
Line: - Sure- Nope
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Old Man
Line: Shinra's tried a lot of things, but it's only HUMAN. It's fate that Meteor will kill the people.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Redhead
Line: ...Everyone's going to die. Everything's coming to an end.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cloud
Line: ...It's similar.This place... is similar to the inside of the Lifestream....All the different noise....The noise doesn't go through your ears, but directly into your head.It seems to mean something... but I can't quite get it. I hate not knowing what it is.That's what this is similar to.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: (any of the others)
Line: Now that you mention it...
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cloud
Line: So Aeris came here too... She stood in this exact spot...Hmm... Aeris didn't have to come here.She was able to find out all the information here.What Aeris needed was that altar... and only that.Aeris...... Aeris... What were you planning to do?What... are we supposed to do?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Holzoff
Line: It's dangerous past the cliff because of the Barrier!It's better not to go anywhere near it!!Like to rest a little?
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cloud
Line: - Oh yeah- No, thanks
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Holzoff
Line: (if Cloud declines)Don't over do it.
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Holzoff
Line: Look we can't go to the cliff! So just give it up!!
section: The World - After the Rocket's Failure

Name: Cloud
Line: I've heard this melody somewhere before. Managed to play well...

Name: Tifa
Line: I have the sheet music for that song.Huh? Wait a minute! There's something inside the music sheet.

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: NA
Line: NA

Name: Lucrecia
Line: Sephiroth... | Vincent...

Name: Lucrecia
Line: Sephiroth... | Vincent...

Name: Lucrecia
Line: Sephiroth... | Vincent...

Name: Vincent
Line: That voice? It can't be...

Name: Lucrecia
Line: Vincent......?

Name: Vincent
Line: (running towards her)Lucrecia!!

Name: Lucrecia
Line: Stay back!!

Name: Vincent
Line: Lucrecia... You're alive...

Name: Lucrecia
Line: I wanted to disappear... I couldn't be with anyone... I wanted to die...But the Jenova inside me wouldn't let me die...Lately, I dream a lot of Sephiroth... My dear, dear child.Ever since he was born I never got to hold him, even once...Not even once. You can't call me his mother... That... is my sin...

Name: Lucrecia
Line: Back!! Stay back!Vincent... Won't you please tell me?

Name: Lucrecia
Line: If Sephiroth is still alive?I heard that he died five years ago. But I see him in my dreams so often...And I know that physically, like myself, he can't die so easily.Please, Vincent tell me......

Name: Vincent
Line: Lucrecia... Sephiroth is dead...

Name: Vincent
Line: Lucrecia......

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. If you ever are in need of my wisdom, you are always welcome here.

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah, that's why we came.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: What to do? Have you lost your way? When that happens we each have to take a good long look at ourselves.There's always something in the deepest reaches of our hearts.Something buried, or something forgotten.Remember it... Whatever that is, must certainly be what you are all looking for...

Name: Cloud
Line: That's easy enough to say... But, I can't remember a thing.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: It must be there. Look harder!

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Do you see it? What is it that you are searching for?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Nope. Not a thing. Naw. Can't come up with a thing.

Name: Yuffie
Line: Me either! I don't get any of this!

Name: Cloud
Line: I remember Aeris a lot.No... not that.You haven't remembered.You haven't forgotten.That's not it...How would you say it... Aeris was right there all along. Right by our side.She was so close, we couldn't see her. What Aeris did... The words she left behind...

Name: Tifa
Line: That reminds me... I was the same.

Name: Nanaki
Line: ......as was I.

Name: Barret
Line: Me too...

Name: Cloud
Line: She said she was the only one who could stop Sephiroth's Meteor.

Name: Tifa
Line: But Aeris is gone.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Is it impossible for us to carry on... what Aeris tried to accomplish?

Name: Barret
Line: We ain't no Ancients, if that's what ya mean.

Name: Cid
Line: What, did that girl go off to that place?

Name: Cloud
Line: That's it!!

Name: Cid
Line: What's it?

Name: Cloud
Line: We don't know about it.What did Aeris know?Why did she face Sephiroth without running away?

Name: Nanaki
Line: I see... She returned there once again, correct?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Hmmm. Perhaps I'll have you take me there.

Name: Nanaki
Line: You're going too?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: What's so surprising about that...?Even I want to get out from time to time and see the outside world. I wonder what did it? I haven't felt like this in ages.

Name: Nanaki
Line: It must be the planet. The planet is calling you!

Name: Cid
Line: Yeah, hoo boy, the planet calling... right.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. Then let's go.

Name: Cloud
Line: Oh yeah, Bugenhagen. I have one more thing I want to ask you.We're carrying around Huge Materia. This is pretty delicate stuff and we would like to keep it in a safe place...

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. Then we'll put it upstairs. Now, shall we be on our way?I'll teach you how to work the machine. Watch carefully now. You just pull this here...

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. Is this what you call Huge Materia...?This is really rare Materia, indeed.Materia this rare is certain to have a special consciousness enclosed in it.

Name: Cloud
Line: Huge Materia...It is glowing strangely...- Get closer...- Leave it alone- Go back down

Name: Cloud
Line: This color... it's the same color as magic Materia.

Name: Cloud
Line: This color... it's the same color as command Materia.

Name: Cloud
Line: This color... it's the same color as summoned Materia.

Name: Cloud
Line: Is that... Bahamut...?

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hoooo. Good. Now let's leave.Do you remember how to use the machine down below? If you ever want to see Materia, come here anytime.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Hm, hmm, hmm!.......Smells like machinery.I love this smell.Of course, I also love the smell of nature, too......Hm? Is the deck up there?Then I'll be on the deck just passing the time.I can feel the workings of the planet in the smell of the wind.I also feel the greatness of man's wisdom and the knowledge in the smell of machinery...Well, bye for now.

Name: Yuffie
Line: Cloud...... urp...... ugh.You know, I was thinking...... phew...... Why does materia always have something to do with battles or magic?I bet the Ancients must've always been fighting.It must've been... ugh... terrible...

Name: Barret
Line: And Aeris... she's dead.Guess she turned into spiritual energy and returned to the planet, huh?But even if she did, there's no way we'll meet her again...

Name: Tifa
Line: I wonder what Aeris felt... when she was on that altar...?

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm sure she wanted to give her life for the planet...

Name: Tifa
Line: Really? I wonder? I don't think that's it at all.I think she didn't think she would die at all, but that she planned on coming back all along.She always used to talk about the 'Next time'.She talked about the future more than any of us...Although she never talked about it to us she must've had a rough life...I think Aeris looked forward to tomorrow and the future more than anyone......she must've had many many dreams......

Name: Nanaki
Line: Aeris used to pat me on the nose sometimes.I used to hate being treated like a child like that, but I also liked the attention.I wanted to apologize to her for what I did when we first met.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: I went an' told Aeris' Mom about her death.Yes, an' Miss Elmyra was cryin' herself silly... So was little Marlene...

Name: Vincent
Line: City of the Ancients...The Ancients... after a long time that is probably what others will come to call us...Hmmm... hwa ha ha ha... It's only a matter of time for us.

Name: Cid
Line: Aeris...?I wanted to give her a ride in the Highwind......

Name: Learner Pilot (LV11)
Line: Okay then, let's go!

Name: Cloud
Line: - Let's go!- Wait a sec......

Name: Elder Hargo
Line: (in the observatory)I hope great Bugenhagen will take care and not overexert himself.'Ho Ho Hoooo.' I may be light, But I'm not as young as Nanaki.Oops. That will only get you angry. You're just like me. Ho ho ho.

Name: Kid in Nanaki's Room
Line: Both Nanaki and Mr. Bugenhagen are gone... I feel so lonely...

Name: Nanaki
Line: Sorry... I'm really sorry. But now, I have......

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: This is...Yes...... exactly...
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: Are you getting something?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: ...give me a moment.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: The knowledge of the Ancients swirling around here is telling me one thing.The planet's in a crisis...A crisis beyond human power or endless time.It says, when the time comes, we must search for 'Holy'.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: Holy?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Holy... the ultimate White Magic. Magic that might stand against Meteor. Perhaps our last hope to save the planet from Meteor.If a soul seeking Holy reaches the planet, it will appear.Ho Ho Hooo.Meteor, Weapon, everything will disappear.Perhaps, even ourselves.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: Even us!?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: It is up to the planet to decide.What is best for the planet. What is bad for the planet.All that is bad will disappear. That is all.Ho Ho Hooo.I wonder which we humans are?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: Search for Holy... How do we do it?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Speak to the planet.Get the White Materia... This will bond the Planet to humans.Then speak to the planet.If our wish reaches the planet, the White Materia will begin to glow a pale green.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: ...This is the end.Aeris had the White Materia...But when Aeris died, it fell from the altar...That's why...... this is the end.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hooo!Ho Ho Hooo!Ho Ho Hooo!Look at this!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ancients' writing.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: Can you read it?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: I can't even make it out!!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: This's no time for jokes...
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: I'm not an Ancient. I can't read this thing!I may be old, but my eyes aren't completely bad yet. Look closely below the writing.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: There's something written in chalk... ...... (even sunlight can't reach)...... (Key)
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: It was probably written by a scientist who's been here... He probably used all his energy to make out these two words.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: Key......? To what?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: I don't know... But, it probably has something to do with our riddle.The riddle... then it must have something to do with Aeris.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: That Music Box over there. We'll put the key in it.I'll go use the key. You all wait here.And watch closely what happens.Ho Ho Hooo!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Now, go inside. Hope may be inside... Or......
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: This was just a screen to project an image!Look! Look at the image projected on the screen of the water!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: ...It's glowing.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho Hooo!! It's pale green!!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Aeris. Aeris has already prayed for Holy....After I gave up the Black Materia to Sephiroth...... Aeris' words came into my dreams...She said, she was the only one who could stop Sephiroth...... And to do that, there was a secret here...That was Holy...... That's why, she had the White Materia. Aeris knew about here... and what she had to do.Aeris has left us great hope. But, it cost her her life... her future...I'm sorry... Aeris. I should have figured this out sooner....You left us without saying a word...... It was all so sudden, so I couldn't think...That's why it took so long for me to find out... But, Aeris... I understand now.Aeris... I'll do the rest.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: Thank you... Aeris.Aeris' voice has already reached the Planet. Just look at the glow of the White Materia.But...... how about Holy? How come Holy isn't moving?Why?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Something's getting in its way.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: ......Him......He's the only one that could do it....Sephiroth. Where are you?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cait Sith
Line: H... Hey!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: What the?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: What happened?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: Moved it? That big thing......? Where...? Why?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: And, where is that!?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Rufus
Line: ......That's why, Reeve. It's your job to adjust the reactor's output.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Reeve
Line: I see......
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Scarlet
Line: Hah, hah, hah! Don't worry about adjusting it, Reeve.Once you open it up all the way everything will go full speed!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Heidegger
Line: Gya hah, hah, hah! The President's sure done it this time!If we can only defeat Sephiroth, the idea that Meteor will also disappear is based on different objectives!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Scarlet
Line: Please remember, Mr. President...It was my idea to fire Mako reactor powered shells.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Rufus
Line: Will the shells really reach the far northern border?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Scarlet
Line: Ah, hah hah!Of course!But Mr. President, please do not call it a Mako cannon.This new weapon will be called......The Sister Ray!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cid
Line: What's wrong!?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Crew Member
Line: It's a strange signal!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cid
Line: From where?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Crew Member
Line: (turning towards Cait Sith)It's coming from this... person(?)
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Wow!Hey!That was a surprise, the controls went crazy.This ain't good...Weapon came out of the sea and is heading straight for Midgar.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: The new weapon should stop him, right?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cait Sith
Line: I don't know if it's ready or not...
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Barret
Line: Hey! What's gonna happen to Marlene!?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Doncha worry none, Marlene's in a safe place. She's with Aeris' mama.Barret!!What was that scratching just now!?As long as Marlene is safe, who cares what else happens, right?I been itchin' to say this to ya fer a while now!When ya blew the Midgar No. 1 up, how many folks d'ya think died?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Barret
Line: ...that was for the life of the planet. Ya gotta expect a few casualties.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cait Sith
Line: A few? Whaddya mean 'a few'? What may be a few to y'all is everythin' to them who died......Protect the planet. Hah! Y'all sure sound good!Ain't no one that'd go against ya. So ya think ya can do whatever y'all want?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Barret
Line: I don't wanna hear that from no one in Shinra...
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cait Sith
Line: ......nuthin' I can do 'bout that...
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: Stop it!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Tifa
Line: Cait Sith...... Barret, he knows what he did.What we did in Midgar can't be forgotten no matter what the reason.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: OK! Let's go! We'll beat Weapon ourselves!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cid
Line: Hey Cloud......You think we can win against that monster? We got a chance of winnin', right?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: How would I know?But that's no reason for us to just let him go!We're goin' to Midgar and fight Weapon! Come on, let's move!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Barret
Line: That damn Weapon... He's one big *&$*&%$...Even Midgar's gonna be in trouble.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Tifa
Line: Whether you love it or hate it...You just can't bring yourself to leave Midgar, can you?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Nanaki
Line: Midgar...I hated the fact I was caught by Hojo and taken back to the lab where they did all kinds of experiments on me...But because of that I was able to meet you all...People you meet... others you don't...... strange isn't it?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Cloud, you do your best now, hear!?I know y'all can't forgive the Shinra, but them poor folks in Midgar ain't done a bit wrong!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Vincent
Line: ......we still can't seem to get near Sephiroth...
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cid
Line: That reminds me, there was a test rocket that landed in the Slums of Midgar long ago.I remember I was relieved when I heard it never blew up.
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Traveling is wonderful, isn't it?......
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Learner Pilot (L13)
Line: Cloud! I'm going!
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cloud
Line: - Okay- Excuse me, but could you wait?
section: City of the Ancients - Aeris's Prayer

Name: Cid
Line: Hey, HEY! What're ya tryin' to do? Break the Highwind? Let's fight on the ground!

Name: Cloud
Line: No, it's...... feeling something. ......Yeah, it senses murder.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Oh no! We gotta get outta here!Something big... I'm talkin' REALLY BIG's comin'!

Name: Rufus
Line: (laughing)......Fire.

Name: Tifa
Line: Which direction is it going to attack from?

Name: Nanaki
Line: Midgar!

Name: Barret
Line: Marlene!!

Name: Barret
Line: Damn...

Name: Nanaki
Line: It went right through Weapon......

Name: Cloud
Line: I see! They're after Sephiroth! The crater on the Northern boundary!

Name: People Fleeing
Line: WHOOA-- Weapon's attacking!Run for your lives!!

Name: Cloud
Line: What happened to...... Sephiroth?Northern Cave...Let's go see what happened to it.

Name: Barret
Line: When AVALANCHE was jes startin', we used to put up flyers everywhere.And now, we're up against Sephiroth. How about that?Feels like a long time ago.

Name: Tifa
Line: Now we're going to fight Sephiroth.I wonder what the inside of that cave looks like? You think Sephiroth is just sitting there waiting for Meteor?

Name: Nanaki
Line: Will we save the world if we beat Sephiroth?I'm frightened, but I'll do my best. Let's hurry to the Northern Cave!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: ......Wonder what that Sephiroth feller's up to?

Name: Vincent
Line: Defeat Sephiroth... Defeat the son of that beloved woman...Am I on the verge of committing another sin......?Or am I atoning as best I can for only watching...?

Name: Cid
Line: Maybe this is the time?

Name: Yuffie
Line: What's the pilot like?Tell him Yuffie says if he pilots the plane smoothly, give him my autograph...

Name: Learner Pilot (L14)
Line: Hey, Cloud!!!

Name: Cloud
Line: - Y, yeah, let's go!- U, uh wait

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth's energy barrier is gone......Cid! Can the Airship get inside?

Name: Cid
Line: Huh? He's my student, ain't he!? Of course he can go anywhere!

Name: Cloud
Line: Right, sorry about that.

Name: Barret
Line: Yo, Cait Sith! Now what?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Hold it!Scarlet! Heidegger! What's going on?

Name: Heidegger
Line: Strange. I can't reach the President!

Name: Reeve
Line: Not the President. To Sister Ray!

Name: Scarlet
Line: Ha, ha, ha. What is it Reeve? You're speaking strangely.

Name: Reeve
Line: None of that matters!The reactor's output is increasing all by itself!

Name: Scarlet
Line: Ww, wait a minute. That's not wise!It must cool for 3 hours or it won't work. Reeve, shut off the machine!

Name: Reeve
Line: We can't do that! It's inoperable!

Name: Reeve
Line: What about the mainframe? Who!?

Name: Heidegger
Line: Huh? Why are you giving orders?

Name: Reeve
Line: I don't give a damn about the details!!

Name: Hojo
Line: Ha, ha, ha...... Just you wait, Sephiroth.I'll give you all the Mako you want.

Name: Hojo
Line: Ha, ha, ha...... One or two Midgars? ...it's a small price to pay.

Name: Hojo
Line: Show me...... Sephiroth.It should be near...Ha, ha, ha...... Go beyond the powers of science...Before your presence, science is powerless...I hate it, but I'll concede to it.Just... let me see it.Ha, ha, ha......

Name: Barret
Line: YO! Do somethin'! Ya big cat!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: We're sunk. Hojo's doing this on his own.........? ...? H, huh!?I don't like this......

Name: Barret
Line: You're busted, Reeve!Too late tryin' to hide it now...

Name: Cloud
Line: Can't you stop the Mako reactor?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: ......We can't stop it.

Name: Barret
Line: You're from Shinra, ain't ya? So why's it impossible!?

Name: Cid
Line: We came a long way to get here. You better not double-cross us now!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: I can't make you trust me......

Name: Cid
Line: You damn fool! Don't you understand anything I'm saying?I don't give a damn about Shinra. If you're a man... no, if you're a human being, you'll save the planet! Don't you even care?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: No way! If we shut down the reactor, all hell will break loose!!

Name: Cid
Line: Why? Can't you just shut off the valve?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Yeah, it's easy to shut off the reactor's pipe valves......But the reactor made a path for the energy to escape from below.Once you open that, it'll be impossible to close it until everything blasts out...And we can't try to stop the energy from gushing out......

Name: Barret
Line: An explosion!!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: This blast'll be way stronger than when the number 1 reactor blew up!

Name: Barret
Line: Damn...!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Forget about that......... the CANNON! We've got to get to Midgar! That's the first thing!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Must stop Hojo... first.

Name: Reeve
Line: Looks like Cloud and the others are on their way. Stay out of the way!

Name: Heidegger
Line: Ghaa haah hah hah!Don't be so ludicrous! I don't recall you giving me any orders!The Peace Preservation will give their best effort to make the enemy retreat!Because of them, I...... I...!

Name: Reeve
Line: That's a private matter......

Name: Heidegger
Line: The President is dead! Now I'm doing things my way!Ghaa haah hah hah!

Name: Scarlet
Line: Ha, ha, ha.Heidegger! Now I'm going to use the new weapon!

Name: Reeve
Line: Hey! Wait!!Cloud, everybody! Sorry......But!!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: But!But you'll come, won't you!?

Name: Cloud
Line: I know!

Name: Cid
Line: Hey!I'm leaving the ship in your hands!

Name: Pilot
Line: I'm heading for Midgar!

Name: Barret
Line: Comin' and goin'... gettin' pushed around.But I got a debt to all them back in Midgar that I can't never repay...

Name: Tifa
Line: It's all right.You're here... Everyone's all togetherTogether... we can do anything. We've worked this hard already.

Name: Nanaki
Line: I wonder why Hojo performed so many of these experiments?Why couldn't he content himself with quiet research?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: I can't 'pologize to y'all enough.If I was just a bit more o' a better feller Ain't none of this woulda happened...

Name: Vincent
Line: Hojo... what a queer fellow.Such utter lack of scientific talent... compared with the genius of Dr. Gast......Lucrecia chose him trying to protect him...Now I understand... I understand... but...

Name: Cid
Line: We're busy runnin' back and forth!Even my bikini goddess would be pantin' about now!

Name: Yuffie
Line: Headed for... Midgar?Uh, a, anywhere's fine... I don't care. Just hurry up and land this thing.

Name: Learner Pilot (LV14 Limit Break!)
Line: Yo, Cloud! Whacha gonna do?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Move it!- Wait

Name: Pilot
Line: We've reached Midgar!

Name: Barret
Line: Even if we get there, Midgar's under martial law!There'll be no way we could slip into the slums.

Name: Tifa
Line: Looks like all transportation from the slums is cut off......

Name: Cid
Line: Hey, hey, whaddya think we have Highwind for?Where are we now!?

Name: Barret
Line: Huh? Where are we...?

Name: Cid
Line: If land's no go... We'll go by air!

Name: Cloud
Line: Okay then! We'll parachute into Midgar!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Here we go!!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Heidegger is going after you all.That's why it's dangerous out there. Let's go underground!

Name: Barret
Line: Sounds strange comin' from me...But it feels like home bein' back in Midgar.Kinda makes me sick...

Name: Tifa
Line: We sure got to know the Midgar underground.

Name: Nanaki
Line: I have an old score to settle with Hojo, so let's hurry and go!

Name: Yuffie
Line: This place smells gross. Let's get this over with!

Name: Vincent
Line: So it was Hojo who stirred up all this commotion, after all these years...?

Name: Cid
Line: Yeah! Let's get it over with!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: This is where we go in.

Name: Barret
Line: Leave this to me! Hurry to the cannon!

Name: Nanaki
Line: I smell it! The cannon's not this way!

Name: Cloud
Line: Dead end!

Name: Elena
Line: Oh no! They're here!

Name: Elena
Line: What are we going to do!? I think it's okay for you to ignore your orders now.

Name: Reno
Line: ...Elena, don't act so weak.

Name: Rude
Line: We're Turks, Elena.

Name: Elena
Line: ...Yes, sir. You're right.

Name: Rude
Line: Come on, we've got work to do.

Name: Reno
Line: I'm not really up for it, but...

Name: Elena
Line: Our orders were to seek you out and......Kill.Our company may be in turmoil, but an order's an order.That's the will and spirit of the Turks! Believe it!

Name: Elena
Line: What are you doing! Let's go!

Name: Cloud
Line: - Okay, let's end this- No, let's not go

Name: Yuffie
Line: C'mon, c'mon, c'mon, c'mon---!

Name: Tifa
Line: I'm all right! Hurry and go to the cannon!

Name: Cid
Line: Which way...!?Goddamn, piece of $#@^% cannon!!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: No, no! The Sister Ray's not this way!

Name: 2nd Floor Shop
Line: Welcome... to the fully automated store. Place your order... now.

Name: Cloud
Line: .........Is it broken?'- BANG on it- Give up

Name: Cait Sith
Line: No, no way...... I didn't know they completed it...

Name: Heidegger
Line: G'yaaa, Haaa, Haaa!!! Here they come!G'yaaa, Haaa, Haaa!!! So they really showed up!

Name: Heidegger
Line: You sure did treat us like dogs up to now!!

Name: Scarlet
Line: You killed off a lot of my precious soldiers!

Name: Heidegger
Line: G'yaaa, Haaa, Haaa!!! But let's see how you do against anti-Weapon artillery!

Name: Scarlet
Line: You guys are worthless, but my proud creation is a sure thing!

Name: Scarlet
Line: I'll show you the destructive power of the Proud Clod!

Name: Scarlet
Line: Not that! This is the proud Clod.........!?

Name: Heidegger
Line: Whoooooa!!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: We don't got any time! Please get on with it!

Name: Cait Sith
Line: This way, Cloud!

Name: Vincent
Line: (on a lower platform, watching)Damn! Hojo...!

Name: Barret
Line: Hey! This is...

Name: Barret
Line: This is great. Hold on, Hojo......!

Name: Cloud
Line: Hojo! Stop right there!!

Name: Hojo
Line: Oh... the failure.

Name: Cloud
Line: At least remember my name! It's Cloud!

Name: Hojo
Line: Every time I see you, I...It pains me that I had so little scientific sense...I evaluated you as a failed project.But, you are the only one that succeeded as a Sephiroth-clone.Heh, heh, heh...... I'm even beginning to hate myself.

Name: Cloud
Line: None of that matters... just stop this nonsense!

Name: Hojo
Line: (pausing)...nonsense?Oh, this?

Name: Cloud
Line: Why!? Why do that!?

Name: Hojo
Line: Quit asking me why, you moron.Hmm... actually, you might be cut out to be a scientist.

Name: Cloud
Line: ...your son?

Name: Hojo
Line: Ha, ha, ha... Although he doesn't know.Ha, ha, ha... HA, HA, HA...!!What will Sephiroth think when he finds out I'm his father?Always looking down on me like that.HA, HA, HA...!!

Name: Cloud
Line: Sephiroth is your son!?

Name: Hojo
Line: Ha, ha, ha...I offered the woman with my child to Professor Gast's Jenova Project.When Sephiroth was still in the womb, we took the cells of Jenova...HA, HA, HA!!

Name: Cloud
Line: I can't believe you're the one who did this...The illusionary crime against Sephiroth...

Name: Hojo
Line: Heee, hee, hee, hee! No you're wrong!It's my desire as a scientist! Heee, hee, hee, hee!

Name: Vincent
Line: ......I was...... wrong. The one that should have slept was......You, Hojo!

Name: Hojo
Line: I... was defeated by my desire to become a scientist.I lost the last time as well.I've injected Jenova's cells into my own body!Heee, hee, hee!Here are......Heee, hee, hee!...my results!!

Name: Hojo
Line: Gwah, haw, haw!!Haw... now let's seehow the Mako juice is reacting?

Name: Cait Sith
Line: I'm so glad you came.

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Shinra's...... finished.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: Meteor's gonna fall in about......
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Nanaki
Line: Seven more days. That's what Grandfather said.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: Nanaki......You want to see everyone in Cosmo Canyon again?
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Nanaki
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: (turning to Barret)You want to see Marlene, right?
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Barret
Line: Don't ask me that.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: We'll beat Sephiroth...Then, if we don't release the power of Holy in seven days......There won't be a planet left to protect.If we can't beat Sephiroth...It's as good as death for us.We'll just go a few days sooner than the rest who'll die from Meteor.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Barret
Line: Don't be thinkin' you're gonna lose before ya even fight!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: No!What I meant was...What are we all fighting for? I want us all to understand that.Save the planet... for the future of the planet... Sure, that's all fine.But really, is that really how it is?For me, this is a personal feud.I want to beat Sephiroth. And settle my past.Saving the planet just happens to be part of that.I've been thinking.I think we all are fighting for ourselves.For ourselves... and that someone... something... whatever it is, that's important to us.That's what we're fighting for.That's why we keep up this battle for the planet.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Barret
Line: You're right...It sounds cool sayin' it's to save the planet.But I was the one who blew up that Mako reactor......Lookin' back on it now, I can see that wasn't the right way to do things.I made a lot of friends and innocent bystanders suffer......At first, it was revenge against Shinra. For attackin' my town.But now......Yeah. I'm fightin' for Marlene.For Marlene... For Marlene's future...Yeah... I guess I want to save the planet for Marlene's sake...
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: Go and see her. Make sure you're right, and come back.All of you. Get off the ship and find out your reasons for yourselves.I want you to make sure. Then I want you to come back.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cid
Line: Maybe ain't none of us'll come back.Meteor's gonna kill us all anyway. Let's just forget any useless struggling!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: I know why I'm fighting.I'm fighting to save the planet, and that's that.But besides that, there's something personal too...A very personal memory that I have.What about you all?I want all of you to find that something within yourselves.If you don't find it, then that's okay too.You can't fight without a reason, right?So, I won't hold it against you if you don't come back.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: What are you going to do, Tifa?
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Tifa
Line: Did you forget?I'm... all alone. I don't have anywhere to go.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Tifa
Line: Everyone's gone...
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: Yeah, we don't have anywhere or anyone to go home to.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Tifa
Line: You're right...But... I'm sure someday... they'll come back, don't you think?
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: Hmm... I wonder...?Everyone has an irreplaceable something they're holding on to...But this time, our opponent...
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Tifa
Line: Hmm... But that's all right, even if no one comes back.As long as I'm with you... As long as you're by my side... I won't give up even if I'm scared.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Tifa
Line: No matter how close we are... We were far apart... before this.But when we were in the Lifestream surrounded by all those screams of anguish, I thought I heard your voice......sniff... you probably don't remember this...But deep in my heart I heard you calling my name... Or at least I thought I did...
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Tifa
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: We'd better go.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Tifa
Line: But, I still...!?
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: It's all right, Tifa. You said so yourself yesterday.At least we don't have to go on alone.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Tifa
Line: Yes... That's right!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: Okay! Let's go!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Tifa
Line: The airship is too big for just the two of us.Yeah, it's a little lonely without everyone.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: Don't worry. It'll be okay.I'll make a big enough ruckus for everyone.Besides, I'm the pilot.No more flying around casually like before.We won't have time to feel lonely.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Tifa
Line: Huh!?
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: It's moving......
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: Barret! Cid!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Barret
Line: O, oh...... is that okay with you?
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: Nanaki!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Tifa
Line: Why didn't you tell me!?
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Nanaki
Line: But, you know, Cid.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cid
Line: Hey, Nanaki.If you butt in now, you never know what they'll say later......
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Tifa
Line: ......Were you listening?
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: Vincent!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Vincent
Line: Why such a puzzled look?You don't want me to come?
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: No, it's just that you're always so cold. I thought you didn't care what was happening.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Vincent
Line: Cool?Hmm...... I guess that's just how I am, sorry.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Barret
Line: Well lookey-here. The Shinra Manager's come back.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Uh, excuse me but...I wanted to come with the main group, but I couldn't get away......So some people in Midgar took me in.I know I have a stuffed animal body, but I'll work really hard!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Barret
Line: I guess that's everyone.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Nanaki
Line: No, Yuffie's missing.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Barret
Line: She ain't gonna show up.'Least this time she didn't steal our materia. Guess we gotta be thankful for that.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Yuffie
Line: How could you say that!?I came all the way here after being seasick as a dog!I didn't go through all that just to have you guys have the best parts all to yourselves!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: Welcome back, Yuffie.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Yuffie
Line: Gee, Cloud...... that's so nice of you to say that. ......You sick?Well, whatever. I'm gonna be in my reserved seat in the hall...... waiting...... upp! ......Urk!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: Thanks everyone.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Barret
Line: We didn't come back for your spikey headed ass!We came back for Marlene. Guess it's jes' my...... whatcha call, feelings or somethin'.I, uh I ain't got now words now......
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Nanaki
Line: ......Although she's not here, she left us a window of opportunity...
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cid
Line: We can't let it go like this.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: ......Aeris.She was smiling to the end.We have to do something, or that smile will just freeze like that.Let's all go together.Memories of Aeris......Although she should've returned to the planet by now, something stopped her and now she's stuck......We've got to let go of Aeris's memory.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cid
Line: Has anyone here changed their mind?
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm counting on you, Cid.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cid
Line: Yeah, yeah......There are 2 levers here that've been buggin' me for a while now...Let me try them out.All right, so what should I do?You decide, Cloud.
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: This is our last battle.Our target is the North Cave. Our enemy is...... Sephiroth!So let's move out!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: We're almost to the North Cave! We're on our way, Sephiroth!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cid
Line: Man, I'm going to stick it to him!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cloud
Line: What is it, Cid?
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cid
Line: Errrrggh! Some incredible force! Losing... control......!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cid
Line: Get the hell outta here, flunkies! Didn't I tell you all to go home!?
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Crew
Line: Yes, sir. This is our home!!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Cid
Line: Oh ma--......stop trying to act so cool.All right, you jokers! Hold me down with everything you got!!Geronimo!!
section: The Highwind - What We're Fighting For

Name: Elder Bugah
Line: Where is the Promised Land...? Maybe Bugenhagen knows.Isn't Nanaki starting to notice? The reason why Bugenhagen sent him away from the canyon...

Name: Kid in Nanaki's Room
Line: He's finally come home, but Mr. Bugenhagen doesn't seem well...I want to hear Mr. Bugenhagen's talk with Nanaki like we used to do...

Name: Elder Hargo
Line: I think Bugenhagen has foreseen it.About the planet... About Nanaki... And, about himself...But, Bugenhagen would never say that. All he says is 'Ho Ho Hoooo'...

Name: Kid
Line: What's wrong with Bugenhagen? Is he sick?

Name: Woman
Line: No need to be sad, even if something should happen. Everything will return to the planet... Bugenhagen says so.Just the thought of something happening to Bugenhagen... worries me.

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho...... Hoooo. You......?It's been a while... since I've been out. I think I must have... tired myself out a bit.Ahh...... don't tell Nanaki. He'll only worry...

Name: Nanaki
Line: Grandfather!!

Name: Nanaki
Line: Grandfather!!

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: ...Nanaki...? ...you're still...... here?

Name: Nanaki
Line: I can't leave you like this, grandfather...!It's the duty of my... Seto's son, to guard this canyon and her people...

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: ...listen, Nanaki. I think you may already know.If you have any mission in life, it is not to defend this valley.Look at the withering mountain grass. Listen to the warble of the new born chocobo's.Look always to the eternal flow of time which is far greater than the span of a human life.It will teach you more, than staying here in the valley...What you will see will eventually become a part of life's dream.For my children...... And for your children......So please, Nanaki... Go with Cloud... And with your eyes... your ears...

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Ho Ho...... Hoooo. Now, now. Don't look like that. I'm all right.It's a wide world and you must go out and see it... You may even find your life's mate. You never know.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Grandfather......

Name: Bugenhagen
Line: Oh yes... take this along. I think it will look good on you now.Ho Ho......

Name: Cloud
Line: Nanaki... Is Bugenhagen...?

Name: Nanaki
Line: ......Grandpa told me that he's going away again!

Name: Cloud
Line: Away...?

Name: Nanaki
Line: It seems like he really liked that Airship.He told me he couldn't stay still and just zipped out of here!He even gave me a gift, look!

Name: Nanaki
Line: Wait a minute. Aren't you supposed to give gifts AFTER you come back?Ha ha...... Grandpa sure is strange! Haa... ha ha...... ha......

Name: Cloud
Line: Hmm... So maybe we'll run into him again somewhere.

Name: Nanaki
Line: Yeah... maybe...Thanks, Cloud......

Name: Kid in Nanaki's Room
Line: Nanaki, is it true that Mr. Bugenhagen left on a journey? Then that means he's better, right? He IS going to come back soon, right?

Name: Nanaki
Line: .........Don't worry. Grandpa will come back floating, saying 'Ho Ho Hoooo' again...

Name: Kid in Nanaki's Room
Line: Yea, that's right! 'Ho Ho Hoooo'!It's Ho Ho Hoooo! Ho Ho Hoooo!

Name: Gatekeeper
Line: Bugenhagen is what keeps our hearts strong...

Name: Redhead
Line: Hey, listen to me! I heard the barrier protecting Sephiroth is gone!But with Rufus dead, the Shinra troops don't know what to do. Heidegger and Scarlet don't have what it takes to lead the troops......I really thought something was finally going to get done, but everything's the same... not a damn thing's changed!

Name: Old Man
Line: Ah, youth... You really believe that big meteor filling up the sky's going to fall here?If Shinra, Inc was our last hope, and they've been beaten by terrorists...... Are we all going to die?

Name: Woman
Line: Dear, can you believe it!? They say that Shinra's gone under!!This world is coming to an end all because those terrorists called AVALANCHE stuck their noses in the wrong place!

Name: Old Man
Line: If something ever happened to President Rufus, That'd be the end of Shinra, Inc...... and the rest of the world, too.

Name: Man
Line: The North Crater barrier's been demolished?So now's the time to defeat Sephiroth.

Name: Barkeeper
Line: They say the remaining members of AVALANCHE broke Shinra's resistance and destroyed the Mako cannon at Midgar.What's going to happen to the world...?

Name: Person in Blue
Line: I heard the remaining members of AVALANCHE smashed the Shinra troops at Midgar.Lately, there's been a number of scary incidents. I hate it. Just hate it!

Name: Kalm Traveler
Line: OH! It's "Guidebook"! Wanna trade it for this Underwater Materia?How about it?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Trade- Don't trade

Name: Kalm Traveler
Line: OH! It's "Desert Rose"! Wanna trade it for that Chocobo over there?How about it?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Trade

Name: Kalm Traveler
Line: Ok then, it's a done deal!

Name: Kalm Traveler
Line: OH! It's the Earth Harp! Wanna trade it for some Master Materia?I'm not bein' stingy either! I'll give you all three of 'em!How about it?

Name: Cloud
Line: - Trade

Name: Kalm Traveler
Line: Ok then, it's a done deal!It's a 3-piece Master Materia set... and it's all yours!

Name: Kalm Traveler
Line: "[item]" and "[item]"... Will you guys look for them for me?Now if I can just get "[item]", I can start my journey...

Name: Kalm Traveler
Line: I guess it's time to go on a journey for the souls of my departed friends......

Name: Soldier on the Path to the Airport
Line: I finally got orders to join the Great Sephiroth Plan. I even get to go on the Gelnika too...But, I'm just gonna ignore them. I wanna live to see the end of the world.If I'm lucky... There'll be a good place for me in the New World.

Name: Little Girl 1
Line: Once the barrier's gone, I can hear cries from beyond the mountain...

Name: Little Girl 2
Line: A sad voice is getting louder every second!The mountain must be crying. Is it hurt?

Name: Man in Thicket
Line: A bright light hsattered the barrier at the crater! What in the world's goin' on!?

Name: Barret
Line: Heh heh...... heh heh heh... Time's got a way of sneakin' up on ya, huh?I'm shakin' all over... Heh heh... I feel sick...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: Hey, Cloud... Would you tell me 'It's all right'?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: - Say it cool- Say it normal- Don't say it
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Nanaki
Line: I am Nanaki, son of Seto... I am afraid of nothing...It's all right, all right. I'm Nanaki, the son of brave Seto... I'm not afraid of Sephiroth...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cait Sith
Line: But I ain't gonna forget, no matter what happens.Not about this here trip, or them folks--none of it!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Vincent
Line: Cloud...... take the ship to the Northern Cave.The time for flying is now past.Our battlefield is now beneath the earth...The gate to tomorrow is not the light of heaven, but the darkness of the depths of the earth......
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cid
Line: You ever see the play 'LOVELESS'?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: - No- Yes
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cid
Line: When this job's done, I'm landing the ship... yeah, that's what I'll do.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Yuffie
Line: Cloud...... sign this.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: What is it?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Yuffie
Line: It's a contract that says when the war is over, all the materia will belong to me.It's all in there. Read it carefully and then sign it, all right?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Forget it, I'm not even gonna read it.Whenever I read, I get airsick.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Yuffie
Line: Oh yeah......?I'm the same way, so I can't say too much......Damn! My plan failed. Let's pick on Nanaki later to let off steam.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Full Fledged Pilot
Line: Cloud, what do you want to do?- Go on- Wait a minute
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Crew Member
Line: I wonder what everyone's going to do when this fight's over?I wonder what's gonna happen to the Highwind...?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Crew Member
Line: Take care!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Crew Member
Line: Welcome! Everyone's waiting for you.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Looks like we can only slide down.- Alright, let's go!- We'll get prepared first
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: The road splits into two. We'll split into two groups.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cid
Line: Which you gonna choose, Cloud?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: - Left- Right
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Barret
Line: All right. Then I'll go...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: Then I'm going...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Nanaki
Line: All right, then I'll go...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Yuffie
Line: I'm going......
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Then I'll be heading...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Vincent
Line: Then, I will be going......
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cid
Line: All right! I'm headin'...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Now don't any of you die on me.......Gotta get through to Sephiroth!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: This will be the end of it!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: We'll leave this to [name].
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Another fork in the road...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Barret
Line: All right, I'm goin'...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: Then I'll go...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Nanaki
Line: All right, then I'm going...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Yuffie
Line: I'm goin'...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Then, I'll be heading...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Vincent
Line: If so, I will be going...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cid
Line: All right! I'm heading...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Wait! Sephiroth...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Where's [name] and the others...?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: This is the center of the Planet...?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Yuffie
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Yuffie
Line: Oh, all right.Here, Cloud.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Yuffie
Line: But I'm the one who found it, so you better give it back to me when you're done with it!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Barret
Line: Awright, this's the last dance!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: This is it.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Nanaki
Line: We finally made it here.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Yuffie
Line: It feels like we made it as far as we can.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Well, shall we get goin'?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Vincent
Line: Hmm... Being with you all is not so bad.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cid
Line: Let's just get this over with!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: - Let's get going- (No, not yet...)
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: All right, everyone, let's mosey.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cid
Line: Damn! Again!Stop sayin' it like a wimp!Can't you say 'Move out!' or somethin'?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Move out!!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Barret
Line: What?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Nanaki
Line: Look at the number...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cid
Line: %#@^! They're comin' out in full force!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Barret
Line: Cloud! You go first!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: I'm fighting here too.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Barret
Line: Shu'up! It won't do us no good wit' everyone back here!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cid
Line: Barret's right.You take two of us with you and go first. The rest'll catch up with ya later.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: Is this like a practice run before the real thing?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cait Sith
Line: Yeah, a major practice run...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Yuffie
Line: Heh heh, I'm fine with that. (It's probably more fun than fighting Sephiroth down there.)
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Vincent
Line: Hmm, this might be fun to pass time.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Nanaki
Line: They're coming! They're already on the floor next to us!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Barret
Line: Cloud! Hurry up and make up your mind!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: All of you!Later!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Where are we...?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Jenova...!?It's coming!!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Li...... ight......A light...Is this......Is this light...... Holy?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Barret!? | Tifa!? | Cid!?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Everyone
Line: Uuuugh...!!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Sephiroth!!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Barret
Line: Ugh...! Is this...... the true power of Sephiroth?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cid
Line: My... my body... I can't control my body...... Uuugh!?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Nanaki
Line: My front legs...... my hind legs...... my tail's about to tear off!!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cait Sith
Line: This is definitely not good...... He's way outta our league...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Yuffie
Line: I, I don't know if I can... go on...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud... Cloud...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Ugh... ugh...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: ...there...It's...... there...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud...?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: ...Holy...... Holy... is there......The Holy is shining......Aeris's prayer is shining......!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: Holy...... Aeris......
