section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: It's not over yet... This isn't the end yet!!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: - Let's go everyone...!- Just one more time...!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Everyone
Line: Eeeyaaaa----!!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Aeris's memories... Our memories...We came... to tell you... our memories... Come Planet! Show us your answer!And Sephiroth!! To the settling of everything!!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: This is all we could do.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Barret
Line: Wait! What about Holy? What's gonna happen to the Planet?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: That... I don't know. Isn't the rest up to the Planet?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: ...You're right.We've done all that we could do.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: All right, everyone.It's no use thinking about it.We'll leave all our worries here.Let's go home proud.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: What happened?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: ......I feel it...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: What......
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: He is still...... here.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Still......
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud!?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: He's... laughing...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: Cloud!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: .........Lifestream?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: ......I think I'm beginning to understand.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: What?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: An answer from the Planet...the Promised Land...I think I can meet her...there.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: Yeah, let's go meet her.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: Hey, where is everyone?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Barret
Line: Heeeey!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: (waving)I'm glad you're all safe!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Barret
Line: (turning to Cid)They all seem to be safe, too.But...now what're we going to do?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Nanaki
Line: Holy should be moving soon,and that means this place will...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cid
Line: Oh, Lady Luck don't fail me now...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cid
Line: Shit!!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Marlene
Line: The flower girl?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Barret
Line: Wait a damn minute!What's going to happen to Midgar?We can't let that happen!
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cait Sith
Line: I had everyone take refuge in the slums,but the way things are now...
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Nanaki
Line: It's too late for Holy.Meteor is approaching the Planet.Holy is having the opposite effect.Forget Midgar,we've gotta worry about the Planet.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Tifa
Line: What's that!?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Barret
Line: What the hell IS that......?
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Cloud
Line: ......Lifestream.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything

Name: Marlene
Line: It's coming.
section: Northern Crater - The Settling of Everything
